Deal ID 日期 目标国家 标的公司 交易类型 买方 买方国家 卖方 交易所属行业 交易金额 USD (mn) 交易价值来源 股份 % 评论
119365 31/12/2015 香港 Haitian Hydropower International Ltd 少数股权购买 China Orient Asset Management Corp. 中国 　 水电发电 (221111) 12.9 (官方数据) 4.38 Hong Kong-listed energy company Haitian Hydropower International said it sold 4.38% of its enlarged share capital to China Orient Asset Management Corp for HKD 100mn (HKD 83.7mn/USD 12.9mn). China Orient Asset Management subscribed for 100 million new shares issued by Haitian Hydropower International at price of HKD 1.00 per share. After the transaction, Mr. Lin Yang, the majority shareholder of Haitian Hydropower International, owns 65.67% of the company's capital. Haitian Hydropower International will use net proceeds from the subscription for its daily management and operation and acquisition of appropriate hydropower projects. Haitian Hydropower International focuses on operation of small hydropower plants in China. It generated a turnover of CNY 64.5mn (USD 10.5mn) for 2014. China Orient Asset Management Corp is a Chinese state-owned non-banking financial institution. Note 1: All multiples are calculated on a pre-money basis. Note 2: Operating leases were capitalised and included towards debt for the purpose of EV calculation.
116506 31/12/2015 中国 Qingdao Teco Century Advanced High-tech Mechatronics Co Ltd 收购 Shanghai Hanbell Precise Machinery Co Ltd 中国 Yamaha Motor Asia Pte Ltd 通风设备、供暖设备、空调、商用制冷设备制造 (3334) 3.08 (官方数据) 52 Shenzhen-listed Shanghai Hanbell Precise Machinery Co Ltd announced that it will acquire a 52% stake in Qingdao Teco Century Advanced High-tech Mechatronics Co Ltd for a total consideration of CNY 20mn (USD 3.1mn). Seller in the deal Singapore-based Yamaha Motor Asia Pte Ltd. Post-transaction, the buyer intends to import its products to Taiwan and Korea with the help of the target company’s presence in the said countries. Qingdao Teco Century Advanced High-tech Mechatronics Co Ltd produces air conditioning and refrigeration compressors and related equipment. The company had revenues of CNY 29.3mn (USD 4.5mn) in 2014. Shanghai Hanbell Precise Machinery Co Ltd develops and produces screw refrigerant compressors, screw air compressors and screw oil free vacuum pumps. The company is listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of CNY 989.7mn (USD 150.5mn) in 2014. Yamaha Motor Asia Pte Ltd manufactures and produces motorcycles and related equipment.
116324 31/12/2015 中国 Gultech (Suzhou) Electronics Co Ltd 少数股权购买 Gul Technologies Singapore Ltd 新加坡 Anhui Prime Cord Fabrics Co Ltd 裸印刷电路板制造业 (334412) 29.89 (官方数据) 38.6 UPDATE: On 24 February 2016, Tuan Sing Holdings Ltd. announced the completion of the deal. ORIGINAL: Singapore Exchange-listed Tuan Sing Holdings Ltd. announced that its 44.48%-owned associated company Gul Technologies Singapore Ltd. will acquire the remaining 38.6% stake, it did not own, in China-based electronic component manufacturer Gultech (Suzhou) Electronics Co., Ltd. for CNY 194mn (USD 29.9mn / SGD 42.2mn). The seller is China-based trading firm Anhui Prime Cord Fabrics Co. Ltd., a subsidiary of Singaporean holding company Nuri Holdings (S) Pte. Ltd. The acquisition will enable Gul Technologies Singapore Ltd. to acquire full ownership and control of Gultech (Suzhou) Electronics, a profitable business. Prior to the current deal, Gul Technologies Singapore Ltd. held a 61.4% of Gultech (Suzhou) Electronics. Tuan Sing Holdings, through its wholly-owned subsidiary, TS Technologies Pte. Ltd., holds 44.48% of Gul Technologies Singapore Ltd. After the deal, Gul Technologies Singapore Ltd. will own 100% in the target, and Tuan Sing Holdings' interest in Gultech (Suzhou) Electronics will accordingly be increased from 27.3% to 44.48%. Gultech (Suzhou) Electronics Co., Ltd. is engaged in the manufacturing of printed circuit boards in Suzhou, China. The company's book value was CNY 157mn (USD 24.19mn) as at 31 March 2015. Tuan Sing Holdings Ltd. is a diversified holding company operating in property, hotel investments, industrial services and other business segments such as manufacturing printed circuit boards (PCBs) as well as marketing and distributing of golf-related products. In 2015, it booked revenues of SGD 677.1mn (USD 478.7mn).
115321 31/12/2015 美国 Portola Pharmaceuticals Inc 少数股权购买 Temasek Holdings (Pte) Ltd 新加坡 　 医药制造 (3254) 38.75 (DW 估计) 9.4 Singapore state-owned investment firm Temasek Holdings has increased its stake to 11.8% in U.S. bio-technology company Portola Pharmaceuticals Inc., the target announced in a bourse filling. Prior to this transaction, Temasek held 5,833,568 Portola shares equal to 2.36% of the U.S. company portfolio. According to the bourse filling, Temasek now holds 6,583,568 shares of Portola. Based on the target's last trading price of USD 51.66 apiece as at 30 December 2015, the last trading day before the announcement, the deal value is estimated at USD 38.74mn. The transaction is in line with Temasek's long-term strategy in the pharmaceuticals sector. According to U.S. media, Temasek is an institutional investor bullish on Portola Pharmaceuticals. Portola Pharmaceuticals was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in California. The company is focused on the development and commercialization of therapeutics in the areas of thrombosis, other hematologic disorders and inflammation for patients who have limited or no approved treatment options. Its main products, Betrixaban and Andexanet alfa, address unmet medical needs in the area of thrombosis or blood clots, while Cerdulatinib can be used to treat hematologic cancers. Portola's shares have been listed on the NASDAQ stock market since May 2013. The company has around 100 employees, and its Market Capitalization was USD 2.87bn as at end-December 2015. Temasek Holdings is an investment company wholly-owned by Singapore's Ministry of Finance. It focuses on investing in the financial services, telecommunications, technology, transportation and energy sectors, among others. Temasek reported total assets under management of SGD 405.8mn (USD 290.0mn) for FY ended 31 March 2015.
114837 31/12/2015 马来西亚 Bandar Malaysia Sdn Bhd 收购 China Railway Engineering Corp; Iskandar Waterfront Holdings 中国; 马来西亚 1Malaysia Development Bhd 房地产 (531) 1,725.59 (官方数据) 60 Malaysian state fund 1Malaysia Development Bhd (1MDB) announced that it has agreed to sell a 60% interest in local real estate firm Bandar Malaysia to a consortium comprising Malaysian real estate developer Iskandar Waterfront Holdings (IWH) and China Railway Engineering Corp (CREC) for MYR 7.41bn (USD 1.73bn). IWH-CREC Sdn Bhd, a 60:40 joint venture company of JWH and CREC, won the auction in a field of 40 bidders. The transaction is expected to be completed by the end of June 2016. "We are delighted with the outcome of what has been a rigorous, highly competitive and value-enhancing process, which has exceeded our expectations," said 1MDB President and Group Executive Director Arul Kanda. In November 2015, 1MDB announced that it will divest all of its energy assets to China General Nuclear Power Corp (CGN) for MYR 9.8bn (USD 2.3bn) to be paid in cash. Bandar Malaysia (City of Malaysia) owns a land plot of almost two square kilometres in an old air force base some seven kilometres from the centre of the city of Kuala Lumpur. The land is set to be developed with a mix of residential and commercial properties and the project will serve as Kuala Lumpur’'s gateway for the high speed rail-line (HSR) to Singapore. Bandar Malaysia will be developed over a 15 to 25-year period at a projected gross development value of MYR 150bn (USD 34.9bn). China Railway Engineering Corp is a Chinese state-owned holding company and the controlling shareholder of Chinese construction and engineering company China Railway Group Co. CREC also operates in the industrial manufacturing, real estate development, and resources and mineral products sectors among other. The group has an annual turnover of over USD 100bn. Iskandar Waterfront is one of the main developers of Iskandar Malaysia, a development zone in Johor, Malaysia's southern state bordering Singapore. The company has a land bank there that will provide one of the stops on Bandar Malaysia's rail link.
114678 31/12/2015 美国 Lakefield wind farm in Minnesota, US 收购 Nebras Power QSC 卡塔尔 Abu Dhabi National Energy Co PJSC 风力发电 (221115) 　 　 50 Abu Dhabi National Energy (TAQA) has agreed to sell its entire 50% stake in Lakefield wind farm in Minnesota to Qatari investment company Nebras Power, the daily Khaleej Times reported. Financial terms of the deal were not disclosed. The transaction was approved by the US Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC). The other 50% holds Japanese company Marubeni. Originally, TAQA bought a 50% stake in the wind farm in 2013 from French energy group Electricite de France (EDF). Lakefield wind project is situated in Jackson County, Minnesota, Midwestern United States. The project consists of 137 General Electric 1.5MW wind turbines with total capacity of 205.5 MW. The electricity generated by the turbines is sufficient to power some 68,000 homes. Nebras Power was established in 2014 as a USD 1bn joint venture among QEWC (60%), Qatar Petroleum (20%) and Qatar Holding (20%). The company is pursuing continuing investments in power generation and water desalination projects, both within the MENA region and outside. TAQA is a global energy and water firm with operations in 11 countries across four continents. It focuses on power-generating assets, oil and gas exploration and production, pipelines and gas storage. The company has power generation capacity of 17,300 MW and water desalination capacity of 887 million imperial gallons a day (MIGD). TAQA is listed on the Abu Dhabi Securities Exchange and booked revenues of AED 25.8bn (USD 7bn) in 2014.
114668 31/12/2015 中国 iDreamSky Technology Ltd 收购 Prometheus Capital; Legend Capital; StarVC; We Capital; V Capital; Undisclosed investor(s) 中国; 美国 　 软件出版 (5112); 定制电脑编程服务 (541511) 504.97 (DW 估计) 77.9 NASDAQ-listed Chinese mobile gaming company iDreamSky Technology Ltd announced that it will be taken private by a Chinese consortium led by its chairman of the Board and CEO Michael Xiangyu Chen and Chief Technology Officer Anfernee Song Guan for around USD 505mn. Completion of the transaction is expected to close on Q2 2016. The consortium is made up of V Capital, Prometheus Capital, Legend Capital, We Capital, Star VC and other investors. The group already owns a 22.1% stake of iDreamSky's issued and outstanding shares. The buyers will acquire the remaining 144,276,684 Class A and Class B shares of iDreamsky at the price of USD 3.5 each, or USD 14 per ADS. The offered amount represents a 39.8% premium over iDreamsky's closing ADS price on 15 June 2015, the last trading day before it received the going private proposal. Cash proceeds for the deal will come from the financing from its rollover security holders, financing from the consortium worth USD 229.9mn and a loan from Shanghai Pudong Development Bank worth USD 161mn. iDreamSky Technology Ltd operates mobile online games such as Temple Run, Subway Surfers, Three Kingdoms of Fruits and Three Swordsmen. The company is listed on the NASDAQ and recorded revenues of USD 948.2mn (USD 158.6mn) in 2014.
114661 31/12/2015 开曼群岛; 中国 Kindler's Information Technology Co Ltd 少数股权购买 Joyoung Co Ltd 中国 　 软件出版 (5112) 30 (官方数据) 3.82 Beijing-based fresh produce e-commerce start-up Kindler's Information Technology Co Ltd, the operator of Benlai Life, announced that it has raised USD 30mn from its series C round of financing from a subsidiary of Joyoung Co Ltd. Joyoung will hold 3.82% of Benlai Life upon the completion of the investment. Founded in 2012, Benlai Life sells fresh fruits, aquatic and meat products on the e-commerce platform. The company has received USD 10mn series B round of funding from undisclosed investors earlier this year. It has established temperature-controlled logistics chain in 22 major cities in China. Benhai Life had revenues of CNY 268.1mn (USD 43.6mn) for FY ended 31 December 2014. Joyoung Co Ltd produces and distributes soymilk makers and small kitchen appliances. The company is listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and reported revenues of CNY 5.9bn (USD 915.7mn) in 2014.
114607 31/12/2015 巴西 Arapoti paper factory in Parana state, Brazil 收购 Papeles Bio Bio SA 智利 Stora Enso Oyj 造纸业 (322) 22.94 (市场估计) 80 UPDATE: On 28 January 2016, the Brazilian Antitrust Authority CADE approved the transaction. ORIGINAL: Finnish pulp and paper manufacturer Stora Enso Oyj announced it has agreed to sell its entire shareholding of 80% in Brazilian paper mill Arapoti (Parana state) to Chilean paper producer Papeles Bio Bio SA for EUR 21mn (USD 22.94mn), subject to certain closing adjustments. The investment is part of Stora Enso's plan to become a renewable materials producer. In addition, the raised funds will reduce the company's net debt by approximately EUR 18mn (USD 19.67mn). The transaction is subject to regulatory approvals and is expected to close in the first quarter of 2016. Upon the completion of the transaction, Arapoti mill will be 80% owned by Papeles Bio Bio and 20% owned by Chilean forestry products manufacturer Arauco. Arapoti's plantation company in which Stora Enso has a 20% participation, is not part of the transaction. Mrs. Kati ter Horst, EVP Paper division at Stora Enso, said that Papeles Bio Bio will benefit of the good technical condition of the paper mill, as well as of its portfolio of loyal customers. Arapoti mill is the only South American producer of coated magazine paper (LWC). Its production is mainly sold in Brazil, but also to some Latin American countries. The factory has an annual production capacity of 185,000 tonnes of LWC. Stora Enso Oyj was formed in 1998, as a merger between Swedish mining and forestry products company Stora and Finnish forestry products company Enso-Gutzeit Oy. Headquartered in Helsinki, Stora Enso is a leading provider of renewable solutions in packaging, biomaterials, wood and paper on global markets and has more than 27,000 employees. The company is listed on the Helsinki and the Stockholm stock exchanges and it posted revenues of EUR 10.2bn (USD 13.2mn) in 2014. Papeles Bio Bio, founded in 1957, focuses on manufacturing and sale of newsprint paper to graphic and printing companies in Chile, Argentina, Peru, Bolivia, Ecuador, Colombia and Paraguay. The company has an industrial unit with production capacity of 125,000 tons, located in the municipality of San Pedro de la Paz, Concepcion Province, and engages 230 employees. ________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE: Em 28 de janeiro de 2016, o Conselho Administrativo de Defesa Econômica (CADE) aprovou a operação. ORIGINAL: A fabricante finlandesa de celulose e papel Stora Enso Oyj anunciou que entrou em um acordo para vender a totalidade da sua participação de 80% na fábrica brasileira de papel de Arapoti (PA) para a produtora de papel chilena Papeles Bio Bio SA, pelo valor de EUR 21mn (USD 22.94mn), sujeito a certos ajustes. O investimento faz parte do plano da Stora Enso de passar a operar no setor de produção de materiais renováveis. Para além disso, os fundos arrecadados vão reduzir a dívida líquida da companhia em aproximadamente EUR 18mn (USD 19.67mn). A transação está sujeita a aprovações regulamentares e deverá fechar no primeiro trimestre de 2016. Após a conclusão da transação, a fábrica de Arapoti vai ser detida a 80% pela Papeles Bio Bio e a 20% pela fabricante chilena de produtos silvícolas Arauco. A unidade em Arapoti em que a Stora Enso tem uma participação de 20%, não faz parte da transação. A Sra. Kati ter Horst, encarregue para a divisão de Papel EVP da Stora Enso, disse que a Papeles Bio Bio ia beneficiar da boa condição técnica da fábrica de papel, bem como da sua carteira de clientes fidelizados. A fábrica de Arapoti é a única produtora sul-americana de papel de revista revestido (LWC). A sua produção é vendida principalmente no Brasil, mas parte desta é transportada para alguns países da América Latina. A fábrica tem uma capacidade de produção anual de 185,000 toneladas de papel. A Stora Enso Oyj foi estabelecida em 1998 como uma fusão entre a empresa sueca de mineração e produtos silvícolas Stora e a empresa finlandesa de produtos silvícolas Enso-Gutzeit Oy. A Stora Enso está sediada em Helsínquia e é uma provedora líder de soluções em embalagens renováveis, biomateriais, madeira e papel, a nível mundial. A empresa está listada na Bolsa de Valores de Helsínquia, gerou uma receita de EUR 10.2bn (USD 13.2mn) em 2014 e emprega cerca de 27,000 pessoas. A Papeles Bio Bio, fundada em 1957, concentra-se na produção e venda de papel jornal para empresas gráficas e de impressão no Chile, Argentina, Peru, Bolívia, Equador, Colômbia e Paraguai. A empresa possui uma fábrica com capacidade de produção de 125,000 toneladas, localizada no município de San Pedro de la Paz, província de Concepción, e envolve 230 funcionários.
114601 31/12/2015 智利 Inversiones Credere SA 少数股权购买 Grupo Catalana Occidente SA 西班牙 Atradius NV 企业管理服务 (551); 保险活动 (5241) 　 　 49.999 Spanish insurance firm Grupo Catalana Occidente SA has acquired a 49.99% stake in Chilean investment company Inversiones Credere SA, owner of 99.99% of local insurer Compania de Seguros de Credito Continental SA (Continental), the latter announced. Financial terms were not disclosed. The seller was Dutch insurer Atradius NV, which acted via Atradius Participation Holding NV. The remaining 50% interest in Continental are held by Chilean investment company Agustinas Servicios Financieros Ltda. Further transaction details were not disclosed. Inversiones Credere, via its wholly-owned Chilean subsidiary Credere SpA, owns 99.99% in Continental. Grupo Catalana Occidente offers life, accident, health, automobile, marine, freight, and fire insurance products. The company generated a net income of EUR 242mn (USD 264.4mn) for 2014.
119200 30/12/2015 新加坡 China Sports International Ltd 少数股权购买 Lai Zifang - private investor; Huang Huaan - private investor; Lin Changqing - private investor; Ding Mingxia - private investor 中国 　 服装制造 (315); 鞋靴的制造 (3162); 纺织品、服装和杂货批发 (4223) 1.31 (官方数据) 16.64 Singapore Exchange-listed shoes and sportswear producer China Sports International Ltd. announced it will raise SGD 1.73mn (USD 1.31mn), by selling 16.64% of its enlarged share capital in private placement with four investors. The subscribers are China-based entrepreneurs Lai Zifang, Huang Huaan, Lin Changqing and Ding Mingxia. China Sports International Ltd. will allot and issue a total of 192,000,000 new shares at a price of SGD 0.009 (USD 0.007) apiece. The company will use the proceeds from the placement to finance the further development of the breathable and waterproof membrane. The issue price represents a premium of approx. SGD 0.001 or 12.5% to the volume-weighted average price for trades done on 30 December 2015, being the full market day when the placement agreement has been signed. China Sports International Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells sports fashion footwear and apparel products under the brand YELI, and is licensed to use Garfield comic character images in its footwear kids. The company's products are mainly sold through distributors who have a retail network of more than 1,205 points-of-sale outlets throughout China. The company also produces footwear on an original equipment manufacturer (OEM) basis for various brands and exports to different countries in Europe, the Middle East, South America, Asia and South Africa. China Sports International Ltd. booked revenues of CNY 825.9mn (USD 134.5mn) in 2014.
116905 30/12/2015 中国 Shanghai Lingang Cultural Industry Development Co Ltd 少数股权购买 Branding China Group Ltd 香港 Shanghai Shenmeng Cultural Investment Co Ltd 游乐场、博彩和其他休闲娱乐活动 (713) 2.7 (官方数据) 34 Chinese value-added service provider Branding China Group said it will acquire 34% of Shanghai Lingang Cultural Industry Development Co Ltd from Shanghai Shenmeng Cultural Investment Co Ltd for CNY 17.5mn (USD 2.7mn). Shanghai Lingang operates the cultural park management project Sheshan Cultural Oasis with a planned floor area of 160,000 m2. It also manages a CNY 2bn (HKD 2.43bn) mergers and acquisitions fund. Upon completion of the transaction, Shanghai Lingang will be owned as to 35%, 34% and 31% by Shanghai Caohejing Development Area Sheshan Technology Development Co Ltd, Branding China Group and Shanghai Dahan Investment Holdings Co Ltd, respectively. Shanghai Caohejing is engaged in the management and operation of large-scale parks. It is controlled by Shanghai Lingang Economic Development (Group) Investment Management Co Ltd (Lingang Group), a major domestic park development and management agency. The acquisition is in line with Branding China Group's plans to expand its business activities to include park area services, equity investment services and corporate value-added services and will enable it to obtain outstanding park areas managed by Shanghai Lingang. Branding China Group offers various advertising, public relation and event marketing services in China.
116844 30/12/2015 新加坡 XentiQ Pte Ltd 收购 Vicplas International Ltd 新加坡 Tan Eng Khian Eugene - private investor; Ulrich Johannes Schraudolph - private investor 商业和服务行业机械制造业 (33331); 其他制造业 (339) 1.33 (官方数据) 81 UPDATE: On 19 February 2016, Vicplas International Ltd. announced the completion of the acquisition. ORIGINAL: Singapore Exchange-listed medical devices and plastic products designer Vicplas International Ltd. announced it will acquire 81% stake in Singapore-based product design and industrial automation company XentiQ Pte. Ltd. for a consideration of SGD 1.87mn (USD 1.33mn). The transaction is subject to certain closing conditions. The sellers are patent investors Tan Eng Khian Eugene from Singapore, and Ulrich Johannes Schraudolph from U.S., but his family is of German descent. The deal enables Vicplas Group to expand its manufacturing capabilities of the medical devices segment beyond polymer devices to electro-mechanical devices. The acquisition of XentiQ will provide enhanced access to research and design capabilities to Vicplas Group, which will seek new manufacturing opportunities from both new and existing customers. XentiQ Pte. Ltd. was established in 1996 as a technology company focused on product development and industrial automation. The company's activities are centered on medical devices, laboratory instruments and water related technologies. In 2007, XentiQ Pte. Ltd. was acknowledged with the Design Award for an innovative intelligent surgical tool designed for spinal procedures. Vicplas Group, established in 1993, specializes in two core business activities: the research, design, development and manufacture of innovative medical devices; and the manufacturing and distribution of plastic building products, including uPVC pipes and pipe fittings and electrical conduits. The company's products are marketed across Singapore, Middle East, Bangladesh and Asia Pacific.
115087 30/12/2015 乌克兰 Ukrbudinvestbank 收购 Svitlana Demyanenko - private investor 乌克兰 Aspra Finanz Holding AG; Never Mhitaryan - private investor 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 50.01 Ukrainian private investor Svitlana Demyanenko has obtained antitrust approval to acquire more than 50% in the equity capital of Kyiv-based commercial lender Ukrbudinvestbank, according to an announcement of the Antimonopoly Commission. The financial terms of the agreement were not disclosed. According to a report of Interfax news agency, Demyanenko is the founder of Odesa-based Finansovy Svit, set up in 2014 and engaged in currency exchange operations. Ukrainian Construction Investment Bank (or Ukrconstinvestbank/ Ukrbudinvestbank) was founded in 2004 by a group of Ukrainian and foreign companies for providing competitive financial services under the international standards. The bank's shareholders include Aspra Finanz Holding AG (46.3%) and Kyiv citizen Never Mhitaryan (53.7%). As at 1 October 2015, Ukrbudinvestbank was 101st out of 130 commercial banks in Ukraine in terms of assets and own capital that amounted to UAH 355.4 (USD 16.5mn) and UAH 128.9mn (USD 5.99mn), respectively.
114793 30/12/2015 乌克兰 Grain Land 收购 Continental Farmers Group plc 英国 Safastad Holdings Ltd 谷物及其他作物的种植 (111) 　 　 　 Isle of Man-registered diversified agricultural holding with operations in Poland and Ukraine, Continental Farmers Group plc, has obtained antitrust approval to buy over 50% in Lviv region-based crop producer Grain Land, according to an announcement of the Ukrainian Antimonopoly Committee. According to information of the unified state register of legal entities and individual entrepreneurs, Grain Land is involved in the cultivation of grain and technical crops. The company’s founder is Cyprus-based Safastad Holdings Ltd. In 2014, Grain Land reported net income of UAH 34.79mn (USD 2.95mn) and net losses of UAH 41.48mn (USD 3.51mn). Continental Farmers Group’s (CFG) business is production of wheat, barley, soya, maize, oilseed rape, potatoes and sugar beet. In Ukraine, the group has been present since 2006 where it rents around 32,000 ha of farm land (west Ukraine). CFG has been farming in Poland since 1994 and owns circa 2,150 ha of land.
114691 30/12/2015 巴西 Compusoftware Solutions & Resellers 收购 Softline Group 俄罗斯 Globalweb Corp 电脑系统设计及相关服务 (5415) 30 (市场估计) 100 UPDATE: On 17 January 2016, Russian business daily newspaper Vedomonsti announced that Softline acquired a 100% of Compusoftware, through a combination of cash (60%) and equity (40%) payment. According to the Russian media, the deal value was estimated by international services organization Ernst & Young to be between USD 25mn and USD 35mn. ORIGINAL: Brazilian software developer and reseller Compusoftware announced that Russian peer Softline Group acquired a controlling stake of its capital for an undisclosed sum. The seller is Brazilian cloud computing services provider Globalweb Corp. According to Azevedo Sette Advogados that acted as legal advisor to Compusoftware, the stake involved is 60% of the company's capital. The buyer acted through its Brazilian subsidiary Softline Brasil. Mr. Jose Azevedo, CEO of Compusoftware, said that the operation will strengthen the company's global position. The transaction creates one of the leading IT players in Latin America. In addition, it provides Softline with an access to the Brazilian market. Compusoftware, founded in 1992, offers solutions developed by some of the world's largest software producers such as Microsoft, Symantec, Adobe, among others. The company has more than 2,000 customers and in 2015 it was rewarded by Microsoft for being its best cloud partner in Latin America. Softline, established in 1993, is a multinational Russian company that operates in the areas of software licensing and provision of IT services. The company distributes software solutions and also offers software training and consulting services. Softline operates 81 offices worldwide and markets IT solutions in 28 countries across Europe, Asia, the U.S. and South America. It had a turnover of USD 908mn in 2014. _____________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE: Em 17 de janeiro de 2016, o diário russo Vedomonsti anunciou que a Softline adquiriu 100% da Compusoftware, através de uma combinação entre pagamento em dinheiro (60%) e em ações da própria empresa (40%). De acordo com a mídia russa, o valor do negócio foi avaliado pela provedora internacional de serviços profissionais Ernst & Young, para ser entre USD 25mn e USD 35mn. ORIGINAL: A revendedora de software brasileira Compusoftware anunciou que a homóloga russa Softline Group adquiriu uma participação controladora do seu capital social, por um valor não revelado. A vendedora é a provedora brasileira de serviços de computação em nuvem Globalweb Corp. De acordo com o Azevedo Sette Advogados que atuou como assessor jurídico da Compusoftware, a participação envolvido é de 60%. A compradora agiu através da sua subsidiária brasileira Softline Brasil. O Sr. José Azevedo, CEO da Compusoftware, disse que a operação ia reforçar a posição global da empresa. A transação cria uma das principais empresas no mercado Latino Americano de TI. A operação abre o acesso da Softline para o mercado brasileiro. A Compusoftware, fundada em 1992, oferece soluções desenvolvidas por algumas das maiores produtoras de software do mundo, como a Microsoft, a Symantec, a Adobe, entre outras. A empresa tem mais de 2,000 clientes e em 2015 foi eleita pela Microsoft a melhor parceira em cloud na América Latina. A Softline, criada em 1993, é uma empresa multinacional russa que atua nas áreas de licenciamento de software e prestação de serviços de TI. A companhia distribui soluções de software e ainda oferece treinamento e serviços de consultoria nesta área. A Softline opera 81 escritórios em todo o mundo e comercializa soluções de TI em 28 países na Europa, Ásia, os EUA e América do Sul. A empresa teve um faturamento de USD 908mn em 2014.
114633 30/12/2015 智利 Captagua Ingenieria SA 收购 Orbit Garant Drilling Inc 加拿大 Inmobiliaria y Constructora Lo Barnechea SA; Empresas Nalac SA 采矿业辅助活动 (213) 1.52 (官方数据) 100 Canadian mineral drilling services provider Orbit Garant Drilling Inc announced the acquisition of Chilean counterpart Captagua Ingenieria SA for CLP 1.08bn (USD 1.5mn), payable in shares. Orbit Garant will satisfy the payment via the issue of 1,824,900 common shares to the sellers. The deal value is subject to adjustments, contingent on the cash amount received by Captagua from specific tax return following completion of the transaction, and which will amount to up to CLP 330mn (USD 0.47mn). Eric Alexandre, President and CEO of Orbit Garant, said that this acquisition enhances the company's presence in Chile, and that it strengthens its platform for further growth in the country and in South America. Captagua Ingenieria offers surface drilling services such as diamond drilling and reverse circulation, serving the Chilean mineral exploration and mining industry. The company generated annual revenues in the range of CLP 9bn (USD 12.7mn) to CLP 13bn (USD 18.4mn) over the last three years. Orbit Garant Drilling provides contract underground and surface drilling services in South America and the U.S. Currently, the company has 226 drill rigs and serves major, intermediate, and junior mining companies. It registered revenues of CAD 79mn (USD 57mn) and a net loss of CAD 7mn (USD 5.04mn) for FY ended 30 June 2015. Note 1: Target's MVE/Sales and EV/Sales multiples use the rough average figure of CLP 11mn (USD 15.5mn) as annual sales, based on the annual revenues generated by Captagua over the last three years which range from CLP 9bn (USD 12.7mn) to CLP 13bn (USD 18.4mn). Note 2: Target's net debt and book value figures are as of 30 November 2015.
114624 30/12/2015 波兰 Polish online business of Goldbach Group 收购 Ströer Group 德国 Goldbach Group AG 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418) 4.55 (官方数据) 100 German out-of-home and online advertising firm Stroer Media announced that it has acquired Polish online business of Swish peer Goldbach Group. According to the seller's legal adviser Wardynski, the deal value was CHF 4.5mn (EUR 4.17mn). The transaction is expected to close in Q1 2016. In July 2015, Stroer has acquired Polish internet advertising firm Ad-vice from local marketing and public relations agency Cam Media for PLN 4.6mn (EUR 1.1mn). Goldbach is currently Poland's second-largest advertising network, after Google, with 20 million unique users and over 800 websites, 450 of which under exclusive marketing agreements. Stroer commercialises more than 300,000 out-of-home advertising faces and several thousand websites. The company employs 2,700 people at 70 locations. It reached revenues of EUR 721mn in 2014. Goldbach Group, established in 2001, is a network for electronic communication solutions as well as a centre of logistics for the marketing of private electronic, mobile and interactive media in the areas of TV, internet TV, radio, out-of-home, internet, ingame advertising and also search engine and mobile marketing. The group posted revenues of EUR 464mn in 2014.
114599 30/12/2015 土耳其 Sekerbank 少数股权购买 Kazkommertsbank JSC 哈萨克斯坦 Sovereign Wealth Fund Samruk-Kazyna 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 19.37 Kazakh private lender Kazkommertsbank said it will acquire a 19.37% stake in Turkish peer Sekerbank from Kazakhstan's Sovereign Wealth Fund Samruk-Kazyna. No financial details were disclosed. The sale price will be determined at the date of share transfer. The completion is subject to satisfaction of conditions precedent, including regulatory approval. The purchase increases Kazkommertsbank's stake in Sekerbank to 30.28%. Kazkommertsbank has hired an advisor to sell the stake to a strategic investor. The other main shareholder in Sekerbank is Sekerbank employees social security fund SEMVAK with a 35.44% stake. Sekerbank was established in 1956 to support sugar beet farmers. Currently the bank has over 300 branches countrywide and is listed on Borsa Istanbul. Kazkommertsbank is the largest bank by total assets in Kazakhstan and is one of the biggest commercial banks in the Commonwealth of Independent States (CIS). The bank was recently taken over by Kazakh entrepreneur and venture investor Kenes Rakishev.
114600 30/12/2015 巴西 Rede D'Or Sao Luiz SA 少数股权购买 The Carlyle Group LP 美国 GIC Pte Ltd 医院服务 (622) 101.42 (官方数据) 2 Singapore's sovereign wealth fund GIC Private Ltd has sold a 2% stake in Brazilian hospital operator Rede D'Or Sao Luiz SA to U.S. private equity firm The Carlyle Group LP for BRL 400mn (USD 101.42mn). The information was provided by Demarest Advogados that acted as legal advisor to GIC. The deal follows three previous investments made by GIC in Rede D'Or in 2015. On 27 May 2015, GIC has acquired a 15% stake in Rede D'Or for BRL 3.2bn (USD 1.026mn), and on 31 July, the firm purchased an additional stake of 1% for BRL 310mn (USD 89.3mn). The third acquisition was completed on 30 December when GIC acquired 12% of Rede D'Or for BRL 2.38bn (USD 615mn). Rede D'Or Sao Luiz SA, established in 1977 by the Moll family in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, operates a network of 30 hospitals with over 4,700 beds and 46 laboratories under the Labs D'Or brand, located in the states of Rio de Janeiro, Sao Paulo, Pernambuco and the Federal District. With a team of more than 34,000 employees and 87,000 affiliated doctors, annually, the company has over 2.9 million emergency room visits, 170,000 surgeries and 270,000 inpatient treatments, serving an addressable market of 53 million people. Rede D'Or had revenues of BRL 5bn (USD 2.13bn) and a net income of BRL 322.9mn (USD 137.6mn) in 2014. The Carlyle Group is a global alternative investment firm with USD 193bn in assets under management across 128 funds and 159 fund of funds vehicles as of 30 June 2015. With a team of more than 1,650 professionals in 35 offices across six continents, the company specialises in private equity investments in the aerospace, defence, consumer and retail, energy, financial services, healthcare, industrial, technology and business services, telecommunications, media and transportation sectors. The Carlyle Group is listed on the NASDAQ Stock Market and had a turnover of USD 1.16bn and a net profit of USD 915mn for 2014. GIC Private Ltd, incorporated in 1981, is the sovereign wealth fund of the Government of Singapore, with over USD 100bn of assets under management as of 31 March 2015, focused on investments in public and private equities, fixed income assets, real estate, natural resources and infrastructure in more than 40 countries worldwide. The company operates offices in Singapore, Brazil, India, Japan, China, Korea, the United Kingdom, and the United States, and has 1,200 employees. ______________________________________________________________________________________________ O fundo soberano de Cingapura GIC Private Ltd vendeu 2% da operadora brasileira de hospitais Rede D'Or São Luiz SA para a empresa de investimento em participações norte-americana Carlyle Group LP, por BRL 400mn (USD 101.42mn). A informação foi fornecida pelo Demarest Advogados que atuou como assessor jurídico para o GIC. O acordo complementa uma série de outros três investimentos feitos pelo GIC na Rede D'Or em 2015. Em 27 de maio de 2015, o GIC adquiriu uma participação de 15% na Rede D'Or, por BRL 3.2bn (USD 1.026mn), e em 31 de julho, a empresa adquiriu uma participação adicional de 1%, por BRL 310mn (USD 89.3mn). A terceira aquisição foi concluída em 30 de dezembro, quando o GIC adquiriu 12% da Rede D'Or, por BRL 2.38bn (USD 615mn). A Rede D'Or, fundada em 1977 pela família Moll, no Rio de Janeiro, Brasil,, opera uma rede de 30 hospitais com mais de 4,700 leitos e 46 laboratórios sob a marca Labs D'Or, localizados nos estados do Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo, Pernambuco e no Distrito Federal. Com uma equipe de mais de 34,000 funcionários e 87,000 médicos afiliados, anualmente o grupo tem mais de 2.9 milhões de atendimentos de emergência, 170,000 cirurgias e 270,000 tratamentos de internação, servindo um mercado potencial de 53 milhões de pessoas. A Rede D'Or postou receitas de vendas de BRL 5bn (USD 2.13bn) e um lucro líquido de BRL 322.9mn (USD 137.6mn) em 2014. O Carlyle Group é uma empresa global de investimentos alternativos com USD 193bn em ativos sob gestão distribuídos em 128 fundos e 159 fundos de fundos em 30 de junho de 2015. Com uma equipe de 1,650 profissionais em 35 escritórios em seis continentes, a empresa é especializada em investimentos em participações nos setores aeroespacial, defesa, varejo, energia, serviços financeiros, saúde, industria, tecnologia, serviços de negócios, telecomunicações, mídia e transporte. O Carlyle Group está listado na Bolsa de Valores de NASDAQ e registou um faturamento de USD 1.16bn e um lucro líquido de USD 915mn em 2014. O GIC Private Ltd, criado em 1981, é o fundo de riqueza soberana do Governo de Cingapura com mais de USD 100bn de ativos sob gestão a data de 31 de março de 2015, focado em investimentos em títulos públicos e privados, ativos de renda fixa, imóveis, recursos naturais e infraestrutura em 40 países. A empresa tem escritórios em Cingapura, Brasil, Índia, Japão, China, Coreia do Sul, Reino Unido e Estados Unidos e envolve 1,200 colaboradores.
114604 30/12/2015 秘鲁 Strip Centers del Peru SA 少数股权购买 Parque Arauco SA (PASA) 智利 Los Portales SA 房地产 (531) 19.43 (官方数据) 49 Chilean shopping centres developer and operator Parque Arauco SA (PASA) announced it has acquired a 49% stake in Peruvian real estate properties manager Strip Centers del Peru SA from Peruvian real estate developer Los Portales SA for PEN 67mn (USD 19.4mn). PASA acted via its subsidiary Inmuebles Comerciales del Peru SAC. Following this operation, PASA becomes the sole owner of Strip Centers del Peru. For its part Los Portales said that the sale is aligned with the company's strategy of focusing on the urban qualification, dwelling, parking and hotels areas of the real estate sector. Strip Centers del Peru operates the Lima Outlet Center project in Peru. The company reported a net loss of PEN 8.6mn (USD 2.5mn) for 2014. Parque Arauco develops, operates and manages regional shopping centres, neighbourhood shopping centres, outlet malls and strip centres in Chile, Peru and Colombia. It reported a net income of CLP 61.74bn (USD 90mn) for 2014. In October 2015, PASA announced it has agreed to acquire a 45% stake in Colombian real estate firm Inversiones Inmobiliarias Arauco Alameda SAS (IARA) for COP 222.5bn (USD 76mn), as well as Peruvian peer Sercenco SA for an enterprise value of USD 15.3mn.
114596 30/12/2015 波兰 Atrium Centrum office building in Warsaw; Atrium Plaza office building in Warsaw; Poznan Financial Center office building in Poznan 收购 Partners Group AG 瑞士 Peakside Capital Advisors AG 房地产 (531) 　 　 100 Swiss-based private equity investor Partners Group has acquired office portfolio in Poland from U.K.-based real estate private equity firm Peakside Capital, the buyer's legal adviser DLA Piper said. The value of the transaction was not disclosed. The portfolio comprises Atrium Centrum and Atrium Plaza located in Warsaw, and Poznan Financial Center located in Poznan. The buildings have combined GLA of 50,000 m2. Partners Group is a private markets investment manager which serves more than 700 institutional investors worldwide. The company has USD 47bn of assets under management (as of December 2015), employs more than 800 people across 18 offices worldwide. Since its inception in 1996, the company has invested over USD 50bn in private equity, private real estate, private debt and other projects. Peakside Capital, launched in 2010, is a real estate private equity firm with EUR 1.8bn in assets under management. The company specialises in deal origination and execution, asset management, fund management and financial services. It is focused on Germany and CEE countries.
114568 30/12/2015 俄罗斯 UNIStream 少数股权购买 Buyer(s) unknown 　 Aurora Russia 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 5.29 (市场估计) 26 British investment fund Aurora Russia has sold its 26% in Russian commercial bank UNIStream to undisclosed third-party investors, the target company announced. According to the press release, the buyers have not been related to UNIStream before. Allegedly, the buyers are several private investors which acted on behalf of the bank's main shareholders - Gagik Zakaryan and Georgy Piskov, Kommersant daily reported. The financial terms of the sale were not specified. Several sources of Kommersant deem that the price is rather similar to the one set by the fund itself in its financial report for the period 1 April - 30 September 2015. According to the report, as at 30 September 2015 the stake of 26% in UNIStream was valued at GBP 3.4mn (USD 5.29mn). Aurora Russia started to exit Russian assets in 2013. The current holding in UNIStream was the last one left in its portfolio. The leaving of Aurora Russia will not impact the bank's development strategy for the period until 2018. UNIStream plans to expand its presence on the market of money transfers and remittances, as well as to develop products and services for payment agents and SMEs. UNIStream money transfer service started its operations in 2001 as a division of Russian lender Uniastrum Bank. In 2006, UNIStream was split from Uniastrum Bank and received a separate banking licence of its own. Today, UNIStream has an almost 60% market share in some CIS countries, representative offices in Cyprus, the U.K. and Greece, as well as 330,000 service outlets worldwide.
114587 30/12/2015 危地马拉 Energuate 收购 Kenon Holdings Ltd 新加坡 Actis LLP 电力传送，控制和分配 (22112) 265 (官方数据) 92 UPDATE: On 25 January 2016, Actis announced that it has sold its 92% stake in Energuate to Kenon for USD 265mn. Additionally, Kenon will assume gross debts of the Energuate business of some USD 289mn. ORIGINAL: Singapore-based holding company Kenon Holdings announced that its power generation arm IC Power has agreed to acquire Guatemalan electrical utility company Energuate for USD 299.5mn. The seller is Deorsa-Deocsa Holdings, a unit of U.K.-based private equity firm Actis. IC Power expects to assume the total financial debt of the Energuate business of approximately USD 289mn, as of November 30, 2015. The transaction is expected to be completed in January 2016. Energuate has 90.6% and 92.7% stakes in two electricity distribution companies in Guatemala that provide services for approximately 1.6 million households. These companies together operate some 33,000 km of distribution lines within the country and sold 2,160 GWh of energy in 2014. The Energuate business also includes electricity trading company Comercializadora Mayorista de Electricidad and transmission company Redes Electricas de Centroamerica. Kenon Holdings is a Singaporean holding company owned by Israeli businessman Idan Ofer. The group's main subsidiaries include Chinese automobile company Qoros Automotive and IC Power, an owner, developer and operator of power generation facilities in the Latin American, Caribbean and Israeli power generation markets. Kenon Holdings is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange and had a market capitalisation of USD 537.9mn on 31 December 2015.
114567 30/12/2015 俄罗斯 Mondadori Independent Media LLC 收购 InVenture Partners; Other investors 俄罗斯; 国际的 Sanoma Corporation 报纸、期刊、图书和字典的出版 (5111) 　 　 50 UPDATE: On 11 March 2016, Sanoma announced the completion of the deal. ORIGINAL: Finnish newspaper and magazine publisher Sanoma said it agreed to sell its 50% stake in Russian joint venture and magazine publisher Mondadori Independent Media LLC to a consortium of Russia-based investors led by international venture fund with Russian roots InVenture Partners. The financial terms of the transaction were not specified. The sale is subject to government approvals and other customary closing conditions precedent. The above transaction is part of Sanoma's broader strategy to reorganize its consumer media operations, which was announced in October 2013. On a related note, the same consortium also agreed to acquire from Sanoma a 50% stake in Russian JV Fashion Press, a publisher of the Russian editions of Cosmopolitan, Esquire, Harper's Bazaar and other popular magazines. Mondadori Independent Media LLC is a joint venture with Italian publisher Arnoldo Mondadori Editore SpA. The company publishes and distributes the Russian version of Grazia magazine. InVenture Partners is an innovative investment firm helping inventive entrepreneurs to start and grow disruptive technology businesses. The fund was set up in 2012 by Russian entrepreneurs Sergey Azatyan and Anton Inshutin.
114566 30/12/2015 俄罗斯 Fashion Press 少数股权购买 InVenture Partners; Russian investors 俄罗斯 Sanoma Corporation 出版业（因特网除外） (511); 互联网出版与传播 (516) 21.93 (市场估计) 50 UPDATE: On 11 March 2016, Sanoma announced the completion of the deal. ORIGINAL: Finnish newspaper and magazine publisher Sanoma said it agreed to sell its 50% stake in Russian joint venture Fashion Press, a publisher of the Russian editions of Cosmopolitan, Esquire, Harper's Bazaar and other popular magazines, to a consortium of Russia-based investors led by international venture fund with Russian roots InVenture Partners. The sale is subject to government approvals and other customary closing conditions precedent. The deal value was not disclosed. An anonymous source briefed with the deal details said, as cited by Vedomosti daily, that the price was EUR 18mn (USD 21.9mn). In December 2014, Sanoma agreed to sell the stake in Fashion Press to Russian publishing house Hearst Shkulev Media/InterMediaGroup. However, in start-August 2015, the Russian Government Commission for Monitoring Foreign Investments did not approve the transaction. At that time, market experts valued Sanoma's interest at some EUR 40mn (USD 49.9mn). The above transaction is part of Sanoma's broader strategy to reorganize its consumer media operations, which was announced in October 2013. Inventure Partners plans to develop Fashion Press, making the company a leader in online media with a focus on the segments of fashion, lifestyle and new technologies, using its expertise in the development of technologically advanced products, online marketing and advertising. Through Fashion Press, a joint venture with U.S. publisher Hearst, Sanoma publishes popular magazines such as Cosmopolitan, Esquire, Populyarnaya Mekhanika, Harper's BAZAAR and Domashny Ochag, their online versions, as well as magazine Robb Report. InVenture Partners is an innovative investment firm helping inventive entrepreneurs to start and grow disruptive technology businesses. The fund was set up in 2012 by Russian entrepreneurs Sergey Azatyan and Anton Inshutin.
114564 30/12/2015 俄罗斯 Transmashholding 少数股权购买 Alstom SA; Andrey Bokarev - private investor; Iskander Makhmudov - private investor; TransGroup AS 法国; 俄罗斯 Russian Railways (RZhD) 铁路运输设备制造 (3365) 178.19 (官方数据) 25.0015 Russia's state-owned railway operator Russian Railways said it divested its 25% plus one share in local rolling stock manufacturer Transmashholding (TMH) for EUR 162.4mn (USD 178.2mn), exiting the company's list of shareholders. The buyers were TMH's existing owners - French engineering conglomerate Alstom, the company's president Andrey Bokarev, businessman Iskahnder Makhmudov and structures of Russia's railroad cargo carrier TransGroup AS, who acquired shares in proportion to their holdings in TMH. In a separate statement, Alstom specified that it had purchased exactly an 8% stake in TMH boosting its ownership to 33%. Alstom reportedly paid EUR 54mn for its part of the stake. The sale was carried out via Netherlands-based Breakers Investments BV which owns 100% in Transmashholding. The sale is motivated with the fact that Russian Railways has already met its target to create a competitive transnational company for manufacturing of railway equipment with the support of a strategic foreign investor. Transmashholding claims to be the largest railway machine-builder in Russia and the CIS and of the largest in the world. The company manufactures diesel-locomotive shunters, main-line and electric industrial locomotives, passenger and freight cars, electric train cars, locomotive and marine diesels, car castings and other products. TMH supplies rolling stock to Russian Railways. In 2014, TMH posted a net profit of EUR 200.4mn (USD 266.3mn) on revenue of EUR 2.75bn (USD 3.65bn). Alstom develops and markets systems,equipment and services for the railway sector.The group is a world leader in integrated railway systems. In the 2014/2015 fiscal year, Alstom generated sales of EUR 6.2 billion (USD 8.24bn). Headquartered in France, Alstom is present in over 60 countries and employs 32,000 people. TransGroup AS is a freight forwarding and passenger railway company based in Moscow. The company organizes shipments of coal, ferrous metals, aluminum, and mineral fertilizers from Moscow to the Sheremetyevo International Airport.

Knauf Verwaltungsgesellschaft KG announced the acquisition of Colombian gypsum wallboard producer Paneltec SAS. Financial terms were not disclosed. The transaction has been approved by Colombia's Superintendence of Industry and Trade (Superintendencia de Industria y Comercio - SIC). With this acquisition Knauf expands its wallboard manufacturing presence in the country. Paneltec owns a gypsum wallboard production plant in Barranquilla, Colombia. The company reported total revenues of COP 21.97bn (USD 6.8mn) and a net loss of COP 3.23bn (USD 1mn) for 2014. Gebr. Knauf Verwaltungsgesellschaft, via its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells construction and building materials, and construction systems.

The buyer acted in the acquisition through its indirectly 93.53%-owned subsidiary Wadworth Holdings Ltd. The acquisition is in line with Wilmar's strategy to further expand in Tanzania, and complement its existing agribusiness activities. Through the same announcement, Wilmar disclosed the incorporation of a new company in Tanzania - Murzah Wilmar East Africa Ltd. - in which Wadworth holds a 49% stake following an equity contribution of USD 9.8mn. Tanzania Pasta Industries' principal activities are manufacturing and selling of spaghetti and short-cut pasta, and import and export of all types of pasta made of semolina and durum wheat. Wilmar, incorporated in 1999, is engaged in oil palm cultivation, oilseeds crushing, edible oils refining, sugar milling and refining, specialty fats, oleochemicals, biodiesel and fertilisers manufacturing and grains processing, storage and logistics. Through its subsidiary Yihai Kerry Group, Wilmar operates 84 manufacturing companies and over 200 processing factories in 23 provinces and municipalities like - Shanghai, Shenzhen, Beijing, Guangzhou, Tianjin, Qingdao, Yantai, Qinhuangdao, Lianyungang, Wuhan, Xi'an etc. Wilmar is among the largest listed companies by Market Cap. on the Singapore Exchang, and its revenues were USD 43.0bn for 2014.

Huaneng International Power Development Corp is active in investment, construction, operation of power corporations and the relevant engineering work. Huaneng Power develops, constructs and operates large-scale power plants in China. It posted revenues of CNY 125.4bn (USD 20.4bn) for 2014. Bank of China Ltd is a diversified bank with operations in the Chinese mainland, Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan as well as other countries and regions. It engages in the business of commercial banking, and carries out investment banking, insurance and other businesses through its subsidiaries.

The deal value includes earn-outs and it may reach up to BRL 305mn (USD 77.77mn), upon the completion of certain conditions. The company also provides non-financial management consulting services. In addition, the company provides financial, strategic, investment and advisory services. ______________________________________________________________________________ A empresa britânica de capital privado em participações Templewood Capital Inc entrou em um acordo para adquirir o a totalidade do capital social da companhia brasileira de mineração de ferro MIB - Mineração Ibirité Ltda, por BRL 139mn (USD 35.44mn), o assessor financeiro da empresa-alvo revelou para o DealWatch. O valor do negócio inclui um potencial pagamento de earn-outs e pode atingir BRL 305mn (USD 77.77mn), após a conclusão de certas condições. A MIB, criada em 2006 no município de Brumadinho (MG, Brasil), extrai minério de ferro, com foco na produção de hematitinha. A empresa faz parte do grupo mineiro Grupo Aterpa. A companhia também oferece serviços de consultoria de gestão não-financeira. A Templewood, estabelecida em 2011, é uma empresa de capital privado em participações, com cerca de GBP 200mn (USD 298.2mn) em ativos sob gestão (a data de 31 de dezembro de 2014). A companhia também oferece serviços de consultoria financeira, estratégica e de investimento.

Buyer in the deal is PICC Property and Casualty, which will become the target's second largest shareholder post-transaction. The selling of Hua Xia's assets will help raise its financial strength without reducing stakes in its shareholders, as announced by John Cryan, the co-Chief Executive of Deutsche Bank. PICC Property and Casualty plans to allocate its investment-growing portfolio once the acquisition is completed. Hua Xia Bank specializes in personal banking, corporate banking, interbank, electronic banking, and small corporate businesses. The company is listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange and posted revenues of CNY 54.9bn (USD 8.9bn) in 2014. PICC Property and Casualty Co Ltd provides various property and casualty insurance products in China. The company is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange and booked revenues of HKD 224.6bn (USD 29bn) in 2014. Deutsche Bank has five corporate divisions: Corporate & Investment Banking, Global Markets, Private & Business Clients, Deutsche Asset Management and Non-Core Operations unit. The bank offers products and services in investment, corporate and retail banking, as well as in asset and wealth management. Deutsche Bank has 2,814 branches in 70 countries and employs 98,138 people. In 2014, it posted net income of EUR 1.7bn.

The company offers its clients all kinds of support from the planning phase of a trip to the time the client returns home. It employs 153 people, and posted individual revenues of EUR 6.3mn and net profit of EUR 0.69mn in 2014. Finnair's route network connects Asia, North America and the northern regions of Europe and beyond through its hub at Helsinki Airport. The company employs approximately 4,800 people.
