114729 29/12/2015 克罗地亚 NK Osijek 收购 Meszaros Es Meszaros Kft 匈牙利 Vodovod-Osijek doo; Municipality of Osijek; Gradska Banka dd; IPK Osijeck dd 艺术表演、竞技运动和相关服务业 (711) 3.48 (市场估计) 　 Hungarian holding company Meszaros es Meszaros Kft., owned by local businessman Lőrinc Mészáros, has agreed to acquire a majority stake in Croatian football club NK Osijek, the club announced on its website. According to Hungarian media, the buyer will pay off the club's debts of HUF 1.0bn (USD 3.48mn) and it will also provide an initial investment of EUR 2.0mn for the club's renovation and further development. The sellers in the deal include the Osijek Municipality, the city's water-supply company Vodovod-Osijek d.o.o., the local bankrupt lender Gradska Banka d.d. and the bankrupt agribusiness company IPK Osijek d.d. Meszaros es Meszaros was the sole bidder in the tender offer of NK Osijek. The deal will enable troubled football club to avoid bankruptcy proceedings. NK Osijek (The White-Blues) was founded in 1947 and is one of th e fourth clubs that had never been relegated from the Croatian First League, the others being Dinamo Zagreb, Hajduk Split and Rijeka. The football club finished eight in the Croatian First League in the season 2014-2015. The club's home ground is Stadion Gradski vrt with a capacity of 22,050 seats. Meszaros es Meszaros Kft., founded in 2001, is a holding company primarily engaged in concrete and cement product manufacturing. It also operates as a special trade contractor, namely engaged in installing and servicing plumbing, heating, and air-conditioning equipment; electrical wiring and equipment; painting and wall covering. The company has around 150 employees and booked revenues of HUF 9.83bn (EUR 31.2mn) in 2014.
114677 29/12/2015 中美洲; 哥伦比亚; 墨西哥; 秘鲁; 刚果民主共和国; 美国 NewCom International 收购 SpeedCast International Ltd 香港 　 卫星传输服务 (5174) 　 　 100 Hong Kong-based satellite communications services provider SpeedCast International Ltd announced it has agreed to acquire its U.S.-based counterpart NewCom International. Financial terms were not disclosed. SpeedCast said that with this acquisition the company obtains a direct presence in the Central and South American markets, and that it will strengthen its capabilities to serve its customers globally. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals and is expected to close by the second quarter of 2016. NewCom offers integrated satellite and terrestrial communications and engineering solutions across South and Central America, the Caribbean, Mexico and Africa. It specializes in the design, implementation, operations and management of critical integrated voice, video, data, content and security solutions. NewCom has two state-of-the-art teleports - one in Miami, Florida, and one in Lima, Peru. SpeedCast International offers network and satellite communications services in Asia Pacific and to the global maritime sector. It reported total revenues of AUD 143mn (USD 104mn) and a net loss of AUD 8mn (USD 5.8mn) for 2014.
114646 29/12/2015 马来西亚 Intermark Mall in Kuala Lumpur 收购 Pavilion Real Estate Investment Trust (Pavilion REIT) 马来西亚 BlackRock Inc 房地产 (531) 37.31 (官方数据) 100 Malaysia's Pavilion Real Estate Investment Trust (Pavilion REIT) disclosed to Bursa Malaysia that it has agreed to acquire the Intermark Mall in the country's capital Kuala Lumpur from a unit of U.S. investment management corporation BlackRock for MYR 160mn (USD 37.3mn). Pavilion REIT said that the purchase is in line with its investment objective and strategy. The company added that the acquisition is expected to be accretive to its distributable income as the mall is located along Jalan Tun Razak on the fringe of the Golden Triangle of Kuala Lumpur, the city's main commercial precinct. The transaction is expected to be completed by the first quarter of 2016. The Intermark Mall has six floors and 367 parking spaces and its net lettable area stands at 20,904 m2. The shopping centre has a 74% occupancy rate based on committed and/or commenced tenancies as at 30 September 2015. The Intermark Mall forms part of an integrated mixed-use development known as the Intermark, which also includes two corporate office towers and a hotel. Pavilion REIT is one of the largest retail-focused real estate investment trusts in Malaysia. As at 30 September 2015, its portfolio of investment properties was valued at MYR 4.6bn (USD 1.03bn). Pavilion REIT is listed on Bursa Malaysia and and it generated a net property income of MYR 282.7mn in 2014.
114636 29/12/2015 黑山 Crnogorski Elektroprenosni Sistem AD (CGES) 少数股权购买 Elektromreza Srbije (EMS) 塞尔维亚 Existing shareholders 电力传送，控制和分配 (22112) 15.19 (官方数据) 10 Serbian state-owned power grid operator Elektromreza Srbije (EMS) said it bought a 10% stake in Montenegrin peer Crnogorski Elektroprenosni Sistem AD (CGES) from minority shareholders for EUR 13.8mn (USD 15.2mn). EMS bought 14,568,335 CGES shares at EUR 0.95 (USD 1.04) apiece. Following the deal, EMS gets a seat on the CGES 's board of directors and a right to dividends. EMS said that the deal will strengthen the position of the Serbian transmission system in the European electricity system. The acquisition marks an important step for EMS since previously it has never undertaken an expansion outside the country. CGES (Montenegrin Electric Transmission System), established in 1957, manages a grid which is composed of over 1,300 km of transmission lines, 24 substations and switchgears on voltage levels of 400kV, 220kV and 110kV. The company is also engaged in overhauls, replacements and maintenance of the existing equipment of the electricity network in the country. The Montenegrin state is the largest shareholder in CGES with a share of 55%, followed by the Italian electricity company Terna Rete Electrica Nazionale SpA (22.09%). EMS, fully-owned by the Serbian state, is the public company for electric energy transmission and transmission system control. The company operates through three business divisions - Transmission Division, System Operation Division and Market Division. It manages over 9,310 km of overhead lines on voltage levels of 400kV, 220kV and 110kV voltage levels. EMS employs over 1,300 people.
114593 29/12/2015 巴拉圭 Electrofacil SA (Electro Facil) 收购 Regal Forest Holding Co Ltd (Unicomer Group) 萨尔瓦多 　 家具及家庭装饰店 (442); 电子产品和家电商店 (44314); 文化、体育用品及器材专门零售 (451) 30 (市场估计) 　 El Salvador-based retail group Regal Forest Holding Co (Unicomer Group) announced the acquisition of Paraguayan home appliances and electronic goods retailer Electro Facil. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed, but Paraguayan newspaper 5dias reported that analysts from the financial sector valued the transaction at around USD 30mn. Unicomer Group said that the purchase allows it to solidify its position as a leading regional retailer. Electro Facil operates a chain of shops that sell home appliances, electronic goods and furniture among other. The company has a total of 12 stores and 430 associates. Unicomer Group was founded in 2000 and consists of several store chains which sell technological products and accessories, appliances and furniture among other. The group's store chains include La Curacao, Servitotal, Almacenes Tropigas, the Radio Shack franchise and Loco Luis in Central America; Courts, Lucky Dollar, AMC Unicon, Hagemyer, Price Hacker and Home & Nature in the Caribbean, Artefacta in Ecuador and Gollo in Costa Rica. Unicomer Group operates in 20 countries through a network of more than 900 stores and it employs more than 14,000 people.
114582 29/12/2015 印度 LIC Nomura Mutual Fund Asset Management Co Ltd 少数股权购买 GIC Housing Finance Ltd 印度 Nomura Holdings Inc 投资银行及其他金融投资活动 (523) 3.43 (官方数据) 16 Indian finance firm GIC Housing Finance Ltd announced that it has received board approval to acquire a 16% stake in LIC Nomura Mutual Fund Asset Management Co Ltd from Nomura Holding Inc for a total consideration of INR 273.6mn (USD 4.1mn). The buyer will also acquire a similar 16% in LIC Nomura Mutual Fund Trustee Co Pvt Ltd for a consideration of INR 126,000 (USD 1,906). The round comes after LIC Housing Finance acquired a 19.3% in the target for INR 273.6mn (USD 4.1mn). LIC Nomura Mutual Fund Asset Management offers equity, debt, hybrid, liquid and exchange traded mutual funds among others. It is a joint venture between Life Insurance Corporation of India, LIC Housing Finance and Nomura Holding. The firm manages a total of 48 mutual funds. GIC Housing Finance provides house financing services to individuals. It is listed on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) and National Stock Exchange of India (NSE). The firm was founded on 1989 and currently has 53 branches locally. GIC Housing Finance reported net profits of INR 1bn (USD 16.4mn) for FY ended 31 March 2015.
114581 29/12/2015 英国 Camborne Retail Park 收购 Texton Property Fund Ltd 南非 London and Metric Property plc 仓储 (493); 房地产 (531) 14.69 (官方数据) 100 South African real estate investment trust Texton Property Fund disclosed to the JSE that it has agreed to acquire a retail park located in the southwestern British town of Camborne for GBP 9.85mn (USD 14.7mn) at an acquisition yield of 6.40%. The seller is British real estate firm London and Metric Property. Texton said that the property is known as Camborne Retail Park and that the purchase strongly compliments the quality of its existing underlying property portfolio. Camborne Retail Park is a single storey retail warehouse which is exclusively let to British DIY and home improvement retailing company B&Q. The property has a gross lettable area of 4,466 m2. Texton Property Fund is a property investment company focused on South Africa and the U.K. The firm is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and it had a market capitalisation of ZAR 3.55bn (USD 232.5mn) on 29 December 2015.
114577 29/12/2015 美国 Thermal Dynamics International LLC 收购 Zhejiang Yinlun Machinery Co Ltd 中国 TDX Holdings LLC 锅炉、集装箱及金属容器制造 (3324) 56.65 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 23 May 2016, Zhejiang Yinlun Machinery Co Ltd has completed its acquisition of Thermal Dynamics International LLC from TDX Holdings LLC. ORIGINAL: Shenzhen-listed Zhejiang Yinlun Machinery Co Ltd announced that it will acquire U.S.-based heat exchangers manufacturer Thermal Dynamics International LLC for a total consideration of USD 56.7mn. The buyer will settle the transaction through its U.S. based subsidiary Ylsq Holdings Inc. Seller in the deal is TDX Holdings LLC. The deal will enable the buyer to expand its presence globally as well as its production capacity and also improve market share in its industry. Thermal Dynamics International LLC manufactures power steering oil coolers, transmission oil coolers and Intercooler radiators. The company had revenues of USD 51mn in 2014. Zhejiang Yinlun Machinery Co Ltd produces oil coolers, copper-tube oil coolers, exhaust gas recirculation systems and heat exchange solutions. The company is listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of CNY 2.4bn (USD 371.4mn) in 2014.
114552 29/12/2015 塞浦路斯 Branch in Northen Cyprus 收购 Dagli Sigorta Ltd 塞浦路斯 Ray Sigorta 保险活动 (5241) 　 　 100 Turkish insurance company Ray Sigorta said it sold its branch in Northern Cyprus to local rival Dagli Sigorta Ltd. No financial detail were disclosed. Dagli Sigorta started operations in 2001. The company offers all main general insurance policies. Borsa Istanbul-listed Ray Sigorta is majority owned by Vienna Insurance Group. After the sale, it will continue to operate through a network of seven regional offices and around 1,500 sales points across Turkey. It generated gross written premiums of TRY 380mn (USD 173.8mn) in 2014.
114543 29/12/2015 巴西 Papaiz - Udinese Metais Industria e Comercio Ltda; Udinese Metais Ltda 收购 Assa Abloy AB 瑞典 　 金属加工及制品 (332) 　 　 　 UPDATE: On 29 December 2015, the target companies' legal advisor disclosed to DealWatch that the transaction was completed. ORIGINAL: Swedish door opening solutions provider Assa Abloy AB announced it has agreed to acquire Brazilian Papaiz - Udinese Metais Industria e Comercio Ltda, a lock company and Udinese Metais Ltda, a manufacturer of hardware for sliding doors and windows. Financial details were not disclosed. The acquisition will significantly increase Assa Abloy's operations in Brazil. The combined company is expected to report revenues of around BRL 200mn (USD 51mn) in 2016. Mr. Johan Molin, President and CEO of Assa Abloy, said that the acquisition is part of the company's strategy for leadership in emerging markets. Mr. Thanasis Molokotos, Executive Vice President of Assa Abloy, added that the investment will enrich the company's product range in Brazil. This is the third acquisition of the Swedish company in Brasil for 2015. On 21 December the company acquired Brazilian machines and electronics retailers Glass Sentinal do Brasil Ltda and RCD Equipamentos Blindados Ltda, as well as a local security systems manufacturer Vault Engenharia para Ambientes Seguros Ltda, all of them for an undisclosed sum. The transaction is expected to close before the end of 2015. Papaiz and Udinese, part of The Papaiz Group, offer products such as cam locks, pad locks, mortise locks, hinges, parasols, and others. The company is present in more than 20 countries around the world. Assa Abloy, established in 1994, is an international provider of door opening solutions, including locks, cylinders, electromechanical products, security doors, fittings, electronic access control and automatic door systems under the brands of Abloy, HES, La Fonte, Securitron, TESA and Yale, among others. The company has operations in 70 countries worldwide and employs over 44,000 people. Assa Abloy is listed on the Nasdaq OMX Nordic Stock Exchange, and posted USD 14.4bn in revenues and a net income of USD 1.62bn in 2014. ____________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE: Em 29 de dezembro de 2015, o assessor jurídico das empresas-alvo revelou para o DealWatch que a transação foi concluída. ORIGINAL: A provedora sueca de soluções para abertura de portas Assa Abloy AB anunciou que entrou em um acordo para adquirir a Papaiz - Udinese Metais Industria e Comercio Ltda, produtora de cadeados e a Udinese Metais Ltda, fabricante de hardware para deslizamento de portas e janelas. Os termos financeiros não foram divulgados. A aquisição irá aumentar significativamente as operações da Assa Abloy no Brasil. A empresa combinada deverá relatar uma receita de cerca de BRL 200mn (USD 51mn) em 2016. O Sr. Johan Molin, presidente e CEO da Assa Abloy, disse que a aquisição fazia parte da estratégia da empresa para se tornar líder nos mercados emergentes. O Sr. Thanasis Molokotos, Vice-Presidente Executivo da Assa Abloy, acrescentou que o investimento ia enriquecer a gama de produtos da empresa no Brasil. Esta é a terceira aquisição da empresa sueca no Brasil para 2015. Em 21 de dezembro a empresa adquiriu as varejistas brasileiras de máquinas e aparelhos eletrônicos Glass Sentinal do Brasil Ltda e RCD Equipamentos Blindados Ltda, e a fabricante local de sistemas de segurança Vault Engenharia para Ambientes Seguros Ltda, todas estas por um valor não revelado. A transação deverá ser concluída antes do final de 2015. A Papaiz e a Udinese, parte do Grupo Papaiz, oferecem produtos tais como fechaduras para móveis, cadeados, fechaduras residenciais, dobradiças, guarda-sóis, e outros. A empresa está presente em mais de 20 países ao redor do mundo. A Assa Abloy, fundada em 1994, é uma fornecedora internacional de soluções para abertura de portas, incluindo fechaduras, cilindros, produtos eletromecânicos, portas de segurança, acessórios, sistemas de controle eletrônico de acesso e portas automáticas sob as marcas Abloy, HES, La Fonte, Securitron, TESA e Yale, entre outros. A empresa tem operações em 70 países em todo o mundo e emprega mais de 44,000 pessoas. A Assa Abloy está listada na Bolsa de Valores de Estocolmo Nasdaq OMX Nordic, e apresentou um faturamento de USD 14.4bn e um lucro líquido de USD 1.62bn em 2014.
114531 29/12/2015 中国 Chengdu Riverside Project; Guiyang Project 收购 Evergrande Real Estate Group Ltd 香港 New World China Land Ltd; New World Development Co ltd 房地产 (531) 1,126.65 (官方数据) 　 Hong Kong-listed developer Evergrande Real Estate Group Ltd said it will acquire 60% of Chengdu Riverside Project and 100% of Guiyang Project in China from New World China Land Ltd and New World Development Co Ltd for a total consideration of CNY 7.3bn (USD 1.1bn) in cash and bonds. The completion of the acquisition is subject to fulfilment of certain conditions precedent by the end of February 2016. Evergrande Group will acquire the 60% stake in Chengdu Riverside Project for CNY 2.0bn. Chengdu Riverside Project is located in Tianfu New Area, Chengdu City, Sichuan Province, southern China. It has total planned gross floor area (GFA) for commercial and residential use of 3.04 million m2, of which 470,000 m2 have been completed. The remaining 40% in the project are owned by independent third parties. Guiyang Project will be acquired for CNY 5.3bn. Guiyang Project is located in Jinyang District, Guiyang City, southwestern China. The project has a planned GFA of 4.07 million m2, of which 930,000 m2 have been completed. Earlier in December 2015, Evergrande Group entered into deals to acquire interests in projects in Haikou, Huiyang and Wuhan from the same sellers, and the current acquisition would need to aggregate with them. Evergrande is a diversified group engaged in property development, investment, management, construction, hotel and other businesses in China. It is listed on the stock exchange in Hong Kong and had a profit of around USD 2bn in FY 2014.
114525 29/12/2015 俄罗斯 Bystrinsky GOK 少数股权购买 Consortium of Chinese investors 中国 Norilsk Nickel 铜、镍、铅、锌矿的开采 (21223); 有色金属（铝除外）的制造 (3314) 100 (市场估计) 13.3 UPDATE: On 10 June 2016, the Russian Commission for Foreign Investments approved the deal, the director of the Federal Antimonopoly Service, Igor Artemyev, told reporters, as cited by Prime news agency. ORIGINAL: Russian non-ferrous metals giant Norilsk Nickel has signed a binding agreement with a consortium of Chinese investors on the sale of a 13.3% stake in its Bystrinsky Ore-Mining and Processing Plant (Bystrinsky GOK), Vedomosti daily reported citing three sources close to the deal parties. Bystrinsky GOK is a copper mining and processing project being developed by Norilsk Nickel. Reportedly, the sold stake is valued at USD 100mn. Two of the sources claim that the organizer of the deal on the Chinese part is private equity fund HOPU Investment Management Co Ltd. The deal has to be approved by the Government Commission on Foreign Investments. Norilsk Nickel expects to complete the construction of Bystrinsky GOK by 2017 and reach the design production capacity of the project of 65,800 tonnes of copper per year in 2018. Norilsk Nickel has already invested USD 650mn in the development of Bystrinsky GOK and plans to invest another RUB 40bn (USD 565.1mn) in 2016. The reserves of the Bystrinsky deposit under B + С1 + С2 categories are measured at 2.1 million tons of copper, 7.6 million ounces of gold, 34.1 million ounces of silver and 67 million tonnes of magnetite iron.
116089 28/12/2015 丹麦 Tamaco Trading; Tamaco Pack 收购 Supremia Grup SRL 罗马尼亚 Tamaco Group 调味品制造 (31194); 造纸业 (322); 其他支援服务 (5619) 3.29 (市场估计) 100 Romanian food ingredients and spices producer Supremia Grup announced it has entered the Danish market through the acquisition of two counterparts Tamaco Trading A/S and Tamaco Pack A/S. The deal value was not disclosed, but according to Forbes the transaction is estimated at around EUR 3.0mn. Following the deal, Tamaco Trading and Tamaco Pack will be merged and the new company will continue the same business of food ingredients, spices and packaging. Through the acquisition, Supremia will increase its turnover with EUR 10mn in the next two years. Tamaco Trading and Tamaco Pack are part of Danish Tamaco Group. The two companies have a combined annual turnover of EUR 4.5mn. Supremia Grup was established in 2001 by Romanian entrepreneur Levente Bara. The firm offers blends, custom food ingredients blends, natural spices, auxiliary ingredients, natural and artificial casings, and selected wood chips. The firm exports its products to over 30 countries worldwide, and has a portfolio of over 2,000 active clients operating in the food industry. The group has over 300 employees and reported revenues of RON 156mn (USD 37.6mn) and a profit of RON 4.0mn (USD 0.97mn) in 2014. Tamaco Group's member companies also include Tamao Holding, Tamaco Food, Tamaco International, Tamaco GmbH in Germany and Tamaco S.A. in Spain. The group has an annual turnover of EUR 75mn.
115978 28/12/2015 匈牙利 M6 Duna Autopalya Koncesszios Zrt 收购 Aberdeen Asset Management PLC; Group Five Ltd; European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) 英国; 撒哈拉沙漠以南非洲地区; 国际的 UBM Development AG; Bilfinger SE 公用基础设施建筑 (2341) 51.59 (DW 估计) 80 Austrian property developer UBM Development AG together with German engineering firm Bilfinger SE announced they have sold each a 40% stake in Hungarian motorway concession company M6 Duna Autopalya Koncesszios Zrt. for a combined estimated deal value of EUR 47.0mn (USD 51.6mn). Through the same announcement, UBM and Bilfinger said they each divested a 45% participation in M6 Tolna Autopalya Koncesszios Zrt. The sellers have disposed of 80% and 90% interest in M6 Duna and M6 Tolna for an aggregate net amount of EUR 100mn (USD 109.6mn). The buyer is a consortium formed by U.K. global investment management group Aberdeen Asset Management, Hungarian motorway constructor and toll road operator Intertoll (owned by South African integrated constructor Group Five Ltd.) and the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD). The transaction was subject to certain closing conditions, and was completed on 22 December 2015. Following the deal, Austrian heavy construction firm Swietelsky will keep its 20% stake in M6 Duna. M6 Duna has been established in 2004 by Bilfinger, PORR Infrastruktur (a subsidiary of UBM) and Swietelsky, following the concession contract awarded for 22 years by the Hungarian government. M6 Duna has developed a 58.6 km section from Érdi-Tető to Dunaújváros, which includes ten interchanges, 60 bridges, 15 roundabouts, one motorway cross between M6 and the M8, one operation and maintenance centre. The motorway section was opened for traffic on 11 June 2006. Following the construction, the awarded concession includes the operation and maintenance of this motorway section until 2026. The M6 motorway project, with a total length of 212 km, is part of the public private partnership (PPP) program to create a high-speed connection between Budapest and Pécs. Note: The deal value was estimated based on the total net amount of EUR 50mn received by each of the sellers for the combined 85% participation in M6 Duna and M6 Tolna.
115983 28/12/2015 匈牙利 M6 Tolna Autopalya Koncesszios Zrt 收购 Group Five Ltd; Aberdeen Asset Management PLC; European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) 撒哈拉沙漠以南非洲地区; 英国; 国际的 UBM Development AG; Bilfinger SE 公用基础设施建筑 (2341) 58.04 (DW 估计) 90 Austrian property developer UBM Development AG together with German engineering firm Bilfinger SE announced they have sold each a 45% stake in Hungarian motorway concession company M6 Tolna Autopalya Koncesszios Zrt. for a combined estimated deal value of EUR 52.9mn (USD 58.0mn). Through the same announcement, UBM and Bilfinger said they each sold a 40% stake in M6 Duna Autopalya Koncesszios Zrt. The sellers have disposed of 80% and 90% interest in M6 Duna and M6 Tolna for a total net amount of EUR 100mn (USD 109.6mn). The buyer is a consortium formed by U.K. global investment management group Aberdeen Asset Management, Hungarian motorway constructor and toll road operator Intertoll (owned by South African integrated constructor Group Five Ltd.) and the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD). The transaction was subject to certain closing conditions, and was completed on 22 December 2015. Following the deal, French engineering firm EGIS will keep its 10% participation in M6 Tolna. M6 Tolna has been established in 2008 by Bilfinger, PORR Infrastruktur (a subsidiary of UBM) and EGIS, following the concession contract awarded for 30 years by the Hungarian government. M6 Tolna has developed a 65.1 km section of dual carriageway (2x2 lanes), which connects the towns of Dunaújváros and Szekszárd, southern Budapest. It has eight interchanges, 58 bridges, six viaducts, one operation and maintenance centre. The section was opened for traffic on 31 March 2010. The company will operate and maintain this motorway section until 2038. The M6 motorway project, with a total length of 212 km, is part of the public private partnership (PPP) program to create a high-speed connection between Budapest and Pécs. Note: The deal value was estimated based on the total net amount of EUR 50mn received by each of the sellers for their combined 85% participation in M6 Duna and M6 Tolna.

The ownership change took place on 24 December 2015. Sidorova did not possess shares in the bank prior to the acquisition. As at 1 October 2015, FinexBank ranked 88th among other lenders in Ukraine in terms of total assets which stood at UAH 497.5mn (USD 23.1mn).
114648 28/12/2015 阿根廷 A manufacturing plant of Fresenius in Argentina 收购 Jorge Braver - private investor 阿根廷 Fresenius SE & Co KGaA 医药制造 (3254) 4.5 (市场估计) 100 Argentinean private investor Jorge Braver has acquired a manufacturing plant in Argentina of German health care group Fresenius SE & Co KGaA for an estimated USD 4.5mn (ARS 58mn), media sources reported. Fresenius SE & Co KGaA, acted via its wholly-owned subsidiary Fresenius Kabi AG, specialized in infusion therapy and parenteral nutrition. According to the media, Jorge Braver purchased the oncology plant of Fresenius Kabi located in the Martinez neighbourhood of Buenos Aires. Jorge Braver is the CEO of Argentinean pharmaceuticals producer GP Pharm Argentina. Fresenius is a global health care group specialized in products and services for dialysis, hospital and outpatient medical care. The group operates through four business segments: Fresenius Medical Care (products and services for patients with chronic kidney failure), Fresenius Kabi, Fresenius Helios (a hospital network with more than 70 facilities in Europe) and Fresenius Vamed (project and management services for health care facilities). Fresenius registered total revenues of EUR 23.23bn (USD 25.5bn) and a net income of EUR 1.07bn (USD 1.17bn) for 2014.
114639 28/12/2015 波兰; 意大利 Wind assets portfolio of EDP ​​Renovaveis in Poland and Italy 收购 China Three Gorges Corp 中国 EDP Renovaveis SA 风力发电 (221115) 429.84 (官方数据) 49 EDP Renovaveis SA, the renewable energy arm of Portuguese energy group EDP - Energias de Portugal SA (EDP Group), announced that it has entered into agreement to sell a 49% stake in its Polish and Italian wind assets to Chinese company China Three Gorges (CTG) for a total consideration of EUR 392mn (USD 429.8mn). The total implied enterprise value for 100% of all assets amounts to EUR 1.04bn (USD 1.14bn) and includes EUR 240mn of external debt. The implied EV amounts to EUR 1.74mn (USD 1.91mn) per MW. The portfolio includes 392 MW in operation in Poland and 100 MW in Italy, with an average age of four years, as well as 107 MW under construction in Poland and in Italy. CTG, founded in 1993, is a state-owned power company, specialised in the development, construction and management of hydroelectric power plants. The company manages the Three Gorges Dam, which is the world's largest hydroelectric power plant with a total installed capacity of 22,500 MW. EDP Renovaveis, founded in 2007, engages in the construction, operation and maintenance of electricity generating power stations using renewable energy sources, mainly wind. The company has installed capacity of 9,036 MW in energy assets across Belgium, Brazil, Canada, Spain, the United States, France, Italy, Mexico, Poland, Portugal, the United Kingdom and Romania. EDP Renovaveis is listed on the NYSE Euronext Lisbon Stock Exchange, and reached a turnover of EUR 1.28bn and a net income of EUR 126mn in 2014. Its majority shareholder is EDP Group with a 77.53% stake.
114550 28/12/2015 哥伦比亚 Banco Caja Social 少数股权购买 Fundacion Social 哥伦比亚 JP Morgan Chase & Co 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 18.845 Colombian bank Banco Caja Social announced that U.S. banking giant JP Morgan Chase & Co has agreed to sell its 18.85% stake in the company to Colombian non-profit civil organization Fundacion Social. Financial terms were not disclosed. The sale is aligned with JP Morgan's strategy to divest its minority interests in financial institutions outside of the United States. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals. Banco Caja Social offers bank accounts, credit services, insurance, investment and other related services. It caters mainly to the general public, micro enterprises, and SMEs. The bank reported a net income of COP 251.1bn (USD 79.2mn) for 2014. Fundacion Social is a civic, non-profit organization, aiming to fight poverty in Colombia. Via Banco Caja Social it offers affordable, low-amount credit lines.
114513 28/12/2015 巴西 Btech Tecnologia Agropecuaria e Comercio Ltda 收购 Union InVivo - Union de Cooperatives Agricoles (Groupe InVivo); P&A Marketing Ltda 法国; 巴西 　 饲料加工 (3111) 　 　 　 French farming cooperative Union InVivo - Union de Cooperatives Agricoles and Brazilian agricultural marketing consultant P&A Marketing Ltda have acquired Brazilian animal food manufacturer Btech Tecnologia Agropecuaria e Comercio Ltda for an undisclosed sum. The information was provided by Demarest Advogados that acted as legal advisor to Btech. The buyer acted through its animal nutrition and health arm InVivo NSA. Further transaction detail were not disclosed. Btech, established in 1992, produces and markets additives for animal nutrition, especially pigs and chickens. In addition, the company develop systems for metering micro liquid ingredients, powders and granules. Btech has its headquarters in the city of Valinhos (Sao Paulo state, Brazil) and a branch in Curitiba (Parana state, Brazil), responsible for distribution and logistics. P&A Marketing, established in 1995, provides a great variety of marketing, strategic and technological consulting services for the agribusiness. The company coordinates projects for coffee, cacao and walnut production in Africa, Asia, Latin America, Europe and Oceania. Union InVivo, established in 1945, is the largest agriculture cooperative in France with 216 member associations and over 300,000 farmers, with operations in four business areas: seeds and agricultural supplies, grains, animal nutrition and healthcare, and general public. The group is active in 29 countries in the world, employing some 8,200 people, and reported revenues of EUR 5.7bn (USD 7.6bn) for the FY ended 30 June 2015. InVivo NSA, founded in 1954 as the animal nutrition and health arm of Union InVivo, is an international manufacturer and marketer of complete animal feeds, premixes and nutritional specialties, animal health and hygiene products. With a team of over 6,830 employees in 72 manufacturing sites worldwide, the division registered a turnover of EUR 1.5bn (USD 2bn) for the FY ended 30 June 2015. ____________________________________________________________________________ A cooperativa agrícola francesa Union InVivo - Union de Coopératives Agricoles e a consultora brasileira de marketing agrícola P&A Marketing Ltda adquiriram a produtora brasileira de alimentos para animais Btech Tecnologia Agropecuária e Comércio Ltda, por um valor não revelado. A informação foi fornecida pelo Demarest Advogados que atuou como assessor jurídico da Btech. A compradora atuou por meio do seu braço de nutrição e saúde animal InVivo NSA. Não foram divulgados mais detalhes acerca da transação. A Btech, fundada em 1992, produz e comercializa aditivos para alimentação animal, mais particularmente, para porcos e galinhas. Além disso, a empresa desenvolve sistemas para dosagem de micro ingredientes líquidos, pós e granulados. A Btech tem está sediada na cidade de Valinhos (SP, Brasil), e tem uma filial em Curitiba (PA, Brasil), responsável pela distribuição e logística. A P&A Marketing, criada em 1995, oferece uma grande variedade de serviços de consultoria, estratégia e tecnológia de marketing para o agronegócio. A empresa coordena projetos para produção de café, cacau e noz na África, Ásia, América Latina, Europa e Oceania. A Union InVivo, criada em 1945, é a maior cooperativa agrícola na França, com 216 sociedades associadas e mais de 300,000 agricultores, com operações em quatro áreas de negócio: sementes e insumos agrícolas, grãos, nutrição e saúde animal e público em geral. O grupo está presente em 29 países do mundo, empregando cerca de 8,200 pessoas, e registrou um faturamento de EUR 5.7bn (USD 7.6bn) no exercício findo em 30 de junho de 2015. A InVivo NSA, fundada em 1954 como o braço de nutrição e saúde animal da Union InVivo, é uma fabricante e comerciante internacional de rações completas para animais, pré-misturas e especialidades nutricionais, produtos de saúde animal e higiene. Com uma equipe de mais de 6,830 colaboradores em 65 fábricas em todo o mundo, a divisão registrou um faturamento de EUR 1.5bn (USD 2bn) no exercício findo em 30 de junho de 2015.
114538 28/12/2015 巴西 Guarulhos and Barueri quarries of Cimpor in Sao Paulo state, Brazil 收购 Polimix Concreto Ltda 巴西 Cimpor - Cimentos de Portugal SGPS SA 非金属矿的采选 (2123) 25.36 (官方数据) 100 Portuguese cement manufacturer Cimpor - Cimentos de Portugal SGPS SA announced it has sold to Brazilian peer Polimix Concreto Ltda the Guarulhos and Barueri quarries located in Sao Paulo state, Brazil for BRL 100mn (USD 25.36mn). The operation includes real estate properties, assets and exploration rights of mines. The transaction is aligned with Cimpor's strategy to strengthen its capital structure and increase its profitability, in order to concentrate in its strategic development. It includes the sale of non-strategic assets, concrete plants in Brasil, cost and expenditure reduction, among others. Polimix Concreto is engaged in the manufacturing of cement and concrete products in Brazil. It also operates in the construction sector. The company has strong presence in Argentina and Colombia and produces seven million cubic tonnes of concrete per year. Cimpor, acquired by Brazilian industrial conglomerate Camargo Correa SA in 2012, is a cement producer with operations in Portugal, Cape Verde, Egypt, Angola, Mozambique, South Africa, Argentina and Paraguay. The company has an annual production capacity of 46 million tonnes, most of which are produced in Brazil (around 17.9 million tonnes per year). ____________________________________________________________________________________________ A produtora de cimento portuguesa Cimpor - Cimentos de Portugal SGPS SA anunciou a venda das Pedreiras de Guarulhos e Barueri, localizadas no estado de São Paulo, Brazil para a homóloga brasileira Polimix Concreto Ltda, por BRL 100mn (USD 25.36mn). A operação inclui imóveis, ativos e direito de exploração das minas. A transação está em linha com a estratégia da Cimpor de fortalecer a sua estrutura de capital e aumentar a sua rentabilidade, a fim de se concentrar no seu desenvolvimento estratégico. Este inclui a venda de ativos não estratégicos, alienação de centrais de betão no Brasil, redução de custos e despesas, entre outras operações. A Polimix Concreto é focada na fabricação de produtos a base de cimento e concreto no Brasil. A empresa opera também no sector da construção. A companhia tem forte presença na Argentina e na Colômbia e produz sete milhões de toneladas cúbicas de concreto anualmente. A Cimpor, adquirida pelo conglomerado industrial brasileiro Camargo Corrêa SA, em 2012, é uma produtora de cimento com operações em Portugal, Cabo Verde, Egipto, Angola, Moçambique, África do Sul, Argentina e Paraguai. A empresa tem uma capacidade de produção anual de 46 milhões de toneladas, a maioria das quais é produzida no Brasil (cerca de 17.9 milhões de toneladas por ano).
114653 27/12/2015 土耳其 Lutfullah E. Kitapci Madencilik 收购 Calucem doo 克罗地亚 Undisclosed seller(s) 非金属矿的采选 (2123) 　 　 100 Crotian calcium aluminate cement producer Calucem has acquired Turkish emery mine company Lutfullah E. Kitapci Madencilik, 3 Seas Capital Partners, acted as financial and strategic advisor to the sellers, said. No financial details were disclosed. Emery is a dark granular rock used to make abrasive powder. The Calucem plant in Pula, Croatia began production of alumina cements in 1926. The company is the second largest manufacturer of alumina cements worldwide that use the melting method. Calucem is owned by U.K-based private capital investor Argus Capital Partners and the company's management.
115008 26/12/2015 中国 Chengdu Small Enterprise Financing Guarantee Co Ltd 收购 Chengdu B-Ray Media Co Ltd 中国 Chengdu Small & Medium Enterprise Credit Guarantee Co Ltd; International Finance Corporation (IFC) 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522); 投资银行及其他金融投资活动 (523) 178.28 (官方数据) 81.03 Shanghai-listed Chengdu B-Ray Media Co Ltd announced that it will acquire a 81.03% stake in Chengdu Small Enterprise Financing Guarantee Co Ltd for a total consideration of CNY 1.2bn (USD 178.3mn). The buyer will issue 92,685,700 shares at the price of CNY 9.7 (1.6) each to Chengdu Small & Medium Enterprise Credit Guarantee Co Ltd for its 61.03% stake in the target company. Then, the buyer will pay CNY 256mn (USD 39.6mn) to World Bank Group member International Finance Corp (IFC) for its 20% stake in the target. Cash proceeds for the acquisition will come from the buyer’s private placement of shares, in which it will raise CNY 1.2bn (USD 178.2mn), The buyer’s media business has shown a clear downward trend in the past few years. Hence, the acquisition is expected to improve the efficient use of its assets, increase its growth opportunities and enhance its overall profitability. Chengdu Small Enterprise Financing Guarantee Co Ltd provides small loans, business loan guarantees, financing and credit guarantees for small and medium enterprises. The company had revenues of CNY 429mn (USD 66.4mn) in 2014. Chengdu B-Ray Media Co Ltd prints newspapers and magazines, operates online games and provides outdoor advertising, agent advertising and educational services. The company is listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of CNY 1.7bn (USD 260.7mn) in 2014.
115000 26/12/2015 印度尼西亚 PT Sungai Danau Jaya 少数股权购买 Geo Energy Resources Ltd 新加坡 Optimum Source Ltd 煤炭开采 (2121) 25 (官方数据) 38.242 UPDATE: On 31 December 2015, Geo Energy Resources Ltd. announced the completion of the deal. ORIGINAL: Singapore-listed coal mining company Geo Energy Resources Ltd. said it will take over Indonesian PT Sungai Danau Jaya (SDJ), the owner of a coal mining concession in South Kalimantan Province, for USD 25.0mn. The seller is the British Virgin Islands-registered investment holding company Optimum Source Ltd., fully-owned by Indonesian private investor Lenny Limanto. Geo Energy will acquire the remainder 34% stake, it did not own, in Borneo International Resources Pte. Ltd., which in turn holds a 98.96% of SDJ. The rest of 1.04% stake in the target is held by local private investor Huang She Thong in order to ensure compliance with Indonesian law. The deal is subject to certain conditions precedent. The acquisition will allow Geo Energy to expand its business operations and increase coal production levels. PT Sungai Danau Jaya (SDJ) has commenced commercial production of its coal mine asset in mid-December 2015. The company's mining concession spans a total area of 235.5 ha with coal reserves of approx. 42 million tons. Its production capacity is expected to be 55,000 tons of coal by end-2015, to expand further to 500,000 tons by end-March 2016, and targeting to exceed 6 million tons of coal a year. Geo Energy will deliver first shipment of 55,000 tons of coal to China in January 2016. Geo Energy, founded in 2008, operates as a coal producer and mine contractor. The company's coal production operations are located in East and South Kalimantan, Indonesia. It posted revenues of USD 53.1mn for 2014. Geo Energy acquired a 60.71% stake in the SDJ concession coal mine in August 2014 for USD 55.0mn from Lenny Limanto.
117393 25/12/2015 俄罗斯 Sollers-Isuzu 收购 Isuzu Motors Ltd 日本 Sollers 汽车整车制造 (3361) 　 　 29 Japanese automaker Isuzu Motors has acquired an additional 29% stake in Russian commercial vehicles joint venture Isuzu-Motors from its project partner Russian automotive company Sollers, according to press releases of Sollers and Isuzu Motors. As a result of the acquisition, Isuzu Motors consolidated 74% in the target. On a related note, Japanese trade and industrial corporation Sojitz Corp, which previously held 5% in the JV, also boosted its stake to 26%. Thus Sollers completely exited the capital of the joint company. Isuzu Motors expects that the current transaction will enhance its brand, product portfolio and sales on the Russian market. On the other hand, Sollers intends to focus management and investment resources on strategic sectors for the company such as SUVs and light commercial vehicles. Sollers-Isuzu was established in February 2007 and has the capacity to manufacture up to 2,500 Isuzu trucks per year. The company uses the production facilities of Sollers in Ulyanovsk. In 2014, Sollers-Isuzu generated RUB 3.67bn (USD 97.3mn) in sales and RUB 225mn (USD 5.96mn) in net earnings. Founded in 1916, manufactures heavy-, medium- and light-duty trucks, buses, passenger vehicle engines, as well as industrial-use diesel engines.

At the same time, U.K.-based Primespot Securities Ltd reduced its holdings in the target from 100% to 0%. According to the unified state register of legal entities and individual entrepreneurs, the ultimate beneficiaries of Mandarin Plaza as of 25 December 2015 were Swedish resident Tons Per Anders and citizen of South Africa - Brenda Patricia Cocksedge. Founded in 2000, Mandarin Plaza is involved in investments in real estate objects and property development, The company owns the eponymous shopping and office centre at Basseynaya Street in downtown Kyiv with total area of over 21,200 square metres.

Post-transaction, Mitsui Sumimoto will hold a total stake of 40% in the target. The deal comes after the Indian government increased the foreign direct investment limit on insurance companies from 26% to 49% on March 2015. Cholamandalam MS General Insurance is an Indian insurance firm which offers health, car, travel, home and personal accident insurance to individuals and fire, health, crime, marine, liability and engineering insurance to enterprises. It is a JV between the Murugappa Group and Mitsui Sumitomo Insurance Co. The firm has had 737 employees as of 31 March 2015. Mitsui Sumitomo Insurance is a Tokyo-headquartered non-life insurance firm. It has 14,859 employees worldwide and network of 43,055 agents across Japan. The firm was founded in 2001 and is a part of the MS & AD Insurance Group.
114486 25/12/2015 越南 Masan Brewery Co Ltd; Ma San Consumer Corp (Masan Consumer) 少数股权购买 Singha Asia Holding Pte Ltd (Singha Group) 泰国 　 食品制造 (311); 饮料制造 (3121); 食品杂货批发 (4224); 啤酒厂 (31212) 1,100.00 (官方数据) 　 Vietnamese holding company Masan Group Corp and Thai conglomerate Singha Asia Holding (Singha Group) announced that they have signed agreements to form a strategic partnership under which the Thai group will invest USD 1.1bn in exchange for minority stakes in Masan's consumer and brewery units. Singha Group will get 25% of Masan Consumer and 33.3% of Masan Brewery in a transaction which will entirely involve infusion with new capital. The deal is expected to complete in January 2016. Masan and Singha said that the new partnership will immediately enlarge their addressable market as their combined food and beverage platform will be scaled up to better serve consumers in the region, with a focus on inland ASEAN countries. Masan Consumer is one of Vietnam's largest local diversified FMCG companies. It manufactures and distributes a range of food and beverage products, including soya sauce, fish sauce, chili sauce, instant noodles, instant congee, instant coffee, instant cereals and bottled beverages. Masan Brewery was established after Singha Group acquired Phu Yen Beer and Beverage JSC in 2014. The company recently launched a new beer brand named Su Tu Trang. Masan Group operates in the food and beverage, animal nutrition, tungsten and strategic industrial minerals, as well as banking businesses among other. The group's subsidiaries include Masan Consumer Holdings, Masan Nutri-Science and Masan Resources among other. In 2014, Masan Group generated revenues of VND 16.1trln (USD 742mn). Singha Group is controlled by the family of Thai businessman Santi Bhirombhakdi. The group owns companies in the alcoholic beverages, property, consumer products and food sectors among other. Singha Group currently includes over 50 affiliated companies.

119137 24/12/2015 意大利 Ladurner Ambiente S.p.a 收购 Zoomlion Heavy Industry Science and Technology Co Ltd; Mandarin Capital Partners 中国 Existing shareholders 废物治理 (562) 72.32 (官方数据) 75 UPDATE: On 29 April 2016, Zoomlion announced that the acquisition has been completed. ORIGINAL: Chinese construction machinery maker Zoomlion Heavy Industry Science and Technology Co Ltd and private equity firm Mandarin Capital will acquire 75% of Italian environment and renewable energy company solutions company Ladurner Ambiente S.p.a for EUR 66.2mn (USD 72.3mn), Zoomlion Heavy Industry said. Completion of is subject to the approval of or filing with the relevant governmental and anti-monopoly authorities. The deal involves the purchase its existing and newly issued shares and the EV/EBITDA multiple in the transaction is 8.0x. Zoomlion Heavy Industry will invest EUR 50.3mn to acquire a 57% stake in the Italian company. The consideration will be paid in cash and funded by internal resources. The acquisition will allow Zoomlion Heavy Industry to accelerate its upgrade and transformation from the environmental and sanitation machinery manufacturer to a solution provider, investor and operator in the environmental sector. Ladurner Ambiente, established in 1990, is engaged in urban solid waste treatment, sewage and sludge treatment, renewable energy, soil restoration and environmental consultation services. It invests and operates over 30 environmental projects in Italy and other countries. The company posted operating income of EUR 47mn for the first nine months of 2015. Mandarin Capital will invest through Mandarin Capital II, a Sino-Italian private equity fund with an initial fund size of EUR328mn. The fund was established in Luxemburg in 2007 with key investors including China Development Bank and The Export-Import Bank of China and Italy's Intesa Sanpaolo.

117605 24/12/2015 澳大利亚 Office building and an adjoining piece of land in Brisbane 收购 Wee Hur Holdings Ltd 新加坡 　 房地产 (531) 45.54 (官方数据) 100 Singapore Exchange-listed construction company Wee Hur Holdings Ltd. announced it has acquired an office building and an adjoining piece of land in Brisbane, Australia from an independent and unrelated party, for AUD 63.0mn (USD 45.5mn). The acquisition is part of Wee Hur group's strategy and for long term investment. The purchase consideration will be fully satisfied in cash with a combination of internal resources and bank borrowings. The office building is located along Ann Street, and has a net lettable area (NLA) of approx. 14,000 m2 with a total land area of 5,478 m2. The property spans over 9 floors, and is currently fully leased to a Queensland State Government. The adjacent piece of land is located along Turbot Street and is currently vacant. The property, which is located within the Central Business District (CDB) of Brisbane, has excellent redevelopment potential for multiple uses. Wee Hur Holdings was founded in 1980, and since 2008 has expanded its core business from construction to include property development and dormitory operation. The company also provides remodeling construction, including additions, alterations, reconstruction, maintenance, and repair work of buildings (residential, commercial, industrial, institutional), and restoration and conservation of heritage buildings. In 2015, the group booked revenues of SGD 412.8mn (USD 294mn).
115260 24/12/2015 中国 PetroChina United Pipelines Co Ltd; PetroChina Northwest United Pipelines Co Ltd 少数股权购买 PetroChina Pipelines Co Ltd 中国 League of Nations Energy Industrial Investment Fund; National Council for Social Security Fund; Taikang Life Insurance Co Ltd; Baoshan Iron & Steel Co Ltd; New China Life Insurance Co Ltd; Agricultural Bank of China; Youngor Group Co Ltd; Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Ltd; Baosteel Group Corp; China Construction Bank Corp; Generali China Life Insurance Co Ltd; Taikang Assets Management Co Ltd 管道运输 (486) 14,286.80 (DW 估计) 　 Chinese petroleum and natural gas group PetroChina said its unit PetroChina Pipelines Co Ltd will acquire 50% of PetroChina Northwest United Pipelines Co Ltd and 48% of PetroChina United Pipelines Co Ltd for an estimated CNY 94bn (USD 14.3bn) in cash and stock. The move is part of a plan to consolidate under PetroChina Pipelines Co Ltd the assets of the first, second and third West East Gas Pipeline projects, which are managed and operated under three different entities by region or by route, namely PetroChina Eastern Pipelines, PetroChina United Pipelines and PetroChina Northwest United. Under the plan, PetroChina will transfer to PetroChina Pipelines its stake in the three entities. PetroChina holds 100% equity interests in Eastern Pipelines, 50% equity interests in United Pipelines and 52% equity interests in Northwest United. The appraised value of PetroChina Eastern Pipelines is CNY 88.415bn, the appraised value of PetroChina Northwest United is CNY 69.03bn, and the appraised value of PetroChina United Pipelines is CNY 123.922bn. PetroChina Pipelines will pay in stock for the acquisition of the stakes in the target companies from PetroChina, League of Nations Energy Industrial Investment Fund (Guolian Fund), National Council for Social Security Fund (NCSSF), Taikang Life Insurance Co Ltd, Baoshan Iron & Steel Co Ltd (Baosteel), New China Life Insurance Co Ltd, Jiaxing Nongying Investment Partnership (controlled by Agricultural Bank of China Ltd), Youngor Group Co Ltd, Zhuhai Rongyou Equity Investment Partnership (controlled by Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Ltd), Hwabao Investment Co Ltd (owned by Baosteel Group Corporation), Jiaxing Zhuorui Investment Partnership (controlled by China Construction Bank Corporation), and Generali China Life Insurance Co Ltd (GCLI). PetroChina Pipelines will also acquire 13.19% and 1.67% equity interests held by Taikang Assets and Guolian Fund in PetroChina United Pipelines, and 9.6% equity interests held by Guolian Fund in Northwest United in cash. Upon completion of the transactions, PetroChina will have a stake of 72.26% in PetroChina Pipelines. PetroChina is engaged in a broad range of petroleum and natural gas activities including the exploration, development, production and sale of crude oil and natural gas; the refining of crude oil and petroleum products; the production and sale of basic petrochemical products, derivative petrochemical products and other petrochemical products; the sale and trading of refined products; and the transmission of natural gas, crude oil and refined products, and the sale of natural gas. The company is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, the New York Stock Exchange, and the Shanghai Stock Exchange. Note: The combined deal value for the acquired stakes in PetroChina Northwest United Pipelines Co Ltd and PetroChina United Pipelines Co Ltd is estimated based on the appraised value of the two companies.
115211 24/12/2015 新加坡 QuEST Global Services Pte Ltd 收购 Bain Capital LLC; GIC Real Estate 美国; 新加坡 Warburg Pincus LLC 建筑，工程及相关服务 (5413); 人力资源咨询服务 (541612) 325 (官方数据) 21.6666 U.S. investment fund Warburg Pincus has agreed to sell its minority stake in Singapore-headquartered engineering outsourcing firm QuEST Global Services Pte. Ltd. for USD 325mn, the target legal advisor WongPartnership announced. The buyers are Singaporean sovereign wealth fund GIC Pte. Ltd. and U.S. private equity major Bain Capital LLC. According to WongPartnership, QuEST is valued at USD 1.5bn. The deal represents an investment exit for Warburg Pincus, which originally invested USD 75.0mn and acquired 20% of QuEST in 2010. Bain Capital and GIC outbid rivals Advent International, Silver Lake Partners, Apax Partners, Carlyle Group and Goldman Sachs. QuEST provides engineering outsourcing services to companies in sectors including aviation, automotive, healthcare, oil and gas, power generation and transportation. Its services include design and modeling, analysis, prototyping, automation, data documentation, instrumentation and controls, manufacturing support and vendor management. The company employs 7,300 people across 31 centers globally with delivery centers in the U.S., the U.K., Singapore, Germany, Italy, Spain, France, Japan and India. In 2015, it booked revenues of USD 300mn. QuEST's current customers include Rolls Royce, General Electric, United Technologies, Airbus, Halliburton, Siemens, Toshiba etc. Earlier, in November 2014, QuEST acquired the engineering services division of Indian firm NeST Group for an estimated price of INR 5.5bn (USD 90mn). GIC Pte Ltd incorporated in 1981, is present in more than 40 countries worldwide, and has over USD 100bn of assets under management. The company employs around 1,200 people. Bain Capital is one of the world's leading private, alternative asset management firms, with approx. USD 75.0bn in assets under management. Warburg Pincus has more than USD 40.0bn in private equity assets under management, with a portfolio of more than 120 companies. Note: The deal stake was estimated based on the QuEST's valuation of USD 1.5bn provided by WongPartnership.
114694 24/12/2015 埃及 ADI Lease for Financial Lease Co 少数股权购买 Abu Dhabi Islamic Bank PJSC 阿拉伯联合酋长国 　 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522); 房地产及租赁业 (53) 2.61 (官方数据) 35.73 Abu Dhabi Islamic Bank (ADIB) has acquired a 35.73% stake in Egyptian leasing company ADI Lease for EGP 20.4mn (USD 2.61mn), ArabFinance.com reported. The buyer purchased a total of 3,416,865 shares at a price of EGP 5.97 (USD 0.76). ADIB was incorporated in 1997. It provides Islamic personal, royal, corporate, investment and institutional banking. The bank is listed on the Abu Dhabi Stock Exchange. ADIB has around 600,000 customers in the UAE and posted net profit of AED 1.45bn (USD 394.4mn) in 2013.
114541 24/12/2015 俄罗斯 Novorossiysk Fuel Oil Terminal 少数股权购买 Transneft 俄罗斯 Gunvor Group 石油及制品的批发 (4227); 交通运输辅助活动 (488) 　 50 UPDATE: The transaction was completed on 12 February 2016, Transneft announced. ORIGINAL: Swiss oil trader Gunvor has agreed to sell a 50% stake in Novorossiysk Fuel Oil Terminal to a structure of Russia's monopoly pipeline transportation operator Transneft, according to a resolution of the Federal Antimonopoly Service. The buyer will act in the acquisition via subsidiary Chernomorskie Magistralnye Nefteprovody. The press secretary of Transneft, Igor Demin, was quoted by Vedomosti daily as saying that his company is buying Gunvor's stake but the purchase has not completed yet. Financial terms of the agreement were not specified. At present, Novorossiysk Fuel Oil Terminal is held on a parity basis by Gunvor and Novorossiysk Commercial Sea Port (NCSP). Transneft is also a shareholder in NCSP. According to earlier media reports, Gunvor is in the process of re-balancing its global asset portfolio, which implies both buying and selling assets. Since a major part of the company's assets are in Russia, Gunvor was considering the possibilities for selling some of these assets. In March 2014, Russian tycoon Gennady Timchenko exited the capital of Gunvor by selling his 44% in the company to his partner Torbjorn Tornqvist. The sale took place just a day prior to U.S. government imposing sanctions against Timchenko and other Russian tycoons for being affiliated with the Russian president Vladimir Putin. Novorossiysk Fuel Oil Terminal can handle tankers with deadweight of over 47,000 tons. The terminal has two 250-meter parallel jetties and capacity to store up to 119,000 cubic meters of fuel, according to data from Gunvor's website. In 2014, Novorossiysk Fuel Oil Terminal posted net sales of USD 67.4mn and booked a net loss of USD 28.15mn. Transneft is 100% in federal ownership. The company transports 90% of the oil extracted in Russia. Transneft operates 70,000 km of trunk pipelines, more than 500 pumping stations as well as over 22mn m3 of storage tanks.
114517 24/12/2015 波兰 Ferrum SA 少数股权购买 ArcelorMittal SA 卢森堡 HW Pietrzak Holding 钢铁及其他主要金属制造业 (331); 钢材制造 (3312) 5.59 (DW 估计) 21.59 Luxembourg-based steel giant ArcelorMittal has acquired a 21.59% stake in Polish pipe manufacturer Ferrum from local steel elements producer HW Pietrzak Holding as a result of a debt-to-equity conversion for PLN 21.7mn (5.08mn),the target company reported in market filings to the stock exchange. The buyer acted through its subsidiaries ArcelorMittal Poland and ArcelorMittal Flat Carbon Europe and acquired a total of 5,299,000 shares. However, HW Pietrzak Holding claims that the claims were not enforceable. Ferrum, established in 1874, produces welded steel pipes dedicated to the gas, water and sewage sectors. The company posted revenues of PLN 440mn (EUR 105.1mn) and net loss of PLN 3.27mn (EUR 0.78mn) in 2014. HW Pietrzak Holding operates three manufacturing plants in Gostynin, Kutno and Drobin, all located in central Poland. It produces steel sheets and strips, steel pipes and cast iron products. ArcelorMittal Group is a global steel producer with a combined annual capacity of 115 million tons and a team of 225,000 employees across 60 countries. Note: The deal value estimate was made based on the Ferrum's closing stock price of PLN 4.1 (EUR 0.93) on 23 December 2015.
114529 24/12/2015 拉脱维亚; 立陶宛 Bite Group 收购 Providence Equity Partners LLC 美国 Mid Europa Partners LLP 移动电信服务（卫星除外） (5172) 　 　 100 CEE-focused private equity firm Mid Europa Partners announced that it has signed an agreement on the sale of Lithuanian-Latvian mobile operator Bite Group to U.S.-based counterpart Providence Equity Partners. Financial terms of the deal were not provided. The deal is expected to complete in Q1 2016. Originally, Mid Europa Partners acquired Bite Group in 2007. Bite Group, founded in 2005, consists of BITE Lietuva operating in Lithuania since 1995 and BITE Latvija established in 2005. The group offers a wide range of mobile services, internet access and data services for business and residential customers through its nationwide coverage. Bite is #2 in Lithuania and #3 in Latvia, serving 1.58 million customers. Providence Equity Partners is a private equity firm specialising in equity investments in media, communications, education, and information companies. The firm manages funds with over USD 45bn in commitments and has invested in more than 150 companies worldwide. Mid Europa Partners, founded in 1999, is a London-based private equity investor with a focus on Turkey and Central and Eastern Europe. The company has offices in Budapest, Istanbul and Warsaw, and has raised funds of over EUR 4.2bn since its inception.
114497 24/12/2015 美国 Lyft 少数股权购买 Kingdom Holding Co; Prince Alwaleed Bin Talal Bin Abdulaziz Alsaud - private investor; Undisclosed buyer(s) 沙特阿拉伯 　 软件出版 (5112) 247.7 (官方数据) 5.3 Saudi Arabian investment company Kingdom Holding Co (KHC) and Prince Al-Waleed Bin Talal bin Abdulaziz al Saud have lead a group of investors in Series F funding round of U.S-based ridesharing app Lyft for USD 247.7mn, KHC reported in market filings to the stock exchange. KHC said that it has acquired a 2.3% stake for USD 104.9mn, including common and preferred shares. Lyft was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco. The company provides an application that matches drivers with passengers. It operates in around 65 cities in the US. Kingdom Holding Co, founded by Prince Al-Waleed Bin Talal bin Abdulaziz al Saud, is one of the most diversified private investment companies in the world, mainly focused on finance services and real estate investments. The company invests in petrochemical, media and publishing, entertainment, finance, social media and technology, education, health care, aviation, and agriculture sectors. Its has investments in a number of US companies including Apple, Hewlett-Packard, Kodak, News Corporation, Pepsi, Procter & Gamble, SAKS Inc., Time Warner, and the Walt Disney Company. KHC listed on the Tadawul - Saudi Stock Exchange.
114472 24/12/2015 澳大利亚 Logistics facility in Sydney 收购 Ascendas Real Estate Investment Trust 新加坡 Deka Immobilien Investment GmbH 仓储 (493); 房地产 (531) 55.39 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 22 February 2016, A-REIT announced it has completed the acquisition of a logistics facility located at 6-20 Clunies Ross Street, Pemulwuy in Sydney, Australia for AUD 76.6mn (USD 55.4mn). ORIGINAL: Singapore's Ascendas Real Estate Investment Trust (A-REIT) announced that it has agreed to acquire a logistics facility in Australia's capital Sydney from German investment giant Deka Immobilien Investment for AUD 76.6mn (USD 55.4mn). This is A-REIT's 10th logistics facility in Sydney and its 27th in Australia. The company said that the purchase is expected to generate a net property income yield of approximately 7.1% pre-transaction costs in the first year. The transaction is subject to clearance by the Australian Foreign Investment Review Board and is expected to be completed in the first quarter of 2016. The property is located on 6-20 Clunies Ross Street and it comprises a modern high clearance warehouse and a freestanding two-storey office/laboratory facility with a total gross floor area of 38,579 m2. The current tenants of the property include Australia Post and New South Wales Police. Australia Post has subleased its space to Australian retailer Target, which uses it as its major distribution facility. A-REIT is Singapore's first listed business space and industrial real estate investment trust. It has a portfolio, comprising business and science park properties, hi-specs industrial properties, light industrial properties, and logistics and distribution centres. Its total assets stood at SGD 8.3bn (USD 5.8bn) at the end of September 2015.

Completion of the deal is subject to certain conditions precedent. The acquisition is in line with Capital Environment Holdings' plans for expansion of its waste incineration and power generation operations. Jiangxi Ruijin Ai Si Environmental Electric will develop a waste treatment project with daily treatment capacity of 1,200 tonnes under a concessionary agreement with the People's Government of Ruijin City, Jiangxi Province, southeastern China. Capital Environment Holdings provides waste treatment technologies and services. It specialises in technology development, design, system integration, project investment, consultancy, operation and maintenance of waste treatment facilities, especially waste-to-energy projects. 116887 23/12/2015 中国 Hefei Liuyuan Photovoltaic Power Generation Investment Co Ltd; Luan Xuqiang New Energy Engineering Co Ltd; Suzhou Xuqiang New Energy Engineering Co Ltd 收购 Kong Sun Holdings Ltd 香港 Jiangsu Chaoxian Power Co Ltd 太阳能发电 (221114) 81.5 (官方数据) 100 Hong Kong-listed diversified group Kong Sun Holdings said it will acquire three solar plant companies in China from Jiangsu Chaoxian Power Co Ltd for a combined consideration of CNY 528mn (USD 81.5mn). The consideration includes a cash injection into one of the target companies of CNY 47.5mn and assumption of liabilities for the rest of the sum. The target companies include Hefei Liuyuan Photovoltaic Power Generation Investment Co Ltd, Luan Xuqiang New Energy Engineering Co Ltd, and Suzhou Xuqiang New Energy Engineering Co Ltd. Completion of the acquisitions is subject to fulfilment of the conditions precedent. Hefei Liuyuan has a 40 MW photovoltaic power generation project in Hefei City, Anhui Province. Luan Xuqiang is developing a 40 MW photovoltaic power generation project in Luan City, Anhui Province. Suzhou Xuqiang has a 20 MW photovoltaic power generation project in Suzhou City, Anhui Province. All three power plants are expected to be connected to the power grid by the end of January 2016. The acquisitions will strengthen Kong Sun Holdings' position in the photovoltaic power sector in China following its long-term development strategy. Kong Sun Holdings is engaged properties investment, manufacturing and sale of life-like plants, investment in and development of photovoltaic power plants and trading of equipments related to photovoltaic power stations in China. Jiangsu Chaoxian Power Co Ltd is engaged in investment in and development of solar power projects in China.
116375 23/12/2015 香港 Noble Agri Ltd 少数股权购买 COFCO Corp 中国 Noble Group Ltd 谷物及其他作物的种植 (111) 750 (官方数据) 49 UPDATE: On 03 March 2016, China National Cereals, Oils and Foodstuffs Corp. (COFCO) announced the completion of the deal. ORIGINAL: The national food processing conglomerate China National Cereals, Oils and Foodstuffs Corp. (COFCO) will acquire the remainder 49% stake, it did not own, in Hong-Kong agribusiness company Noble Agri Ltd. from its joint-venture partner Noble Group Ltd. for USD 750mn in cash, both parties announced. The transaction is subject to customary approvals. In addition to the cash receipt of USD 750mn, Nobel Group said it would retain the right to benefit from a future sale or IPO of the Noble Agri, worth up to USD 200mn. Upon deal completion, COFCO will own 100% of Noble Agri Ltd., which will be re-named as COFCO Agri Ltd. Originally, in 2014 COFCO acquired a 51% stake in the target for USD 1.5bn. Following the deal, Noble Agri will become COFCO's overseas purchase platform and contribute to further optimization of its fully integrated value chain. Noble Group Ltd. will use the entire sale proceeds to pay down debt. Noble Agri Ltd. was incorporated in Bermuda in 2009, and engages in the agricultural trading and processing businesses, delivering 46 million tons of products globally. It operates 45 asset locations, strategically based within key global trade flows, and has 9,500 employees in 29 countries. In 2014, the company booked revenues of USD 14.9bn. Founded in 1949, COFCO is the largest supplier of of agricultural products, diversified foodstuffs and services in China. The company provides grain and oil products to one quarter of global population, employing 120,000 people. COFCO has five companies listed in Hong Kong - China Foods Ltd., China Agri-Industries Holdings Ltd., Mengniu Dairy, Joy City Property Ltd., and CPMC Holdings Ltd., as well as three companies listed in China - COFCO Tunhe Co. Ltd., COFCO Property (Group) Co. Ltd., and COFCO Biochemical (AnHui) Co. Ltd. Noble Group acts as a supply chain manager of agricultural and energy products. Operating from over 60 locations, the company facilitates the processing, financing and transportation of essential raw materials. Noble Group is listed on the Singapore Exchange and it booked revenues of USD 85.8bn in 2014.
115484 23/12/2015 巴西 Minerva SA 少数股权购买 Saudi Agricultural and Livestock Investment Company 沙特阿拉伯 　 食品制造 (311); 畜禽屠宰及肉制品加工 (3116) 186.28 (官方数据) 19.95 UPDATE: On 25 February 2016, Minerva announced that it has reached the final date for the issuance of new shares. The company said that through the subscription of SALIC, it has reached the minimum shares required to receive an approval for the Capital Increase. ORIGINAL: Saudi Agricultural and Livestock Investment Company (SALIC) announced it has agreed to acquire 19.95% new shares of Brazilian beef producer Minerva SA through a private share placement for BRL 746.44mn (USD 186.28mn). SALIC acted through its London-based wholly owned subsidiary Salic (UK) Ltd. Subject of the transaction are 47,848,524 new common shares of Minerva, corresponding to the minimum of shares to be issued on the capital increase. The company will issue up to 99,736,56 new common shares that will raise as much as BRL 1.56bn (USD 388.3mn) until 26 February 2016. The operation will allow Minerva to expand its operations and gain better access to markets in the Middle East. Mr. Abdullah Aldubaikhi, CEO of SALIC, commented that the investment was made, due to Minerva's strong market position both in South America and internationally. The deal is expected to be completed in the first quarter of 2016. Minerva, founded in 1957, specialises in slaughtering livestock and production and distribution of beef, pork and poultry products. The company operates ten slaughter and deboning plants and eight distribution centres in Brazilian states and one in Paraguay, with a total daily slaughter capacity of 17,330 head of cattle. Its export portfolio comprises live cattle, leather, beef and beef byproducts, sold in more than 100 countries. Minerva posted BRL 7bn (USD 3bn) in revenues and a net loss of BRL 418.22mn (USD 178.25mn) in 2014. SALIC, established in 2012, develops and invests in companies operating in the agricultural industry. The firm is focused on investing in trade, financial operations, production, packaging, processing, storage, transportation, supply-chain, and shipping of agricultural and animal products. Note: All multiples are calculated on a pre-money basis. ________________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE: Em 25 de fevereiro de 2016, a Minerva anunciou que atingiu a data limite para a emissão de novas ações. A empresa disse que com da subscrição pela SALIC, foi atingido o valor mínimo necessário para a homologação do Aumento de Capital. ORIGINAL: A Saudi Agricultural and Livestock Investment Company (SALIC) anunciou que se comprometeu a subscrever uma participação acionária de 19.95% de novas ações da processadora brasileira de carne bovina Minerva SA, através de uma colocação privada de ações, pelo valor de BRL 746.44mn (USD 186.28mn). A SALIC agiu através da sua subsidiária integral baseada em Londres Salic (UK) Ltd. O assunto da transação são 47,848,524 novas ações ordinárias da Minerva, correspondente ao mínimo de ações a serem emitidas na operação de aumento de capital. A empresa vai emitir até 99,736,56 novas ações ordinárias que vão levantar até BRL 1.56bn (USD 388.3mn), até o dia 6 de fevereiro de 2016. A operação vai ajudar a Minerva a expandir as suas operações e obter melhor acesso aos mercados do Oriente Médio. O Sr. Abdullah Aldubaikhi, CEO da SALIC, comentou que o investimento foi feito, devido a forte posição de mercado da Minerva, tanto na América do Sul como a nível internacional. O negócio deverá ser concluída no primeiro trimestre de 2016. A Minerva, fundada em 1957, é especializada no abate de animais e produção e comercialização de carne bovina, suína e de aves. A companhia opera dez plantas de abate e desossa e oito centros de distribuição em oito estados brasileiros, Uruguai e Paraguai, com uma capacidade diária de abate de 17,330 cabeças de gado. A sua carteira de exportação inclui gado vivo, couro, carne bovina e derivados, vendidos em mais de 100 países. A Minerva apurou um faturamento de BRL 7bn (USD 3bn) e um prejuízo líquido de BRL 418.22mn (USD 178.25mn) em 2014. A SALIC, criada em 2012, investe em empresas que operam no setor agrícola e participa no desenvolvimento destas. A companhia tem interesse em investir em comércio, operações financeiras, produção, embalagem, processamento, armazenamento, transporte, cadeia de fornecimento, e transporte de produtos agrícolas e animais. Note: Todos os múltipolos são calculados numa base pre-dinheiro.

115228 23/12/2015 新加坡 Interplex Holdings Ltd 收购 Baring Private Equity Asia 中国 Standard Chartered Private Equity Ltd; CVC Capital Partners Ltd 金属加工及制品 (332); 金属锻压 (3321) 184.41 (官方数据) 57.7 Shanghai-headquartered Baring Private Equity Asia announced it will acquire a 57.7% stake in Singapore-headquartered precision engineering firm Interplex Holdings Ltd., former Amtek Engineering Ltd., for SGD 259.2mn (USD 184.4mn). The sellers in the deal are China's Standard Chartered Private Equity Ltd. (SCPEL) and U.K.-based CVC Capital Partners. Baring Private Equity Asia will acquire 316,133,346 Interplex shares at an offer price of SGD 0.82 (USD 0.58) apiece. The deal is subject to the fulfillment of certain conditions, including approvals by U.S., Chinese and Polish regulators. Interplex's major shareholders, SCPEL and CVC, have accepted the offer and will tender their combined 57.7% stake in the target. Following the deal, Baring Private Equity Asia will also offer to buy the other 42.3% of the target's publicly traded shares, at the same offer price, for SGD 190.4mn (USD 135.4mn). The whole transaction for 100% of Interplex's share capital would be worth SGD 450mn (USD 320.1mn). The offer price of SGD 0.82 per share represents a premium of 15.5% over the target's closing price of SGD 0.71 per share on 22 December 2015, the last trading day before the announcement. The acquisition will allow Baring Private Equity Asia to get control in a precision engineering company with a strong track record, global manufacturing footprint, and diversified customer base. Interplex Holdings offers end-to-end solutions for complex precision mechanical and electro-mechanical components and assemblies. The company serves its customers in sectors including the automotive, consumers electronics, industrial, telecom, medical and life sciences etc. With 12,000 employees, Interplex operates more than 40 manufacturing plants in 14 countries worldwide. In 2015, it booked revenues of USD 969.5mn. Baring Private Equity Asia is one of the largest independent private equity firms in Asia, with USD 9.0bn in committed capital. The firm employs 120 people in seven offices in Hong Kong, Shanghai, Beijing, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta and Tokyo.
