114747 23/12/2015 斯洛文尼亚 SwatyComet doo 收购 Weiler Corp 美国 Avtotehna dd 水泥、玻璃等建筑材料，非金属矿物制品业 (327) 　 100 U.S. abrasive products producer Weiler Corp. announced the acquisition of the entire capital of the Slovenian bonded abrasives manufacturer SwatyComet d.o.o. from Slovenian diversified industrial company Avtotehna d.d. The deal value was not disclosed. The acquisition enables Weiler Corp. to expand substantially its global footprint into the bonded abrasives segment, the buyer disclosed on its website. With the deal, Weiler increases its production capabilities, offering solutions to the welding, metalworking and general industrial markets. Furthermore, the U.S. company adds a broad range of cut-off and grinding wheels and technical fabrics to serve industrial markets. The sale is part of Avtotehna's restructuring process in a compulsory proceeding. Earlier in November 2015, Avtotehna has also sold its IT products wholesaler Avtera d.o.o. to local Janus Trade d.o.o., an authorized distributor of Samsung products. SwatyComet d.o.o., founded in 1879, is a leading manufacturer of bonded abrasives and technical fabrics, and employs around 900 workers. The company booked revenues of EUR 84.8mn in 2014, of which more than 95% were generated in foreign markets. It exports its products to around 80 countries around the world. Weiler, established in 1898, is a global producer of power brushes, abrasives and maintenance products for surface conditioning. The firm is a leading provider of surface conditioning solutions for the welding & fabrication, industrial production, and maintenance, repair & operations markets. With some 550 employees, it operates a manufacturing facility in Pennsylvania, and sales its products through distributors in the U.S., Canada and Mexico, as well as in the Middle East, Caspian Region, Asia, Australia, Africa and South America.
114697 23/12/2015 斯洛伐克 Hotel Crowne Plaza Bratislava; Grand Hotel Kempinski High Tatras 收购 REDSIDE investicni spolecnost as 捷克共和国 Best Hotel Properties as 住宿服务 (721) 61.24 (官方数据) 100 Slovak hotel operator Best Hotel Properties (BPH) announced that it will sell two hotels in Slovakia, Hotel Crowne Plaza Bratislava and Grand Hotel Kempinski High Tatras to fund NOVA Hotels, owned by Czech investment firm REDSIDE for EUR 56mn (USD 61.2mn). BPH said it is also negotiating the sale of Hotel Moscow Baltschug. Hotel Crowne Plaza Bratislava is situated in the heart of the city - opposite the Presidential Residence. It has 224 rooms and suites. Grand Hotel Kempinski High Tatras consists of three interlinked buildings. It offers 98 rooms and suites. REDSIDE, founded in 2012, provides professional management of qualified investors' funds. As of end-2014, the company has CZK 1bn (EUR 36.1mn) in assets under management. Best Hotel Properties was founded in 2009. The company's portfolio comprises: Hotel Moscow Baltschug, Hotel InterContinental Prague, Grand Hotel River Park in Bratislava, as well as restaurant Buddha Bar in Prague. BPH is listed on the Bratislava Stock Exchange.
114570 23/12/2015 俄罗斯 Isoroc 收购 Compagnie de Saint-Gobain SA 法国 　 水泥、玻璃等建筑材料，非金属矿物制品业 (327) 　 74.9 UPDATE: The transaction was completed, AK&M news agency reported on 27 May 2016. ORIGINAL: French construction and high-performance materials producer Compagnie de Saint-Gobain SA has obtained antitrust approval to acquire a 74.9% stake in Russian thermal insulation materials manufacturer Izoroc, according to a statement of the Federal Antimonopoly Service. The financial parametres of the acquisition were not specified. Following the successful completion of the deal, Saint-Gobain will consolidate 100% in the target. Izoroc was founded in 2000 with a 100% foreign capital from German and Austrian investors, as well as the EBRD. Saint-Gobain acquired a 25.1% stake in Izoroc in 2012. Izoroc produces insulation materials (walls, roofs, floor decks, ventilation shafts, pipelines, etc) made of mineral fiber on the basis of the reconstructed Tambov plant of heat insulation materials. Saint-Gobain is a worldwide leader in sustainable habitat solutions, designs, manufactures and distributes building- and high-performance materials. The holding operates in 66 countries and employs 170,000 people. In 2014, Saint-Gobain reported sales of EUR 38.3bn (USD 50.9bn).
114509 23/12/2015 巴西 Ingresse - Ingressos para Eventos Ltda 少数股权购买 Ambev SA; DGF Investimentos Holding SA; e.Bricks Digital; Qualcomm Ventures 巴西; 美国 　 旅行社、旅游经营者的活动 (5615) 2.99 (官方数据) 　 Brazilian on-line ticket sales company Ingresse - Ingressos para Eventos Ltda has raised BRL 10.8mn (USD 2.99mn) in in its third round of funding, through a capital increase. The investment was headed by Ambev SA, the Brazilian subsidiary of Belgian brewery Anheuser-Busch InBev that invested BRL 8mn (USD 2mn). U.S. venture capital firm Qualcomm Ventures, Brazilian private equity firm DGF Investimentos Holding SA, and E.Bricks Early Stage Fund, the venture capital fund of Brazilian media group RBS Participacoes SA, also participated in the investment round, but with smaller contributions, i.e. BEL 2.8mn (USD 0.7mn). The information was provided by Veirano Advogados that acted as a legal advisor to Qualcomm, DGF, Ambev and e.Bricks. Furthermore, Ambev, DGF e E.Bricks paid BRL 1.2mn (USD 0.3mn) for an undisclosed stake of an angel investor. Ingresse, founded in 2012 by entrepreneurs Gabriel Benarros and Sebastien Robaszkiewicz, specialises in the development and management of an on-line ticket sales platform for a variety of events across Brazil. Since its inception, the company has sold more than 200,000 tickets. Companhia de Bebidas das Americas (Ambev) was founded in 1999, following the merger of Brahma and Antarctica. It is the largest brewing company in Latin America and the fifth in the world. The company's portfolio includes beers such as Antarctica, Brahma, Bohemia, Skol and Stella Artois. Amber operates in 14 countries and employs over 45,000 people. Ambev booked BRL 38.08bn (USD 16.2bn) in revenues and a net profit of BRL 12.07bn (USD 5.14bn) in 2014. The company is listed on the BM&FBovespa and the New York (NYSE) Stock Exchanges. Qualcomm Ventures, founded in 2000 as the venture capital investment arm of U.S. mobility solutions provider Qualcomm Inc, focuses on investments in companies from the mobile software, consumer internet, healthcare, energy, e-commerce and digital media segments. The company usually invests between USD 0.5mn and USD 10mn in a single transaction. DGF Investimentos, launched in 2001, is a private equity and venture capital firm with USD 368mn in assets under management (as of 29 December 2015). The company invests between USD 10mn and USD 100mn in early-stage and growth companies, and manages a specific thesis platform, focused on local bio-energy market. e.Bricks Digital, founded in 2012 as a result of the spin-off of the digital business unit of RBS, is a business development company in the digital sector, focused on investments in Brazilian companies in a stage of rapid growth from the e-commerce, mobile and digital media and technology sectors. Among its investment portfolio are Grupo.Mobi, Guia da Semana, Hagah, Hi-Midia, Lets, ObaOba, Predicta, Vitrinepix and Wine. The company also has an early-stage venture capital fund e.Bricks Early Stage, focused on Seed, A and B rounds investments in Brazilian technology start-ups. _______________________________________________________________________________________________ A empresa brasileira de venda de ingressos online Ingresse - Ingressos para Eventos Ltda anunciou que recebeu sua terceira rodada de investimento de BRL 10.8mn (USD 2.99mn), através de aumento de capital. O investimento foi fornecido pela Ambev SA, a subsidiária brasileira da cervejaria belga Anheuser-Busch InBev que foi a investidora principal, contribuindo com um valor de BRL 8mn (USD 2mn). A empresa de capital de risco norte-americana Qualcomm Ventures, a empresa brasileira de investimento em participações DGF Investimentos Holding SA, e o E.Bricks Early Stage Fund, o fundo de capital de risco do grupo de mídia brasileiro RBS Participações, também participaram na rodada mas com contribuições mais reduzidas, i.e. BEL 2.8mn (USD 0.7mn). A informação foi fornecida pelo Veirano Advogados que foi o assessor jurídico das Qualcomm, DGF, Ambev and e.Bricks. Adicionalmente, a Ambev, a DGF e a E.Bricks pagaram BRL 1.2mn (USD 0.3mn) para adquirir a participação na Ingresse de um investidor anjo não revelado. A Ingresse, lançada em 2012 pelos empresários Gabriel Benarrós e Sébastien Robaszkiewicz, é especializada no desenvolvimento e gestão de uma plataforma on-line de venda de ingressos para uma variedade de eventos em todo o Brasil. Desde a sua criação, a empresa já comercializou mais de 200,000 ingressos. A Companhia de Bebidas das Américas (AmBev) foi estabelecida em 1999, após a fusão da Brahma com a Antarctica. A Ambev é a maior fabricante de cerveja na América Latina e a quinta maior do mundo. O portfólio da empresa inclui cervejas como Antarctica, Brahma, Bohemia, Skol e Stella Artois. A empresa opera em 14 países e emprega mais de 45,000 pessoas. A Ambev registrou BRL 38.08bn (USD 16.2bn) em receitas e um lucro líquido de BRL 12.07bn (USD 5.14bn) em 2014. A empresa está listada na Bolsa de Valores de São Paulo BM&FBovespa e na Bolsa de Valores de Nova Iorque (NYSE). A Qualcomm Ventures, fundada em 2000 como o braço de investimentos de capital de risco da provedora norte-americana de soluções de mobilidade Qualcomm Inc, tem com foco investimentos em empresas dos segmentos de software móvel, internet de consumo, saúde, energia, comércio eletrônico e mídia digital. A empresa investe geralmente entre USD 0.5mn e USD 10mn em uma única transação. A DGF Investimentos, lançada em 2001, é uma empresa de investimento em participações com cerca de USD 368mn de ativos sob gestão (a data de 29 de dezembro de 2015). A companhia investe entre USD 10mn e USD 100mn em empresas em estágio inicial e em empresas de crescimento, e administra uma plataforma de investimento de teses setoriais específicas, focada no mercado local de bio-energia. A e.Bricks Digital, fundada em 2012, como resultado da cisão da unidade de negócios digitais da RBS, é uma empresa de desenvolvimento de negócios no setor digital, focada em investimentos em empresas brasileiras em estágio de alto crescimento dos setores do comércio eletrônico, mobile e mídia digital e tecnologia. Entre a sua carteira de investimentos estão Grupo.Mobi, Guia da Semana, Hagah, Hi-Mídia, Lets, ObaOba, Predicta, Vitrinepix e Wine. A empresa também tem um fundo de capital de risco dedicado a startups iniciantes e.Bricks Early Stage, com foco em investimentos de capital semente e investimentos de séries A e B em empresas nascentes de tecnologia no Brasil.
114524 23/12/2015 波兰 Ultramedia Sp z oo 收购 Olympic Entertainment Group 爱沙尼亚 　 游乐场、博彩和其他休闲娱乐活动 (713) 　 　 100 Estonian casino operator Olympic Entertainment Group (OEG) has acquired Polish company Ultramedia for an undisclosed amount, the buyer disclosed in market filings to the stock exchange. The aim of the transaction is to create a legal platform for expanding OEG's activities in Poland. Ultramedia currently is not operating. Olympic Entertainment Group, founded in 1999, is the leading casino entertainment company in the Baltic States. The company is active also in Poland, Slovakia and Belarus. Its shares have been listed on the NASDAQ OMX Tallinn Stock Exchange since 2006 and on the Warsaw Stock Exchange - since 2007. The company posted revenues of EUR 151mn and net profit of EUR 21.6mn in 2014.
114500 23/12/2015 乌克兰 KUB-Gas 收购 Cub Energy Inc 加拿大 Serinus Energy Inc 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 32.8 (官方数据) 70 UPDATE 2: On 8 February 2016, Serinus Energy announced its sold 70% in KUB-Gas. The effective date of the sale was 31 December 2015. Serinus received total cash consideration of USD 32.8mn including all working capital and inter-company adjustments. Serinus is also due to repay a total of USD 19.2mn of debt and accrued interest to the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development. UPDATE 1: On 6 January 2015, Canada-listed CUB Energy Inc said it exercised its right of first refusal to acquire from Serinus Energy Inc the remaining 70% it does not own in KUB-Gas at the same price earlier agreed with the undisclosed private company. CUB Energy Inc will act in the transaction via wholly-owned subsidiary Gastek LLC. The closing of the deal is subject to the meeting of customary conditions precedent. CUB Energy Inc is a Ukraine-focused upstream oil and gas company with 355,000 gross acres in the Transcarpathian and Dnieper-Donets basins in Ukraine. The company's gross proved plus probable reserves are estimated at 4.767 billions of boe. ORIGINAL: International oil and gas company Serinus Energy Inc has agreed on the sale of its 70% stake in Ukrainian natural gas firm KUB-Gas to an undisclosed private company, the seller disclosed in a filing with the Warsaw Stock Exchange. The payment consideration is to be settled in cash of USD 30mn plus working capital and inter-company adjustments. The transaction is expected to close before 31 January 2016 pending approval or expiry of the right of first refusal by the holder of the remaining 30% in KUB-Gas. The reasons that triggered the sale were both declining global prices of energy, as well as certain regulations passed in Ukraine in 2014 and 2015 which reportedly have adverse effect on CUB-Gas' business and namely - high royalty rates on natural gas and imposed foreign exchange control that restricts remittances of currency outside the country. Serinus acquired its interest in KUB-Gas in mid-2010 for USD 45mn. KUB-Gas operates six licences in Ukraine which cover the Olgovskoye, Makeevskoye, Vergunskoye and Krutogorovskoye gas fields. The estimated gross 2P gas reserves of the deposits as at end-2014 are 64.5 billion cubic feet. The company's production in Q3 2015 reached 23.5 MMcfe/d.
114510 23/12/2015 阿根廷 Aguada Federal oil block in Argentina 少数股权购买 Wintershall Holding GmbH 德国 Gas y Petroleo del Neuquen SA (GyP) 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 　 　 40 German crude oil & natural gas producer Wintershall Holding GmbH, a subsidiary of German chemicals company BASF SE, announced the acquisition of an additional 40% stake in the Argentinean oil block Aguada Federal from Argentinean state-owned oil & gas firm Gas y Petroleo del Neuquen SA (GyP). Financial terms were not disclosed. Following this acquisition, Wintershall increased its interest in the block to 90%. The German firm acquired 50% back in January 2014. The Aguada Federal oil block comprises 97 square kilometres of the prospective Vaca Muerta shale, located in the Anelo department of the Neuquen province. Wintershall Holding explores, develops and produces natural gas and crude oil. Gas y Petroleo del Neuquen is the oil & gas firm of Argentina's Neuquen province. It reported total revenues of ARS 207mn (USD 16.1mn) and a net income of ARS 59.7mn (USD 4.64mn) for 2014.
114492 23/12/2015 土耳其 Onedio 少数股权购买 European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD); Revo Capital 国际的; 土耳其 　 互联网出版与传播 (516) 3 (官方数据) 　 Turkish social media content startup Onedio raised USD 3.0mn in an investment round, led by European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD), digital technology blog Webrazzi reported. Existing investor Revo Capital also participated in the round. Onedio received TRY 2.6mn (USD 1.0mn) from Revo Capital in March 2015. The company received its first investment of TRY 1.2mn (USD 0.6mn) from Revo Capital in September 2013. The new investment will be used for original video content production and for introduction of English and Arab language versions of the website. Onedio was launched in 2012. Currently the website has 23 million visitors monthly. A significant part of Onedio's traffic comes from social media networks, mainly Facebook. EBRD started investing in Turkey in 2009 and currently operates from offices in Istanbul, Ankara and Gaziantep. To date, the bank has invested EUR 6.8bn in the country through 170 projects in infrastructure, energy, agribusiness, industry and finance. Revo Capital is an early stage technology investment fund, providing between USD 0.25mn and USD 4mn in an investment round.
114498 23/12/2015 中国 Properties in Goldin Metropolitan development project 收购 Company manager(s); Undisclosed 中国 Goldin Properties Holdings Ltd 房地产 (531) 2,778.35 (官方数据) 100 Hong Kong-listed Goldin Properties Holdings Ltd said it will sell several properties in Goldin Metropolitan development project in Tianjin, eastern China, to its chairman Pan Sutong and an undisclosed Chinese buyer for CNY 18bn (USD 2.8bn). The transaction is subject to satisfaction of certain closing conditions, including shareholder approval. Each of the buyers will acquire 50% interest in the properties and will provide half of the consideration. The properties include A office building Goldin Finance 117, Grade A office building - Headquarter building E, a mega high-end shopping mall and other facilities including car parking spaces with ancillary. The total gross floor area (GFA) and estimated saleable GFA of the properties is 497,156 m2 and 553,929 m2, respectively. Their construction is 77% completed. Goldin Metropolitan is a high-end integrated property development project of Goldin Properties with a GFA of 1.89 million m2 , which will be completed by 2017 in phases. It comprises also Twin Tower - North Tower and five other headquarter buildings of Grade A office buildings. Its major elements include the central business district, comprised of skyscraper Goldin Finance 117, a luxury residential zone called Fortune Heights and Tianjin Goldin Metropolitan Polo Club complemented by Tianjin Goldin Metropolitan Polo Club Hotel. Upon completion of the sale, Goldin Properties will continue to be engaged in the property development and investment and operation of hotel and polo club. It ill continue to develop other buildings and facilities within the Goldin Metropolitan project. Pan Sutong owns 64.38% of Goldin Properties. Note: The estimated saleable GFA of the properties is used for the calculation of the MVE/Area multiple.
114503 23/12/2015 美国 Viteos Group 收购 Wipro Ltd 印度 　 定制电脑编程服务 (541511); 办公支持服务 (5614) 13 (官方数据) 100 Indian IT major Wipro Ltd announced that it has entered into definitive agreements to acquire financial software and back office solutions firm Viteos Group for a total consideration of USD 130mn. The acquisition will strengthen Wipro’s business process services capabilities. The transaction is subject to customary and regulatory conditions and approval. It is expected to be completed in Q4 2016. Viteos Group is financial software and business services provider that specialises in the financial and asset management services such as reconciliation, regulatory reporting, data conversion, collateral management and trade support among others. The firm has more than 400 employees in india and The U.S. It was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in New Jersey. Wipro is an international consulting, IT and outsourcing firm with over 150,000 employees globally. It offers engineering, financial and information technology services to over 900 clients in 61 countries. It is listed on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE), National Stock Exchange (NSE) and New York Stock Exchange (NYSE). Wipro reported net revenues of INR 469.5bn (USD 7.5bn) for FY ended 31 March, 2015.
114489 23/12/2015 俄罗斯 Ajur-Media 收购 Alexander Gorshkov - private investor; Andrey Konstantinov - private investor; Evgeny Vyshenkov - private investor; Andrey Potapenko - private investor 俄罗斯 Bonnier AB 互联网出版与传播 (516) 8.7 (市场估计) 51 Swiss media consortium Bonnier AB has sold its 51% stake in Russian web publisher Ajur-Media, to the latter’s founders and minority shareholders Alexander Gorshkov, Andrey Konstantinov, Andrey Potapenko and Evgeny Vyshenkov, Bonnier AB and fontanka.ru reported separately. The financial terms of the sale were not commented but according to information of Kommersant daily, the majority stake was valued at EUR 8mn (USD 8.7mn) in the transaction. The sale was triggered by the latest Russian regulations which stipulate that a foreign entity should not hold more than 20% in a Russian media company starting from 1 January 2016. On a related note, Bonnier AB also sold its 80% in local newspaper Delovoy Peterburg to Russian property developer Fort Group. Bonnier AB bought 51% in Ajur-Media in April 2013 from the company founders. Apart from its flagship product - internet news site fontanka.ru, Ajur-Media also operates internet projects fontanka.fi (news covering Finland), doctorpiter.ru (news on healthcare sector) and online edition on road traffic Voditel Peterburga (spbvoditel.ru). Alexander Gorshkov, who is also a chief editor of Fontanka, was quoted as saying that the editor’s policy of the online resource will not be changed. Andrus Vaher, the general director of Bonnier Business Press which publishes Delovoy Peterburg, said, as cited by Kommersant daily, that the terms of the sale of Ajur-Media imply that Bonnier AB may purchase back its shares in the future. The seller is also set to stay on the Russian market although its presence and ownership are restricted. Fontanka.ru, in existence since 1999, is the oldest and most popular internet newspaper in St Petersburg covering social and political topics.
114493 23/12/2015 立陶宛 Neptuno Vandenys UAB 收购 The Coca-Cola Co 美国 　 软饮料及食用冰制造 (31211) 　 　 100 UPDATE 2: On 1 April 2016, Coca-Cola finalised the deal. UPDATE 1: On 18 February 2016, Lithuanian anti-monopoly office approved the deal. ORIGINAL: US beverage company The Coca-Cola has signed an agreement to acquire Lithuanian mineral water producer Neptuno Vandenys, The Baltic Course reported. The deal value was not disclosed. The transaction is expected to close in Q1 2016. The buyer acted through its subsidiary Coca-Cola HBC Lietuva. Neptuno Vandenys sells mineral water under brand name Neptunas. The water is extracted in the forest on the edge of Dzukija National Park in Lithuania. The company has 20% market share. It reported revenues of EUR 5.3mn and net profit of EUR 1.91mn in 2014. Coca-Cola, established in 1886, is the world's largest beverage company with a portfolio of over 500 sparkling and still brands available in more than 24 million retail consumer outlets in 200 countries. The Coca-Cola systems comprises over 250 bottling partners worldwide, with nearly 900 plants and more than 700,000 employees. The company posted USD 46bn in revenues and a net profit of USD 7bn in 2014.

ORIGINAL: Polish real estate developer Globe Trade Centre SA (GTC SA) said that it has acquired Pixel office building in Poland from Netherlands-based investment fund Garvest for EUR 32.2mn (USD 35.2mn). The buyer will finance the transaction through available cash resources and a bank loan. The deal is subject to customary closing conditions and is expected to complete in Q1 2016. Earlier on 19 November 2015, GTC purchased Duna Tower twin-office building in Budapest from Hungarian real estate company Duna Tower for EUR 52.15mn (USD 55.54mn). Pixel is located at the junction of Grunwaldzka and Babimojska streets in Poznan. Opened in 2013, it has seven floors and GLA of 14,500 m2. It is fully leased by Polish auction service Allegro. GTC Group is focused on Central and Eastern Europe with operations in Poland, Romania, Hungary, Croatia, Serbia, Bulgaria, Slovakia, the Czech Republic, Russia and Ukraine. The Group's portfolio comprises completed office buildings and office parks, as well as retail and entertainment centres, residential projects and undeveloped plots of land (including suspended projects). GTC generated revenues of PLN 520.2mn (EUR 124.3mn) in 2014.
114452 23/12/2015 俄罗斯 Bonnier Business Press 收购 Fort Group 俄罗斯 Bonnier AB 报纸、期刊、图书和字典的出版 (5111) 2.25 (市场估计) 80 Swedish media group Bonnier AB has closed the sale of an 80% stake in its Russian subsidiary Bonnier Business Press, the publisher of local newspaper Delovoy Peterburg, to Russian developer Fort Group, Bonnier AB announced. The financial terms of the deal were not disclosed. The whole asset was allegedly valued at RUB 200mn (USD 2.81mn) in the deal, according to infornation of Kommersant daily. The head of Fort Group, Maxim Levchenko, was cited by fontanka.ru as saying that the group will use own funds for the acquisition. The sale is in compliance with the latest Russian regulations which stipulate that foreign entities should not hold more than 20% in local media companies starting from 1 January 2016. Andrus Vaher, the general director of Bonnier Business Press, as cited by fontanka.ru, does not rule out the possibility that Bonnier AB will continue to develop on the Russian market once the legislative limitations for foreigners are lifted. Reportedly, the ownership change will not influence the editor's policy and organizational structure of Delovoy Peterburg. Vaher will keep his position in the company. Delovoy Peterburg is the largest business daily in the North-West Federal District published in St Petersburg. The newspaper has a circulation of 15,000 copies per day, as well as an electronic version. In 2014, Bonnier Business Press generated revenue of RUB 406mn (USD 10.8mn) and a net profit of RUB 17.6mn (USD 466,400). Founded in 2011, Fort Group is a leading player on the commercial real estate market in St Petersburg. The main areas of the company's activity are investments, development and property management. Today, the group owns 11 commercial centres with total area of over half a million square metres, office centres and an elite residential house.
114451 23/12/2015 俄罗斯 Terner Detskie Programmy; Terner Informatsionnye Programmy i Stil Zhizny 收购 Media Alliance 俄罗斯 Turner Broadcasting System Inc 有线广播电视和其他付费订阅节目服务 (5152) 　 　 100 UPDATE: On 5 May 2016, Media Alliance completed the transaction, Interfax news agency reported. ORIGINAL: Russia's recently-created cable TV company Media Alliance has agreed to acquire the local assets of U.S. media conglomerate Turner Broadcasting System Inc (TBS Inc), Vedomosti daily reported, citing a source on the media market. The information was reportedly confirmed by the buyer's general director, Olga Paskina and a source close to the seller. Financial parametres of the transaction were not commented. Paskina specified that TBS Inc is selling Russian companies OOO Terner Detskie Programmy and OOO Terner Informatsionnye Programy i Stil Zhizni. The first one represents children's TV channels Cartoon Network and Boomerang in Russia while the second one is the local representative for CNN channel. The deal is expected to close in the coming weeks. Thanks to the sale, Media Alliance will diversify its portfolio of paid TV channels, especially in the children's content segment. The sale is in compliance with the latest Russian legislation which stipulates that foreign entities should not possess more than 20% in a local media company starting from 1 January 2016. Media Alliance was created in October 2015 by Russian media holding National Media Group (NMG) and U.S. mass-media and entertainment group Discovery Communications with the aim to control Discovery's Russian assets. NMG possesses 80% in Media Alliance and the remainder belongs to Discovery Communications. Media Alliance operates popular TV channels among which Discovey Channel, Animal Planet, Eurosport, TLC and others. According to TNS data, Cartoon Network is among the top ten cable TV channels in Russia by popularity and among the top three most popular channels for kids.

The bank expected to raise HKD 6.2bn in order to replenish its capital. According to Valor, the sellers are Brazilian investment manager Bozano Investimentos Ltda (35%) and undisclosed existing shareholders of Hortigil (5%). The price is reported to be BRL 300mn (USD 74.9mn), i.e. ten times the EBITDA of the target company for 2015. Hortigil Hortifruti operates 40 stores mostly in the cities of Rio de Janeiro, Sao Paulo and Espirito Santo. The company had a turnover of BRL 922mn (USD 393mn) in 2014. It is expected to report BRL 1bn (USD 250mn) in sales and EBITDA of BRL 30mn (USD 7.5mn) in 2015. Partners Group is a private markets investment manager which serves more than 700 institutional investors worldwide. The company has USD 47bn of assets under management (as of 23 December 2015), employs more than 800 people across 18 offices worldwide. Since its inception in 1996, the company has invested over USD 50bn in private equity, private real estate, private debt and other projects. __________________________________________________________________________________________________ A empresa suíça de capital privado em participações Partners Group adquiriu uma participação de 40% na operadora brasileira de rede de supermercados Hortigil Hortifruti SA, por BRL 300mn (USD 74.87mn), o jornal brasileiro de negócios e economia Valor relatou. O valor do negócio divulgado pela mídia é de BRL 300mn (USD 74.9mn), ou seja, dez vezes o EBITDA da empresa-alvo para 2015. A Hortigil Hortifruti opera 40 lojas localizadas principalmente nas cidades de Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo e Espírito Santo. A empresa teve um volume de negócios de BRL 922mn (USD 393mn) em 2014. A Hortifruti deverá apurar uma receita de vendas de BRL 1bn (USD 250mn) e um EBITDA de BRL 30mn (USD 7.5mn) em 2015. A Partners Group é uma gestora privada de mercados de investimento que serve mais de 700 investidores institucionais em todo o mundo. A empresa tem USD 47bn de ativos sob gestão (a data de 23 de dezembro de 2015), emprega mais de 800 pessoas em 18 escritórios em todo o mundo. 114446 23/12/2015 波兰; 马耳他 Presco Investments SarL 收购 Kruk SA 波兰 P.R.E.S.C.O. Group SA 办公支持服务 (5614) 55.84 (官方数据) 100 Polish debt collector Kruk said that it will acquire Malta-registered peer Presco Investments from local sector company P.R.E.S.C.O. Group for PLN 216.8mn (EUR 50.8mn). Completion of the transaction is subject to customary closing conditions. The deal has already been approved by the Polish anti-monopoly authority. Presco Investments and the fund P.R.E.S.C.O. Investment I NS FIZ have a portfolio of two million cases and receivables with nominal value of PLN 2.7bn (EUR 636mn). P.R.E.S.C.O. Group was established in 1998. The company specialises in the purchasing of portfolios of receivables, which have been recognised to be difficult to recover by the primary owners. Its shares have been listed on the Warsaw Stock Exchange since 2011. Kruk, founded in 1999, provides debt management and collection services for corporate clients, including banks, utilities, pay TV operators, and telecoms. The company posted a net income of PLN 151.8mn (EUR 36.3mn) in 2014.
115649 22/12/2015 保加利亚; 捷克共和国; 匈牙利; 波兰; 罗马尼亚; 斯洛伐克; 乌克兰; 意大利; 西班牙; 瑞士 Rhiag-Inter Auto Parts Italia SpA 收购 LKQ Corp 美国 Apax Partners 汽车零配件制造 (3363) 　 (官方数据) 100 US alternative automotive parts supplier LKQ Corp announced that it has signed an agreement to acquire Italy-based peer Rhiag-Inter Auto Parts Italia from U.K.-based private equity firm Apax Partners for an enterprise value EUR 1.04bn (USD 1.13bn). The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals and is expected to close in Q2 2016. Rhiag-Inter Auto Parts Italia is a pan-European business-to-business distributor of aftermarket spare parts for passenger cars and commercial vehicles. The company has operations in Italy, Czech Republic, Switzerland, Hungary, Romania, Ukraine, Bulgaria, Slovakia, Poland and Spain. It operates through 247 distribution centers and 10 warehouses, and serves more than 100,000 professional clients. For the twelve months ended 30 September 2015, Rhiag had revenues of EUR 882mn. LKQ Corp provides alternative and specialty parts to repair and accessorize automobiles and other vehicles. It has operations in North America, the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, Belgium, France, Scandinavia, Australia and Taiwan. The company offers its customers a broad range of replacement systems, components, equipment and parts to repair and accessorize automobiles, trucks, and recreational and performance vehicles. LKQ posted revenues of USD 6.74bn and net profit of USD 382mn in 2014. Apax Partners is an independent global partnership focused solely on long-term investment in growth companies. Funds advised by Apax Partners typically invest in large companies with an enterprise value between EUR 1bn and EUR 5bn. Over its more than 30 year history, the company has raised and advised 32 funds with aggregate commitments of EUR 33.8bn (USD 38bn).
115634 22/12/2015 中国 Fujian Tianwang Foods Co Ltd 少数股权购买 Yamada Green Resources Ltd 新加坡 Golden Sea International Holdings Ltd 蔬菜及瓜类的种植 (1112); 林业 (113); 食品制造 (311) 6.16 (官方数据) 45 Singapore Exchange-listed Yamada Green Resources Ltd., a grower and supplier of fresh and processed agricultural products, announced it will acquire a 45% in Chinese counterpart Fujian Tianwang Foods Co. Ltd. for a total consideration of CNY 39.9mn (USD 6.16mn) in cash. The seller is Chinese holding company Golden Sea International Holdings Ltd. The deal is subject to certain closing conditions. The acquisition is in line with Yamada' strategy to increase its product offerings in the bamboo trees and bamboo shoots segments. The purchase consideration will be funded by Yamada with internal cash resources. The acquisition is carried out through the buyer's wholly-owned subsidiary Fuzhou Wangcheng Foods Development Co. Ltd. Fujian Tianwang Foods Co. Ltd. is a manufacturer and supplier of processed food products, such as processed bamboo shoots, in Fujian Province, China. The company is also engaged in the cultivation and sales of vegetables, and forestry management. Yamada Green Resources Ltd. is a major grower, manufacturer and supplier of fresh and processed agricultural products in Fujian Province, China. The company's products consist of two major segments, the self-cultivation segment and processed food segment. Its products include moso bamboo trees, bamboo shoots and edible fungi, shitake mushroom and black fungus; as well as processed mushrooms, processed vegetables, water-boiled bamboo shoots. It booked revenues of CNY 503.9mn (USD 82.0mn) for FY ended 30 June 2015.

Park Place Energy said it entered into an agreement with Tiway Oil, a Dutch entity in bankruptcy, to buy its three wholly owned Turkish subsidiaries. The transaction, expected to close by end of March 2016, is subject to the satisfaction of several closing conditions, including the receipt of approval of Turkish authorities. Tiway Oil's Turkish assets include interests in four exploration permits. Park Place Energy is mainly engaged in gas exploration in Vranino in northeast Bulgaria. Its stock is quoted on the US:OTCBB and the OTC:QB.
115077 22/12/2015 阿拉伯联合酋长国 Styracorp Management Services 收购 Thomas Cook (India) Ltd 印度 　 人力资源咨询服务 (541612); 管理咨询服务 (54161) 　 100 Quess Corp, a subsidiary of India-based travel services company Thomas Cook India announced that it has acquired UAE-based recruiting company Styracorp Management Services. The transaction value was not disclosed. Styracorp was established in 2007 and is based headquartered in Dubai. The company specialises in executive search, recruitment, contract staffing, RPO and managed services. Quess Corp, founded in 2007 and headquartered in Bangalore, has over 110,000 employees and serves over 1,500 customers across eight countries in more than 8,000 locations. Thomas Cook India is a travel and tourism company that caters to individual and corporate customers. Its services include corporate and leisure travel, visa and passport services, insurance, and foreign exchange. The company has presence in 232 locations across India, Mauritius, and Sri Lanka, and has network of 115 partners and 112 sales agents in India. Thomas Cook had total consolidated revenues of INR 32.4bn (USD 517.6mn) for FY ended 31 March 2015.
114647 22/12/2015 匈牙利 Lombard Lizing Zrt 收购 DDM Holding AG 瑞士 VR Leasing AG 租赁服务 (532); 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 100 UPDATE: On 29 April 2016, DDM Holding AG announced the completion of the acquisition. ORIGINAL: Swiss distressed asset investor and manager DDM Holding AG announced that it has concluded an agreement to acquire a Hungarian leasing company Lombard Pénzügyi és Lízing Zrt. for an undisclosed amount. Closing of the deal is subject to regulatory approvals, and is expected to fulfill during the first half of 2016. The acquisition will grow DDM's portfolio of investments by more than 50% and strengthen its position in Hungary. The final purchase price is subject to adjustments on deal completion, pending collections and performance of the acquired assets. The acquisition price will be satisfied through internal resources and/or debt instruments. The deal is part of DDM's plan to develop in markets with great investment opportunities, and Hungary is a vital part of its expansion strategy. Lombard Lizing Zrt., incorporated in 1991, is a leading Hungarian leasing company holding performing and nonperforming leasing assets. The company employs around 270 people, and it reported total assets of HUF 48.34bn (USD 186.5mn) in 2014. DDM was founded in 2007 in the region of Baar, Switzerland. It is a specialist acquirer and manager of distressed assets portfolios from banks and financial institutions in Eastern Europe. Since 2007, the group has invested in portfolios to a nominal value of approx. EUR 1.4bn. The company operates in Romania and Russia, and it has recently entered Hungary, Bosnia, Montenegro, Serbia and Slovenia. DDM Group also intends to expand to the Czech Republic, Slovakia and Macedonia. DDM entered the Hungarian market earlier in February 2015, when it acquire a regulated financial company Summit Zrt. for EUR 2.7mn.
114632 22/12/2015 波兰 Polimex-Mostostal S.A. - Zakład ZREW Transformatory 收购 R&S International Holding AG 瑞士 Highlander Partners LP 电气设备制造 (3353) 　 　 100 Swiss company R&S International Holding announced that it has acquired Polish power transformers manufacturer ZREW Transformatory from U.S.-based private equity firm Highlander Partners. Originally, Highlander Partners acquired ZREW Transformatory in 2012 from Polish troubled construction company Polimex-Mostostal for PLN 47.2mn (EUR 11.6mn). ZREW Transformatory, founded in 1956, develops and produces oil-immersed power transformers used in power distribution, the railway infrastructure and the wind industry. The company employs 190 people, and posted individual revenues of PLN 94.1mn (EUR 22.5mn) and net profit of PLN 11.2mn (EUR 2.69mn) in 2014. R&S International Holding produces components for the power distribution and electrical infrastructure market. The company is owned by the industry participation fund CGS III (Jersey) LP. Highlander Partners was founded in 2004 in Dallas. The company has investments in a wide range of asset categories, with a principal focus on making direct private equity and mezzanine investments in light manufacturing, basic materials, food products, business and industrial services and value-added distribution companies. Highlander Partners has more than USD 1bn in capital under management, over USD 900mn of which is allocated to direct private equity and mezzanine investments in the United States and Central Europe.
114544 22/12/2015 捷克共和国 United Bakeries as 收购 Moulins de Kleinbettingen 卢森堡 Marko Parik - private investor 焙烤食品制造 (3118) 　 　 　 Luxembourg-based cereals processing company Moulins de Kleinbettingen has acquired an undisclosed majority stake in Czech bakery United Bakeries from local private investor Marko Paric, the daily Hospodarske Noviny said. Financial details of the deal were not disclosed. The transaction was approved by Czech competition regulator UOHS. United Bakeries was created through the merger of two Czech baking groups Delta Pekarny and Odkolek. The company operates 13 production facilities in the Czech republic. Moulins de Kleinbettingen, founded in 1894, is a familly owned company that is specialised in processing cereals. The company offers a wide range of semolinas and flours.

The acquisition will enable Yokogawa strengthen its focus on Turkey and will enhance its relationships with customers in the country. BEST, based in Aegean port city Izmir, has been Yokogawa's distributor since 1977. Yokogawa group comprises 88 companies in 56 countries. It is active in the industrial automation and control (IA), test and measurement, and aviation and other businesses segments. The company has an annual turnover of USD 3.5bn.
114475 22/12/2015 巴西 Alukroma SA Industria e Comercio 少数股权购买 Tekno SA Industria e Comercio 巴西 Alucoil SA 建筑用及结构性金属制品制造 (3323) 　 　 6.12 Brazilian coverings and coatings manufacturer Tekno SA Industria e Comercio announced the acquisition of a 6.12% stake from Spanish metal composite materials producer Alucoil SA in local metal compounds manufacturer Alukroma SA Industria e Comercio. Financial terms were not disclosed. The acquired stake represents the total participation of Alucoil in Alukroma. Alukroma, part of Tekno Group, is a aluminium composite material (ACM) manufacturer. The company produces panels and other aluminium parts for the Brazilian market. Alucoil, headquartered in the municipality of Miranda de Ebro (Burgos, Spain), manufactures advanced aluminium materials for building, transport and industry applications. The company operates four factories in Europe, Africa, America and Oceania. Tekno, founded in 1939, focuses on manufacturing and sale of coverings and coatings for metal items and pre-coated metal sheets for appliances, metallic doors, sandwich panels, roofing and siding profiles used in the industrial, commercial, and residential construction. The company operates a manufacturing plant in the municipality of Guaratingueta, Sao Paulo state. Tekno is listed on the BM&FBovespa Stock Exchange and posted BRL 137mn (USD 58.4mn) in revenues and a net profit of BRL 5mn (USD 2.13mn) in 2014. _____________________________________________________________________________________ A fabricante brasileira de acabamentos e revestimentos Tekno SA Indústria e Comércio anunciou a aquisição de uma participação de 6.12% na fabricante de componentes metálicas Alucoil SA, da produtora espanhola de painéis compósitos de metal Alucoil SA, por um valor não revelado. Os termos financeiros não foram divulgados. A participação adquirida representa a totalidade da participação da Alucoil na Alukroma. A Alukroma, parte do Grupo Tekno, opera como uma fabricante de alumínio composto (ACM). A empresa produz painéis e outras peças de alumínio para o mercado brasileiro. A Alucoil, sediada no município de Miranda de Ebro (Burgos, Espanha), fabrica materiais avançados de alumínio para aplicações de construção, transporte e indústria. A empresa opera quatro fábricas na Europa, África, América e Oceania. A Tekno, fundada em 1939, concentra-se na fabricação e comercialização de acabamentos e revestimentos para artigos de metal e chapas pré-revestidas para eletrodomésticos, portas metálicas, painéis sanduíche, telhas e perfis utilizados na construção industrial, comercial e residencial. A companhia opera uma fábrica no município de Guaratinguetá, Estado de São Paulo. A Tekno está listada na Bolsa de Valores de São Paulo BM&FBovespa e gerou um faturamento de BRL 137mn (USD 58.4mn) e um lucro líquido de BRL 5mn (USD 2.13mn) em 2014.
114471 22/12/2015 巴西 Odebrecht Ambiental SA 少数股权购买 Farallon Capital Management LLC 美国 　 水的供应、污水处理和其他水的处理、利用与分配 (2213) 75.05 (市场估计) 　 U.S. hedge fund Farallon Capital Management LLC has agreed to make an equity investment of around BRL 300mn (USD 75.05mn) in Odebrecht Ambiental SA, the water and sewage treatment arm of Brazilian industrial conglomerate Odebrecht SA, Brazilian media sources reported. Farallon acted through its Brazilian subsidiary Farallon Latin America Investimentos Ltda. Under the agreement, Farallon Latin America is investing in a subsidiary of Odebrecht Ambiental, formed by four assets, including water and sewage operations of the company in the municipality of Limeira (Sao Paulo state, Brazil). The transaction will help Odebrecht Ambiental strengthen its capital structure and expand its operations in the coming years. Odebrecht Ambiental, formerly known as Foz do Brasil was created in 2008 as the sanitation services arm of Brazilian industrial conglomerate Odebrecht. The company provides water and sewage treatment services, waste and industrial effluents treatment and environmental remediation services in 180 municipalities in ten Brazilian states, serving 16.1 million people. Farallon, established in 1986, is a global equity hedge fund and investment adviser with more than USD 24.6bn in assets under management (as of 14 October 2015), focused on investments in public and private debt and equity securities, and direct investments in private companies and real estate. The company operates six offices in San Francisco, London, Singapore, Hong Kong, Tokyo and Sao Paulo, and engages 180 professionals. ______________________________________________________________________________________ A gestora de recursos norte-americana Farallon Capital Management LLC concordou em fazer um aporte de capital de cerca de BRL 300mn (USD 75.05mn) na Odebrecht Ambiental SA, o braço de saneamento do conglomerado industrial brasileiro Odebrecht SA, fontes da mídia brasileira relataram. A Farallon agiu através da sua subsidiária brasileira Farallon América Latina Investimentos Ltda. Pelo acordo, a Farallon América Latina está investindo em uma subsidiária da Odebrecht Ambiental, formada por quatro ativos, incluindo as operações de água e esgoto da empresa no município de Limeira (SP, Brasil). A transação ajuda a Odebrecht Ambiental solidificar a sua estrutura de capital e expandir as suas operações nos próximos anos. A Odebrecht Ambiental, antiga Foz do Brasil, foi criada em 2008, como o braço de saneamento do conglomerado industrial brasileiro Odebrecht. A empresa fornece serviços de saneamento básico (água e esgoto), tratamento de resíduos e efluentes industriais e serviços de remediação ambiental em 180 municípios em dez estados brasileiros, atendendo a 16.1 milhões de pessoas. A Farallon, criada em 1986, é uma gestora de recursos e assessoria financeira com mais de USD 24.6bn em ativos sob gestão (a data de 14 de outubro de 2015), focada em investimentos em ações e títulos de dívida públicos e privados e investimentos diretos em empresas privadas e no mercado imobiliário. A empresa opera seis escritórios em San Francisco, Londres, Cingapura, Hong Kong, Tóquio e São Paulo e envolve 180 profissionais.
114488 22/12/2015 罗马尼亚 Eurolife ERB Asigurari Generale SA; Eurolife ERB Asigurari de Viata SA 收购 Fairfax Financial Holdings Ltd 加拿大 Eurobank Ergasias SA 保险活动 (5241) 15.6 (DW 估计) 80 Canada's Fairfax Financial Holdings has agreed to acquire 80% in the Romanian insurance business of Greek lender Eurobank Ergasias, the buyer and seller announced jointly. The Romanian deal is part of a larger EUR 316mn transaction for an 80% stake in Eurolife ERB Insurance Group Holdings SA, which comprises the Greek and Romanian life and non-life insurance businesses of Eurobank, in addition to Eurolife's Brokerage subsidiary in Greece, and the bancassurance agreements between Eurolife subsidiaries and Eurobank. The overall transaction is subject to customary closing conditions and is expected to complete by Q3 2016. It is in line with Eurobank's restructuring plan approved by the EU, and is part of the lender's strategy to exit its non-banking operations. Following the deal, Eurobank will keep a 20% stake in Eurolife ERB Insurance Group. Fairfax already holds a 17% in the Greek lender after participating earlier in its capital increase. Eurolife is Greece's third largest insurer with a 10% market share. It had aggregate (life and non-life) gross written premiums of EUR 383mn in 2014. In Romania, the insurance business had aggregate gross written premiums of RON 81.55mn (EUR 18.2mn), RON 74mn of which were attributable to life insurance. Eurolife's insurance products in both countries are marketed through Eurobank's network. Fairfax Financial Holdings Ltd is a Canadian financial holding company that provides insurance, reinsurance, and investment management through its subsidiaries worldwide. Fairfax reported total consolidated assets of USD 36.1bn for FY ended 31 December 2014. Eurobank has more than 500 branches in Greece and is present in seven countries, including Romania, Serbia and Cyprus. The group has 19,000 employees and total assets of EUR 77.6bn. Bank of America Merrill Lynch and Mediobanca - Banca di Credito Finanziario S.p.A. advised Eurobank on the Greek financial aspects of the sale of Eurolife ERB Insurance Group Holdings SA, while Shearman & Sterling LLP and M&P Bernitsas Law Offices advised Eurobank on the Greek legal aspects. CMS advised Eurobank on the Romanian legal aspects of the sale. Note 1: The deal value for the Romanian insurance business is estimated based on the overall disclosed deal value for Eurolife ERB Insurance Group Holdings SA and the relative contribution of the Romanian business to the aggregate gross written premiums in Greece and Romania. Note 2: All multiples are calculated based on the aggregated financial data for the Romanian life and non-life insurance businesses.

The deal value is confidential. The transaction was carried out through the COIMA QIA fund, promoted and managed by COIMA SGR on behalf of the QIA. The historical building housed lender BNP Paribas, which will move to Diamond Tower in Porta Nuova business district. The acquired property has 10,000 m2 of leasable space. QIA was established in 2005 and currently holds assets worth over USD 100bn. The main purpose of QIA is to develop, invest and manage the state reserve funds of Qatar.
114477 22/12/2015 突尼斯 Unimed 收购 Blakeney Management; Tunisian-Kuwaiti Consortium of Development; Undisclosed investor(s); SQM 英国; 突尼斯; 美国 The Abraaj Group Ltd; Proparco - Societe de Promotion et de Participation pour la Cooperation Economique SA 医药制造 (3254) 　 　 83 UAE-based investment firm Abraaj announced that, together with French development financial institution Proparco, have sold a combined 83% stake in Tunician pharmaceutical company Unite de fabrication de medicaments (Unimed). Financial terms of the transaction were not disclosed. The buyers are Washington-based SQM, U.K.-based investment firm Blakeney Asset Management, the Tunisian-Kuwaiti Consortium of Development (CTKD), and two local investors. Unimed plans to list its shares on the Tunis stock exchange in H1 2016. Unimed, established in 1989 by Ridha Charfeddine, is the second largest local pharmaceutical company in Tunisia, specialising in sterile dosage forms such as liquid and powder injectables, intravenous (IV) solutions and a range of ophthalmic products. The company currently holds 329 marketing authorisations, including 97 obtained over the last two years. Blakeney Management was established in London in 1990. The company is focused on investment in inefficient stock markets in Africa and the Middle East. CTKD, was founded in 1976 as a joint venture between the Kuwaiti and the Tunisian Government, in order to unify the Kuwaiti investments in Tunisia. It primarily invests in companies operating a chain of hotels in Tunisia. Abraaj was established in 2002 and manages investments in MENA, Turkey and Central Asia, Sub-Saharan Africa and Latin America. It manages USD 9bn worth of assets across more than 20 sector and country-specific funds. Funds managed by the group have made over 140 investments across 10 sectors including consumer, energy, financials, healthcare and utilities. Abraaj employs 300 people in 20 offices worldwide. Proparco is a development financial institution of the French development agency. It invests in private companies of developing countries to support growth and economic sustainability. It is involved in different industries like productive sector, financial system, infrastructure, and equities.

Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. SNP said that it will acquire another 19% in Astrums Consulting as at 1 January 2018. The German group also announced the acquisition of a 51% stake in local software consulting and service company Hartung Consult. SNP said that through these two strategic investments, it's expanding its range of services for international customers and gaining deeper access to the rapidly growing Asian markets. Astrums Consulting focuses on implementation projects on an SAP basis including process analyses, design, implementation, maintenance and support. The company currently employs around 100 IT and software specialists in Singapore and in Kuala Lumpur. In 2014, Astrums Consulting generated revenues of around EUR 4mn (USD 5.31mn) with an EBIT margin of 18%. SNP Schneider-Neureither & Partner AG was founded in 1994 and is the developer of SNP Transformation Backbone, the world's first standard software solution that automatically analyses changes in IT systems and implements them in a standardised way. The company employs around 380 people in Europe and the USA. SNP is listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange and it generated revenues of EUR 30.5mn (USD 40.5mn) in 2014.
114424 22/12/2015 美国 Two manufacturing sites of Zoetis 收购 Huvepharma 保加利亚 Zoetis Inc 医药制造 (3254) 40 (官方数据) 100 U.S. animal health medicines manufacturer Zoetis said it will sell two manufacturing sites to Bulgarian sector company Huvepharma for USD 40mn in cash. The sites are located in Laurinburg, North Carolina, and Longmont, Colorado. Huvepharma will also assume the assets and operations and, subject to approval from the lessor, the lease of a Zoetis manufacturing and distribution site in Van Buren, Arkansas. The Bulgarian company will also acquire a portfolio of products manufactured at the sites. The transaction is expected to complete in the first quarter of 2016. The acquisition will strengthen Huvepharma's position in key markets and enhance its growth potential, the company said. Huvepharma develops and manufactures veterinary products, feed additives, active pharmaceutical ingredients and anticoccidial drugs. The company has three production sites in Bulgaria, a factory in Italy, and a plant in St. Louis, the USA. Huvepharm's products are sold in over 90 countries worldwide. Zoetis, a former division of Pfizer, develops and manufactures animal health medicines and vaccines, with a focus on both livestock and companion animals. It has operations in the USA, Europe/Africa/Middle East, Canada/Latin America and Asia-Pacific.
114401 22/12/2015 俄罗斯 Polar Lights Company 少数股权购买 Trisonnery Asset Ltd 塞浦路斯 ConocoPhillips Co 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 87.5 (DW 估计) 50 U.S. oil and gas major ConocoPhillips Co has sold its 50% stake in Russian oil firm Polar Lights, a joint venture with Russian peer Rosneft, The Financial Times reported. The buyer is shell company Trisonnery Asset Ltd. According to a source of the daily, familiar with the matter, the final beneficiary is the Belarusian Khotin family. On 17 December 2015, Rosneft also announced the sale of its 50% in the JV to an undisclosed investor. According to a source of Financial Times briefed with the details, the deal valued the company at USD 150-200mn. The Russian media earlier speculated that Russian oil and gas firm Tatneftegaz-Sever and structures of Belarusian businessmen Yury Khotin and his son Aleksey Khotin are the potential buyers of the asset. The current transaction marks the full retreat of ConocoPhillips from the Russian market after more than 25 years of presence. ConocoPhillips announced the sale of its last asset in Russia in 2014. As reported, the exit was not provoked by the U.S. and EU sanctions against Russia but by the fact that the asset is the only one left and too small to keep. Polar Lights was established in 1992 and holds the licences to develop five oil fields in Russia's Nenets autonomous district. At the beginning of the development, the recoverable reserves of the company were estimated at 16mn tonnes of oil. However, output from the fields developed by Polar Lights has been decreasing in recent years, and was down to 410,000 tonnes in 2014 from around 700,000 tonnes produced in 2010. Yury Khotin and Alexey Khotin started to collect oil and gas assets in Russia back in 2012 when they acquired 100% in company Dulisma. In 2013, they purchased 30% in Exillon Energy. In June 2014, Dulisma bought a 100% stake in local peer Irelyakhneft from Russian major diamond miner Alrosa. In November 2015, the Khotins acquired domestic oil and gas company Negusneft from diversified holding Sintez Group. The Khotins are also one of the largest property developers in Russia. Note: The deal value is calculated based on the middle point of the quoted market range, adjusted for the 50% stake sold.
114412 22/12/2015 印度 Super Highway Labs Pvt Ltd 少数股权购买 Lightspeed Advisory Services India Pvt Ltd; Sequoia Capital; The Times of India Group; Times Internet Ltd 印度; 美国 　 软件出版 (5112) 20 (官方数据) 　 India-based bus aggregation firm Super Highway Labs Pvt Ltd which operates Shuttl announced that it has successfully raised USD 20mn in a funding round led by Lightspeed Ventures. The round which was also participated by Times Internet Ltd and existing investor Sequoia Capital, comes after a USD 3mn funding round on August 2015. The capital raised will be used further developing its technology and expand its operations. Super Highway Labs operates Shuttl, a mobile-based bus aggregation platform which lets users book bus seats through their mobile application. It over 500 bus partners and provides 15,000 rides daily across Gurgaon and Delhi. The firm was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Gurgaon. Lightspeed Venture Partners is an international private equity and venture capital firm focused on technology-based early and growth stage firms in the big data, internet, mobile and e-commerce sector among others. It has a portfolio of more than 200 companies in the U.S., India, Israel and China.
114411 22/12/2015 中国 China Internet Plus Holding Ltd 少数股权购买 Tencent Holdings Ltd; DST Global; TBP Capital; China International Capital Corp Ltd; Capital Today Group 中国; 俄罗斯 China Internet Plus Holding Ltd 互联网出版与传播 (516) 3,300.00 (官方数据) 18.667 Update: The company announced that it has raised USD 3.3bn in its round of funding instead of the reported USD 2.8bn. Original: China Internet Plus Holding Ltd, a new merged entity formed between Chinese discount website Meituan.com and ratings and group buying site Dianping.com, has raised USD 2.8bn in a funding, China Money Network said while refering to a document first reported by local media. The funding was led by Hong Kong-listed internet giant Tencent Holdings Ltd, investing USD 1bn, and was also joined by DST Global, TBP Capital, CICC and Capital Today. CICC, DST and TBP invested USD 1.3bn, 350mn and 150mn, respectively, putting the target's valuation at USD 15bn. China Internet Plus Holding expects to raise USD 3bn more in a Series B funding of preference shares for a 16.67% stake, upping the valuation to USD 18mn. In addition, the target company plans to list its shares in the U.S.A. in two to three years. China Internet Plus Holding Ltd was formed by Meituan and Dianping on October 2015. Meituan's shareholders hold 60% of the new company, while Dianping will hold the remaining 40%. The company expects to control 80% of the Chinese group discount market and projects its revenues at CNY 6.5bn (USD 1bn) in 2015, with a projected loss of CNY 10.5bn. Tencent Holdings Ltd offers Internet and mobile value-added services, online advertising, online and mobile games, as well as instant messaging services. The company is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange and booked revenues of CNY 78.9bn (USD 12.8bn) in 2014. CICC provides economic, securities, debt and equity issuance, underwriting and other financial services. The company is listed on the HKEX and had profit of USD 1.1bn in 2014. Note 1: The deal stake is estimated based on the USD 15bn valuation of China Internet Plus Holding Ltd following the funding round. Note 2: The MVE/Sales multiples is estimated based on the 2015 projected sales revenue of China Internet Plus Holding Ltd of CNY 6.5bn (USD 1bn).
114410 22/12/2015 菲律宾 PNB Life Insurance Inc 收购 Allianz SE 德国 Philippine National Bank 保险活动 (5241) 　 　 51 German insurance and asset management firm Allianz will acquire a 51% stake in Philippine-based PNB Life Insurance for an undisclosed amount, The Philippine National Bank (PNB) disclosed. The new joint venture will be known as Allianz PNB Life Insurance Inc. The deal includes a 15-year bancassurance agreement that will provide Allianz access to over 660 branches and 4 million customers of PNB in the Philippines. Allianz said that the acquisition will enable the company to enter a market with an established distribution network and a fast-growing insurance market. The buyer operated in the country by way of a joint venture with the Pioneer Group for 5 years until it pulled out in 2003. PNB Life Insurance provides variable life products such as protection, educational funding, retirement funding, health, investment and group insurance. It is the 10th largest life insurance firm in the Philippines and its insurance premiums amounted to PHP 3.7bn (USD 83.5mn) in 2014. Allianz offers a portfolio of financial services including private insurance, business insurance, asset management, investment management and business to business to consumer (B2BC) services among others. Allianz had revenues of EUR 88.6bn (USD 107.7bn) for FY ended 31 December 2014. PNB, incorporated in 1916, offers banking and other financial services to corporate, middle-market, small-medium enterprises, retail customers, as well as the national government and government agencies. The bank's total assets were PHP 625.4bn (USD 13.9bn) for FY ended 31 December 2014.
114409 22/12/2015 罗马尼亚 Billa Romania SRL 收购 Carrefour SA 法国 Rewe Group 超市和食品杂货店 (4451) 104.45 (市场估计) 100 French retailer Carrefour SA has agreed to acquire Billa Romania S.R.L., operator of 86 supermarkets across Romania, from German retailer and tourism company Rewe Group, the buyer and the seller announced. The value of the transaction was not disclosed. According to Romanian business portal mirsanu.ro, it is close to EUR 96-97mn. The deal is subject to the approval of the Romanian Competition Council. The acquisition enables Carrefour to strengthen its supermarket network in Romania and enlarge its multi-format offering to better serve its clients. Billa Romania's network of 86 supermarkets has a total retail area of 83,000 m2. The company employs around 3,200 people and its revenue was EUR 315.3mn in 2014. Carrefour, established in 1959, is the largest retail group in Europe and the second-largest retailer in the world, with more than 12,000 stores in 35 countries in Europe, Latin America and Asia. The group employs over 380,000 people. It booked revenues of EUR 100.5bn in 2014. Carrefour entered the Romanian market in 2001 and presently operates 104 supermarkets and 29 hypermarkets under the Carrefour Market brand, and over 50 proximity shops under the Express and Contact brands. Carrefour's business in Romania had a turnover of over EUR 1.2bn in 2014. Rewe, founded in 1927, is a German retailer and travel services group. It operates around 15,000 stores and 2,100 agencies in 12 European countries. The group employs 330,000 people and posted revenues of EUR 51.0bn in 2014. Rewe is present in Romania with Billa network, the Selgros Cash & Carry network, and the Penny Market and XXL Mega Discount supermarket networks.
114397 22/12/2015 波兰 Four wind farm projects 收购 Electricite de France SA (EDF) 法国 Greentech Energy Systems AS 风力发电 (221115) 　 　 100 Danish renewable energy company Greentech Energy Systems announced that it has signed an agreement of the sale of four wind farm projects in Poland to EDF Energies Nouvelles, part of French energy group EDF. Financial terms of the deal were not disclosed. The transaction is subject to customary closing conditions and is expected to complete in H1 2016. The wind farms are located in Parnowo, Ustka, Puck and Smolecin, and generate a total of 120 MW of power. EDF Energies Nouvelles develops, installs and operates green electricity power plants, mainly in Europe and North America. EDF Polska holds 10% of the share in the electricity market, and 15% of the share in the district heating market in Poland. It operates one of the largest power plants, in Rybnik. EDF Polska employs 3,000 people. EDF, established in 1946, is an integrated energy group with operations in the areas of energy generation, transmission, distribution, supply and sale. The company has a net installed capacity of 139.5 GWe, a transmission and distribution network of over 1.38 million km of electricity lines, and serves 39.3 million customers in 26 countries on five continents. EDF is listed on the Euronext Paris Stock Exchange, and reached a turnover of EUR 72.9bn (USD 96.9bn) and a net income of EUR 3.7bn (USD 4.9bn) in 2014. Greentech Energy Systems is active in wind power, solar power, water power, biomass and biogas. The company operates in Denmark, Germany, Italy, Poland and Spain. It posted revenues of DKK 414mn (EUR 55.5mn) in 2014.
114378 22/12/2015 土耳其 Finansbank AS 收购 Qatar National Bank 卡塔尔 National Bank of Greece 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 2,992.11 (官方数据) 99.81 National Bank of Greece (NBG) said it will sell its 99.81% stake in Turkish subsidiary Finansbank to Qatar National Bank (QNB) for EUR 2.75bn (USD 3.0bn). In addition, QNB will repay upon closing USD 910mn of subordinated debt that NBG has extended to Finansbank. The deal also includes the sale of NBG's 29.87% stake in Finans Leasing, and minuscule stakes in a couple other finance firms. The closing of the transaction is subject to regulatory approvals. The sale of Finansbank is in line with NBG's commitment to the shareholders and the European authorities, and is part of a restructuring plan following NBG's long-term strategy to redeploy capital towards the Greek economy. Finansbank is Turkey's fifth largest private bank with assets of TRY 92.64bn (USD 30.36bn) as at the end of September 2015. It has a network of around 660 branches across Turkey and 12,000 employees. The bank has brokerage, asset management and financial leasing units. Its profit for 2014 was TRY 950.1mn (USD 409.2mn). QNB was established in 1964. It is the highest rated bank in Qatar. QNB has presence in over 26 countries on three continents. The bank's ownership is evenly divided between the Qatar Investment Authority and the private sector. NBG is the dominant financial group in Greece, also with a strong presence in southeast Europe and the Eastern Mediterranean. The group operates in 12 countries and controls, apart from NBG and Finansbank, eight other banks.
116854 21/12/2015 中国 Wanyuan Yuanbang Resort Development Co Ltd 少数股权购买 Wanyuan City Qinba Electronic Commerce Co Ltd 中国 China Yuanbang Property Holdings Ltd 建筑、开发及承包 (233); 房地产 (531) 5.78 (官方数据) 25 Singapore Exchange-listed real estate group China Yuanbang Property Holdings Ltd. announced it will divest a 25% stake in China-based property developer Wanyuan Yuanbang Resort Development Co., Ltd. for a total consideration of CNY 37.5mn (USD 5.8mn). The buyer is China-based Wanyuan City Qinba Electronic Commerce Co., Ltd. - a company with experience in the tourism development industry and extensive networks and resources in the Wanyuan area. The deal will enable the seller to bring a reputable strategic partner for the development of a project, which is a tourism property project with a mixture of residential, villa and commercial units under development. After the deal, China Yuanbang Property Holdings Ltd. will keep a 57% shareholding in Wanyuan Yuanbang Resort. China Yuanbang Property Holdings Ltd. intends to use the sale proceeds for the working capital of the group. The seller is acting in the transaction through its wholly-owned subsidiary Guangdong Yuanbang Real Estate Development Co., Ltd. Wanyuan Yuanbang Resort Development Co. Ltd., incorporated in 2011, is currently developing a premier tourist attraction, spanning an area of 120 km2, located in the vicinity of Batai Mountain National Park and Longtan River Scenic Area. This is the company's first tourism property project, with residential, villa and commercial properties under development since 2012. The company had a book value of CNY 7.35mn (USD 1.14mn) for FY ended 30 June 2015. China Yuanbang Property Holdings Ltd., established in 1998, focuses on the development of quality residential and commercial properties, targeting at the middle to upper-middle income market segments. Its properties portfolio includes Nanchang project, Yuanbang Mingyue Gardens, Yuanbang Aviation Homeland etc. The group had total assets under management of CNY 4.87bn (USD 797.2mn) for FY ended 30 June 2015.

Other investors that joined the round included Mohr Davidow Ventures (MDV), Greycroft Partners and Novia Capital which have already contributed capital in the company in the past. The new financing will be used for expanding the business development operations. Paul Asel, managing partner with NGP, will join the target’s board of directors. WorkFusion is a provider of software solutions for automation of financial business processes in international corporations. Founded in 2010 by Max Yankelevich and Andrey Volkov, the company has also offices in London and Eastern Europe. RTP Ventures is the US-based arm of ru-Net Holdings, one of the largest internet and technology investors in Russia.

The company bought a 51% stake in Rugen Fisch. ORIGINAL: Thai tuna processor Thai Union Group announced that it has agreed to acquire a majority stake in German seafood producer Rugen Fisch. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. "Germany is one of the largest seafood markets and part of our strategic pillars for growth in Europe. Through this partnership with Rugen Fisch, Thai Union becomes a market leader in Germany and further strengthens its position as one of the European seafood leaders," said Thai Union president and CEO Thiraphong Chansiri. Rugen Fisch is a market leader for shelf-stable canned seafood in Germany and supplies ambient and chilled fish including herring, mackerel and salmon across the country to all of the leading retailers. The company's key brands include Rugen Fisch, Hawesta, Ostsee Fisch and Lysell among other. Rugen Fisch has annual sales of over EUR 140mn (USD 185.9mn). Thai Union Group is the world's largest shelf-stable tuna processor. It also manufactures and exports other seafood products such as shrimp, salmon, sardine and mackerel and its major brands include John West, Petit Navire, Parmentier, Mareblu and Chicken of the Sea among other. Thai Union is listed on the Stock Exchange of Thailand and it generated sales of THB 121.4bn (USD 3.73bn) in 2014.
115331 21/12/2015 美国 Flux Factory Inc 少数股权购买 Temasek Holdings (Pte) Ltd; Surbana Jurong Pte Ltd; Far East Ventures; Draper Fisher Jurvetson (DFJ); South Park Ventures; Borealis Ventures; Obvious Ventures 新加坡; 美国 　 电脑系统设计和相关服务 (54151) 29 (官方数据) 　 U.S. architecture design software start-up Flux Factory Inc. announced it has raised USD 29.0mn in a Series B funding round co-led by Singapore-state fund Temasek Holdings and Singapore's urban solutions consultancy firm Surbana Jurong Pte. Ltd. The round was also participated by existing investors - Far East Ventures, part of Singapore's Far East Organization, a leading private real estate developer, and by U.S. venture firms Draper Fisher Jurvetson (DFJ), South Park Ventures, Borealis Ventures, and Obvious Ventures. Flux Factory will use the funding proceeds to accelerate its expansion in Asia. The investment in Flux Factory from Temasek and Surbana Jurong reflects the important role Flux oversees in Asian markets as the U.S. company moves forward. Flux Factory was founded in 2012 to drive scalability, sustainability and efficiency improvements across the global building industry. Its cloud-based collaboration service allows architects, engineers and contractors to add helpful plugins into their existing work-flows and saves them crucial time in simplifying file transfer, data conversion, and data-merge. Temasek Holdings is an investment company wholly-owned by Singapore's Ministry of Finance. It focuses on investing in the financial services, telecom, technology, transportation and energy sectors, among others. Temasek reported total assets under management of SGD 405.8mn (USD 290.0mn) for FY ended 31 March 2015. Surbana Jurong offers urban, infrastructure and engineering solutions to support social and economic growth. With 4,000 employees in 20 offices across Asia, Africa and the Middle East, the company has completed projects in 51 countries across 167 cities.

Hancock Natural Resource Group acted via its Chilean subsidiary Hancock Chilean Plantations LP. Following this operation, Hancock Natural Resource Group increased its interest in HCP from 80% to 99%. Masisa retained 1%. The U.S. company purchased the 80% interest from Masisa back in April 2014 for USD 203.6mn. Masisa also sold to its U.S. counterpart the USD 38.3mn loan it had with HCP. The Chilean firm added that it has preferential right to purchase HCP from Hancock Natural Resource Group in case the latter decides to sell. Masisa concluded that the sale is aligned with its plan to sell non-core assets for at least USD 100mn in order to strengthen its financial position. The proceeds from today's sale will be used to reduce the company's debt. HCP's forestry assets portfolio consists of 62,000 hectares of land of which 32,500 are planted mainly with pine. The assets are located in the Temuca and Valdivia zones in Chile. Hancock Natural Resource Group is farmland development company managing agricultural real estate, including timberland portfolios for institutional and other investors. It operates through its Hancock Timber Resource Group and Hancock Agricultural Investment Group subsidiaries.

Grupo Verzatec, through its subsidiaries, offers fiberglass-reinforced plastic (FRP), PVC, and polycarbonate products used primarily in the commercial construction and transportation sectors.

Modacruz introduced iOS and Android applications in October 2014 and has registered 400,000 downloads since. The online store was launched in February 2014. The transaction includes majority stakes in commercial bank Banco Citibank de El Salvador SA, credit card issuer Citi Tarjetas de El Salvador as well as insurer Seguros e Inversiones SA (SISA) and its life insurance subsidiary SISA Vida SA Seguros de Personas. Citibank will retain its corporate banking operation in the country. Banco Citibank de El Salvador is El Salvador's fifth largest bank and it had total assets of USD 1.58bn, gross loans for USD 1.2bn and total deposits of USD 1.17bn as of November 2015. SISA is the country's seventh largest insurer with total premiums of USD 30.7mn as of November 2015. SISA Vida SA Seguros de Personas, in turn, is El Salvador's largest life insurer with total premiums of USD 78mn as of the same month. Grupo Terra was established in 1978 and is a diversified investment group mainly focused on the development, construction and operation of renewable energy and thermoelectric projects and the distribution of petroleum products. The group employs more than 3,000 people in nine countries in Latin America, namely Guatemala, Belize, El Salvador, Honduras, Nicaragua, Costa Rica, Panama, Colombia and Peru.
