114423 21/12/2015 巴西 Vault Engenharia para Ambientes Seguros Ltda 收购 Assa Abloy AB 瑞典 　 调查和保安活动 (5616) 　 　 100 Swedish door opening solutions provider Assa Abloy AB has acquired the total capital of Brazilian security systems manufacturer Vault Engenharia para Ambientes Seguros Ltda for an undisclosed sum, the latter's legal advisor disclosed to DealWatch. Assa Abloy acted through its Brazilian subsidiary Assa Abloy Brasil Sistemas de Seguranca Ltda. The acquisition increases the company's product portfolio and its supply of civil construction solutions, Brazilian media sources reported. Mr. Luis Barbosa, president of Assa Abloy Brasil, said that the company will start offering the Vault's products such as locks, fire doors, security doors, armored windows, watchtowers and armored counters, gates and armored security gates, among others. He added that the transaction will enable the company to develop new production process and will expand its operations across Brazil, rising its revenues by 15%. Vault is an engineering company that specialises in the design and manufacturing of security solutions into four production units: Special Projects, Architectural Shield, Access Control and Electronic Security Systems. The company's customer portfolio includes corporate clients such as Bradesco, Accor, Banco Safra, Siemens, Itau, etc. Vault had a turnover of BRL 30mn (USD 12.8mn) in 2014. Assa Abloy, established in 1994, is an international provider of door opening solutions, including locks, cylinders, electromechanical products, security doors, fittings, electronic access control and automatic door systems under the brands of Abloy, HES, La Fonte, Securitron, TESA and Yale, among others. The company has operations in 70 countries worldwide and employs over 44,000 people. Assa Abloy is listed on the Nasdaq OMX Nordic Stock Exchange, and posted USD 14.4bn in revenues and a net income of USD 1.62bn in 2014. ________________________________________________________________________________ A provedora sueca de soluções para abertura de portas Assa Abloy AB adquiriu a totalidade do capital social da fabricante brasileira de sistemas de segurança Vault Engenharia para Ambientes Seguros Ltda, por um valor não revelado, o assessor jurídico da empresa-alvo revelou para o DealWatch. A Assa Abloy agiu através da sua subsidiária brasileira Assa Abloy Brasil Sistemas de Segurança Ltda. A aquisição aumenta o portfólio de produtos da empresa e a sua oferta de soluções de construção civil, fontes da mídia brasileira apuraram. O Sr. Luís Barbosa, presidente da Assa Abloy Brasil, disse que a empresa ia passar a oferecer os produtos da Vault, como fechaduras, portas corta-fogo, portas blindadas, janelas, guaritas e guichês blindados, cancelas e portões de segurança, entre outros. Ele acrescentou que a operação ia permitir a empresa desenvolver um novo processo produtivo e expandir as suas operações por todo o Brasil, elevando as sua receita em 15%. A Vault é uma empresa de engenharia especializada na concepção e fabricação de soluções de segurança em quatro unidades de produção: Projetos Especiais, Blindagem Arquitetônica, Cofres e Sistemas Eletrônicos de Segurança. A carteira de clientes da companhia inclui empresas como Bradesco, Accor, Banco Safra, Siemens, Itaú, etc. A Vault teve um faturamento de BRL 30mn (USD 12.8mn) em 2014. A Assa Abloy, fundada em 1994, é uma fornecedora internacional de soluções para abertura de portas, incluindo fechaduras, cilindros, produtos eletromecânicos, portas de segurança, acessórios, sistemas de controle eletrônico de acesso e portas automáticas sob as marcas Abloy, HES, La Fonte, Securitron, TESA e Yale, entre outros. A empresa tem operações em 70 países em todo o mundo e emprega mais de 44,000 pessoas. A Assa Abloy está listada na Bolsa de Valores de Estocolmo Nasdaq OMX Nordic, e apresentou um faturamento de USD 14.4bn e um lucro líquido de USD 1.62bn em 2014.
114433 21/12/2015 巴西 RCD Equipamentos Blindados Ltda; Glass Sentinal do Brasil Ltda 收购 Assa Abloy AB 瑞典 　 金属配件制造 (3325); 电子、电器商店 (443) 　 　 100 Swedish door opening solutions provider Assa Abloy AB has acquired the total capital of Brazilian machines and electronics retailers Glass Sentinal do Brasil Ltda and RCD Equipamentos Blindados Ltda for an undisclosed sum, the buyer's legal advisor disclosed to DealWatch. Further transaction details were not disclosed. Glass Sentinal, established in 2001 in Sao Paulo city (Sao Paulo state, Brazil), operates as a retailer of machines, mechanical parts and other industrial equipment. RCD, founded in 1995 in Sao Paulo city, is a retailer of electronic and other appliances. In addition, the company produces metal mechanical parts. Assa Abloy, established in 1994, is an international provider of door opening solutions, including locks, cylinders, electromechanical products, security doors, fittings, electronic access control and automatic door systems under the brands of Abloy, HES, La Fonte, Securitron, TESA and Yale, among others. The company has operations in 70 countries worldwide and employs over 44,000 people. Assa Abloy is listed on the Nasdaq OMX Nordic Stock Exchange, and posted USD 14.4bn in revenues and a net income of USD 1.62bn in 2014. _____________________________________________________________________________________ A provedora sueca de soluções para abertura de portas Assa Abloy AB adquiriu a totalidade do capital social das varejistas brasileiras de máquinas e aparelhos eletrônicos Glass Sentinal do Brasil Ltda e RCD Equipamentos Blindados Ltda, por um valor não revelado, o assessor jurídico da compradora revelou para o DealWatch. Não foram divulgados mais detalhes acerca da transação. A Glass Sentinal, criada em 2001 na cidade de São Paulo (SP, Brasil), atua como varejista de máquinas, peças mecânicas e outros equipamentos industriais. A RCD, fundada em 1995 na cidade de São Paulo, é uma varejista de aparelhos eletrônicos e outros dispositivos. A empresa também produz peças mecânicas de metal. A Assa Abloy, fundada em 1994, é uma fornecedora internacional de soluções para abertura de portas, incluindo fechaduras, cilindros, produtos eletromecânicos, portas de segurança, acessórios, sistemas de controle eletrônico de acesso e portas automáticas sob as marcas Abloy, HES, La Fonte, Securitron, TESA e Yale, entre outros. A empresa tem operações em 70 países em todo o mundo e emprega mais de 44,000 pessoas. A Assa Abloy está listada na Bolsa de Valores de Estocolmo Nasdaq OMX Nordic, e apresentou um faturamento de USD 14.4bn e um lucro líquido de USD 1.62bn em 2014.
114426 21/12/2015 印度 Fixinnov Technology Pvt Ltd 少数股权购买 Sequoia Capital; Ritesh Dwivedy - private investor; Ramakant Sharma - private investor; Mount Nathan Advisors Pte Ltd 美国; 印度; 新加坡 　 软件出版 (5112); 互联网出版与传播 (516) 2 (市场估计) 　 India-based trucking services aggregator application and portal TruckMandi which is operated by Fixinnoc Technology Pvt Ltd, has raised around USD 2mn from a seed funding round from Mount Nathan Adivisors Pte Ltd and private investors Ritesh Dwivedy and Ramakant Sharma, VCCircle reported. The funding raised will be used to expand its presence into more cities. Truckmandi is a web and mobile based trucking solutions aggregator which allows logistics providers to bid for trips. The platform has 500 partner clients and 1,000 partner transporters. It claims to have had handled 3,400 transactions and has a network of 5,000 trucks through its 1,200. It was founded in October 2015 and is based in Delhi. Mount Nathan Adivisors is a Singapore-based private equity firm which offers investment and advisory services. The firm focuses the emerging markets in the Asian market. It was founded in 2015.
114415 21/12/2015 菲律宾 Wizardsgroup Inc 收购 NTT Data Corp 日本 　 数据处理、主机管理及相关服务 (518); 电脑系统设计和相关服务 (54151) 100 Japanese technology services and solutions provider NTT Data Corp announced that it will acquire the total capital of Taiwan Application Service Management Consulting Co Ltd and Philippine-based Wizardsgroup Inc. Financial details of the deal were not disclosed. The deal is aligned with the buyer's strategy to expand its business and customer base outside of Japan. Taiwan Application Service Management Consulting Co Ltd, established in 2010, offers SAP consulting and cloud solutions in Taiwan. Wizardsgroup Inc provides business solution services for Oracle and Microsoft solutions. It also offer enterprise applications, managed services, training, courseware and certification exams. NTT Data Corp provides application development and management, enterprise application services, business intelligence analytics, infrastructure services and outsourcing services. The company is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange and its revenues were JPY 1,511bn (USD 12.6bn) for FY ended 31 March 2015.
114387 21/12/2015 巴西 DMS Publicidade Midia Interativa Ltda ; Telefonica on the Spot Services SAU 收购 H.I.G. Capital LLC 美国 　 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418) 　 　 　 U.S. private equity firm H.I.G. Capital announced it has made undisclosed equity investments in Brazilian out-of-home advertising companies DMS Publicidade Midia Interativa Ltda and Telefonica on the Spot Services SAU (Tots). According to Brazilian business and economics journal Valor, H.I.G. Capital purchased the total capital of the target companies, unlike its usual policy of purchasing minority stakes. DMS and Tots will be under the management of local out-of-home digital media company Eletromidia, a subsidiary of H.I.G. Capital. Tots provides advertising music solutions in Rio de Janeiro city (Rio de Janeiro state, Brazil), offering 150 types of music, in corporate spaces such as stadiums, classrooms, cultural centres, hotels, hypermarkets, restaurants, among others. The company also provides out-of-home digital media solutions, digitalisation of corporate spaces and other services. DMS offers out-of-home advertising services in Rio de Janeiro subway. The media reaches around 1.8 million people per day, through more than 1,700 displays spread across 35 metro stations. H.I.G. Capital LLC, established in 1993 and based in Miami (U.S.), is a global private equity, venture capital and alternative assets investment firm specialised in providing both debt and equity capital to small and mid-sized companies. Since its inception, the company has managed and invested in over 200 companies globally. H.I.G. Capital also owns offices in Atlanta, Boston, Chicago, Dallas, New York and San Francisco and has international affiliate offices in London, Hamburg, Madrid, Milan, Paris and Rio de Janeiro. H.I.G. Capital has USD 19bn in assets under management as of 22 December 2015. _____________________________________________________________________________________ A empresa norte-americana de capital privado em participações H.I.G. Capital anunciou que tinha feito aportes de capital não revelados nas empresas brasileiros de publicidade out-of-home DMS Publicidade Mídia Interativa Ltda e Telefónica on the Spot Services SAU (Tots). De acordo com o jornal brasileiro de economia e negócios Valor, a H.I.G. Capital concordou em comprar a totalidade do capital das empresas-alvo, ao contrário da sua política habitual de aquisição de participações minoritárias. A DMS e a Tots vão estar sob a gestão da local companhia de mídia digital out-of-home Eletromidia, uma subsidiária da H.I.G. Capital. A Tots oferece soluçõe musicais de publicidade no ponto de venda na cidade do Rio de Janeiro (Rio de Janeiro, Brasil). A empresa oferece 150 estilos diferentes para espaços corporativos, tais como estádios, salas de aula, centros culturais, hotéis, hipermercados, restaurantes, entre outros. A companhia também fornece soluções out-of-home de mídia digital, digitalização dos espaços corporativos e outros serviços. A DMS oferece serviços de publicidade out-of-home no metrô do Rio de Janeiro. A mídia atinge cerca de 1.8 milhões de pessoas por dia, através de mais de 1,700 telas espalhadas por 35 estações do metrô. A H.I.G. Capital LLC, criada em 1993 e com sede em Miami (EUA), é uma empresa global de investimentos em 'private equity', capital de risco e ativos alternativos especializada no fornecimento de dívida e capital próprio para pequenas e médias empresas. Desde a sua criação, a empresa tem gerido e investido em mais de 200 empresas em todo o mundo. A H.I.G. Capital também possui escritórios em Atlanta, Boston, Chicago, Dallas, Nova Iorque e São Francisco e suas filiais têm escritórios internacionais em Londres, Hamburgo, Madrid, Milão, Paris e Rio de Janeiro. A companhia tem cerca de USD 19bn em ativos sob gestão, a data de 22 de dezembro de 2015.

The completion is subject to satisfaction of customary closing conditions precedent, including shareholder approval. The consideration will be settled in cash and promissory notes. The project has loans of CNY 931mn (USD 143.6mn) owed to Shum Yip Group and additional loans of HKD 222mn (USD 28.6mn) and USD 61mn owed to Shum Yip Holdings Co Ltd. The project comprises two land plots with ongoing development for commercial and residential use in Huangbeiling, Luohu District, Shenzhen. The acquisition is in line with Shenzhen Investment group's development strategy. Shum Yip Holdings owns 60.68% of Shenzhen Investment Ltd. Shenzhen Investment Ltd. is mainly engaged in property development, property investment and property management. It had assets of HKD 94.5bn (USD 12.2bn) at the end of 2014.

Further transaction details were not disclosed. Yema produces and markets a great variety of cheeses, such as Gorgonzola, Mozzarella, Brie, Camembert, Emmental and others. The company distributes its products through several supermarket chains and stores in Sao Paulo state. Granarolo produces dairy products such as ice-cream, fresh and hard cheeses, yogurts, pasteurized and fresh cream, butter, Mozzarella, desserts and others. The company expects to reach revenues of more than EUR 1bn (USD 1.18bn) for 2015 and targets sales of EUR 1.5bn (USD 1.77bn) for 2016. ______________________________________________________________________________ A fabricante italiana de laticínios Granarolo SpA concluiu a aquisição da homóloga brasileira Yema Distribuidora de Alimentos Ltda, por um valor não revelado, o assessor jurídico da empresa-alvo revelou para o DealWatch. Não foram divulgados mais detalhes acerca da transação. A Yema fabrica e comercializa uma grande variedade de queijos, tais como Gorgonzola, Mozzarella, Brie, Camembert, Emmental e outros. A empresa distribui os seus produtos através de várias cadeias de supermercados e lojas no estado de São Paulo. A Granarolo atua na área de produção de laticínios, tais como sorvetes, queijos frescos e duros, iogurtes, creme pasteurizado e fresco, manteiga, Mozzarella, sobremesas e outros. A empresa espera faturar mais de EUR 1bn (USD 1.18bn) em 2015 e tem o objetivo de atingir um faturamento de EUR 1.5bn (USD 1.77bn) para 2016

General Mills acted through its Italian subsidiary General Mills Italy. Further transaction details were not disclosed. Lacticinios Carolina, established in 1969 in the municipality of Ribeirao Claro (Parana state, Brazil), produces yogurts under the brands Carolina Yogurte Grego, Mix La Vita, Zero Lactose Carolina and many others. The company has operations in 14 Brazilian states and employs more than 500 people. General Mills, one of the largest food companies in the world, operates in three main divisions: retail, international, convenience stores & foodservice and joint ventures. General Mills markets brands such as Cheerios cereal, Yoplait yogurt, Nature Valley, Pillsbury refrigerated dough and Betty Crocker baking products. The company posted revenues of USD 17.63bn and a net income of USD 1.22bn for fiscal year ended 31 May 2015. _________________________________________________________________________________________________ O conglomerado norte-americano de produção de alimentos General Mills Inc concluiu a compra de fabricante brasileira de lacticínios Carolina, por um valor não revelado, o assessor jurídico da empresa-alvo revelou para o DealWatch. A General Mills agiu através da sua filial italiana General Mills Italy. Não foram divulgados mais detalhes acerca da transação. A Lacticínios Carolina, criada em 1969 no município de Ribeirão Claro (PA, Brasil), produz iogurtes, sob as marcas de Carolina Yogurte Grego, Mix La Vita, Zero Lactose Carolina e muitas outras. A empresa tem operações em 14 estados brasileiros e emprega mais de 500 pessoas. A General Mills, uma das maiores empresas no setor de alimentos do mundo, opera em três divisões principais: varejo, internacional, lojas de conveniência e serviços de alimentação, e joint ventures. A General Mills comercializa marcas como cereais Cheerios , iogurte Yoplait, Nature Valley, massa refrigerada Pillsbury e produtos de panificação Betty Crocker. A empresa gerou um faturamento de USD 17.63bn e um lucro líquido de USD 1.22bn para o ano fiscal findo em 31 de maio de 2015.
114370 21/12/2015 巴西 Empreendimentos Pague Menos SA 少数股权购买 General Atlantic LLC 美国 　 药店 (44611) 151.49 (官方数据) 17 UPDATE: On 28 December 2015, the buyer's legal advisor disclosed to DealWatch that the transaction was completed. ORIGINAL: U.S. private equity firm General Atlantic LLC has agreed to purchase 17% of Brazilian pharmacy chain operator Empreendimentos Pague Menos SA for BRL 600mn (USD 151.5mn), the latter announced. The investment will be made through the issue of new shares valued at BRL 440mn (USD 111.1mn), while the remaining BRL 160mn (USD 40.4mn) will be paid for existing shares of the target company. The raised funds will be used by Pague Menos as working capital and for expansion of its business. The deal is subject to regulatory approvals and the fulfillment of certain conditions. Pague Menos, established in 1981, operates a network of more than 799 low cost pharmacies (as of 30 September 2015) spread across 300 cities in all the Brazilian states. With a team of more than 24,000 employees, the company had a turnover of BRL 4.4bn (USD 1.87bn) and a net income of BRL 116.3mn (USD 50mn) in 2014. According to the Brazilian business and economics journal Valor, Pague Menos is expected to register BRL 5bn (USD 1.22bn) in sales and will have an enterprise value of BRL 4bn (USD 975mn) in 2015. General Atlantic, established in 1980 by Charles Feeney, is a global equity investment firm with USD 20bn in assets under management (as of 31 December 2014), focused on investments in financial services, media, information technology, communications, electronics and energy enterprises. With a team of 100 professionals in 11 offices worldwide, General Atlantic has invested more than USD 3bn to date. Note: All multiples are calculated on a pre-money basis. __________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE: Em 28 de dezembro de 2015, o assessor jurídico da compradora revelou para o DealWatch que o negócio foi concluído. ORIGINAL: A empresa norte-americana de investimento em participações General Atlantic LLC entrou em um acordo para adquirir 17% do capital social da rede farmacéutica brasileira Empreendimentos Pague Menos SA, por BRL 600mn (USD 151.5mn), esta última anunciou. O investimento vai ser feito através da emissão de novas ações no valor de BRL 440mn (USD 111.1mn), sendo que o montante remanescente de BRL 160mn (USD 40.4mn) será pago por ações já existentes da empresa-alvo. Os recursos captados serão utilizados pela Pague Menos como capital de giro e para a expansão dos seus negócios. O acordo está sujeito a aprovações regulatórias e ao cumprimento de determinadas condições. A Pague Menos, fundada em 1981, opera uma rede de mais de 799 farmácias de baixo custo (a data de 30 de setembro de 2015), distribuídos por 300 cidades em todos os estados brasileiros. Com uma equipe de mais de 24,000 colaboradores, a empresa teve um volume de negócios de BRL 4.4bn (USD 1.87bn) e um lucro líquido de BRL116.3mn (USD 50mn) em 2014. De acordo com o jornal brasileiro de economia e negócios Valor, a Pague Menos deverá registrar BRL 5bn (USD 1.22bn) em vendas e o valor da empresa estima-se em BRL 4bn (USD 975mn) em 2015. A General Atlantic, criada em 1980 por Charles Feeney, é uma empresa global de investimento em participações com USD 20bn em ativos sob gestão (a data de 31 de Dezembro de 2014), com foco em investimentos nos setores de serviços financeiros, mídia, tecnologia da informação, comunicações, eletrônica e energia. Com um time de 100 profissionais em 11 escritórios em todo o mundo, a General Atlantic já investiu cerca de USD 3bn até a data de hoje. Note: Todos os múltipolos são calculados numa base pre-dinheiro.
114393 21/12/2015 阿根廷; 玻利维亚; 智利; 厄瓜多尔; 巴拉圭; 秘鲁; 乌拉圭 Laboratorio LKM SA 收购 Grupo Biotoscana SL 西班牙 Undisclosed investor(s); Advent International Corp 医药制造 (3254) 　 　 100 Latin America-focused Spanish pharmaceutical firm Grupo Biotoscana SL (GBT) announced the acquisition of Argentinean peer Laboratorio LKM SA. Financial terms were not disclosed. LKM was majority-owned by U.S. global private equity firm Advent International Corp. Mariano Garcia-Valino, CEO of GBT, said that this acquisition consolidates the company's position as the first truly Latin American advanced medicines firm, and that it enhances GBT's product offering. The combined entity will have operations in 10 Latin American countries as well as annual revenues of USD 250mn, and will operate under the Biotoscana, United Medical and LKM brands. LKM is an Argentinean specialty pharmaceutical manufacturer involved in the oncology, urology and HIV segments. The company also commercializes products in the following business lines: dermatology, central nervous system and general medicine. It has operations in Argentina, Bolivia, Chile, Ecuador, Paraguay, Peru and Uruguay. Grupo Biotoscana is a biopharmaceutical firm producing and distributing medicines for high-complexity genetic disorders, rare diseases, onco-hematology and specialty treatments. It mainly operates in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru and Uruguay. The company is controlled by Advent International and U.S. growth equity firm Essex Woodlands, among other investors. Advent International is a venture capital and private equity firm specialized in growth buyout, acquisitions, mid and upper-mid market buyouts, and others. The company invests in a variety of sectors such as financial services, retail, mining, industry, technology, media, telecom, etc. As of 31 December 2014, Advent had assets under management of USD 33bn.

SecureLink, founded in 2003, is cybersecurity infrastructure and managed services provider, offering integrated security solutions for corporates and institutions in the upper mid-market. The company provides advanced security solutions as well as managed security services (MSS). It expects to reach revenues of EUR 75mn in 2015. Investcorp was established in 1982. The company is mainly active in corporate, real estate and technology investment, as well as hedge funds management. It has offices in New York, London, Bahrain, Abu Dhabi and Riyadh. Investcorp is listed on the Bahrain stock exchange. As of 30 June 2015, it has USD 10.6bn in total assets under management. Its real estate group had approximately USD 1.4bn in assets under management.

The completion of the transaction is subject to satisfaction of a number closing conditions, including shareholder approval. The consideration will be settled in cash, stock and convertible bonds. Guocai Science & Technology is currently a substantial shareholder of CPP with a 14.07% stake. Its stake may rise to 37.71% upon conversion of the bonds. The acquisition is expected to broaden CPP group's client base and its source of income. Beijing Yian Tongbao is engaged in electronic platforms for clearing and settlement service. It has signed an agreement with ChinaPay in relation to cross-border online settlement business. CPP is engaged in the development and operation of electronic public procurement platforms, and provision of other added value services to users of the procurement platforms. In 2014, the company posted a revenue of HKD 1.2bn (USD 157.8mn).

Carey, founded in 1973, is a NYSE listed global net-lease REIT that provides long-term sale-leaseback and build-to-suit financing solutions for companies worldwide. 114383 21/12/2015 博茨瓦纳 Mmamantswe coal and power project 收购 TM Consulting 南非 African Energy Resources Ltd 煤炭开采 (2121); 化石燃料发电 (221112) 20 (官方数据) 100 Australian mining and energy development company African Energy Resources disclosed to the ASX that it has agreed to sell its Mmamantswe coal and power project in southeastern Botswana to South African developer TM Consulting for USD 20mn. The transaction is s conditional upon TM Consulting sole funding a bid submission and successfully winning an IPP procurement tender from the South African government and taking the project to financial close. South Africa has announced a 1,600 MW coal-fired base load IPP procurement programme which will include up to 600 MW from cross border projects such as Mmamantswe. The Mmamantswe project is located around 20 km from the border with South Africa and has been awarded environmental approvals for up to 10 Mtpa of coal mining and up to 2,000 MW of power generation. The project covers an area of 453 km2. African Energy Resources focuses on coal mining and energy generation projects in Botswana and it also has uranium projects in Zambia. The company is listed in the Botswana Stock Exchange and the Australian Securities Exchange and had a market capitalisation of AUD 32.2mn (USD 23.1mn) on 18 December 2015.
114377 21/12/2015 哥伦比亚 CPE-6 oil block in Colombia 收购 Pacific Exploration and Production Corp 加拿大 Talisman Energy Inc 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 48 (官方数据) 50 Latin America-focused Canadian oil & gas company Pacific Exploration and Production Corp (formerly known as Pacific Rubiales Energy Corp) announced it has signed an agreement for the acquisition of the remaining 50% stake in the Colombian oil block CPE-6 from its Canadian peer Talisman Energy Inc. The purchase consideration payable by Pacific Exploration is capped at USD 48mn. It comprises variable monthly payments equal to four percent of the monthly net total production multiplied by an applicable price barrel and three cash payments of USD 5mn each to be disbursed in three tranches contingent on the progressive accumulated gross production of the block. Ronald Pantin, CEO of Pacific, said that the purchase of the 50% interest consolidates a significant new heavy oil discovery in Colombia. The transaction is subject to the approval by Colombia's National Agency of Hydrocarbons (ANH). Following completion of this deal Pacific Exploration will own 100% in the CPE-6 oil block. The CPE-6 oil block is located in the southern Llanos Basin of Colombia and covers an area of approximately 2,400 square kilometres. As of 31 December 2014, the block has 2P reserves of about 38 MMbbl. Pacific Exploration and Production is engaged in the exploration, development and production of crude oil and natural gas in Colombia, Peru, and Guatemala. In 2014, it had a net production of approximately 147,400 barrels of oil equivalent per day and 511 MMboe of 2P reserves. Pacific Rubiales reported sales revenues of USD 4.95bn, Adjusted EBITDA of USD 2.5bn and a net loss of USD 1.31bn in 2014. Talisman Energy explores, develops, produces, transports and sells crude oil, natural gas and natural gas liquids worldwide. It reported sales revenues of USD 4.65bn and a net loss of USD 911mn for 2014.
114346 21/12/2015 俄罗斯 Russian business of Viacom 收购 Maxim Mayoretz - private investor 俄罗斯 Viacom Inc 有线广播电视和其他付费订阅节目服务 (5152) 17 (市场估计) 80 Russian businessman and top manager of Renova Group, Maxim Mayoretz, has agreed to acquire an 80% stake in the Russian business of U.S. media group Viacom Inc, RBC news agency reported, citing two sources close to Renova and one affiliated to Viacom. The financial terms of the transaction were not disclosed. Alexander Vengranovich, an analyst of Otrkitie Bank, values the whole asset at some USD 21.2mn, RBC reported. Thus, Mayoretz might have paid around USD 17mn for the 80%-interest. Allegedly, Mayoretz is buying into Viacom Russia with borrowed funds. Viacom started to look for investors in Russia with regard to the latest local legislative rulings which stipulate that a foreign investor should not possess more than 20% in a Russian media company. The legal amendments come into force in the beginning of 2016. The outbound arm of Viacom, Viacom International Media Networks, distributes 12 entertainment and children TV channels in Russia, the most popular of them being Nickelodeon, Paramount Comedy, Paramount Channel, MTV and VH1. Nickelodeon’s average coverage in November 2015 exceeded 1.36 million people over four years which ranked it fifth among all thematic channels in the classification of TNS Russia.
114373 21/12/2015 南非 21 stores of Jwayelani in KwaZulu-Natal and Eastern Cape 收购 Choppies Enterprises Ltd 博茨瓦纳 Jwayelani Retail (Pty) Ltd 超市和食品杂货店 (4451) 　 　 100 Botswanian supermarket chain Choppies disclosed to the JSE that it has agreed to acquire 21 retail stores in east South Africa from South African sector player Jwayelani Retail. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. The stores are located in the provinces of KwaZulu-Natal and Eastern Cape. Choppies is an Africa-focused supermarket chain and it operated a total of 129 stores across the continent at the end of June 2015. The company is listed on the Botswana Stock Exchange and the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and it booked BWP 5.95bn (USD 621.9mn) revenues in its FY ended 30 June 2015.
114369 21/12/2015 美国 A facility for fully cooked chicken products in the U.S. 收购 Industrias Bachoco SAB de CV 墨西哥 American Foods Group LLC 畜禽屠宰及肉制品加工 (3116) 8 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 22 February 2016, Industrias Bachoco said it completed the acquisition of the facility for fully cooked chicken products in the U.S. from American Foods Group for a purchase consideration of USD 8mn. ORIGINAL: Mexican poultry producer Industrias Bachoco SAB de CV announced it has agreed to acquire a facility for fully cooked chicken products located in the United States from U.S. beef processor American Foods Group LLC for USD 11mn. The facility is located in Oklahoma City and has a weekly production capacity of 300 tonnes. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals and is expected to close in February 2016. Industrias Bachoco acted via its U.S.-based subsidiary OK Foods Inc. Rodolfo Ramos, CEO of Bachoco, said that the acquisition is aligned with the company's growth plans in the United States. Earlier this year, in July 2015, Bachoco acquired for an undisclosed sum the breeding farm assets located in the U.S. state Georgia from its U.S. peer Morris Hatchery Inc. Industrias Bachoco is the biggest producer in the Mexican poultry industry and engages in the breeding, processing, and marketing of chicken, eggs, swine, and balanced animal feed. The company reported sales revenues of MXN 41.8bn (USD 2.7bn) and net income of MXN 3.93bn (USD 250mn) for 2014. American Foods Group operates as a beef products processor and supplier.
114356 21/12/2015 尼泊尔 Ncell Private Ltd 收购 Axiata Group Bhd 马来西亚 TeliaSonera UTA Holdings BV; SEA Telecom Investments BV 移动电信服务（卫星除外） (5172) 1,365.10 (官方数据) 80 UPDATE: On 12 April 2016, Axiata said that it has completed the deal. ORIGINAL: Malaysian telecommunications firm Axiata Group Bhd announced that it will acquire an 80% stake in Nepal-based mobile operator Ncell Private Ltd for a total cash consideration of approximately MYR 5.9bn (USD 1.36bn). Under the deal terms, the buyer's wholly-owned subsidiary Axiata Investments (UK) Ltd will acquire the total capital of Reynolds Holdings Ltd, which in turn holds an 80% stake in Ncell. On the sell side are TeliaSonera UTA Holdings BV (60% stake), which is 75.5%-owned by Swedish telephone and mobile network operator TeliaSonera AB, and SEA Telecom Investments BV (20% stake). The acquisition marks the entry of the Axiata Group in Nepal. It is also the largest foreign direct investment in the country to date. The deal is aligned with the buyer's strategy to expand its telecom operations in emerging Asia. Axiata Group reported that Nepal has an average mobile subscriber growth of 18% from 2012 to 2014. TeliaSonera said it will use the proceeds to cut debt and will focus on other European markets. Ncell Private Ltd offers mobile telecommunications services such as mobile voice, data and value-added services. The company also provides internet, messaging and mobile devices. It has over 12.8 million mobile subscription as of July 2015 and employs more than 520 employees. Ncell had revenues of MYR 2.25bn (USD 590.8mn) and EBITDA of MYR 1.39 (USD 367.5mn) for FY ended 16 July 2015. The company had a net cash position of USD 284 as of 30 September 2015. Axiata Group Bhd, through its subsidiaries, provides mobile and telecommunication services to over 244 million subscribers in Asia. The company posted revenues of MYR 18.7bn (USD 5.3bn) for FY ended 31 December 2014.

The company will issue 65,546,946 shares at CNY 14.65 (USD 2.26) apiece and will pay CNY 539.7mn (USD 83.2mn) to satisfy the purchase consideration. Wang Tianxiang, the controlling shareholder of Fuan Pharmaceutical Group, has a 45.42% shares in the company. Upon deal completion, his shares will be reduced to 35.61%. Yantai Zhichu Pharmaceutical Co will become a wholly-owned subsidiary of Fuan Pharmaceutical once the deal is completed. The acquisition is part of the buyer's restructuring plan to expand the product line of the company. The company will focus more on the bio-fermentation technology field. Yantai Zhichu Pharmaceutical Co Ltd manufactures pharmaceutical raw materials. The company's revenues were CNY 588.7mn (USD 95.7mn) in 2014. Fuan Pharmaceutical Group Co Ltd is involved in the research, development, production, and distribution of beta-lactamase, penicillin and cephalosporin antibiotic ingredients and preparations. The company is listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and booked revenues of about CNY 448.6mn (USD 72.9mn) in 2014.

No financial details were disclosed. After the transaction, SEDCO owns 30% of Mektebim Okullari and the Kalko family controls 40% of the education company. SEDCO was founded in 1976 by the Bin Mahfouz family, one of the leading banking families in Saudi Arabia. 118666 19/12/2015 印度 Swarna Pragati Housing Microfinance Pvt Ltd 少数股权购买 Omidyar Network; Zephyr Peacock Management India; Intellecap; Buyer(s) unknown; Aavishkaar Goodwell 美国; 印度 　 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 15.07 (市场估计) 15 India-based Swarna Pragati Housing Microfinance Pvt Ltd, has raised an undisclosed amount in its series investment round from Omidyar Network and Zephyr Peacock Management India, The Economic Times reported According to media sources, the firm raised INR 1bn (USD 15.1mn) from the round which saw the buyers pick up around a 15% stake in the target. The round also saw the participation of Aavishkaar Goodwell, Intellecap and undisclosed private investors. Swarna Pragati Housing is a micro finance firm which offer micro housing loans for as home improvement, construction and extension. The firm has a loan portfolio of INR 850mn (USD 12.8mn) and customer base of 8,700 of November 2015. Omidyar is a philanthropic investment firm that focuses on investing on profit and non-profit firms across the consumer, internet, education financial services, public and property rights firms. The company has disbursed over USD 730mn since 2004. Zephyr Peacock Management is a U.S and India-based private equity firm which focuses on India, Sri Lanka, Africa, Korea, Mexico and the U.S. The firm is headquartered in New York and typically invests between USD 5mn and USD 20mn.
114340 19/12/2015 肯尼亚 Woolworths Kenya Ltd 少数股权购买 Woolworths Holdings Ltd 南非 Deacons Kenya Ltd 服装、服饰店 (448) 5.65 (官方数据) 49 UPDATE: Woolworths disclosed in its financial report for the 26 weeks ended 27 December 2015 that the sum of the deal stands at ZAR 87mn (USD 5.65mn). ORIGINAL: Kenyan clothing and household goods retailer Deacons Kenya has agreed to sell its 49% stake in local clothing retailer Woolworths Kenya to South African retail group Woolworths, Kenyan newspaper The Standard reported. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Deacons Kenya said that the transaction will be completed by 31 December 2015 and that it plans to invest the proceeds in new franchises, stores, brands as well as funding its existing operations. Woolworths Kenya was established in December 2013 as a joint venture between Deacons and Woolworths. The creation of the company formally ended a franchise arrangement where Woolworths only supplied Deacons with its brands. Deacons reserved the right to manage the joint venture company despite its minority stake. Woolworths was incorporated in 1931 and is a South African clothing, footwear, groceries and beauty products retail group with some 1,300 stores worldwide. The group employs over 41,000 people and operates in 15 countries. Woolworths is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and it booked revenues of ZAR 58.1bn (USD 5.08bn) in its FY ended 28 June 2015.

The consideration includes a cash payment of CNY 48mn and assumption of debts of CNY 9.4mn due by the target to Huili Resources. The sale will enables Huili Resources to achieve an exit at acceptable terms and recoup the investment costs. The sale proceeds will be used as general working capital or acquisitions. Hami Jiatai Mineral Resource Exploitation Ltd is a 95%-owned subsidiary of Huili Resources. Huili Resources is engaged in the mining and processing of diversified non-ferrous metals. It had a turnover of CNY 3.5mn (USD 0.57mn) in 2014.

Based in Prague, APS Holding is a distressed asset investment management and servicing company, focused across Central and South Eastern Europe. 114443 18/12/2015 哥伦比亚 Sofitel Legend Santa Clara hotel in Colombia 收购 Accor Sa 法国 　 住宿服务 (721) 　 　 42 French hotels operator Accor SA has acquired a 42% stake in the Sofitel Legend Santa Clara hotel located in the Colombian city Cartagena, local media reported. Financial terms were not disclosed. With this acquisition Accor increased its interest in the hotel from 20% to 62%. In Colombia Accor operates six hotels with 970 rooms, two of which under the brand name Sofitel, three under the brand Ibis, and one under the name Mercure. The transaction took place through the Colombian holding company Sociedad Hotel Santa Clara SA, owner of the Sofitel Legend Santa Clara hotel. As part of the deal Accor also acquired a majority stake in the 14-room Las Bovedas de Santa Clara Boutique hotel also located in Cartagena, next to the Sofitel Legend hotel. The Sofitel Legend Santa Clara hotel operates in the luxury and high-end hotel segments and has 124 rooms, including 19 suites. Accor operates hotel chains ranging from the budget to upscale segments. The company generated total revenues of EUR 5.45bn (USD 5.92bn) and a net income of EUR 223mn (USD 242mn) for 2014. In Latin America, Accor operates 255 hotels with 42,300 rooms in nine countries: Argentina, Bolivia, Brasil, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, Paraguay, Peru and Uruguay.

The company operates through a network of more than 200 own and franchised stores in 26 Brazilian states. H.I.G. Capital LLC, established in 1993 and based in Miami (U.S.), is a global private equity, venture capital and alternative assets investment firm specialised in providing both debt and equity capital to small and mid-sized companies. Since its inception, the company has managed and invested in over 200 companies globally. H.I.G. Capital also owns offices in Atlanta, Boston, Chicago, Dallas, New York and San Francisco and has international affiliate offices in London, Hamburg, Madrid, Milan, Paris and Rio de Janeiro. H.I.G. Capital has USD 19bn in assets under management as of 22 December 2015. ___________________________________________________________________________ A empresa norte-americana de capital privado em participações H.I.G. Capital LLC, criada em 1993 e com sede em Miami (EUA), é uma empresa global de investimentos em 'private equity', capital de risco e ativos alternativos especializada no fornecimento de dívida e capital próprio para pequenas e médias empresas. Desde a sua criação, a empresa tem gerido e investido em mais de 200 empresas em todo o mundo. A H.I.G. Following this acquisition, VIG will become one of the top three insurers in the non-life market of the Baltic States. BTA Baltic Insurance Company is headquartered in Latvia and has branch offices in Lithuania and Estonia. The company employs 591 people in 154 units spread across three countries. 114350 18/12/2015 罗马尼亚 Loan portfolio of UniCredit Romania 收购 Kredyt Inkaso SA 波兰 UniCredit SpA 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 30.38 (官方数据) 100 Italian banking group UniCredit SpA has sold a loan portfolio of its Romanian unit UniCredit Romania to Polish debt collector Kredyt Inkaso for EUR 28.0mn (USD 30.4mn), Romanian business daily Ziarul Financiar reported. The portfolio of non-performing loans amounts to EUR 340mn, and the sale price represents a discount of 92% of the portfolio's nominal value. According to local media, the deal is the largest transaction involving NPLs in Romania for this year. Under the deal agreement, Kredyt Inkaso is due to pay the acquisition price in three months. According to Romanian business portal mirsanu.ro, the Czech debt recovery firm APS Holding and Britain investment manager APartners Capital have also submitted binding offers for the acquisition of the bad loans portfolio put up for sale by UniCredit. The sale NPLs portfolio includes loans granted to small and medium-sized companies (SMEs), which have been highly hit by the financial crisis and were unable to repay their bank borrowings. UniCredit Bank, former UniCredit Tiriac Bank, founded in 1991 and based in Bucharest, is the fourth largest bank by assets. It has around 3,350 employees and serves retail and corporate customers in more than 180 branches in Romania. For 2014, it had EUR 6.45bn in total assets and a net profit of EUR 22.2mn. UniCredit Group is a global banking and financial services company with total assets under management of EUR 873.5bn as at 30 September 2015. The lender's network covers 50 markets, with more than 8,500 branches and over 147,000 employees. Kredyt Inkaso specialises in purchasing entire portfolios of debts considered difficult to recover by the original creditors. The company had a net profit of PLN 40.1mn (EUR 9.59mn) in the financial year ended 31 March 2015.

114293 18/12/2015 巴西 EcoRodovias Infraestrutura e Logistica SA; VEM ABC – Vidas em Movimento 收购 Autostrada Torino-Milano SpA (ASTM); Societa Iniziative Autostradali e Servizi SpA (SIAS) 意大利 Primav Ecorodovias SA 交通运输辅助活动 (488) 570.96 (官方数据) 　 UPDATE: On 04 May 2016, EcoRodovias announced that it has completed the transaction. With the completion of the deal, Primav has received BRL 2.22bn (USD 570.96mn) and became a shareholder in "Newco" with a participation of 35.9%. In addition, ASTM holds the remaining stake of 64.1% in the company. The stake held by "Newco" in the capital of EcoRodovias is 64%, while Primav and Igli hold indirectly stakes in EcoRodovias, equivalent yo 23% and 41%, respectively. ORIGINAL: Italian motorway operators Autostrada Torino-Milano SpA (ASTM) and Societa Iniziative Autostradali e Servizi SpA (SIAS) have agreed to acquire Brazilian highway concessionaires EcoRodovias Infraestrutura e Logistica SA and VEM ABC - Vidas em Movimento through a capital injection of BRL 2.22bn (USD 571mn). The information was provided by infrastructure manager Gavio Group, which is the controller of Italian holding company Argo Finanziaria SpA, which in turn manages ASTM and SIAS. The seller in the deal is Primav Ecorodovias SA, a majority shareholder in EcoRodovias and controlled by CR Almeida. Under the agreement, a new special purpose vehicle will be created, under the joint-control of highway concessionaire CR Almeida (35.9%), ASTM and SIAS (64.1%). The new company's capital will be composed by common and preferred stock, of which all preference shares will be under the control of ASTM and SIAS. Furthermore, "Newco" will hold 64% of EcoRodovias and 55% of VEM ABC, which will provide ASTM and SIAS with 41% control over EcoRodovias. By completion of the transaction, ASTM and SIAS will be able to manage a road network under concession with a total extension of 3,260 km in Italy (1,400 km) and in Brazil (1,860 km), for a period of 10 years. The transaction is part of the development process and the geographical diversification of ASTM and SIAS, and is aligned with Gavio Group's strategy for joint management of infrastructure projects. Moreover, it gives the buyer the possibility to compete in auctions for related projects. The controllers of EcoRodovias decided to enter into the agreement in order to collect resources to reduce debt of BRL 2.57bn (USD 660mn). EcoRodovias has a toll-road network under management of around 1,860 km, divided between eight concessionaires across Brazil. The company also controls Ecoporto, a firm responsible for the management of port terminals in Port of Santos and Elog. EcoRodovias is listed on the BM&FBovespa and had revenues of BRL 2.4bn (USD 627mn) and an EBITDA of BRL 1.29bn (USD 330.15mn) in 2014. VEM ABC has the right to manage a monorail of 14.9 km that connects Sao Paulo city and the region of ABC with 13 stations. The concession is for a period of 25 years, starting from 2017. ASTM operates as an industrial holding active in the management of motorways and in the construction of infrastructures. The firm is listed on the Italian Stock Exchange and had a turnover of EUR 1.34bn (USD 1.78bn) and a net income of EUR 100mn (USD 133mn) in 2014. SIAS is a motorways operator of approximately 1,400 km road network under concession in the north-west of Italy. The company is listed on the Italian Stock Exchange and had a turnover of EUR 1.33bn (USD 1.77bn) and a net income of EUR 134mn (USD 178mn) in 2014. _____________________________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE: Em 04 de maio de 2016, a EcoRodovias anunciou que concluiu a transação. Com o fechamento do negócio, a Primav recebeu BRL 2.22bn (USD 570.96mn) e passou a ser titular de 35.9% do capital social da "Newco". Além disso, a ASTM detém a participação remanescente de 64.1% na empresa. A participação detida pela "Newco" no capital da EcoRodovias é de 64%, enquanto a Primav e a Igli seguraram indirectamente 23% e 41% do capital social da EcoRodovias, respectivamente. ORIGINAL: As operadoras italianas de auto-estradas Autostrada Torino-Milano SpA (ASTM) e Societa Iniziative Autostradali e Servizi SpA (SIAS) entraram em um acordo para adquirir o controle sobre as concessionárias brasileiras de rodovias EcoRodovias Infraestrutura e Logística SA e ABC VEM - Vidas em Movimento, através de uma injecção de capital de BRL 2.22bn (USD 571mn). A informação foi anunciada pela gestora italiana da infra-estrutura Gavio Group que é o controladora da holding Argo Finanziaria SpA, que por sua vez gerencia e coordena a ASTM e a SIAS. A vendedora é a Primav Ecorodovias SA, acionista majoritária na EcoRodovias e controlada pela CR Almeida. Sob o acordo, vai ser criado um novo veículo de propósito específico, sob o controle conjunto da concessionária de rodovias CR Almeida (35.9%), a ASTM e a SIAS (64.1%). O capital social da nova empresa vai ser composto por ações ordinárias e preferenciais, das quais todos as ações preferenciais passarão sob o controle da ASTM e da SIAS. A "Newco" também vai deter 64% da EcoRodovias e 55% da VEM ABC, e desta forma, a ASTM e a SIAS vão ter o controle indireto de 41% sobre a EcoRodovias. Uma vez concluída a operação, a ASTM e a SIAS vão ter o direito de gerenciar uma rede de estradas sob concessão com uma extensão total de 3,260 km em Itália (1,400 km) e no Brasil (1,860 km), por um período de 10 anos. A transação faz parte do processo de desenvolvimento e de diversificação geográfica da ASTM e da SIAS, e está alinhada com a estratégia da Gavio Group de gestão conjunta de projetos de infraestrutura. Além disso, a operação dá as compradoras a possibilidade de competir em leilões para projetos relacionados. Os controladores da EcoRodovias decidiram celebrar o acordo, a fim de angariar recursos para reduzir a dívida de empresa de BRL 2.57bn (USD 660mn). A EcoRodovias tem uma rede de rodovias sob gestão de cerca de 1,860 km, dividida entre oito concessionárias em todo o Brasil. A empresa também controla a Ecoporto, uma empresa responsável pela gestão de terminais portuários no Porto de Santos e no Elog. A EcoRodovias está listada na BM&FBovespa e teve um faturamento de BRL 2.4bn (USD 627mn) e um EBITDA de BRL 1.29bn (USD 330.15mn) em 2014. A VEM ABC tem o direito de gerir um monotrilho de 14.9 km composto por 13 estações, que liga a cidade de São Paulo e a região de ABC. A concessão é por um período de 25 anos, que começam a partir de 2017. A ASTM opera como uma holding industrial especialisada na gestão de auto-estradas e na construção de infra-estruturas. A empresa está listada na Bolsa de Valores Italiana e teve um faturamento de EUR 1.34bn (USD 1.78bn) e um lucro líquido de EUR 100mn (USD 1.33mn) em 2014. A SIAS é uma operadora de auto-estradas de uma rede sob concesão de aproximadamente 1,400 km, localizada no nordeste da Itália. A empresa está listada na Bolsa de Valores Italiana e teve um faturamento de EUR 1.33bn (USD 1.77bn) e um lucro líquido de EUR 134mn (USD 178mn) em 2014.
114325 18/12/2015 秘鲁 Fenix Power Peru SA 收购 Colbun SA; Abu Dhabi Investment Authority; Sigma Sociedad Administradora de Fondos de Inversion SA (Sigma SAFI) 智利; 阿拉伯联合酋长国; 秘鲁 AEI Services LLC; Grupo Lakas SA; Private investor(s) 化石燃料发电 (221112) 171.4 (官方数据) 100 Chilean electricity generation and transmission company Colbun SA announced the acquisition of Peruvian electricity generating firm Fenix Power Peru SA for USD 171.4mn (PEN 577mn). Colbun acted via its 51%-owned Peruvian subsidiary Inversiones Las Canteras SA (ILC). The remaining shareholders in ILC are UAE-based sovereign wealth fund Abu Dhabi Investment Authority (36%) and Peruvian investment funds manager Sigma Sociedad Administradora de Fondos de Inversion SA (Sigma SAFI) (13%). The buyers paid an additional of USD 224.1mn for the repayment of a loan Fenix has with the sellers, as well as USD 25mn for the latter's capital increase. The sellers were U.S. power generation company AEI Services LLC (87.24%), as well as Panamanian energy holding firms Grupo Lakas SA and Baragua Energia SA. Colbun said that this is the first electricity generating asset acquired outside of Chile, which accelerates the company's internationalization process. Fenix Power Peru owns and operates a 570 MW combined-cycle natural gas-fired power generation plant located 65km south of Lima, Peru. For the last nine months ended on 30 September 2015 the company generated total revenues of USD 163mn and an EBITDA of USD 44mn. Colbun operates 16 hydroelectric power plants and seven thermoelectric power plants with total installed capacity of 3,278 MW. The company also operates 892km of single and double-circuit transmission lines and 27 substations. It serves primarily electric distributors, manufacturing and mining companies. Colbun reported total revenues of USD 1.5bn and a net income of USD 80mn for 2014.
114316 18/12/2015 斯洛伐克 Slovenske Elektrarne as 少数股权购买 Energeticky A Prumyslovy Holding as 捷克共和国 Enel SpA 水电发电 (221111); 核能发电 (221113) 406.93 (官方数据) 33 UPDATE: On 21 December 2015, Slovak prime minister Robert Fico said that the state has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Enel, giving the state an option to acquire another 17% in SE. Slovakia would thus become majority shareholder in SE instead of Czech utility EPH, which will be left with a minority stake of 49%. The MoU was later on also made public by Enel. ORIGINAL: Italian energy group Enel announced that it has signed an agreement to sell a 66% stake in Slovak peer Slovenske Elektrarne (SE) to Czech utility company Energeticky A Prumyslovy Holding (EPH) for a total consideration of EUR 750mn (USD 813.8mn) in a two-phase deal. First, EPH will acquire 33% in SE by paying EUR 150mn at the closing of the first phase and then another EUR 225 upon the closing of the second phase. In the second phase, the buyer has an option to acquire another 33% in Slovenske Elektrarne for EUR 375mn, exercisable 12 months after receiving the Trial Operation Permit of units 3 and 4 of the Mochovce nuclear power plant, which are currently under construction. On the basis of the current work plan these options are expected to become exercisable within the first half of 2019. The remaining 34% stake in Slovenske Elektrarne is held by the Slovak state. The total deal value is subject to an adjustment mechanism, while the transaction is subject to the approval of EU's antitrust authorities. EPH is acting through its subsidiary EP Slovakia, while the seller via company Enel Produzione. Slovenske Elektrarne is the largest power generating company in Slovakia in terms of installed capacity. As at the end of 2014, it had installed capacity of about 4,521 MW, of which about 1,940 MW from nuclear power generation. The company operates 31 hydroelectric, two nuclear, two thermoelectric and two photovoltaic plants. Slovenske Elektrarne posted revenues of EUR 2.47bn and a net profit of EUR 170mn in 2014. EPH is a leading energy group with operations in the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Germany, Italy, the UK and Poland. It includes more than 40 companies operating throughout the whole energy value chain, including electricity and heat generation, electricity and gas trading, and renewable energy. The group employs around 10,000 people and had revenues of EUR 3.7bn in 2014. Note: Only the first phase of the deal for 33% in SE is currently considered by EMIS DealWatch due to the uncertainties of the second phase.
114324 18/12/2015 波多黎各 Puerto Rican operations John Hancock Financial 收购 Massachusetts Mutual Life Insurance Co (MassMutual) 美国 Manulife Financial Corp 保险活动 (5241) 　 　 　 U.S. mutual insurance group Massachusetts Mutual Life Insurance Co (MassMutual) has acquired the Puerto Rican operations of U.S. insurer John Hancock Financial, Puerto Rican news portal Caribbean Business reported. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. MassMutual carried out the purchase through its local arm MassMutual Puerto Rico. "We are extremely happy of being able to make this acquisition and to add to our team more producers, who upon completion of their ongoing training, will help more Puerto Ricans achieve their future goals through savings and responsible and well thought-out investments, which MassMutual promotes," said Fernando Lopez, general agent of MassMutual Puerto Rico. He added that the transaction adds 30 insurance producers to the MassMutual team. Also, John Hancock's investment business on the island will be transferred to MassMutual Puerto Rico, increasing the latter's business by 70%. John Hancock Financial has been operating in Puerto Rico for 70 years. The company forms part of Canadian insurance company Manulife Financial. MassMutual was established in 1851 and is mutual life insurance company based in the city of Springfield, northeastern USA. The group offers life insurance, retirement plans, disability income insurance and long term care insurance products among other. MassMutual's major affiliates include Babson Capital Management, Baring Asset Management, Cornerstone Real Estate Advisers, The First Mercantile Trust Co, MassMutual International, MML Investors Services, Member FINRA and SIPC; OppenheimerFunds, and The MassMutual Trust Co.
114320 18/12/2015 中国 Qihoo 360 Technology Co Ltd 收购 CITIC Guoan Group; Sequoia Capital; Taikang Life Insurance Co Ltd; Ping An Insurance (Group) Co of China Ltd; Sunshine Insurance Group; Beijing Huatai Ruilian M&A Fund; Huasheng Capital; Golden Brick Silk Road Capital; New China Capital 中国; 美国 Existing shareholders 软件出版 (5112); 互联网出版与传播 (516) 9,217.27 (DW 估计) 100 Chinese leading Internet and mobile security company Qihoo 360 Technology Co Ltd announced that it will be taken private by a local consortium of investors lead by company CEO Hongyi Zhou in an all-cash deal for around USD 9.22bn. The consortium is made up of Citic Guoan, Golden Brick Silk Road Capital, Sequoia Capital China, Taikang Life Insurance, Ping An Insurance, Sunshine Insurance, New China Capital, Huatai Ruilian and Huasheng Capital among others. The transaction involves the redemption of the company's long-term debts of USD 1.6bn. Completion is subject to regulatory approvals and is expected by Q2 2016. The buyers will acquire Qihoo's 136,911,908 Class A shares and 42,656,903 Class B shares at a price of USD 51.33 each., or USD 77 per ADR. The price for the ADR represents a 16% increased over their closing price on 16 June 2015, the last day before Qihoo received the going private offer. As of 31 March 2015, Qihoo had long-term debt of USD 1.63bn and cash of USD 1.49bn. The tangible book value of its common shares stood at USD 681mn. Cash proceeds for the acquisition will be funded through cash contributions from investors, from a committed term loan facility worth USD 3bn and from a bridge loan facility worth USD 400mn. Qihoo 360 Technology Co Ltd provides internet services, develops and designs internet security software and also sells third party anti-virus software. As of summer 2015, it had some 514 million monthly active internet users on PC, and some 800 million mobile users. Qihoo's products include 360 Safe Guard, 360 Anti-virus and 360 Mobile Safe. It is listed on the NYSE and recorded revenues of USD 1.4bn in 2014.
114297 18/12/2015 芬兰 Gasum Oy 少数股权购买 Government of Finland 芬兰 Gazprom 电力、燃气和水的供应业 (22) 272.66 (官方数据) 25 Russian gas major Gazprom has divested its 25% stake in Finnish natural gas supplier Gasum Oy to the Government of Finland, according to a press release of the target. The sale price was EUR 251.3mn (USD 272.7mn). As a result of the transaction, the state will consolidate 100% in Gasum Oy. In November 2014, the Finnish government purchased the stakes of the other two shareholders in Gasum - local utility Fortum and German E.ON. Investors lost interest in the target asset because of the EU requirements of the Third Energy Package. In addition, Gazprom did not agree with the amended strategy for gaining access to the end consumer. As Kommersant daily reminds, Gazprom wanted to exit Gasum Oy in end-November 2014 but the Finnish state linked the negotiations with the discussions of the contract price for the imported gas. In the end, Gazprom agreed on a small additional discount of the gas price. Gasum Oy is an integrated gas company whose activities comprise natural gas importing, upgrade and distribution for industrial use and for homes. The company is the leading supplier of biogas in Finland and owns the majority of the LNG distribution business of Norwegian company Skangass. In 2014, Gasum Oy reported EUR 1.1bn (USD 1.46bn) in revenues.
114315 18/12/2015 斯洛伐克 Forum Business Center I 收购 REICO investicni spolecnost Ceske sporitelny as 捷克共和国 HB Reavis 房地产 (531) 50.13 (官方数据) 100 CS Nemovitostni fond, the real estate fund managed by Czech company REICO investicni spolecnost has acquired Forum Business Center I office building in Slovakia from Slovak real estate developer HB Reavis for EUR 46.2mn (USD 50.1mn), the seller announced. Forum Business Center I is located in Bratislava, at the junction of Bajkalska and Prievozska Street. The 17-storeys building offers 18,500 m2 of leasable space. REICO investicni spolecnost establishes and manages funds that invest in real estate assets and capital market instruments. It is part of Czech savings bank Ceska sporitelna. Its fund CS Nemovitostni focuses mainly on completed properties with a minimum value of EUR 10mn. By the end of November 2015, its fund capital exceeded EUR 275mn (CZK 7.5bn). HB Reavis, founded in 1993, is a Luxembourg-registered developer active in the Czech Republic, Hungary, Poland, Slovakia, the United Kingdom and Turkey. It has total assets of EUR 1.8bn with a net asset value of EUR 1.024bn.
114312 18/12/2015 贝宁 Tincy Boulangerie 少数股权购买 Investisseurs & Partenaires (I&P) 法国 　 焙烤食品制造 (3118) 　 　 48.2 French impact investment company Investisseurs & Partenaires (I&P) announced that it has acquired a 48.2% stake in Benin-based bakery Tincy Boulangerie. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. I&P said that Tincy is expanding rapidly and is working on new projects which include improvement of the quality and the management of the production, doubling the production capacity and starting a pastry activity to diversify the range of products. Tincy Boulangerie is a semi-industrial bakery that produces and distributes a wide variety of breads in Benin's northern city of Cotonou and its surroundings. The company has a shop and a network of 24 kiosks. Investisseurs & Partenaires was founded in 2002 and is an impact investment group focused on small and medium enterprises in Sub-Saharan Africa. The company has so far made investments in more than 50 companies in 15 African countries.

The deal will give the buyer opportunities to divert its business to oil and gas exploitation which will allow it to create a new profit growth point and improve its profitability. Blue Whale Energy North America Corp explores oil and gas as well as acquiring upstream oil and gas properties. Yantai Xinchao Industry Co Ltd develops and distributes residential buildings and manufactures electronic components as well as offers construction and installation services. The company is listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of CNY 936.1mn (USD 153.7mn) in 2014.
114290 18/12/2015 波兰 Liberty Ubezpieczenia 收购 AXA Group 法国 Liberty Mutual Insurance Co 保险业 (524) 23.32 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 6 April 2016, Polish anti-monopoly office approved the deal. ORIGINAL: French insurance company AXA Group announced that it has entered into agreement to acquire Liberty Ubezpieczenia, the Polish Property & Casualty operations of U.S.-based Liberty Mutual Insurance Group for PLN 92.3mn (EUR 21.6mn) plus the net asset value outstanding as of the date of closing. Thanks to the acquisition AXA will further strengthen its presence in Poland and will increase its market share in Property & Casualty to around 4.4% from 3.2% previously. The deal aligns with AXA's strategy in Poland to further diversify distribution channels and expand the product portfolio. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals and is expected to close before Q3 2016. Liberty Ubezpieczenia offers property, travel and car insurance. It operates through agencies, direct and car dealers. The company had gross written premiums of PLN 315mn (EUR 75mn) in 2014. AXA Group is an International French financial services firm that focuses in property-casualty insurance, life insurance and asset management. It has 161,000 employees and distributors serving 103 million clients in 59 countries. AXA reported consolidated total assets of EUR 840.1mn (USD 1bn) for FY ended 31 December 2014.
114287 18/12/2015 巴西; 中美洲; 哥伦比亚 Rocol SA 收购 Alphaeon Corp 美国 　 专业和商业设备及用品商人批发商 (4214) 　 　 　 U.S. healthcare products-focused social commerce company Alphaeon Corp announced the acquisition of Colombian medical equipment distributor Rocol SA. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. "Rocol is a well-respected and recognised leader in the commercialisation of medical equipment in ophthalmology and aesthetics across m Latin America," said Alphaeon Corp CEO Robert Grant. He added that the purchase enables Alphaeon Corp to expand its presence in these key emerging markets. Rocol was founded in 1984 and it provides products, services and medical equipment in the fields of ophthalmology, dermatology, aesthetics, oncology and robotics. The company focuses on Latin America, particularly Brazil and the Caribbean Islands. Alphaeon Corp was established in 2012 and it provides beauty, wellness, and lifestyle products such as age defense creams, face and eye cleansing solutions, skin radiance smoothing creams, and deep repair soothing balms. The company is owned by U.S. lifestyle healthcare-focused growth equity firm Strathspey Crown.
118310 17/12/2015 美国 Atheer 少数股权购买 RONA Holdings; FundersClub Inc; Shanda Group; Streamlined Ventures; Signatures Capital; Fang Group Co Ltd 美国; 新加坡; 中国 　 软件出版 (5112); 电脑系统设计和相关服务 (54151) 14 (官方数据) 　 U.S.-based AiR (Augmented interactive Reality) computing platform Atheer has raised USD 14.0mn in a Series B funding round, with the participation of Singapore's global investing holding company Shanda Group, online VC & PE news platform FinSMEs reported. The round was led by U.S. Signatures Capital and Streamlined Ventures. Other participants included existing investor FundersClub, and new investors Fang Group and RONA Holdings. Atheer will use the funds to accelerate go-to-market activities and global customer deployment of its solutions. Atheer is the pioneer of the AiR™ (Augmented interactive Reality) smart glasses platform, designed to enhance the productivity and safety of deskless professionals at Fortune 1000 companies. The award-wining AiR™ provides Augmented Reality with intelligent gesture, voice and head-motion interactions as well as real-time rich-media collaboration with remote peers without the need to hold any device, all on a mobile smart glasses platform. Shanda Group started out as an online game company called Shanda Interactive in 1999. The company later spun off the gaming business and became an investment group with a long-term investment horizon across public markets of equity, fixed income and commodities, private equity and real estate. The group focuses on value investment opportunities in the financial services, technology and health care services sectors. Shanda Group is headquartered in Singapore with offices in Shanghai, Beijing, Hong Kong, Canada, Japan and the U.S., and currently, the total net asset value of Shanda stands at approx. USD 8.0bn.

Prior the transaction, Tencent owned a 93% stake in Riot Games. Tencent first invested in Riot Games in 2011 acquiring a majority stake in the company for a reported consideration of over USD 350mn. Los Angeles-based Riot Games is the developer of the popular online game League of Legends. Tencent Holdings Ltd offers Internet and mobile value-added services, online advertising, online and mobile games, as well as instant messaging services. The company is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange and generated revenues of CNY 78.9bn (USD 12.8bn) in 2014.

The firm also conducts business in Argentina, Chie, Ecuador, Mexico, Panama, Peru and Venezuela and pretends to be the fastest-growing online sales portal in Latin America. The seller include Ms. Zhou Li, Mr. Zhou Dong, Jiahanyin Investment, Zhongwei Partnership and Baojiehui Partnership. The deal is subject to satisfaction of certain conditions, including shareholder approvals. Some CNY 10mn from the total consideration will go for a capital increase of Shanghai Hejian Nutritional Food Products, prior to the completion of the acquisition. The sellers, except Baojiehui Partnership, will use the sale proceeds to subscribe for new shares of Nanjing Sinolife, representing 6.96% of its enlarged capital. The acquisition will diversify Nanjing Sinolife's portfolio and distribution channels. The sales models of Shanghai Hejian Nutritional Food Products are in line with and complementary to Nanjing Sinolife's business expansion strategy. Nanjing Sinolife is a leading manufacturer of nutritional supplements and health food products in China. The company posted revenues of CNY 252.5mn (USD 41.1mn) for 2014.

The buyer acted through its local subsidiary Sarantis Polska. Sarantis used existing cash facilities to finance the transaction. Polipak manufactures polyethylene-film-based packaging products (mainly garbage bags). The company expects to reach revenues of EUR 13.7mn and EBIDTA margin of 10% in 2015. Sarantis is focused on the markets of fragrances and cosmetics, personal care, household products and health and care products. The company has nine subsidiaries in Poland, Romania, Bulgaria, Serbia, Czech Republic, F.Y.R.O.M., Hungary, Bosnia & Herzegovina and Portugal as well as distribution network in more than 35 countries via direct exports.
