114300 17/12/2015 俄罗斯; 美国 Depositphotos 少数股权购买 TMT Investments; European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) 英国; 国际的 　 电子购物 (454111); 数据处理、主机管理及相关服务 (518) 5 (官方数据) 　 U.S.-based photobank with Russian roots Depositphotos raised USD 5mn in a new funding round led by the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) and also joined by existing shareholder TMT Investments fund. EBRD will acquire a minority stake in the target while founder of Russian origin Dmitry Sergeev will retain his majority ownership. The proceeds will be used for strengthening the company’s positions in the emerging markets where Depositphotos aims to become a leader. In addition, Depositphotos will continue to boost its footstep in the western countries. The company also intends to expand its R&D centre in Ukraine. Founded in 2009, Depositphotos is among the top 5 stock photo marketplaces in the world. The company has customers in 192 countries and offers a library of over 40 million stock photos, illustrations, vector images and video files. TMT invests in high-growth, internet-based companies across a variety of sectors and has a significant number of Silicon Valley investments in its portfolio. The company was set up by the founders of RBC media group.
114299 17/12/2015 英国 Interconnector UK Ltd 少数股权购买 Fluxys 比利时 Gazprom 管道运输 (486) 　 　 10 Belgian gas transit operator Fluxys has acquired a 10% stake in U.K.-based pipeline operator Interconnector from Russian gas major Gazporom for an undisclosed price, the buyer announced. Interconnector operates a 235-kilometres-long natural gas pipeline which connects the British terminal at Bacton with a terminal in Zeebrugge, Belgium. As a result of the acquisition, Fluxys consolidates a 50.75% interest in Interconnector, held both directly (35%) and indirectly (15.75%) - through a 50-50 joint venture with Snam. Fluxys is an independent gas infrastructure group operating on the European market. The company’s services combine gas transmission, storage and terminalling of liquefied natural gas (LNG).
114314 17/12/2015 印度 HDFC ERGO General Insurance Co Ltd 少数股权购买 ERGO International AG 德国 Housing Development Finance Corp Ltd 保险活动 (5241) 168.12 (官方数据) 22.902 Indian financial services major Housing Development Finance Corp Ltd (HDFC) announced that it has entered into agreements to sell its 22.9% stake in its insurance joint venture (JV) HDFC ERGO General Insurance Company Ltd to its German-based JV partner ERGO International AG (ERGO) for a total consideration of INR11.2bn (USD 168.1mn). The deal is subject to regulatory and government approvals. HDFC is selling a total of 123,357,262 shares at a price of INR 91 (USD 1.36) a piece. Post-transaction ERGO International will hold a 48.7% stake in the target while HDFC will continue to hold the remaining 50.7%. The deal comes after the Indian government increased the foreign direct investment limit on insurance companies from 26% to 49%. HDFC ERGO General Insurance Co offers health, motor, travel and home insurance in India. It was formed as a 74-26 joint venture between HDFC Ltd and ERGO International AG. The firm has presence through 109 branches across 89 cities domestically. HDFC ERGO reported total assets of INR 45.3bn (USD 722.7mn) as of 31 March 2015. ERGO International AG is an International German Insurance firm with focus in Europe and Asia. It provides insurance, provision and services across 30 counties. The firm was founded in 1997 and currently employs a total of 43,000 people.
114302 17/12/2015 英国 One Chapel Place 收购 Y. T. Realty Group Ltd 香港 Castro Global Ltd 房地产 (531) 76.92 (官方数据) 50 Hong Kong-listed Y. T. Realty Group Ltd said it will acquire additional 50% of commercial property One Chapel Place in London from British Virgin Islands-registered investment holding company Castro Global Ltd for a total consideration of HKD 596.2mn (USD 76.9mn). Y. T. Realty Group will pay HKD 7.3mn for the stake and will finance the repayment of the seller's loans worth HKD 117.5mn and property related bank borrowings worth HKD 471.4 mn. One Chapel Place is a 4-storey building offering 3,159 m2 of grade A office and retail space at Vere Street and 10 Chapel Place. The acquisition is conditional upon Y. T. Realty Group's disposal of two properties in Hong Kong to its chairman Mr. Cheung Chung Kiu for a total consideration of HKD 4.02bn (USD 518.8mn). Upon completion of the deals, expected to close by 30 June 2016, Y. T. Realty Group will be full owner of the London property and will own 41.66% of firm Cross-Harbour, which is engaged in engage in investment in and management of tunnels, motoring schools and highway and tunnel toll system in Hong Kong.
114291 17/12/2015 巴西 Produquimica Industria e Comercio SA 少数股权购买 Compass Minerals International Inc 美国 　 农药、肥料和其他农用化学品的制造 (3253) 114.83 (官方数据) 35 UPDATE: On 23 December 2015, the Produquimica's legal advisor disclosed to deal watch that the transaction was completed. ORIGINAL: U.S. highway deicing salt manufacturer Compass Minerals International Inc announced it has agreed to purchase a 35% stake in Brazilian specialty plant nutrition company Produquimica Industria e Comercio SA for BRL 450mn (USD 114.83mn), subject to certain post-closing adjustments. The transaction is expected to close before the end of 2015. The agreement also gives the buyer the option to purchase the remaining 65% of Produquimica by the beginning of 2019 for an amount equal to between 9.2 and 9.4 times its Trailing Twelve Months (TTM) EBITDA. Mr. Fran Malecha, president and CEO of Compass Minerals, said that Produquimica has strong potential for future growth and margin expansion. Furthermore, the target-company's great variety of specialty plant nutrients, advanced technology, and extensive distribution network will enable Compass Minerals to enter into one of the largest agriculture markets in the world. The President of Produquimica, Mr. Gerhard Schultz, commented that the investment will allow the company to accelerate its growth and to benefit from the exchange of valuable knowledge in the specialty plant nutrition and chemical market. Produquimica, based in Sao Paulo city (Sao Paulo state, Brazil), specialises in agricultural productivity and chemical solutions. The company manufactures micronutrients, controlled release fertilisers and other supplements that are used in the fertiliser industry. In addition, it produces specialty chemicals used in the water treatment industry. The company employs around 1,400 people and registered EBITDA of USD 389.9mn and a net income of USD 217.9mn in 2014. Proquimica is expected to have a turnover of approximately BRL 1bn (USD 255.2mn) and EBITDA of BRL 180mn (USD 45.93mn) in 2015. Compass Minerals produces highway deicing salt, general trade salt and sulfate of potash in North America and the U.K. The company sells its production primarily to state, provincial, county, and municipal highway departments. The firm had a turnover of USD 1.28bn and a net income of USD 218mn in 2014. ______________________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE: Em 23 de dezembro de 2015, o assessor jurídico da Produquimica revelou para o DealWatch que a transação foi concluída. ORIGINAL: A fabricante norte-americana de sal para degelo de rodovias Compass Minerals International Inc anunciou que entrou em um acordo para adquirir uma participação de 35% na fabricante brasileira de nutrientes especiais para fertilização de plantas Produquímica Indústria e Comércio SA, por um valor de BRL 450mn (USD 114.83mn), sujeito a determinados ajustes pós-fechamento. A transação deverá ser concluída antes do final de 2015. O acordo também dá a compradora a opção de adquirir a parcela remanescente da Produquímica de 65%, até o início de 2019, por um valor que pode atingir no mínimo 9.2 e no máximo 9.4 vezes o EBITDA da empresa dos últimos 12 meses. O Sr. Fran Malecha, presidente e CEO da Compass Minerals, disse que a Produquímica tinha um forte potencial para crescimento futuro e incremento da margem. Além disso, a grande variedade de nutrientes especiais para plantas que a empresa oferece, a sua tecnologia avançada e a sua ampla rede de distribuição, vão possibilitar a entrada da Compass Minerals para um dos maiores mercados agrícolas do mundo. O Presidente da Produquímica, o Sr. Gerhard Schultz, comentou que o investimento ia acelerar o crescimento da companhia e dar-lhe-ia acesso ao valioso know-how da Compass Minerals sobre o mercado de nutrientes e químicos para plantas. A Produquímica, sediada na cidade de São Paulo (SP, Brasil), é especializada na produção de soluções químicas agrícolas. A companhia fabrica micronutrientes, fertilizantes de liberação controlada e outros suplementos usados ​​na indústria de fertilizantes. A companhia também produz substâncias químicos especiais utilizadas na indústria de tratamento de água. A Produquímica emprega cerca de 1,400 pessoas e apurou um EBITDA de USD 389.9mn e um lucro líquido de USD 217.9mn em 2014. A Proquímica deverá ter um volume de negócios de cerca de BRL 1bn (USD 255.2mn) e um EBITDA de BRL 180mn (USD 45.93mn) em 2015. A Compass Minerals produz sal para degelo em rodovias, sal convencional e sulfato de potássio na América do Norte e no Reino Unido. A empresa vende a sua produção principalmente para o estado, as províncias, os município, e os departamentos de rodovias municipais. A empresa teve um faturamento de USD 1.28bn e um lucro líquido de USD 218mn em 2014.
114255 17/12/2015 俄罗斯 Sobol-Aqua 收购 Aqualife 俄罗斯 PepsiCo Inc 软饮料及食用冰制造 (31211) 19.6 (市场估计) 100 Moscow-based soft drinks manufacturer Aqualife has acquired Sobol Aqua, a Novosibirsk-based plant for production of bottled water and soft drinks from U.S. counterpart PepsiCo, Vedomosti daily reported, citing representatives of the buyer and the seller. The transaction was concluded on 1 December 2015. The deal value was not disclosed. The market estimate of the asset, as cited by the daily, is RUB 1.3bn (USD 19.6mn). PepsiCo's divestment is reportedly connected with optimization of the company's production capacities. PepsiCo's products under brands such as Pepsi, 7UP, Mirinda and Aqua Minerale will continue to be produced at Sobol Aqua under a co-packaging contract. The plant will also manufacture drinks under the buyer's brands - Napitki iz Chernogolovki and Aqualife. The new investor is set to inject funds in modernization and installation of additional production lines at Sobol Aqua so that the output capacity raises twice up to 100 million litres per year. At present, Aqualife occupies 4th place among the largest producers of lemonade with a 5% market share. The company aims to raise this figure to 10%. Other popular products of the company are mineral water and drinking water enriched with iodine.
114272 17/12/2015 斯洛伐克 Sberbank Slovensko as 收购 Penta Investments sro 捷克共和国 Sberbank 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 99.5 Czech-Slovak investment firm Penta Investments announced that it has signed an agreement to acquire a 99.5% stake in Sberbank Slovensko, Slovak unit of Russian lender Sberbank. Financial details of the deal were not disclosed. The seller acted through its Austrian subsidiary Sberbank Europe AG. The deal is subject to approval by Slovak competition regulator and the European Central Bank. Sberbank Slovensko has 665 employees and a balance sheet total of EUR 1.86bn as of Q3 2015. Penta Investments, established in 1994, is a CEE-focused investment firm active in healthcare, financial services, retail, manufacturing and real estate. It operates in more than 10 markets across Europe, providing more than 35,000 jobs through investee companies. The company has six offices in Prague, Bratislava, Warsaw, Limassol, Amsterdam and Munich. Penta owns assets of EUR 6.7bn. Sberbank is the largest lender in Russia with around 30% market share in terms of total assets. The bank has more than 135 million individual customers and one million corporate clients in 22 countries. It has the largest distribution network in Russia with almost 17,000 branches, and its international operations include UK, US, CIS, Central and Eastern Europe, Turkey and other countries.

Lockton acted through its Brazilian subsidiary Lockton Brasil Corretora de Seguros. The acquisition is aligned with the buyer's strategy to strengthen its expertise in the Brazilian market, said Mr. Tony Gusmao, CEO of Lockton Brasil. The U.S. company will incorporate VIS' operations in Brazil and its team of 27 employees by early January 2016. VIS operates as a consulting, insurance brokerage, and benefits advisor. It offers risk consulting support to corporate customers in al related aspects of their business. The company's service portfolio comprises health, life, travel, tension, dental, civil liability, financial products, automotive fleet, transport and other insurances. In addition, VIS operates a platform for online sales directed to small and medium enterprises. Lockton, founded in 1966 in Kansas City (Missouri state, U.S.), provides risk management, insurance, employee benefits consulting, and retirement services. The company has more than 48,000 customers and a team of 5,600 employees. Lockton was recognised by Best Companies Group and Business Insurance magazine as "Best Places to Work in Insurance" for the seventh consecutive year. ____________________________________________________________________________________________ A empresa norte-americana de seguros e resseguros Lockton Companies International Ltd anunciou a aquisição da homóloga brasileira VIS Corretora de Seguros e Benefícios Ltda, por um valor não revelado. A Lockton agiu por meio de sua subsidiária brasileira Lockton Brasil Corretora de Seguros. A aquisição está em linha com a estratégia da compradora de reforçar a sua parícia no mercado brasileiro, disse o Tony Gusmão, diretor executivo da Lockton Brasil. A empresa norte-americana vai incorporar as operações da VIS no Brasil e a sua equipe de 27 colaboradores até o início de janeiro de 2016. A VIS opera como uma empresa de consultoria e assessoria sobre corretagem de seguros e benefícios. A companhia oferece serviços de consultoria de risco para clientes corporativos sobre todos os aspectos relacionados com os seus negócios. O portfólio de serviços da empresa engloba Seguros Patrimoniais, Planos de Saúde, Seguro de Vida, Viagem, Previdência, Odonto, Responsabilidade Civil, Produtos Financeiros, Automóvel Frota, Transportes, entre outros. A VIS ainda opera uma plataforma de vendas online direcionada as pequenas e médias empresas. A Lockton, fundada em 1966, em Kansas City (estado de Missouri, EUA), oferece serviços de gestão de riscos, seguros, consultoria de benefícios para os funcionários e previdência. A empresa tem mais de 48,000 clientes e uma equipe de 5,600 colaboradores. A Lockton foi reconhecida pelo Best Companies Group e pela revista Business Insurance como a "Melhores Empresas para Trabalhar na Área dos Seguros" pelo sétimo ano consecutivo.
114248 17/12/2015 俄罗斯 Yamal LNG 合资企业 Silk Road Fund Co Ltd 中国 Novatek 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 1,209.80 (官方数据) 9.9 UPDATE: On 15 March 2016, Novatek announced the closing of the transaction to sell a 9.9% equity stake in the Yamal LNG project to China’s Silk Road Fund for a consideration of EUR 1.087bn (USD 1.2bn). ORIGINAL: Russian natural gas producer Novatek has signed a binding definitive agreement on the sale of a 9.9% stake in Yamal LNG project to China's Silk Road Fund (SRF), Novatek and SRF announced separately. The deal value will be kept confidential at the request of the investor. The deal completion is expected after certain amendments to the intergovernmental agreement between Russia and China come into force. After the closing of the transaction, the project's shareholder structure will include Novatek (50.1%), Total (20%), CNPC (20%) and SRF (9.9%). In addition, the deal parties inked an agreement which stipulates that SRF will disburse a 15-year loan to Novatek worth some EUR 730mn (USD 911mn) for financing the project. Management board chairman of Novatek, Leonid Mikhelson, was quoted as saying that the deal will enable the achievement of the desired target shareholder structure and will facilitate the project's planned financing and implementation. The Yamal LNG project includes the construction of production, storage and loading facilities for liquefied natural gas (LNG) based on the resources of the South-Tambeyskoye field. The plant will have annual output capacity of 16.5 million tons per annum. According to the PRMS reserve standards, the proven and probable reserves of the South-Tambeyskoye field as of 31 December 2014 were estimated at 926 billion cubic meters of natural gas. The launch of the plant is projected for 2017. The venture includes also the construction of a transport infrastructure (including sea-port and airport located at Sabetta ) for the shipment of LNG. The total estimated cost of the project is USD 27bn. Silk Road Funds was established in December 2014 to make medium- to long-term outbound investments. The fund's total capital is USD 40bn and it's dedicated to supporting infrastructure, resources and energy development, industrial capacity and financial co-operation.
114235 17/12/2015 中国 Jiangsu Changshun Xinhe New Energy Co Ltd 收购 Chongqing Future Investment Co Ltd 中国 Shunfeng International Clean Energy Ltd 太阳能发电 (221114) 185.41 (官方数据) 100 Chinese clean energy solutions provider Shunfeng International Clean Energy disclosed it will sell its photovoltaic energy subsidiary Jiangsu Changshun Xinhe New Energy to Chongqing Future Investment for RMB 1.2bn (USD 185.4mn). The seller acts in the deal via its subsidiary Jiangxi Shunfeng Photovoltaic Investment Co. Ltd. Completion of the deal is subject to certain conditions precedent. The disposal is in line with seller's strategy to focus on development of solar projects, and selling them after their completion. Jiangsu Changshun Xinhe New Energy focuses on construction, development and operation of different photovoltaic projects and power plants in China. Chongqing Future Investment engages in industrial investment, equity investment, market development and investment, operation and management of assets.

The investment will help UploadVR to retain full control over the content on the website for VR news, and will continue to operate with a high standard for editorial ethics, Will Mason, founder of the target, was quoted as saying. Taylor Freeman, founder and CEO of UploadVR, said that the company wants to help the virtual reality (VR) industry move forward and showcase its most inspiring work. UploadVR is dedicated to accelerating the success of the virtual reality industry through inspiring community experiences. The company is connecting the community of VR pioneers to one another through unforgettable and unique experiences and events, all in an effort to inspire people to spread the magic of virtual reality. Shanda Group started out as an online game company called Shanda Interactive in 1999. The company later spun off the gaming business and became an investment group with a long-term investment horizon across public markets of equity, fixed income and commodities, private equity and real estate. The group focuses on value investment opportunities in the financial services, technology and health care services sectors. Shanda Group is headquartered in Singapore with offices in Shanghai, Beijing, Hong Kong, Canada, Japan and the U.S., and currently, the total net asset value of Shanda stands at approx. USD 8.0bn.

Financial terms of the deal were not disclosed. Through the acquisition, New Frontier Group will further expand its foothold, and increase its Microsoft Dynamics capabilities. NPS d.o.o., founded in 2003, provides ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) software solutions through the implementation, modification and upgrading of business solutions from Microsoft Dynamics family (AX, NAV and NAV Express). The ERP system is a business-management software which facilitates the integration of all data within an organization into a single platform. The company has over 30 employees. New Frontier Group offers IT solutions, services and products in Central and Eastern Europe and beyond. The company's software solutions serve companies operating in banking, insurance, telecom, retail, transportation, and energy, as well as the public sector. The group has subsidiaries in 15 countries worldwide.

Ongair is the only IM aggregator worldwide offering Whatsapp, Messenger, WeChat and Telegram integration, with plans to add more instant messaging platforms. In 2012, Keangnam Enterprises borrowed around USD 510mn to build Landmark 72. The loans of Keangnam are currently held by a project financing creditor group which includes five commercial banks and 10 savings banks. Keangnam Hanoi Landmark Tower is located on Pham Hung Boulevard in the city of Hanoi and consists of one 72-story office tower and two 48-storey residence towers. AON Holdings is a mid-sized financial group and its subsidiaries include AON Investment and Turbo Engineering among other. Coomeva, through the companies within its organization, offers healthcare services and related insurance products. Currently, the group has assets of about USD 2.6bn.
114679 16/12/2015 中国; 象牙海岸; 马达加斯加; 尼日利亚; 塞内加尔; 突尼斯; 法国; 马里 MicroCred Holdings 少数股权购买 Apis Partners LLP 英国 　 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522); 企业管理服务 (55) 　 　 British private equity asset manager Apis Partners announced that it has agreed to acquire a significant minority stake in Africa and China-focused microfinance group MicroCred Holdings. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. The transaction is expected to be completed by the end of 2015. "Only 50% of the global adult population has access to the formal financial sector, and this figure drops to 24% in Sub-Saharan Africa. However, demand for affordable, high-quality financial services is increasing as incomes rise steadily in global growth markets and financial institutions adopt innovative business models to serve them profitably," said Apis co-founder and managing partner Matteo Stefanel. MicroCred was established in 2005 and it offers credit products, savings accounts, and access to electronic payments methods such as cards and ATMs to micro, small and medium-sized enterprises in seven countries in Africa and Asia. The company currently has over 325,000 clients in Madagascar, Senegal, Nigeria, Ivory Coast, Mali, Tunisia and China. As of June 2015, MicroCred's loan portfolio stood at over USD 300mn. Apis Partners is a private equity asset manager focused on supporting growth stage financial services companies in Africa and Asia by providing catalytic, growth equity capital. The firm has a core team of 12 investment professionals and over 20 additional financial services sub-sector experts. Apis Partners is the manager of Apis Growth Fund I.
114640 16/12/2015 智利 Emilio Saray y Cia Ltda (DPS Chile) 收购 Bunzl Plc 英国 　 纸制品的批发 (4221); 化工产品的批发 (4226) 　 　 100 U.K.-based distributor of non-food consumable products Bunzl Plc announced it has acquired Chilean catering disposables distributor Emilio Saray y Cia Ltda, doing business as DPS Chile. Financial terms were not disclosed. Bunzl said that the acquisition of DPS Chile expands the company's operations in the foodservice and cleaning and hygiene sectors. Emilio Saray y Cia distributes catering disposables, cleaning, safety and packaging products. The company mainly serves wholesalers, distributors, restaurants as well as supermarkets, and is expected to generate revenues of CLP 25.4bn (USD 35.7mn) for 2015. Bunzl is a multinational distribution and outsourcing group, focused on supply of foodservice, cleaning, safety, non-food retail, and healthcare products. The company reported sales revenues of GBP 6.2bn (USD 9.4bn) and net income of GBP 210mn (USD 317mn) for 2014.
114392 16/12/2015 以色列 MelCap Systems 少数股权购买 Roman Abramovich - private investor 俄罗斯 　 其他制造业 (339) 2 (官方数据) 　 Russian tycoon Roman Abramovich has invested USD 2mn in Israeli medical start-up MelCap Systems, globes.co.il reported. MelCap Systems has designed an electronic capsule which treats obesity and gastrointestinal diseases. Once positioned in the gastrointestinal tract, the capsule broadcasts signals that stimulate the feeling of satiety. The capsule is wirelessly controlled from outside. The current investment of Abramovich follows a series of several other ones he’s made in Israeli companies since the beginning of 2015 (Kidoz, StoreDot, AnyClip Media Ltd, Safer Place, Mobilibuy, etc.).
114341 16/12/2015 罗马尼亚 Bucharest West Industrial Park 收购 CTP Invest spol sro 捷克共和国 Portland Trust sro 仓储 (493) 65.92 (官方数据) 100 Czech industrial real estate company CTP Invest announced it has acquired Romanian logistics park Bucharest West Industrial Park from Czech real estate developer Portland Trust for an undisclosed amount. According to Romanian business portal profit.ro, based on its market data, the deal value could be worth EUR 60mn. The logistics park has already been renamed CTPark Bucharest. The acquisition is the fifth deal in Romania in 2015 and CTP self-disclosed it becomes the largest industrial developer on the Romanian market. In less than a year, the group CTP bought 350,000 m2 of logistics space, representing a 20% of the local market. In Romania, CTP's acquisitions worth over EUR 150mn and include: Deva Logistics Park (renamed CTPark Deva); Cefin Logistics Park (renamed CTPark Arad); Mercury Logistics Park in Bucharest; and ProLogis Park Bucharest A1 (renamed CTPark Bucharest West); in addition to 20 ha land near the Bucharest West Park, and 15 ha land near Sibiu's western industrial area. The deal is in line with CTP's commitment to grow its industrial properties portfolio to 5 million m2 by the end of 2018. The acquired industrial park has a total lettable area of 130,000 m2 with an additional 11 ha available for development. The property is rented to DSV, Iron Mountain, Equest Logistics and Welde Romania. CTP, founded in 1998, is a real estate developer and property manager focused on markets in Central Eastern Europe. The company's portfolio consists of premium industrial, office, retail and mixed-use properties with 3 million m2 of leasable space. CTP employs over 140 people. Portland Trust has been active on the Romanian market since 1999 and it has developed some 260,000 m2 of office space in Bucharest, including Opera Center, Bucharest Business Park, Floreasca 169A and Floreasca Park. The company is controlled by British businessman Robert Neale. Earlier in August 2015, Portland also announced the sale of an office building in Floreasca Park in Bucharest to German real estate investment firm GLL Real Estate Partners for an estimated deal value of EUR 80mn.

The capital raised will be utilised to expand their services, locally and internationally as well as to hire new talent. Blubirch is an IT equipment reverse logistics firm which refurbishes, rents and re sells used IT assets to consumers enterprises and retailers. The firm claims to have more than 3,000 partners internationally. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangalore. Chicago Venture Partners is a venture capital firm focused on technology, consumer and media firms. It primarily invests in Chicago and the central U.S region.

The round saw the participation of Vertex Venture Holdings, Qualcomm, ru-Net Holdings and existing investor Matrix Venture Partners. The capital received will be used to scale-up its marketing activities, expand product category and its footprint. Sarvaloka Services On Call operates HouseJoy, a web and mobile-based home services aggregator that offers electrical, plumbing computer repair, laundry, carpentry and fitness services from certified professionals. It has 10,000 service providers catering to 4,000 job orders daily. Amazon.com is a U.S.-based online retail major which offers products from various categories including electronics, books, apparel and games. The firm reported consolidated total net revenues of USD 89bn for FY ended 31 December 2014.
114252 16/12/2015 土耳其 DYO Matbaa Murekkepleri 收购 Toyo Ink Group 日本 Yasar Holding 其他化学产品及制备制造业 (3259) 　 　 75 Japan's Toyo Ink Group said it will acquire 75% of Turkish printing ink manufacturer DYO Matbaa Murekkepleri from local industrial group Yasar Holding. No financial details were disclosed. The transaction is expected to close in January 2016. Upon its completion, Yasar Holding will keep a 25% stake in DYO Matbaa. The acquisition is in line with Toyo Ink Group's growth strategy, under which it has been focusing on Turkey as a platform for building a business hub. The deal will enable the group to strengthen its sales network in its priority areas of MENA, Central Asia and Eastern Europe. DYO Matbaa manufactures gravure inks, flexo inks, offset inks, can coatings and ink-related products. It is based in Manisa, western Turkey, and is the leading market player in its segment. The company reported revenues of TRY 126.7mn (USD 57.9mn) for 2014. Tokyo Stock Exchange-listed Toyo Ink Group operates in four main segments, including Colorants & Functional Materials Related Business, Polymers & Coatings Related Business, Printing & Information Related Business, and Packaging Materials Related Business. The group comprises 70 companies in 23 countries and has around 7,900 employees. Yasar Holding is mainly engaged in food & beverage products and paint & paint chemicals industries.
114234 16/12/2015 阿根廷; 巴西; 智利; 哥伦比亚; 哥斯达黎加; 墨西哥; 美国 EDF Communications 收购 LLORENTE & CUENCA Madrid SL 西班牙 　 管理咨询服务 (54161); 其他管理咨询服务 (541618) 　 70 Spanish management consulting services provider LLORENTE & CUENCA Madrid SL announced it has agreed to purchase 70% of Latin America focused counterpart EDF Communications. Financial terms were not disclosed. Through the present agreement, LLORENTE & CUENCA will integrate EDF's business and employees into its operations in Miami (U.S.), Mexico, Colombia, Argentina, Chile, Brazil and Costa Rica. The company will broaden its service and client portfolios, and reach 11 locations in Latin America. In addition, the firm will strengthen five specific business areas: international present in the U.S., U.S.-based companies focused on Latin America, corporate meetings taking place in Miami, M&A operations and regional business litigations. Mr. Jose Llorente, CEO of LLORENTE & CUENCA, said that his firm has developed good synergies with EDF during their long-lasting partnership for over a decade. According to Mr. Erich de la Fuente, founder of EDF Communications, the integration will enable the company to offer greater benefits to its customers, given its enlarged operations. This is the second acquisition that the Spanish firm is making in Latin America this year. On 18 November 2015, the company announced the acquisition of the 70% of the issued share capital of Brazilian public relations agency SA Comunicacao. EDF, established in 2001 and headquartered in Miami, provides strategic communications and public affairs consulting services to corporations in the U.S., Latin America, Africa, Eastern Europe, Eurasia and the Middle East. The company also has operations in Washington, D.C., New York, Sao Paulo (Brazil), Bogota (Colombia), Buenos Aires (Argentina), Mexico City (Mexico), Santiago (Chile), Central America and Kiev (Ukraine). LLORENTE & CUENCA provides corporate and financial communications services in Spain, Portugal, the U.S., and Latin America. In Latin America the company is present in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Mexico, Panama, Peru and in other countries. LLORENTE & CUENCA reported sales revenues of EUR 23.6mn (USD 26.3mn) for 2014.

Financial terms of the transaction were not disclosed. The buyer acted via its subsidiary ISON Technologies. 114232 16/12/2015 巴西; 智利; 澳大利亚 Pacific Hydro Pty Ltd 收购 State Power Investment Corp 中国 IFM Investors Pty Ltd 水电发电 (221111); 风力发电 (221115) 3,000.00 (市场估计) 100 China's State Power Investment Corp (SPIC) has won the auction to acquire 100% of Australian renewable energy generator Pacific Hydro from local pension fund IFM for an estimated enterprise value of USD 3bn, The Australian Financial Review (AFR) reported. The deal is expected to complete in January 2016. SPIC won over rival bidders Pacific Equity Partners, Morgan Stanley Infrastructure Fund, China's Huadian Corporation, ENGIE, Gas Naturale, TransAlta and Marubeni Corporation, according to AFR. Wang Binghua, the chairman of SPIC, said that the acquisition will be a part of the company's high quality global renewable development platform. IFM had announced intentions to sell Pacific Hydro since early 2015, after first writing down the value of the business by some USD 685mn in 2014 due to uncertainties in the renewable energy sector. Founded in 1992, Pacific Hydro is mainly engaged in wind and hydroelectric energy generation, and also solar and geothermal energy. As of end-2013, the company had 919.8 MW of generating assets in Australia, Chile and Brazil, in addition to other wind projects under development. Pacific Hydro expects to book EBITDA of USD 175mn in 2015, with 52% of earnings coming from Chile, 41% from Australia and 7% from Brazil, according to AFR. State Power Investment Corp (SPIC) is a Chinese state-owned enterprise with significant interests across all energy classes. SPIC is the result of the merger of China Power Investment Corporation and State Nuclear Power Technology Corporation in early 2015. It has total installed capacity of 96,680MW and assets worth CNY 722.3bn (USD 111.8bn). Founded in 2004, IFM Investors Pty is an Australian pension fund focused on the infrastructure sector. It originally invested in Pacific Hydro in 2002. Note: The deal value is assumed to equal the estimated enterprise value of USD 3bn.
114219 16/12/2015 南非 Block 2B offshore South Africa 收购 Africa Energy Corp 加拿大 Afren Plc; Crown Energy AB; Undisclosed sellers 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 4.16 (官方数据) 90 Africa-focused oil and gas company Africa Energy announced that it has agreed to acquire a 90% working interest and operatorship in Block 2B offshore South Africa. Under the deal, Africa Energy will get a 25% interest in Block 2B from British peer Afren for USD 1mn, as well as a 30.5% interest from Swedish sector player Crown Energy AB in exchange for the reimbursement of USD 0.3mn of net back costs and funding of costs for the latter's remaining 10% interest associated with the drilling and testing of the next well in the block. Also, Africa Energy will acquire Thombo Petroleum, which holds a 34.5% interest in Block 2B, for a cash consideration of USD 2mn plus the issuance of 14.8 million shares. Africa Energy will issue up to an additional 20 million shares and pay and/or issue up to USD 1.5mn in additional contingent cash and/or shares, both payable on milestones associated with the commercialisation of Block 2B. "I am hopeful this will be the first of a number of acquisitions to grow Africa Energy. I believe that an exploration driven strategy in Africa will deliver value to our shareholders as the world oil markets recover and that we have the technical team and access to capital from our supportive shareholders to deliver on this strategy," said Africa Energy CEO James Phillips. Block 2B is an under explored, shallow water area off the west coast of South Africa which contains a proven hydrocarbon-bearing rift basin. According to Africa Energy, the block contains numerous prospects identified recently by 3D seismic and limited work is now required to recommence drilling activities. Africa Energy is an international oil and gas exploration and development company based in Canada. The firm is is listed on the the TSX Venture Exchange and it had a market capitalisation of CAD 10.l4mn (USD 7.57mn).

Blackstone will buy out current shareholder General Atlantic LLC and other unnamed investors. General Atlantic originally bought its stake in the target in 2007 for USD 60mn. According to The Economic Times, Blackstone will hold around 35% stake after the transaction. The transaction is subject to customary regulatory approvals and is expected to close within one month. IBS Software is an India-based international transportation software developer, which focuses on passenger and cargo aviation, passenger shipping, and oil and gas logistics. IBS has 3,000 employees in across 9 offices globally, serving over 170 enterprises including airports, cruise lines, hotels and oil and gas companies. The company had sales revenue of INR 3.5bn (USD 57.2mn) in FY 2014. Blackstone Group is a global U.S.-based asset manager and financial advisory firm that focuses on private equity, alternative assets and real estate. It manages more than USD 330bn worth of assets across Asia, Europe and North America.

The company develops ideas in the entrepreneurial environment.

Financial terms were not disclosed. The sale is aligned with Pitney's strategy of converting to a dealer model in Mexico, South Africa and five other emerging markets in Asia. Pitney Bowes de Mexico imports, distributes and sells postage software, systems and equipment for correspondence automation and information management. Appliance Technologies Mexico specializes in the analysis of data and big data. Adven Group offers tailored corporate energy solutions and district heating in Finland, Sweden and Estonia. The company employs 215 people and posted EBITDA of EUR 30mn (USD 32.7mn) in 2014. Infracapital invests in infrastructure sectors including the utilities, transport, renewables and social infrastructure sectors. The company is a subsidiary of M&G Investment Management and has over GBP 2.4bn (EUR 3.1bn) of funds under management. Prudential, established in 1848, is an international financial services group which operates within four business lines: health and protection insurance products (Prudential Corporation Asia), retirement products (Jackson National Life Insurance Co), life insurance and pension products (Prudential UK), and asset management (M&G). The group is present in Europe, North America, South America, and Asia, and employs some 48,000 people. Prudential is listed on the London, New York and Hong Kong stock exchanges. AMP, founded in 1849, is an independent wealth management company with the largest financial advice network in Australia and New Zealand, having 4,441 aligned and employed financial advisers and planners. AMP's wholesale superannuation business provides superannuation and insurance services to more than 50,000 companies and 500,000 members in Australia. AMP has around 835,000 shareholders and AUD 156.1bn (EUR 107.9bn) in assets under management as of 30 June 2015. EQT is a private equity group with EUR 29bn in raised capital. It has portfolio companies in Europe, Asia and the US with total sales of more than EUR 17bn and some 140,000 employees.

Cote d'Ivoire is the third largest economy in West Africa in terms of GDP and belongs to Sub-Saharan Africa's fastest growing economies with a 2014 GDP growth rate of 8.5% and estimated 7.9% GDP growth for 2015," said Duet Group CEO Henry Gabay. It is also the exclusive owner of the Tampico fruit juice license in Ivory Coast, Burkina Faso, Togo, Benin and Guinea. Duet Group is a global alternative asset management firm co-founded by Henry Gabay and Alain Schibl in 2002. Financial terms were not disclosed. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals and is expected to close around February 2016. Komatsu added that it considers Mexico an important market for its construction and mining equipment business and therefore focuses its efforts on further growing its presence in the country. Road Machinery offers repair and maintenance services for mining and construction equipment. Komatsu is an international provider of construction and mining equipment, utilities, forest machines and industrial machinery. The company reported sales revenues of JPY 1.98tn (USD 16.4bn) and a net income of JPY 154bn (USD 1.27bn) for FY ended 31 March 2014. Mitsui & Co's core activities focus on production, processing and trade of natural resources, infrastructure (energy and rail transportation) and logistics, food manufacturing and others. It reported total revenues of JPY 5.4tn (USD 45bn) and a net income of JPY 306.5bn (USD 2.6bn) for FY ended 31 March 2015.
