Financial details were not disclosed. However, according to Ziarul Financiar the deal value could be worth between EUR 70-80mn. The sold stake is currently held by Tiriac's company Zareba Holdings Ltd., registered in Cyprus. Following the deal, Metro AG will hold 100% of Metro Cash & Carry Romania S.R.L. The deal is part of an option agreement signed in 2009 between the target's minority shareholders and the German group. German Metro supermarket chain has entered the Romanian market in 1996 through a partnership with Ion Tiriac. Currently the retailer has more than 4,500 employees in 31 cash and carry stores across Romania, and reported a turnover of EUR 892mn for FY ended 30 September 2015. Metro AG is an international wholesaler that owns and operates department stores, hypermarkets, consumer electronics stores and grocery stores. It has around 230,000 employees worldwide and its sales amounted to EUR 59.22bn for FY ended 30 September 2015. In Romania, the Metro group still operates four Real hypermarkets, after in 2012 the German group sold local network of 20 Real stores to France's counterpart Auchan. Metro also owns the network of convenience stores "La Doi Pasi" opened in franchise. Ion Tiriac, one of the richest Romanian businessmen, owns Tiriac Holdings, a conglomerate of automotive, real estate, air transport and energy companies. He also holds minority stakes in local insurance company Allianz-Tiriac Asigurari. Earlier, in June 2015, the businessman has sold 45% stake in Romanian lender UniCredit Tiriac Bank SA to UniCredit Bank Austria AG, in an estimated deal worth EUR 700mn. Following the deal, the local bank has changed its name to UniCredit Bank.
114254 15/12/2015 保加利亚 Anubis-Bulvest 少数股权购买 Ernst Klett 德国 Bulgarian private investor(s) 图书、期刊和音像店 (4512) 　 　 　 German publisher Ernst Klett AG will acquire an additional stake in Bulgarian publishing group Anubis-Bulves for an undisclosed price, Capital Daily reported. The transaction is subject to approval by the Bulgarian competition authority. Ernst Klett acquired 16% of Anubis-Bulves in 2013 in an equity swap deal in which the founders of the Bulgarian group acquired 20% of the local subsidiaries of Ernst Klett. Upon completion of the current transaction Ernst Klett will still have a minority stake in Anubis-Bulves. Anubis-Bulves group comprises textbook publishers Anubis and Bulvest 2000 as well as book distributor Anubis-Bulves. Anubis reported turnover of BGN 4.2mn (EUR 2.1mn), Bulvest 2000 posted revenues of BGN 9.4mn (EUR 4.8mn) and distributor Anubis-Bulves had sales of BGN 18mn (EUR 9.2mn) in 2014. The group's main competitor in the segment is local publisher Prosveta. Ernst Klett is active in textbook, dictionary and novel publishing, seminar-houses and distance learning schools. It is present in Bulgaria also through its two units involved in teaching materials for foreign language learning and professional literature.
114165 15/12/2015 巴西 Two sugar and alcohol plants of Antonio Ruette Agroindustrial in Sao Paulo 收购 Cargill Inc 美国 Antonio Ruette Agroindustrial Ltda 制糖及糖果制造 (3113); 基础化学原料制造 (3251) 174.97 (市场估计) 100 UPDATE 2: On 4 January 2015, Cargill announced the completion of the transaction. UPDATE 1: On 11 December 2015, the Brazilian Antitrust Authority CADE approved the transaction without restrictions. ORIGINAL: U.S. food and agricultural products trading group Cargill Inc has agreed to purchase two sugar and alcohol plants (Sao Paulo state, Brazil) of Brazilian bioethanol and sugar producer Antonio Ruette Agroindustrial Ltda (Ruette) for approximately BRL 680mn (USD 175mn), Brazilian media sources reported. Cargill acted through its asset management arm Black River Asset Management LLC, that in turn acted through its investment fund Black River Agriculture Fund 2 LP. From the total deal value, BRL 530mn (USD 136.4mn) will be used to cover the plants' net debt, while the remaining BRL 150mn (USD 38.6mn) will be invested in the operation. On 14 December 2015, the Brazilian Antitrust Authority CADE approved the transaction without restrictions. The transaction is still subject to signing a debt rescheduling agreement with creditors and is expected to close before the end of 2015. The two sugar and alcohol plants are located in the state of Sao paulo and have a combined processing capacity of 3.7 million tonnes of sugarcane per year. Cargill, established in 1985, is an international producer and marketer of food, agricultural, financial and industrial products and services. The company is present in 68 countries and employs over 155,000 employees. Cargill's sugar trading business specialises in the origination, marketing and sale of white sugar and ethanol. The division operates a bulk sugar export terminal in the port of Santos, Sao Paulo state, and offices in Geneva, Hong Kong, Sao Paulo, Miami, Delhi, Moscow, Shanghai, Jakarta, Bangkok and Dubai. Ruette, established in 1988, owns and operates sugar and ethanol mills. The company develops sugarcane varieties adaptable to different environments and resistant to the most common diseases of the crop. ______________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE 2: Em 4 janeiro de 2015, a Cargill anunciou o fechamento do negócio. UPDATE 1: Em 11 de dezembro de 2015, o Conselho Administrativo de Defesa Econômica (CADE) aprovou a transação sem restrições. ORIGINAL: A trading norte-americana de alimentos e produtos agrícolas Cargill Inc entrou em um acordo para comprar duas usinas sucroalcooleiras (SP, Brasil) da produtora brasileira de bioetanol e açúcar António Ruette Agroindustrial Ltda (Ruette), por aproximadamente BRL 680mn (USD 175mn), fontes da mídia brasileira relataram. A Cargill agiu através do seu braço de gestão de ativos Black River Asset Management LLC, que, por sua vez agiu através do seu fundo de investimento Black River Agriculture Fund 2 LP. Do valor total do negócio, BRL 530mn (USD 136.4mn) vão ser usados para cobrir a dívida líquida das usinas, enquanto o valor remanescente de BRL 150mn (USD 38.6mn) vai ser investido na operação. Em 14 de dezembro de 2015, o Conselho Administrativo de Defesa Econômica (CADE) aprovou a operação sem restrições. A transação ainda está sujeita as assinatura de um acordo de repactuação da dívida com os credores e deverá ser concluído antes do final de 2015. As duas usinas de açúcar e álcool estão localizadas no estado de São Paulo e tem uma capacidade de processamento combinada de 3.7 milhões de toneladas de cana por ano. A Cargill, fundada em 1985, é uma produtora e comercializadora internacional de alimentos, produtos e serviços agrícolas, financeiros e industriais. A empresa está presente em 68 países e emprega mais de 155,000 funcionários. A divisão de comercialização de açúcar da Cargill é especializada na originação, comercialização e venda de açúcar branco e etanol. A divisão opera o Terminal de Exportação de Açúcar do Guarujá no Porto de Santos, Estado de São Paulo, e escritórios em Genebra, Hong Kong, São Paulo, Miami, Delhi, Moscou, Xangai, Jacarta, Bangkok e Dubai. A Ruette, estabelecida em 1988, detém e opera usinas de açúcar e etanol. A empresa desenvolve novas variedades de cana adaptáveis a diferentes ambientes e resistentes as principais doenças da cultura.
114196 15/12/2015 巴西 Grupo Ibmec Educacional SA 收购 DeVry Education Group Inc 美国 　 教育服务业 (61) 173.39 (官方数据) 96.4 UPDATE: On 22 December 2015, the target's legal advisor disclosed to DealWatch that the transaction was completed. ORIGINAL: U.S. educational services provider DeVry Education Group announced it has agreed to purchase a 96.4% stake in Brazilian counterpart Grupo Ibmec Educacional SA for BRL 673.84 (USD 173.4mn), subject to certain closing adjustments. DeVry acted through its Brazilian subsidiary DeVry Educacional do Brasil SA. Mr. Daniel Hamburger, president and CEO of DeVry Education Group, said that the company is focusing on long-term opportunities in the Brazilian private higher education. He added that he considers Ibmec to be an excellent strategic fit with strong growth potential that will increase the company's presence in Rio de Janeiro, Brasilia and Belo Horizonte. DeVry's expansion plan includes promoting Ibmec's educational programmes through the DeVry Brasil network, establishing its institutional presence to new campuses and developing corporate education. Furthermore, both educational companies will benefit from the exchange of academic best practices, infrastructure and technology, access to virtual libraries and research databases, English-language courses and exchange programs. Ibmec, founded in 1970, operates private colleges and universities that offer programmes in the areas of business, law and engineering. The institution offers graduate, post graduate and master programmes, as well as distance learning. DeVry, established in 1931, is a global provider of educational services and the parent organization of American University of the Caribbean School of Medicine, Becker Professional Education, Carrington College, Chamberlain College of Nursing, DeVry Brasil, DeVry University, Ross University School of Medicine and Ross University School of Veterinary Medicine. With a team of 9,500 employees, the company offers undergraduate and graduate programmes in business, healthcare, technology, accounting and finance to more than 110,000 students in 55 countries. DeVry is listed on the New York Stock Exchange, and posted USD 1.9bn in revenues and a net income of USD 140mn for the FY ended on 30 June 2015. Note: The deal value is assumed to equal to the estimated enterprise value of BRL 673.84mn (USD 173.4mn). _____________________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE: Em 22 de dezembro de 2015, o assessor jurídico da empresa-alvo revelou para o DealWatch que a transação foi concluída. ORIGINAL: A provedora norte-americana de serviços educacionais DeVry Education Group Inc anunciou a aquisição de 96.4% do capital social da empresa educacional brasileira Grupo Ibmec Educacional SA, por um valor de BRL 673.84 (USD 173.4mn), sujeito a certos ajustes de fechamento. A DeVry agiu por meio da sua subsidiária brasileira DeVry Educacional do Brasil SA. O Sr. Daniel Hamburger, presidente e CEO da DeVry Education Group, disse que a sua empresa estava concentrada em oportunidades de longo prazo na educação brasileira superior privada. Ele acrescentou que considerava a Ibmec um excelente complemento estratégico com forte potencial de crescimento que ia aumentar a presença da empresa no Rio de Janeiro, Brasília e Belo Horizonte. O plano de expansão da DeVry inclui a promoção de programas educacionais da Ibmec através da rede DeVry Brasil, expansão da sua presença institucional para novos campi e desenvolvimento da educação corporativa. Para além disso, ambas as empresas vão beneficiar do partilhamento de boas práticas acadêmica, infra-estrutura e tecnologia, acesso a bibliotecas virtuais e bancos de dados, cursos de língua inglesa e programas de intercâmbio. A Ibmec, fundada em 1970, opera universidades que oferecem programas nas áreas de administração, direito e engenharia. A instituição oferece cursos de graduação, pós-graduação e mestrado, e ainda ensino a distância. A DeVry, fundada em 1931, é uma provedora global de serviços educacionais e a organização-mãe da DeVry Brasil, DeVry University, Keller Graduate School of Management, Becker Professional Education, Carrington Colleges, Chamberlain School of Nursing, duas escolas médicas, Ross University School of Medicine e American University of Caribbean School of Medicine (AUC), e uma escola veterinária, Ross University School of Veterinary Medicine. Com uma equipe de 9,500 colaboradores, a empresa oferece programas de graduação e pós-graduação em administração, saúde, tecnologia, finanças e contabilidade para mais de 110,000 alunos em 55 países. A DeVry está listada na Bolsa de Valores de Nova Iorque, e apresentou um faturamento de USD 1.9bn e um lucro líquido de USD 140mn no exercício findo em 30 de junho de 2015. Note: O valor do negócio é considerado igual ao "enterprise value" de BRL 673.84mn (USD 173.4mn).
114233 15/12/2015 智利 Mas Cerca Contact Center SA 收购 Computer Generated Solutions Inc (CGS) 美国 　 办公支持服务 (5614) 　 　 　 U.S. outsourcing company Computer Generated Solutions (CGS) announced the acquisition of Chilean business process outsourcing (BPO) provider Mas Cerca Contact Center for an undisclosed amount. "We're excited to have Mas Cerca join CGS, continuing our BPO growth in Latin America. The addition of Mas Cerca's skilled staff will enable us to answer the global demand for Spanish-speaking agents and support our growth in a wide range of industries," said CGS CEO Phil Friedman. CGS said that the purchase will extend its capabilities in Chile to new industries, including telecommunications, retail and transportation. Mas Cerca was established in 2004 and is a call centre service provider with offices in the cities of Santiago and Valdivia. With the acquisition of the company, CGS' Chilean arm CGS Chile has established its sixth office and doubled its employee base in the region to 3,000. CGS Chile has thus established itself as the largest technical and BPO company in Chile. Computer Generated Solutions was founded in 1984 and is an applications, enterprise learning and business process outsourcing company based in the U.S. city of New York. The firm employs more than 5,200 professionals and serves some 3,500 customers with operations in 40 countries worldwide.
114225 15/12/2015 中国 Bona Film Group Ltd 收购 Alibaba Pictures Group Ltd; Uranus Connection Ltd; Willow Investment Ltd; SAIF Partners (China); All Gain Ventures Ltd; Dong Yu - Private investor; Mountain Tiger International Ltd; Sequoia Capital 香港; 中国; 美国 　 电影和录音 (512) 923.62 (官方数据) 100 China's largest film distributor Bona Film Group Ltd announced that it will be acquired by a Chinese consortium led by Mountain Tiger International Ltd in a going private transaction for an enterprise value of USD 1bn. The buyer consortium includes Uranus Connection Ltd, Alibaba Pictures Group Ltd, Fosun International Ltd, Willow Investment Ltd, All Gain Ventures Ltd, Sequoia Capital China I LP and Bona Film's chairman Dong Yu. The consortium will acquire all the target company's outstanding shares at USD 27.4 apiece, or USD 13.7 per ADS. Completion of the transaction is subject to regulatory approvals. The deal is expected to complete in Q2 2016. The target company has originally received its going private proposal on 12 June 2015. Bona Film Group Ltd produces and distributes films, provides film advertising services and operates movie theatres. The company is listed on the NASDAQ exchange and recorded revenues of USD 254.1mn in 2014. Alibaba Pictures Group Ltd provides film and television planning, production and distribution. The company is listed on the HKEX and recorded revenues of CNY 126.6mn (USD 20.6mn) in 2014. Willow Investment Ltd operates as an affiliate of Hong Kong-listed internet giant Tencent Holdings Ltd. Note: The Deal Value (consideration paid) was calculated using the target company's disclosed Enterprise Value (EV) and outstanding Net Debt of USD 77.67mn as of 30 September 2015.
114217 15/12/2015 瑞典 Visionsbolaget 10088 AB 收购 Mahindra Holidays & Resorts India Ltd 印度 　 住宿服务 (721) 1.03 (官方数据) 51 India-based Mahindra Holidays and Resorts India announced that it has acquired a 51% stake in Swedish hotel operator Visionsbolaget 10088 AB for a total consideration of SEK 9mn (USD 1mn). The acquisition will be done through the buyer’s Holiday Club Sweden AB subsidiary. The target is in the process of being renamed Holiday Club Sport and Spa Hotels AB. Visionsbolaget 10088 is a Swedish spa, restaurant and hotel operator. Mahindra Holidays and Resorts India is a leisure hospitality firm that offers vacation and holidays services through its resorts, hotels, and spas. The firm has over 183,000 club members and has 45 resorts locally and internationally. Mahindra Holidays and Resorts reported total consolidated net profit of INR 812.3mn (USD 13mn) for FY ended 31 March 2015.
114190 15/12/2015 土耳其 Akfen Yenilenebilir Enerji 少数股权购买 European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) 国际的 　 电力生产 (22111) 100 (官方数据) 20 The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) said it will acquire 20% of Akfen Yenilenebilir Enerji (AkfenRE), the renewable energy subsidiary of Turkey's Akfen Holding, for USD 100mn. The investment will help AkfenRE to triple the size of its renewable portfolio to over 500 MW and to become one of the largest producers of renewable energy in Turkey. AkfenRE has a portfolio of renewable projects, including operational hydro and solar power plants and several wind, solar and hydro projects under development, with a total operational capacity of 210 MW. EBRD started investing in Turkey in 2009 and currently operates from offices in Istanbul, Ankara and Gaziantep. To date, the bank has invested EUR 6.8bn in the country through 170 projects in infrastructure, energy, agribusiness, industry and finance. Akfen Holding's core businesses comprises seaport and airport operations and airport construction and other heavy construction. Its portfolio includes investments in water transportation, energy, real estate and water utility operations. It posted revenues of TRY 119.3mn (USD 54.5mn) for 2014. The company is listed on Borsa Istanbul.
114191 15/12/2015 哥伦比亚 Tappsi SAS 收购 Easy Taxi Servicos Ltda 巴西 　 软件出版 (5112) 　 　 100 Brazilian mobile taxi services provider Easy Taxi Servicos Ltda has agreed to acquire Colombian peer Tappsi SAS, the parties announced cited by media sources. Financial terms were not disclosed. For the moment, Easy Taxi and Tappsi will continue operating independently post-merger and Tappsi will preserve its brand name. Dennis Wong, CEO of Easy Taxi, assured that this merger will create the main mobile taxi application in Latin America and that it will help the companies compete with their U.S. counterpart Uber. Mr. Wong further commented that the combined business' user base will exceed 25 million downloads, while its drivers base will hit half a million. Tappsi, founded in 2012, develops and operates a mobile taxi application which connects users and taxi drivers. The company generated total revenues of COP 2.87bn (USD 0.87mn) and a net income of COP 50.6mn (USD 0.02mn) for 2014. Easy Taxi, founded in 2011 by Brazilian entrepreneur Tallis Gomes, develops and operates an internet platform, which allows users to call a taxi through mobile applications for iOS, Android, Windows Phone and BlackBerry devices in about 30 countries in Latin America, Africa, the Middle East and Asia.
114163 15/12/2015 印度 LIC Nomura Mutual Fund Asset Management Co Ltd 少数股权购买 LIC Housing Finance Ltd 印度 Nomura Holdings Inc 投资银行及其他金融投资活动 (523) 4.08 (官方数据) 19.3 India-based non-banking financial company (NBFC) LIC Housing Finance Ltd has announced that it has received board approval to acquire a 19.3% stake in its joint venture LIC Nomura Mutual Fund Asset Management Co Ltd from Nomura Holding Inc for a total consideration of INR 273.6mn (USD 4.1mn). The buyer will also acquire a 19.3% stake in LIC Nomura Mutual Fund Trustee Co Pvt Ltd for a consideration of INR 152,000 (USD 2,266.2) Post-transaction Nomura and LIC Housing will hold around 18.7% and 39.3% stake in the company. LIC Nomura Mutual Fund Asset Management offers equity, debt, hybrid, liquid and exchange traded mutual funds among others. It is a joint venture between Life Insurance Corporation of India, LIC Housing Finance and Nomura Holding. The firm manages a total of 48 mutual funds. LIC Housing Finance is a housing-focused NBFC that offers home and project loans as well as loans against property and securities. The firm operates through 7 regional offices and 209 marketing units across India. It is listed on the National Stock Exchange of India (NSE) and the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) and reported total assets of INR 1,125.4bn (USD 167.8mn) as of 31 March 2015.
114148 15/12/2015 罗马尼亚 Rompetrol Group 收购 CEFC China Energy Co Ltd 中国 KazMunayGas 精炼石油产品的制造 (32411); 加油站 (447) 680 (市场估计) 51 UPDATE 2: On 29 April 2016, Romanian press agency Agerpress said that CEFC will pay USD 680mn for the purchase of 51% stake in Rompetrol (KMGI), while pledging to invest at least USD 3.0bn over the next five years, according to a press release issued by CEFC. Rompetrol said that a newly joint-venture (JV) company has been established. The equity proportion of KazMunayGas (KMG) and CEFC in the JV is 49% to 51% respectively. The transaction is subject to certain conditions precedent, including regulatory approval from the European, Chinese and other authorities. The deal is expected to complete by October 2016. UPDATE 1: On 17 December 2015, Rompetrol announced that CEFC has finalized the take-over of 51% in Dyneff group of companies, which owns assets and runs fuel trading and distribution operations in France and Spain. After the deal, Rompetrol continues to hold a 49% participation share in Dyneff. ORIGINAL: CEFC China Energy Co Ltd has agreed to acquire a 51% stake of KMG International N.V. (former Rompetrol Group) from Kazakhstan's state oil and gas company KazMunayGas (KMG) for an undisclosed amount, the target announced. KMG International owns refining and fuel distribution assets in Europe, including Romanian refineries Petromidia Navodari and Vega Ploiesti; and around 1,000 Rompetrol gas stations in Bulgaria, Romania, Moldova, Ukraine and Turkey; as well as in France and Spain, where the group operates under the Dyneff brand. The agreement is part of a package of deals worth a total of USD 4.0bn, signed late on 14 December 2015 in Beijing between China and Kazakhstan. According to Reuters, citing sources close to deal, the target was valued at USD 500mn to USD 1.0bn, putting the price of the acquired 51% stake at above USD 200mn to USD 500mn. Upon deal completion, CEFC plans to expand the Rompetrol retail network to more than 3,000 gas stations across Europe. Petromidia, managed by Rompetrol Rafinare SA, is located in Navodari at the Black Sea and is Romania's biggest oil refinery (43% of the country's refining capacity), which can process 5 million tons of raw material per year. Near the refinery a fertilizer plant processes 400,000 tons per year. Rompetrol Group, established in 1974 and privatized in 1993, is fully-owned by the Kazakh state-owned company KazMunayGas (KMG). Although Rompetrol was renamed into KMG International (KMGI) in 2014, the Rompetrol brand will continue to be used in the distribution segment of the entire company. KMGI is present in 12 countries and has over 7,500 employees. In 2015, the company recorded an EBITDA of USD 162mn. CEFC China Energy Co Ltd is an international private investment group with energy and financial services as its core business. With main operations in Shanghai and Beijing, the group is present in 15 countries and has over 20,000 employees. It booked revenues of CNY 220bn (USD 34.10mn) in 2014.
114129 15/12/2015 巴西; 挪威; 英国; 美国 Certain assets for oil and gas extraction of Repsol in Brazil, U.K., U.S. and Norway 收购 Statoil Fuel & Retail 挪威 Repsol SA 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 　 　 　 Norway-based oil and gas company Statoil ASA announced it has reached an asset swap agreement with Spanish peer Respol SA, in order to increase its operatorship in Brazil, the U.K., the U.S. and Norway, achieve greater control on asset development and reduce costs. Under the agreement, Statoil will acquire a 31% interest in the U.K. licence for Alfa Sentral natural gas field in the North Sea (across both the U.K. Continental Shelf and Norwegian Continental Shelf), increasing its shareholding up to 55%. The buyer also acquires from Repsol a 13% stake in the Eagle Ford joint venture located in the southern part of Texas state (U.S.), and will become its operator with a 63% share. Finally, Statoil will assume operatorship from Repsol of the BM-C-33 licence in Campos Basin oil and gas exploration area offshore in Brazil (located 120 km off the coast of Rio de Janeiro state). After this last transaction, Statoil will keep its 35% stake in the field. Repsol will receive from Statoil in exchange for the assets a 15% interest in the Gudrun oil and gas field (located on the Norwegian Continental Shelf). Upon the completion of the transaction, Statoil remains the operator and largest equity holder with a 36% interest in the field. The transactions for Gudrun and Eagle Ford are valued at the same amount and are expected to close before the end of 2015. The transfer of the assets and the operatorship of BM-C-33 will be concluded, once they receive certain regulatory approvals. According to Mr. John Knight, Statoil's Executive Vice-President for Global Strategy & Business Development, the agreement on Alfa Sentral will increase the company's holding in the U.K. licence for the field, as well as its potential future profitability. The Eagle Ford joint venture will help Statoil to expand its international activity, through efficient operations and cost saving. The operatorship of BM-C-33 in Brazil will allow Statoil to use its deep-water and gas expertise to develop the exploration of the field. Alfa Sentral is a field that is currently producing 60 million boe/d. Statoil is the operator in the Norwegian Continental Shelf licence with a 62% holding and acquired a 24% interest in the UK Continental Shelf licence on 2 October 2015 for USD 15mn. Eagle Ford started operating in 2010 as a 50/50 joint venture between Statoil and Talisman Energy USA Inc. Initially, the field produced around four thousand boe/d. Exploration Licence BM-C-33, comprises the Pao de Acucar, Gavea and Seat discoveries in Campos Basin oil and gas exploration area offshore in Brazil. In 2012 block resources were estimated at around 700 million barrels of light crude and three trillion cubic feet of gas. There will be an appraisal campaign that will reestimate the discovered potential. The Gudrun field holds 130 million of boe. Production started in April 2014 and in 2015 production is currently at 75 thousand boe/d. Statoil specialises in exploration and production of crude oil and gas, and transportation, refining, and marketing of gas, petroleum and petroleum-derived products and has proven reserves of approximately 5.4 billion barrels of oil equivalent. Listed on the Oslo Stock Exchange, Statoil reached a turnover of USD 71.5bn and a net income of USD 2.52bn in 2014. Repsol is specialises in the exploration and production of crude oil and natural gas. The company operates petroleum refineries, and transports petroleum products and liquefied petroleum gas (LPG). Repsol also operates a chain of gasoline filling stations of the same name. It reported sales revenues of approximately USD 6.34bn and net income of around USD 2.14bn for 2014. ______________________________________________________________________ A empresa norueguesa de petróleo e gás Statoil ASA anunciou que chegou a um acordo de permuta de ativos com a homóloga espanhola Respol SA, visando aumentar as suas operações no Brasil, Reino Unido, EUA e Noruega, obter maior controle sobre o desenvolvimento dos seus ativos e reduzir custos. Pelo acordo, a Statoil vai adquirir uma participação de 31% na licença britânica para exploração do campo de gás natural Alfa Sentral no Mar do Norte (entre ambas as plataformas continentais britânica e norueguesa), aumentando a sua participação na licença até 55%. A compradora vai também adquirir da Repsol uma participação de 13% na joint venture Eagle Ford, localizada na parte sul do estado de Texas (EUA), tornando-se a sua principal operador, com uma quota de 63%. Finalmente, a Statoil vai assumir os direitos da Repsol na licença BM-C-33 para exploração da área de petróleo e gás Bacia de Campos no Brasil (localizada a 120 km da costa do estado do Rio de Janeiro). Após esta última operação, a Statoil vai manter sua participação de 35% na Bacia. A Repsol vai receber da Statoil, em troca dos ativos, uma participação de 15% no campo de petróleo e gás Gudrun (localizado na plataforma continental norueguesa). Após a conclusão da transação, a Statoil continua a ser a operadora e a detentora majoritária do campo, com um interesse de 36%. As operações do Gudrun e da Eagle Ford são avaliados no mesmo valor e as negociações deverão fechar antes do final de 2015. O negócio acerca da permuta de ativos e a licença BM-C-33 vai ser concluído, após certas aprovações regulamentares. De acordo com o Sr. John Knight, vice-presidente executivo da Statoil para a Estratégia Global e Desenvolvimento de Negócios, o acordo sobre o Alfa Sentral vai aumentar a participação da empresa na licença britânica para a exploração do campo, bem como a rentabilidade futura desta. A joint venture de Eagle Ford vai ajudar a Statoil a expandir a sua atividade a nível internacional, através de operações eficientes e de diminuição de custos. Os direitos de exploração BM-C-33 no Brasil vão permitir a Statoil usar a sua expertise em águas profundas e gás para desenvolver a exploração do campo. A Alfa Sentral é um campo de exploração de óleo e gás que atualmente produz cerca de 60 milhões de boe/d. A Statoil é a detentora da licença para a exploração da plataforma norueguesa central, com uma participação de 62%, e adquiriu uma participação de 24% na licença para a exploração da plataforma britânica continental em 2 de outubro de 2015, por USD 15mn. A Eagle Ford foi lançada em 2010 como uma parceria estratégica com participações iguais entre a Statoil e a Talisman Energy USA Inc. Inicialmente, o campo produzia cerca de quatro mil boe/d. A licença de exploração BM-C-33, abrange os descobrimentos Pao de Açúcar, Gávea e Seat na Bacia de Campos área de exploração de petróleo e gás, no mar brasileiro. Em 2012, os recursos do bloco foram estimadas em cerca de 700 milhões de barris de petróleo leve e 3 trilhões de pés cúbicos de gás. Vai ser conduzido um estudo que vai reestimar o potencial descoberto. O campo Gudrun tem potencial para 130 milhões de boe. A produção começou em abril de 2014 e atualmente é de 75 mil boe/d. A Statoil é especializada na exploração e produção de petróleo e gás, e transporte, refino e comercialização de gás, petróleo e produtos derivados e tem reservas provadas de cerca de 5.4 bilhões de barris de óleo equivalente. Listada na Bolsa de Valores de Oslo, a Statoil atingiu um volume de negócios de USD 71.5bn e um lucro líquido de USD 2.52bn em 2014. A Repsol está envolvida na exploração e produção de petróleo bruto e gás natural. A empresa opera refinarias de petróleo, e transporta produtos petrolíferos e gás liquefeito de petróleo (GLP). A Repsol também opera uma cadeia de estações de gasolina com o mesmo nome. A empresa registrou receitas de vendas de aproximadamente USD 6.34bn e um lucro líquido de cerca de USD 2.14bn em 2014.
114114 15/12/2015 马来西亚 iPrice 少数股权购买 Asia Venture Group; 500 Startups; IMJ Investment Partners; Venturra Capital; F2 Capital; Startstrike Ventures 马来西亚; 美国; 新加坡; 印度尼西亚; 英国; 德国 电子购物 (454111); 互联网出版与传播 (516) 1.2 (官方数据) 　 Malaysian e-commerce portal iPrice has raised USD 1.2mn of investment from existing investor Asia Venture Group, TechinAsia reported. Investors including 500 Startups, IMJ Investment Partners, Venturra Capital, F2 Capital, and Startstrike Ventures also participated in the fund raising. The investment brings the total funding of iPrice to USD 1.8mn. iPrice acts as an online shopping portal in Southeast Asia. It markets home and living products, electronics, toys, sports and outdoors products. Asia Venture Group acts as a venture capital that invests in digital businesses across Southeast Asia. 500 Startups acts as a seed fund and startup accelerator providing USD 25,000 to USD 250,000 to early stage startup firms. IMJ Investment Partners, based in Singapore, invests in startups from Southeast Asia and Japan. Venturra Capital is the venture capital unit of Indonesian conglomerate Lippo Group. It invests in early growth stage consumer technology-related companies in Southeast Asia.
120060 14/12/2015 台湾 Inotera Memories Inc 收购 Micron Technology Inc 美国 　 半导体器件制造 (3344) 3,200.00 (官方数据) 67 American semiconductor systems developer Micron Technology Inc announced that it will acquire the remaining 67% stake of Taiwan-based computer chips producer Inotera Memories Inc for around USD 3.2bn. The buyer will acquire the remaining shares it does not own in Inotera for TWD 30 (USD 0.9) per share. Along with the acquisition, Micron also announced that it has secured a deal to license manufacturing technology to Nanya Technology Corp. In addition, the agreement for the deal states that both parties have a 60-day period wherein each one can terminate the transaction if certain agreements are not met during the said period. Completion of the transaction is subject to customary closing conditions and the approval of Inotera’s shareholders. It is expected to be completed in the middle of 2016. Micron will fund the acquisition through a combination of cash, USD 2.5bn in debt and USD 1bn of its own equity. Inotera Memories Inc manufactures dynamic random access memory (DRAM) chips. The company, founded in 2003, operates as a joint venture between Micron Technology and Nanya Technology. It is listed on the Taiwan Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of TWD 82.6bn (USD USD 2.5bn) in 2014. Micron Technology Inc is a global leader in advanced semiconductor systems. The company manufactures and produces dynamic random access memory (DRAM) chips, memory modules, NAND and other semiconductor components. It is listed on the NASDAQ and had revenues of USD 4.3bn in 2015.
115312 14/12/2015 多米尼加共和国; 波多黎各; 美国 Oliver Exterminating Corp 收购 Rentokil Initial Plc 英国 Grinda family 企业管理服务 (55); 公共管理、支持服务、废物治理和整治服务业 (561) 　 100 UPDATE: On 12 January 2016, Rentokil confirmed the acquisition. The company said that the purchase of Oliver complements its existing pest control activities in the U.S. states of Arizona and Florida and also provides it market entry into Puerto Rico and the Dominican Republic. ORIGINAL: British business services group Rentokil Initial has acquired U.S.-based pest control company Oliver Exterminating Corp for an undisclosed amount, U.S. magazine Pest Control Technology (PCT) reported. Oliver Exterminating has operations in the USA, Puerto Rico and the Dominican Republic and had been owned by Olivier Grinda and his family since 1982. PCT reported that Oliver CEO and president Bert Putterman said that a few years ago Grinda had turned Oliver over to his children, and that the family decided to exit the pest control business in order to focus on its other holdings. Oliver Exterminating includes pest control firms Arizona Exterminating and Guarantee Floridian Pest Control as well as Oliver Exterminating of Puerto Rico and the Dominican Republic. The group has 16 offices - four n Florida, five in Arizona, six in Puerto Rico and one in the Dominican Republic. Oliver employs 371 people and it has annual revenues of some USD 32.5mn. Rentokil Initial provides route-based services in the fields of pest control, hygiene and workwear. The company is listed on the London Stock Exchange and it booked GBP 1.74bn (USD 2.87bn) revenues in 2014.
114796 14/12/2015 土耳其 Goa Teknoloji Danismanlik 收购 Getinge Group 瑞典 Undisclosed seller(s) 其他制造业 (339) 　 　 100 Swedish healthcare and life sciences solution provider Getinge Group said it acquired Turkish low temperature sterilisers manufacturer Goa Teknoloji Danismanlik (Stericool) for an undisclosed price. The acquisition is in line with Getinge's strategy to strengthen customer offerings with new innovations and to offer a product range for different markets. Ankara-based Stericool was founded in 2008 and has 20 employees. The company manufactures hydrogen peroxide based solution low temperature sterilisers for emerging markets. Its sales are expected to total SEK 20mn (USD 2.4mn) in 2015. The company's net sales in 2016 are estimated at SEK 25mn (USD 3.0mn) and EBITDA is expected at SEK 4.5mn (USD 0.5mn). Getinge Group operates in the areas of surgery, intensive care, infection control, care ergonomics and wound care. It has nearly 16,000 employees in over 40 countries and generated sales of almost SEK 27bn (USD 3.2bn) in 2014. The Group is divided into three business areas, including Medical Systems, Extended Care and Infection Control and operates under the brands of Maquet, ArjoHuntleigh and Getinge.
114742 14/12/2015 巴西 Telvent Brasil Ltda 收购 Kapsch TrafficCom AG 奥地利 Schneider Electric SE 软件出版 (5112) 　 　 100 Austrian intelligent transportation systems (ITS) provider Kapsch TrafficCom AG has reached an agreement to acquire Brazilian counterpart Telvent Brasil Ltda from French energy group Schneider Electric SA for an undisclosed sum. The information was provided by Veirano Advogados that acted as legal advisor to Schneider. The transaction is part of a global deal that includes the operations of Schneider's Transportation Business, Telvent Trafico y Transporte SA, located in Spain. The operation is subject to regulatory approvals and the fulfillment of certain conditions and is expected to close in January 2016. It will allow Kapsch TrafficCom to offer its customers an integrated portfolio of ITS. Mr. Georg Kapsch, CEO of Kapsch TrafficCom, said that the enriched portfolio of the company will offer eco-friendly services that will optimise the use of lots of transportation assets and reduce urban problems such as congestion, pollution, aging infrastructure, limited funding and constrained capacity. Telvent, established in 1987 in Rio de Janeiro city (Rio de Janeiro state, Brazil), provides ITS and develops solutions that are applied in various industries in Brazil. Kapsch TrafficCom, headquartered in Vienna, provides ITS solutions for support and optimisation of infrastructure, vehicles, users and industry. It is mainly focused on ITS solutions that increase the security, availability and quality of the infrastructure. The company has subsidiaries and offices in 33 countries worldwide, employs over 3,500 people and reported a revenue of EUR 456mn (USD 606mn) for fiscal year ended 31 March 2015. Schneider Electric is an engineering company focused on the development and production of power management solutions as well as energy-efficient equipment for industrial enterprises, civil engineering, residential objects, and data centres. The firm is listed on Euronext Paris and had a turnover of EUR 25bn (USD 33.23bn) and a net income of EUR 1.94bn (USD 2.58bn) in 2014. _______________________________________________________________________________________________________ A provedora austríaca de sistemas de transporte inteligentes (ITS) Kapsch TrafficCom AG entrou em um acordo para adquirir a homóloga brasileira Telvent do Brasil Ltda do grupo energético francês Schneider Electric SA, por um valor não revelado. A informação foi fornecida pelo Veirano Advogados, que atuou como assessor jurídico da Schneider. A operação faz parte de uma transação global que inclui a totalidade do negócios de transportes da Schneider ("Schneider's Transportation Business"), Telvent Tráfico y Transporte SA, localizado na Espanha. A operação está sujeita a aprovações regulatórias e ao cumprimento de certas condições e deverá ser concluída em janeiro de 2016. O negócio vai aumentar a oferta de ITS para os clientes Kapsch TrafficCom. O Sr. Georg Kapsch, CEO da Kapsch TrafficCom, disse que a nova carteira de soluções da empresa ia oferecer serviços ecológicos que iam optimizar o funcionamento de muitos transporte e reduzir os problemas urbanos relacionados com o congestionamento, a poluição, a infra-estrutura envelhecida, o financiamento reduzido e a capacidade restrita. A Telvent, criada em 1987 na cidade do Rio de Janeiro (RJ, Brasil), oferece ITS e desenvolve soluções, aplicáveis em diversos setores econômicos no Brasil. A Kapsch TrafficCom, sediada em Viena, oferece ITS para suporte e otimização da infra-estrutura, os veículos, os consumidores e a indústria. A empresa está principalmente focada nas suas soluções que aumentam a segurança, a disponibilidade e a qualidade da infra-estrutura. A companhia tem filiais e escritórios em 33 países ao redor do mundo, emprega mais de 3,500 pessoas e registou um faturamento de EUR 456mn (USD 606mn) para o ano fiscal findo em 31 de março de 2015. A Schneider Electric é uma empresa de engenharia com foco em desenvolvimento e produção de soluções de gestão energética e de equipamento eficiente em termos energéticos para empresas industriais, de engenharia civil, edifícios residenciais, e centros de dados. A empresa está listada na Bolsa de Valores de Paris Euronext e teve um faturamento de EUR 25bn (USD 33.23bn), e um lucro líquido de EUR 1.94bn (USD 2.58bn) em 2014.
114395 14/12/2015 巴西; 保加利亚; 新加坡; 澳大利亚; 英国; 美国 FocusVision 收购 EQT Partners; Company manager(s) 瑞典 Thompson Street Capital Partners 软件出版 (5112) 　 　 100 Swedish private equity firm EQT said it has teamed up with management of U.S.-based quantitative and qualitative technology solutions provider FocusVision to acquire the company from U.S. private equity firm Thompson Street Capital Partners for an undisclosed price. FocusVision has more than 300 employees and offices in the USA, the UK, Bulgaria, Brazil, Australia and Singapore. The acquisition is expected to help FocusVision to strengthen its investment in both research and development and its global sales force. FocusVision provides an online survey platform, research facility video streaming, webcam focus groups, ethnography streaming, mobile device usability studies, content management and end-to-end project management solutions. It was founded in 1990. EQT acted through its unit EQT Mid Market Investment Strategy. EQT is a leading global private equity group with EUR 29bn in raised capital. It has portfolio companies in Europe, Asia and the US with total sales of more than EUR 17bn and some 140,000 employees. Thompson Street Capital Partners focuses on investing in founder-led middle market businesses in North America. Founded in 2000, the company partners with companies in the business services, healthcare services and engineered products sectors.
114285 14/12/2015 意大利 Pininfarina SpA 收购 Mahindra Group 印度 Pincar Srl 专业服务、科学研究和技术服务 (541) 49.75 (官方数据) 76.063 Indian multinational conglomerate Mahindra Group announced that it has entered into definitive agreements with Pincar Srl to acquire a 76.063% stake in Italian engineering and design firm Pininfarina SpA for an estimated consideration of EUR 25.2mn (USD 27.7mn). The buyer will acquire the stake at a price of EUR 1.1 (USD 1.2) per share through a to-be formed 60-40 joint venture between its group companies Tech Mahindra Ltd and Mahindra and Mahindra Ltd. In addition, EUR 20mn will be invested in the company until the end of 2016 through a capital increase. Post-transaction, Mahindra Group will commence an open offer for the remaining ordinary shares at price of EUR 1.1 (USD 1.2). The target will continue to operate independently after the acquisition. Pininfarina is an Italian designing firm that primarily focuses on automotive design. The firm offers car, transportation, architectural and industrial design as well as engineering services. Its clients include Maserati, Hyundai GM and Fiat among others. Pininfarina reported total consolidated revenues of EUR 86.6mn (USD 105.2mn) for FY ended 31 December 2014. The Mahindra group is a multinational Indian conglomerate with business units in technology, financial services, energy, hospitality and automobile manufacturing among others. The firm has over 200,000 employees across 100 countries. Note 1: The deal value was estimated based on the 22,945,566 ordinary shares of Pininfarina SpA held by Pincar and the additional EUR 20mn that will be invested through a capital increase. Note 2: All multiples are calculated on a pre-money basis before the capital increase of EUR 20mn. Note 3: Pininfarina SpA had net financial debt of EUR 47.3mn as of 30 September 2015 but its net debt for the purpose of the EV formula is a negative EUR 8.9mn (does not include finance lease obligations but includes assets held for trading).
114294 14/12/2015 罗马尼亚 Autonet Group 收购 Swiss Automotive Group (SAG) 瑞士 Existing shareholders 汽车及零配件经销商 (441) 　 　 51 Switzerland's international car parts wholesaler Swiss Automotive Group (SAG) will acquire 51% stake in Romanian counterpart Autonet Group from its founders Zoltan Kondor and Mihály Lieb, the target announced on its website. The deal value was not disclosed. The transaction is pending the anti-trust authorities approval. Autonet's subsidiaries will be included in a holding company in which SAG will hold a 51% stake, and the sellers will own the remainder 49%. The merged company will cover seven European countries, including Romania, Hungary, Slovenia, Slovakia, Switzerland, Austria and Belgium. Furthermore, SAG and Autonet will continue to operate separately within their own markets. Following the deal, Autonet will retain its brand names such as Lubexpert, Autonet, Garage Assist, Forsius and Network Systems, and will keep its current management team. The partnership with SAG will enable Autonet to consolidates its leading position in the Romanian market, Mihály Lieb said. Autonet Group, founded in 1996 in Satu-Mare, north-western Romania, is an auto spare parts distributor and currently it operates three distribution centers and 61 regional warehouses in four countries (Romania, Hungary, Slovenia and Slovakia). The group employs 1,500 people, serving around 9,000 customers, and its turnover for 2015 is estimated at nearly EUR 280mn. SAG is one of the largest independent suppliers of auto parts in the European market. The company operates through a network of 100 stores and owns a fleet of 500 vehicles for distribution. With over 2,000 employees, SAG has annual revenues of CHF 500mn (USD 508mn). Both Autonet and SAG groups are members of ATR International AG - the association of the largest importers and distributors of spare parts for automobiles in the world with an estimated turnover of EUR 14.0bn for 2015.

San Francisco Coffee Sdn Bhd operates 28 specialty coffee outlets in Malaysia under the brand name San Francisco Coffee. 114192 14/12/2015 斯洛文尼亚 Trimo 收购 Innova Capital Sp z oo 波兰 Nova Ljubljanska Banka (NLB) 建筑用及结构性金属制品制造 (3323) 54.94 (市场估计) 97.45 UPDATE: On 30 March 2016, Slovenian newspaper Delo announced the completion of the deal. ORIGINAL: Polish private equity fund Innova Capital said it has acquired a 97.45% stake in Slovenian steel construction products manufacturer Trimo d.d. from 10 Slovenian banks and other credit institutions, for an undisclosed amount. According to the Slovenian national newspaper Delo, the deal value could be worth over EUR 50mn. Innova Capital offered the highest price and outbid Irish construction materials producer Kingspan. The deal is subject to certain conditions precedent and is expected to complete in Q1 2016. As part of the deal, Innova Capital will take over Trimo's all outstanding bank debt from 10 Slovenian banks, including Nova Ljubljanska Banka (NLB). The banks have been looking to sell the company for about two years. Through the acquisition, Innova Capital will gain access to the European market for complete solutions in steel buildings, roofs, facades, modular units and sound-proof systems. Trimo d.d. produces steel elements and components used in the construction and engineering sectors. Its products include steel buildings, facade systems, roofs, modular units and sound-proof systems. The group operates in over 50 countries including Slovenia, Serbia, the U.K., Macedonia, Russia and Poland. In 2014, the company booked consolidated revenues of EUR 111.2mn. Innova Capital, founded in 1994, is a mid-market private equity firm in Central Europe, with EUR 900mn in total funds. The firm has concluded more than 40 transactions across 10 countries in the region and has invested so far almost EUR 600mn.

114178 14/12/2015 土耳其 Gama Enerji 少数股权购买 Tenaga Nasional Bhd 马来西亚 Gama Holding; International Finance Corporation (IFC) 电力生产 (22111) 243 (官方数据) 30 Malaysian utility Tenaga Nasional Berhad (TNB) said it will acquire 30% of Turkish power generation company Gama Enerji from local industrial group Gama Holding and International Finance Corporation (IFC) for USD 243mn. The completion of the transaction is subject to approvals by the Turkish energy and competition regulators and relevant Malaysian regulatory authorities. The investment will allow GAMA Enerji to pursue regional expansion opportunities in terms of asset acquisitions, greenfield projects, portfolio optimisation and supply market entry. Gama Enerji owns and operates a portfolio of thermal, wind and hydro assets in Turkey as well as a large water conveyance project in Jordan. It has a 840MW natural gas-fired plant and a 45 MW wind power plant under construction in Turkey. The company plans to have an installed capacity of 1,027MW in the country by 2017. Upon completion of the transaction, Gama Holding will own a 50.5% stake in Gama Enerji, down from 73% currently. IFC's direct stake will decline to 14.5% from 20.25% and GIF Holding I Cooperatief (GIF), a fund managed by the IFC Asset Management, will have 5%, down from 6.75%. The investment will be financed by a combination of internal funds and external debt. TNB is integrated electricity provider with core activities in the generation, transmission, and distribution of electricity. It supplies electricity to approximately 8.9 million customers. Gama Holding has interests in construction, EPC contracting, concessions, trade and energy & water investment. IFC is a global institution promoting sustainable economic growth in developing countries by providing capital and advisory services to businesses and governments.

The proceeds of the deal will enable the seller to distribute more capital according to its capital allocation policy. 114135 14/12/2015 埃及 Medsofts Group 合资企业 Archer Daniels Midland Co (ADM) 美国 　 农畜产品批发 (4225); 交通运输及物流仓储 (48); 仓储 (493); 食品制造 (311) 50 UPDATE: On 22 April 2016, ADM said that it has completed the deal. ORIGINAL: U.S. food-processing and commodities trading group Archer Daniels Midland (ADM) announced that it has reached an agreement to acquire a 50% stake in Egyptian sector firm Medsofts Group. Financial terms of the transaction were not disclosed. The deal is subject to approval by the competition authority and is expected to complete in Q1 2016. The new 50-50 joint venture will own and manage merchandising and supply chain operations. The joint venture will also own a 50% stake in Nile Stevedoring & Storage Co (NSSC), which operates one of the largest grain port facilities located in Port of Alexandria in Egypt, with annual discharge capacity of two million metric tons. In March 2015, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) provided USD 20mn loan, to partly finance the working capital of Medsofts. Medsofts, founded in 2001, is a group of supply chain investments that provide value-added commodity trading, processing, and logistics in Egypt, Middle East and North Africa. Archer Daniels Midland is one of the largest agricultural processors and food ingredient providers in the world with more than 33,000 employees and clients in more than 140 countries. The group has more than 460 crop procurement locations, 300 ingredient manufacturing facilities and 40 innovation centres. ADM is listed on the New York Stock Exchange. It posted revenues of USD 81.2bn and net profit of USD 2.2bn in 2014.
114132 14/12/2015 多米尼加共和国 Aeropuertos Dominicanos Siglo XXI SA (Aerodom) 收购 Vinci SA 法国 Advent International Corp 交通运输辅助活动 (488) 　 　 　 UPDATE: On 11 April 2016, Advent International announced that the deal was completed. ORIGINAL: Vinci Airports, the airport arm of French concessions and heavy construction group Vinci SA, announced that it has agreed to acquire Dominican Republic-based airport operator Aeropuertos Dominicanos Siglo XXI (Aerodom) from U.S. private equity company Advent International. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Vinci Airports said that the purchase will bring the number of airports it operates to 33 and that it illustrates its strategy of expansion in countries with strong growth potential. Aerodom has a concession to operate six airports in the Dominican Republic which is valid until March 2030. They include Las Americas International Airport, Gregorio Luperon, Presidente Juan Bosch, Arroyo Barril, La Isabela and María Montez. The six airports handled 4.3 million passengers in 2014, 98% of them international. Vinci is a multinational concessions and construction company, specialised in the design, construction, financing, and management of motorway and road infrastructure, road bridges and tunnels, rail infrastructure, airports, stadiums, and car parking facilities. The company reported sales revenues of EUR 39.1bn (USD 43.2bn) and net income of almost EUR 2.5bn (USD 2.75bn) for 2014.

The sale and lease back transaction was signed with an undisclosed third party logistics provider that operates in Central and Eastern Europe. The buyer acted via fund Gramercy Property Europe. It also purchased a logistics facility, and an office and production facility in Netherlands for EUR 15.6mn and EUR 24.1mn, respectively. The properties are located in Strykow and Piaseczno in Central Poland and have combined space of 1,069,500 sq f (99,360 m2). Gramercy Property Trust (GPT) is a leading global investor and asset manager of commercial real estate. The company specialises in acquiring and managing single-tenant, net-leased industrial and office properties purchased through sale-leaseback transactions or directly from property developers and owners. It focuses on income producing properties leased to high quality tenants in major markets in the United States and Europe. GPT is listed on the NYSE.

Capricoast is an Indian online modular furniture retailer that provides pre and custom-designed kitchen, wardrobe and furniture solutions. The firm offers 1,000 predesigned kitchens and has 50 showrooms in 15 cities across India. It is currently available in Bangalore and plans expand to 6 more cities by the end of 2015. Accel Partners is a venture capital and private equity firm focused on technology-based firms. It has a portfolio of over 300 companies and has presence in U.K., U.S. and India. C&C Group produces branded cider, beer, wine and soft drinks. The group manufactures Bulmers the leading Irish cider brand, Magners the premium international cider brand, the C&C Brands range of English ciders and the Tennent's beer brand. It posted revenues of EUR 683.9mn and net loss of EUR 81mn in the financial year ended 28 February 2015. Southeastern Asset Management, established in 1975, is an investment management and advisory firm with USD 21bn in assets under management as of 30 September 2015. With a team of 28 professionals in four offices in Memphis (Tennessee), London, Sydney and Singapore, the company manages equity mutual funds on behalf of pension funds, investment companies, pooled investment vehicles, governmental entities and individuals. Nassif Sawiris is Egypt's richest businessman. He was ranked by Forbes as the 240th richest person in the world.

Financial terms were not disclosed. With Rapiddo's contribution, Mensajeros Urbanos is getting closer to its objective of boosting its presence in the Colombian urban logistics sector. Mensajeros Urbanos was incubated in Telefonica’s initiative called Wayra Colombia, and offers express messenger and delivery services, together with a web-based order and track system. The company has 400 messengers delivering over 10,000 packages per month. Rapiddo, founded in 2014 by Patrick Sigrist e Guilherme Bonifacio, provides express delivery services, based on an on-line platform, which allows users to pick, schedule and track the status of their delivery. The company operates in the cities of Sao Paulo and Rio de Janeiro, and has 140 couriers.
115705 11/12/2015 马来西亚 FlexMove System (M) Sdn Bhd 收购 Incline Equity Partners 美国 　 其他通用机械制造业 (3339) 　 　 　 Malaysian conveyor manufacturer FlexMove announced that it has been acquired by Dorner Holding Corp, the parent company of U.S. packaged and custom conveyor systems producer Dorner Manufacturing Group. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Dorner Manufacturing Group is a portfolio company of U.S. private equity firm Incline Equity Partners. "We've done a number of deals in Canada and Europe, but this is our first add-on in Asia," said Wali Bacdayan, a founding partner at Incline. He added that the company was always looking for add-ons for its portfolio companies. FlexMove said that the transaction expands Dorner Holding Corp's geographic coverage and complements existing products and capabilities in the Dorner Manufacturing line. FlexMove is a producer of flexible chain conveyors and is based in the state of Penang on the northwest coast of Peninsular Malaysia, Its clients include firms in the food, beverage and dairy, automotive and machine parts, electronic and electrical, personal products, medical and pharmaceutical, as well as paper converting and packaging industries. Dorner Manufacturing Group was established in 1966 and it focuses on the design, manufacturing and distribution of conveyors and related equipment. Incline Equity Partners focuses on investing in companies with an enterprise value ranging between USD 30mn and USD 150mn in the value-added distribution, business and industrial services and specialised light manufacturing business sectors. The company usually invests between USD 15mn and USD 30mn per transaction.
114321 11/12/2015 巴西 BAR-M-215 oil block; BAR-M-217 oil block; BAR-M-252 oil block; BAR-M-254 oil block 少数股权购买 Mitsui & Co Ltd; Mitsui Oil Exploration Co Ltd 日本 BG Group Plc 天然原油的开采 (21111) 　 　 10 Japanese trading company Mitsui & Co Ltd announced it has acquired a 10% stake in four deep water exploration blocks located in the Barreirinhas basin, Northern Brazil, from U.K.-based state-controlled oil & gas company BG Group Plc for an undisclosed sum. Mitsui and BG Group acted through their Brazilian subsidiaries Mitsui E&P Brasil Ltda and BG E&P Brasil Ltda, respectively. BG is the major operator with 65% interest in the blocks and Thai state-controlled oil & gas company PTT Exploration and Production Pcl (PTTEP) holds the remaining 25% stake. Mitsui E&P Brasil, BG and PTTEP are planning to invest in seismic surveys and exploration drilling, in order to confirm the existence of oil and gas in the blocks. Since Brazil has discovered huge oil and gas resources in recent years, the investment is part of Mitsui's plan to successfully develop and expand its business across Brazil and Latin America. The oil exploration blocks BAR-M-215, BAR-M-217, BAR-M-252 and BAR-M-254, subject of the current transaction, cover an area of approximately 3,077 m2 on around 2,000 m water depth, in the Barreirinhas basin, located offshore of the states of Maranhao and Piaui, North Eastern Region of Brazil. Mitsui & Co Ltd, established in 1947, is a global diversified trading company with interests in the energy, machinery and infrastructure, metals, chemicals, food, textile, logistics, and finance sectors. The company operates a network of 150 offices in 67 countries worldwide, and engages more than 44,800 employees. Mitsui has gas distribution business in Brazil that consists of regional monopolies based on the concessions granted by state governments. _________________________________________________________________________________________ A trading japonesa Mitsui & Co Ltd anunciou a aquisição de uma participação de 10% em quatro blocos de exploração em águas profundas na bacia de Barreirinhas, Nordeste do Brasil, da petrolífera estatal britânica BG Group Plc, por um valor não revelado. A Mitsui e a BG Group agiram por meio das suas subsidiárias brasileiras Mitsui E&P Brasil Ltda e BG E&P Brasil Ltda, respetivamente. A BG é a principal operadora dos blocos com uma participação de 65%, e a petrolífera estatal tailandesa PTT Exploration and Production Pcl (PTTEP) detém a participação remanescente de 25%. A Mitsui E&P Brasil, a BG e a PTTEP vão investir em pesquisa sísmica e perfuração de exploração, a fim de confirmar a existência de petróleo e gás nos blocos. Visto que o Brasil descobriu grandes reservas de petróleo e gás nos últimos anos, o investimento faz parte do plano da Mitsui para desenvolver e expandir com sucesso os seus negócios em todo o Brasil e América Latina. Os blocos de exploração de petróleo BAR-M-215, BAR-M-217, BAR-M-252 e BAR-M-254, assunto da presente transação, cobrem uma área de aproximadamente 3,077 m2, na bacia de Barreirinhas, localizada em águas profundas de 2,000 m ao longo dos estados do Maranhão e Piauí, região Nordeste do Brasil. A Mitsui & Co Ltd, fundada em 1947, é uma empresa de comércio global diversificada, com interesses nos sectores da energia, máquinas e setores de infra-estrutura, metais, produtos químicos, alimentos, têxtil, logística e finanças. A empresa opera uma rede de 150 escritórios em 67 países em todo o mundo, e envolve mais de 44,800 funcionários. Mitsui tem negócio de distribuição de gás no Brasil, representado por monopólios regionais com base nas concessões outorgadas pelo governo do estado.
114256 11/12/2015 俄罗斯 Astrakhan Port 收购 Nasim Bahr Kish 伊朗 　 交通运输辅助活动 (488) 11 (官方数据) 53.0659 Iranian sea shipment company Nasim Bahr Kish has acquired a 53.1% stake in Astrakhan Port for some RUB 750mn (USD 11mn), the head of the Russian Antimonopoly Service (FAS), Igor Artemyev, announced. Artemyev specified that the Government Commission for Foreign Investments has approved the transaction which was already cleared by FAS in July 2015. Astrakhan Port is located on the right bank of the Volga river near the village of Solyanka. The cargo complex consists of 4 berths with a total length of 454 m and depth of 4m. The area has 11 gantry cranes installed which have lifting capacity of 5 up to 10/16 tonnes. The port equipment includes also a floating crane with lifting capacity of 50 tonnes, motor- and electric loaders. The warehouse area is 21,000 m2, of which about 2,000 m2 are covered. The main activity profile of Nasim Bahr Kish is transportation of cargo and passengers by sea.

114090 11/12/2015 土耳其 Borsa Istanbul 少数股权购买 European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) 国际的 　 证券和商品期货交易 (5232) 　 　 10 The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) said it will acquire 10% of Turkish stock and commodity exchange operator Borsa Istanbul for an undisclosed price. The investment aims to improve the efficiency and liquidity of Borsa Istanbul. EBRD will also help with the preparations for a successful listing of Borsa Istanbul. The exchange is expected to go public as part of the government's plan to reshape Turkey's capital markets. Borsa Istanbul, majority-owned by the Turkish government, is the sole exchange operator in the country. It was created in 2013 by combining the Istanbul Stock Exchange, the Istanbul Gold Exchange and the Turkish Derivatives Exchange. Nasdaq OMX Group has a 5% stake in Borsa Istanbul. Borsa Istanbul provides trading, settlement, custody and registry services for equities, derivatives, fixed income and repo, precious metals and Islamic finance markets. It is a shareholder in the Sarajevo, Baku, Kyrgyz, and Montenegro Stock Exchanges, as well as LCH. Clearnet. EBRD started investing in Turkey in 2009 and currently operates from offices in Istanbul, Ankara and Gaziantep. To date, the bank has invested EUR 6.8bn in the country through 170 projects in infrastructure, energy, agribusiness, industry and finance.

The funding was done through CLSA’s ARIA IV fund. The capital raised will be used to establish more fulfilment centres, expand its last mile delivery network and expand its product offerings. Holisol Logistics is an Indian supply chain and logistics firm which provides multi-retail logistics solutions, consulting and packaging and handling services. The firm currently has 2,500 employees and manages a total of 55,700 m2 of fulfilment centres across 14 location locally. Holisol Logistics was established in 2009 and is headquartered in Delhi. CLSA Capital Partners is an international Asian private equity and alternative asset management firm which also offers investment banking services. It has over 1,500 employees in its offices across Mumbai, Singapore, Hong Kong, Shanghai, Seoul, Beijing and Tokyo. The firm manages a total of USD 3bn worth of assets. Note: The deal stake was computed from the targets reported average valuation of INR 4.5bn (USD 67.3mn) and the amount raised of USD 10mn.
114063 11/12/2015 越南 PETRONAS (Vietnam) Co Ltd; Thang Long LPG Co Ltd 收购 Total SA 法国 PETRONAS Dagangan Bhd 燃气的输配 (2212); 石油及制品的批发 (4227) 　 　 100 Malaysian oil and gas products retailer and marketer Petronas Dagangan Bhd (PBD) announced that it will divest its liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) units in Vietnam to French multinational oil and gas firm Total SA for an undisclosed amount. The target companies are PETRONAS (Vietnam) Co Ltd and Thang Long LPG Co Ltd. The deal will be carried out by PDB (Netherlands) BV which is a wholly-owned subsidiary of the seller and Totalgaz Vietnam Ltd, a subsidiary of the buyer. The sale is in line with the rationalisation strategy of PBD. PETRONAS (Vietnam) Co Ltd stores, processes and distributes LPG in Malaysia. Thang Long LPG Co Ltd liquefies and markets petroleum gas as well as maintains LPG transmission systems. Total SA explores, develops and produces oil and natural gas. It also provides liquefaction, shipping and regasification as well as refining of petrochemicals and specialty chemicals. Total SA posted revenues of USD 212bn for FY ended 31 December 2014. Petronas Dagangan Bhd markets downstream oil and gas products such as petroleum, motor gasoline, aviation fuel, kerosene, diesel, fuel oil, bunker fuel, lubricants and liquefied petroleum gas (LPG). PBD had revenues of MYR 32.4bn (USD 9.3bn) for FY ended 31 December 2014.

Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. "Paymaster is a great brand and a great product and we are delighted to welcome it to the Digicel family as we expand our range of products and services consistent with the convergence of communications, e-Commerce and financial services," said Digicel CEO Colm Delves. Paymaster was established in 1997 and it has developed and launched a proprietary Bill Payment Information System. The company has over 170 locations in Jamaica and agent relationships with over 40,000 locations in the USA and Canada. Digicel Group offers mobile telecommunications services in 33 markets across the Caribbean, Central America, and Oceania. Currently, the company has 13 million customers and its total investment up to date is over USD 5bn.

Mitsui & Co acted via its Chilean subsidiary Mitsui Agro Business SA. Further transaction details were not revealed. Following completion of this operation Empresas Iansa no longer holds any interest in the target, while Mitsui becomes the sole owner of Anagra. Anagra imports and distributes fertilizers. Currently it has three plants for the reception, storage, blending and packaging of fertilizers located at the ports of San Antonio, Lirquen and Puerto Montt. Mitsui & Co's core activities focus on production, processing and trade of natural resources, infrastructure (energy and rail transportation) and logistics, food manufacturing and others. It reported total revenues of JPY 5.4tn (USD 45bn) and a net income of JPY 306.5bn (USD 2.6bn) for FY ended 31 March 2015. Empresas Iansa is engaged in the production, distribution and sale of sugar, beet sub-products, and other natural foods, serving food processing companies in Europe, Japan and the Americas. The company reported sales revenues of USD 597.13mn and net income of USD 12.32mn for 2014. It is controlled 91.95% by U.K.-based agricultural commodities merchant ED&F Man Holdings Ltd.

Alibaba Group will pay HKD 2.1bn (USD 265.9mn) in cash for the target business. Completion of the deal is subject to various conditions precedent. Apart from the acquisition of the flagship South China Morning Post newspaper, the deal envisages the purchase of the magazine, recruitment, outdoor media, events & conferences, education and digital media businesses of SCMP Group. Alibaba Group will invest additional resources in SCMP's editorial and business operations. SCMP comprises a portfolio of businesses that deliver news, information and entertainment across many platforms in Hong Kong, China and abroad. The South China Morning Post newspaper began operations in 1903. Alibaba Group provides consumer e-commerce, online payment, business-to-business marketplace and cloud computing services. Alibaba's online retail portal Taobao features nearly a billion products and is one of the top 20 most visited websites globally. The company is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and booked revenues of USD 12.3bn for its FY ended 31 March 2015.

The acquired properties are Woolworths Shopping Centre and Masters Home Improvement Everton Park. Completion of the deal is subject to the fulfilment of certain conditions. Sim Lian Group will fund the acquisition with a combination of internal funds and bank borrowings. Woolworths Shopping Centre, which opened in May 2015, is situated on a site area of 17,070 m2. The shopping mall has a total gross letable area (GLA) of 5,687 m2, and its main tenant is the full-line Woolworths supermarket. Its other tenants include medical-related services, food and beverage outlets and a gymnasium. The Masters Home Improvement Park spans on a site area of 38,660 m2, and has a total letable area of 13,750 m2. It offers over 35,000 different product lines from electronic appliances to outdoor furniture. Sim Lian Group is a property developer, established as a construction company in 1976. The group has launched over 20 development projects to date, including in Malaysia, as well as industrial and mixed-use developments. The company is listed on the Singapore Exchange and its revenues were SGD 714.7mn (USD 512.7mn) for 2014. Earlier, in October 2015, Sim Lian announced the acquisition of Lara Village shopping centre located in Victoria state of south-eastern Australia for AUD 30.2mn (USD 21.8mn).; while in March 2015, it has acquired a commercial property located at 59 Albany Highway in Perth, Australia for AUD 72.8mn (USD 56.3mn). 114014 11/12/2015 捷克共和国; 罗马尼亚; 斯洛伐克; 奥地利 Hame sro 收购 Orkla ASA 挪威 Decapterus Sarl 食品制造 (311) 192.08 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE 3: Orkla completed the deal on 31 March 2016. UPDATE 2: On 16 March 2016, Orkla said that Romanian competition council approved the agreement. The transaction has already been approved by the competition authorities in the Czech Republic, Hungary, Austria, Russia and Ukraine. UPDATE 1: On 1 March 2016, Slovak anti-monopoly office approved the deal. ORIGINAL: Norway-based food group Orkla announced that it has agreed to acquire Czech packaged foods manufacturer Hame for EUR 175mn (CZK 4.73bn / USD 192.1mn) on a debt-free basis. The seller is Luxembourg-based private equity holding company Decapterus. Orkla said that the acquisition will double its turnover in Central Europe. Orkla's existing assets in Central Europe include Vitana (in the Czech Republic and Slovakia), Felix Austria, and Orkla Foods Romania. Hame is among the leading food manufacturers in the Czech Republic and Slovakia. The company provides a large variety of products including pates, canned meat, ready-made foods, vegetable products, mixed fruits, jams, stewed fruit, baby foods, sandwiches and others. Hame's products are distributed in 36 countries worldwide. It has 2,400 employees and ten production facilities. It posted revenues of CZK 4.87bn (EUR 176.4mn) and a net profit of CZK 234mn (EUR 8.42mn) in 2014. Orkla is a leading supplier of branded consumer goods and concept solutions to the grocery and out-of-home sectors in the Nordic region, the Baltics and selected markets in central Europe, Russia and India. The company employs 13,000 people. In 2014, its revenues amounted to NOK 29.6bn (EUR 3.26bn), and net profit was NOK 1.66bn (EUR 182.6mn). Orkla is listed on the Oslo Stock Exchange. Note: The disclosed debt-free value is assumed equal to the Deal Value (consideration paid).

The consideration amount was subject to adjustments and was funded through a combination of internal resources and debt/equity financing. The acquisition is in line with Landing International Development's strategy for diversification into the gaming industry. The company intends to establish its own branding and presence worldwide by investing in the well-defined and recognised brand name of the Les Ambassadeurs Club. A Liv Drinks, criada em 2012, fabrica bebidas alcoólicas e não-alcoólicas como sucos, chás, águas de coco, detox, coquetéis, entre outras, que podem ser encomendados através do site da empresa. É companhia espera ter um volume de negócios de cerca de BRL 50mn (USD 13.35mn) em 2014.
