114004 10/12/2015 巴西; 西班牙; 美国 Quality Systems Laboratory Inc; Laboratorio de Metrologia y Calibracion Industrial SA (MCI); MEC-Q Comercio e Servicos de Metrologista Industrial Ltda 收购 Trescal SA 法国 　 建筑，工程及相关服务 (5413); 管理、科学研究和技术咨询服务 (5416) 　 　 French calibration services provider Trescal SA announced it has acquired three peers: Quality Systems Laboratory Inc (U.S.), Laboratorio de Metrologia y Calibracion Industrial SA (Spain) and MEC-Q Comercio e Servicos de Metrologista Industrial Ltda (Brazil). Financial terms were not disclosed. MEC-Q's expertise and strong reputation are expected to increase Trescal's offering in Spain in the areas of aeronautics and defense. Its two laboratories, located in Toledo and Seville, reinforce the company's presence in the country. The incorporation of Quality Systems Laboratory will expand the buyer's operations to Florida state (U.S.) which is a key location for the aeronautics and life science industries. The acquisition will add new know-how and secure the company's pharmaceutical business in the country. Mr. Guillaume Caroit, General Secretary of Trescal, said that the operations are aligned with the company's strategy for global expansion. Quality Systems Laboratory offers a wide range of validation services for manufacturing, marine, R&D, aviation, medical device, aerospace and pharmaceutical industries in the U.S. Laboratorio de Metrologia y Calibracion Industrial, established in 1988, provides industrial calibration services. The company offers its services to a great range of companies in aeronautical, automotive, construction and other industries. MEC-Q operates a calibration laboratory that provides engineering and consulting services. The company specialises in the automotive and oil and gas industries, and has five laboratories in the states of Sao Paulo, Rio de Janeiro, Minas Gerais and Bahia. Trescal provides a broad range of calibration services for the test and measuring equipment market. The company has subsidiaries in Austria, Belgium, Brazil, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, Luxemburg, Morocco, and other countries. Trescal operate in 80 laboratories, service 29,000 customers in sectors such as Defense, Aerospace, Aeronautical and Automotive, and employs 2,150 people. _________________________________________________________________________ A provedora francesa de serviços de calibração Trescal SA anunciou a aquisição de três empresas do mesmo ramo: a Quality Systems Laboratory Inc (EUA), a Laboratorio de Metrología y Calibración Industrial SA (Espanha) e a MEC-Q Comércio e Serviços de Metrologista Industrial Ltda (Brasil). Os termos financeiros não foram divulgados. A Trescal espera que a experiência e a forte reputação da MEC-Q vão aumentar a sua oferta na Espanha nas áreas de aeronáutica e defesa. Os dois laboratórios da empresa-alvo, localizados em Toledo e Sevilha, vão reforçar a presença da empresa no país. A incorporação da Quality Systems Laboratory vai expandir as operações da compradora no estado da Flórida (EUA), que é uma localização-chave para as indústrias aeronáutica e de ciências da vida. A aquisição vai adicionar nova expertise e reforçar o negócio farmacêutico da empresa no país. O Sr. Guillaume Caroit, Secretário Geral da Trescal, disse que as operações estavam em linha com a estratégia de expansão global da empresa. A Quality Systems Laboratory oferece uma ampla gama de serviços de validação para as indústrias de fabricação, marinha, pesquisa e desenvolvimento, aviação, dispositivos médicos, aeroespacial e farmacêutica nos EUA. A Laboratorio de Metrología y Calibración Industrial, criada em 1988, oferece serviços de calibração industriais. A empresa presta os seus serviços para clientes corporativos de várias indústrias como aeronáutica, automotiva, construtiva, entre outras. A MEC-Q opera um laboratório de calibração que oferece serviços de engenharia e consultoria. A empresa é especializada nas indústrias de petróleo e gás, e automotiva, e tem cinco laboratórios nos estados de São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro, Minas Gerais e Bahia. A Trescal oferece uma ampla gama de serviços de calibração para o mercados de pesquisa e medição de equipamentos. A empresa tem filiais na Áustria, Bélgica, Brasil, República Checa, Dinamarca, França, Alemanha, Itália, Luxemburgo, Marrocos e em outros países. A Trescal operar 80 laboratórios, oferece serviços para 29,000 clientes nos setores de defesa, aeroespacial, aeronáutico e automotivo e emprega 2,150 pessoas.
114015 10/12/2015 智利 Espacio Urbano de Vina del Mar commercia centre in Chile 收购 Credicorp Ltd 秘鲁 Kimco Realty Corp 百货商场及其他综合性商店 (452) 50 (市场估计) 100 Peruvian financial holding firm Credicorp Ltd has acquired the Espacio Urbano de Vina del Mar commercial centre in Chile from U.S. real estate investment trust Kimco Realty Corp for an estimated USD 50mn (CLP 35.2bn), media sources reported. Credicorp acted via its Chilean subsidiary Credicorp Capital, which in turn acted via its investment fund Credicorp Capital Rentas Inmobiliarias. With this acquisition, Credicorp Capital will manage approximately USD 250mn in real estate assets in Chile. U.S. retail stores operator Wal-Mart Stores Inc is in the process of selling another 10 commercial centres of the Espacio Urbano brand, which would generate proceeds of between USD 400mn and USD 600mn to the U.S. firm. The Espacio Urbano de Vina del Mar commercial centre has an area of approximately 25,000 square metres and is located in the Chilean city Vina del Mar. It is a three-storey building with 55 shops and 1,350 parking lots. Credicorp is a provider of financial services such as credit facilities, deposits, current accounts, investment banking and others. The company generated a net income of PEN 2.4bn (USD 759mn) for 2014. Kimco Realty is a real estate investment trust focused on the acquisition and development of shopping centres in North America. It posted sales revenues of USD 994mn and a net income of USD 424mn for 2014.
114010 10/12/2015 亚美尼亚 ProCredit Bank Armenia CJSC 收购 Inecobank CJSC; European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) 亚美尼亚; 国际的 ProCredit Holding AG & Co KGaA 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 89.4 (DW 估计) 100 Armenian Inecobank disclosed it will purchase ProCredit Bank Armenia, in a cooperation with EBRD, from Germany's ProCredit Holding for AMD 43.3bn (USD 89.4mn). EBRD will hold a 22.7% stake in ProCredit Bank Armenia upon completion of the deal. The acquisition is in line with buyer's strategy to significantly enhance its services offered to medium and small enterprises. IFC, being a shareholder of Inecobank, will also provide a senior loan to the bank, for the purpose of the acquisition. The completion is expected to take place before the end of 2015. ProCredit Bank Armenia was established in 2008. The bank is a development-oriented full-service financial institution. Inecobank was created in 1996. It is a universal bank offering services both for physical entities and corporate customers.
113997 10/12/2015 南非 Plastichem (Pty) Ltd 收购 Brenntag AG 德国 　 化工产品的批发 (4226) 　 　 　 German chemicals distributor Brenntag AG announced that it has agreed to acquire South African specialty chemicals distributor Plastichem for an undisclosed amount. "This acquisition is an excellent opportunity for us and is completely in line with Brenntag's strategy to build a chemical distribution platform in key industries in the Middle East and Africa region. With Plastichem, we are diversifying our current product portfolio in South Africa towards an increased offer of specialty chemicals," said Karsten Beckmann, member of the management board of Brenntag Group and CEO of Brenntag Europe Middle East and Africa (EMEA). Plastichem is a specialty distributor of high performance polymers for plastics and rubber and focuses on the automotive market as well as in the packaging, electronics and engineering industries. The company is expected to generate sales of EUR 26.9mn (USD 29.4mn) in 2016. Brenntag, established in 1874, is an international distributor and marketer of industrial and specialty chemicals. With a team of more than 13,500 employees, the company offers over 10,000 products to around 170,000 customers through a network of more than 490 storage and distribution facilities in 72 countries. Brenntag is listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange and it generated sales of USD 13.3bn in 2014.
113985 10/12/2015 斯里兰卡 Asiri Hospital Holdings 少数股权购买 TPG Growth 美国 Actis LLP 流动救护服务 (621); 医院服务 (622) 51.97 (官方数据) 27.87 U.S. private equity firm TPG Growth has acquired a 27.87% stake in Sri Lanka-based Asiri Hospital Holdings for a total consideration of LKR 7.6bn (USD 52mn), the latter disclosed. The buyer, through its unit TPG Growth III SF Pte Ltd, acquired 317,085,695 shares of the target from U.K.-based private equity firm Actis at a price of LKR 24 (USD 0.2) per share. The investment is in line with the buyer's strategy to further expand its position in the healthcare sector of Sri Lanka. Asiri Hospital Holdings is a multi-specialty private healthcare firm that provides radiology, nuclear medicine, genetic services, laboratories and patient treatment services, among others. It has around 570 beds that is equivalent to 30% of Sri Lanka's private sector capacity. Asiri Hospital had revenues of LKR 8.6bn (USD 63.1mn) for FY ended 31 March 2015. PG Capital, founded in 1922, invests in a variety of industries including healthcare, energy, industrials, consumer, retail, technology, media & communications, software, financial services, travel, entertainment and real estate. Its investments are executed mainly through leveraged buyouts, recapitalizations, spinouts, growth investments, joint ventures and restructurings. The firm has over USD 59bn of assets under its management. Actis, established in 2004, invests in the private equity, energy and real estate sectors of emerging markets such as Africa, Asia, and Latin America. It currently has USD 7.6bn funds under its management.

The seller is DHL Supply Chain, which forms part of German postal and logistics company Deutsche Post DHL, and the sum of the deal translates into an acquisition yield of 6.45%. Texton said that the transaction is in line with its stated strategy to achieve geographic diversification beyond South African borders into the U.K. Bawtry Building is an A Grade distribution warehouse located in the town of Doncaster. It is exclusively tenanted by DHL Supply Chain and the latter has 15 years remaining on the lease. Bawtry Building has a gross lettable area of 25,294 m2. Texton Property Fund is a property investment company focused on South Africa and the U.K. The firm is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and it had a market capitalisation of ZAR 3.01bn (USD 279.5mn) on 9 December 2015.

There is no information available regarding the shares acquired in the target - existing or newly issued. LTG focuses on recycling mobile phones, game consoles and other electronic equipment. Among the company's clients are Apple Inc and Microsoft Corp. The company was formed in 2000. LTG has 15 wholly-owned facilities in Hong Kong, China, Japan, North America and EMEA. The investment was led by Indonesian venture capitalist Venturra Capital with the participation of East Ventures. The funds raised will be used by the target to strengthen its human resources. The company plans to be the largest education provider in the tech space of Indonesia. Ruangguru.com is an online portal where prospective students find teachers. It also offers test questions and online exams in addition to providing date-based evaluation, time management monitor and performance-based training topics. Venturra Capital is the venture capital unit of Indonesian conglomerate Lippo Group. It invests in early growth stage consumer technology-related companies in Southeast Asia. East Ventures is a venture capital firm that invests in seed-early stage firms involved in commerce, social, game, and mobile services.
117977 09/12/2015 塞尔维亚 Patent Co 少数股权购买 Abris Capital Partners 波兰 　 饲料加工 (3111) 　 　 　 Polish private equity fund Abris Capital Partners announced it has invested in Serbian animal nutrition solutions provider Patent Co. The investment value was not disclosed, neither the acquired stake in the company. Nevertheless, the investment firm said the funds will be used by Patent Co. for the construction of a new state-of-the-art compound feed plant, which will be the most modern of its kind in Southeast Europe. After the transaction, Radivoje Perović, the founder of Patent Co., will continue to serve as executive manager of the company. He said the new partnership will help Patent Co. to strengthen its position in both regional and global markets. The investment enables Patent Co. to triple its existing production capacity, and add managerial talent to its strong team. Following the commissioning of the new compound feed facility, Patent Co. will reach an annual compound feed capacity of 150 thousand tons, Radivoje Perović said. Patent Co. is a family-run business managed by Radivoje and Miodrag Perović. It produces compound feeds, premixes/minerals, protein concentrates and high-value add feed additives, several of which are patented in both Serbia and the EU. The company's products are exported to over 25 countries in Europe, Asia, and South and Central America. Patent Co. is based in Mišićevo in northern Serbia, near the Hungarian and Croatian borders, allowing the company to have access to raw materials from the farming heartlands of Serbia, Croatia and Hungary, and cover a large number of regional customers. Abris Capital Partners, founded in 2006, has to date raised over EUR 770mn of committed capital for investment in mid-market opportunities in Central and Eastern Europe. The company has offices in Warsaw, Kiev and Bucharest.

(SSKAP) for an aggregate sum of CNY 16.3mn (USD 2.54mn). The seller is Hong Kong-based joint partner Herons Investment Ltd. The deal is pending approvals from China's relevant authorities. 114246 09/12/2015 克罗地亚 Zagrebacka burza dd 少数股权购买 European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) 国际的 　 证券和商品期货交易 (5232) 2.11 (官方数据) 12.85 Croatian stock exchange Zagrebačka burza (ZSE) announced it has raised HRK 14.9mn (UD 2.11mn) in a private share placement. ZSE has sold 5,960 new shares at an issue price of HRK 2,500 apiece. The first round of recapitalization, scheduled between 01-15 October 2015, was opened to existing investors who subscribed for 28.5% of the total offered shares and provided HRK 4.27mn. The unsubscribed shares were offered in the second round between 30 November - 9 December 2015 to qualified investors. EBRD also participated and subscribed for 2,400 new shares, equal to a stake of 5.17% in the Zagreb Stock Exchange. All the shares of ZSE will be listed on the Official Market of the Zagreb Stock Exchange in the first half 2016, in accordance with the General Assembly's decision from 31 August 2015. The purpose of the ZSE capital increase is to finance the takeover of the Ljubljana Stock Exchange, which was announced earlier in July 2015. Following the recapitalization, ZSE has increased its share capital from HRK 40.40mn (USD 5.73mn) to HRK 55.30mn (USD 7.85mn). Zagrebačka burza, founded in 1991, is the sole regulated market in Croatia. For 2014, it reported a total equity turnover of HRK 3.9bn (USD 559mn). It lists almost 300 financial instruments, including stocks, bonds, commercial paper and structured products.
114153 09/12/2015 中国 Union Bless Ltd 收购 Merit Success Global Ltd 英属维尔京群岛 GT Group Holdings Ltd 铁矿石的开采 (21221) 2.58 (官方数据) 100 Hong Kong-listed GT Group Holdings Limited said it will sell its iron mining company Union Bless Ltd to investment holding company Merit Success Global Limited for HKD 20mn (USD 2.6mn). Union Bless Ltd owns a magnetite iron ore mine located in Guangdong, southeastern China. Its right over the mine expire by end of 2015. Operations in the mine were suspended by the local authorities following a serious geological disaster caused by the Lian Nan County Damaishan Mine in October 2011. The sale will prevent the group from incurring further losses. It recorded an operating loss of HKD 123.3mn (USD 15.9mn) from its minerals operation for 2014. GT Group Holdings will use the net proceeds from the sale as general working capital. GT Group Holdings, former China Yunnan Tin Minerals, is active also in trading of goods, financing, brokerage and securities investment.

Naren Shaam, Founder and CEO of GoEuro, was quoted in the press release as saying that the new funding will further boost the company’s growth and development of a comprehensive travel platform. Founded in 2012 and based in Berlin, GoEuro is a search platform that allows to optimally choose the travel path through Europe and make bookings for rail, bus or air transport. The company co-operates with more than 340 transport operators in Europe. GoEuro covers 32 countries and employs 150 people.

Huabao International's unit High Praise Enterprises will acquire the stake through a capital increase and will have an option to further subscribe for new shares, within five years, to raise its stake in VMR Products to 51%. A total USD 7.0mn of the consideration will be settled through converting a bridge loan into equity and the remainder will be by paid in cash. The acquisition is in line with Huabao International's plans to expand its business in the newly emerging markets. VMR Products was established in Miami in 2009. It is engaged in the design, manufacturing and distribution of electronic cigarettes. The company posted sales of USD 44.2mn for 2014, with half of the total generated online. Huabao International is engaged in the research and development, production, distribution and sale of flavours, fragrances, reconstituted tobacco leaves and new materials products that are innovative and applicable to tobacco industry. Note: The MVE/Sales multiple is calculated on a pre-money basis.
114083 09/12/2015 巴西 Guarana Urban Mobility Inc (GUMI) 少数股权购买 West Japan Railway Co 日本 Mitsui & Co Ltd 铁路运输业 (482) 　 　 33.9 Japanese rail transportation services provider West Japan Railway Co (JR-West) announced it has agreed to acquire 33.9% of Brazilian railway business Guarana Urban Mobility Inc (GUMI) from Japanese trading company Mitsui & Co Ltd for an undisclosed sum. Under the agreement, JR-West is acquiring 812,736 shares of the capital stock of GUMI. The acquisition is aligned with JR-West's "Medium-Term Management Plan 2017" that is looking to foster its global growth and develop its human resources. In addition, the investment is expected to contribute to safe and stable transport on urban passenger railways in Brazil. GUMI operates as a subsidiary of Mitsui that is responsible for the investment in urban passenger railway businesses in Brazil. The company has interests in Rio de Janeiro suburban operator SuperVia, No. 6 subway line in Sao Paulo, Rio Light Rail Transit (LRT) in Rio de Janeiro and Goiania light rail concessionaire (Goias state). The four projects have a combined capacity of around 3,225,000 passengers per day. JR-West, headquartered in Osaka City, specialises in providing rail transportation services. The company is also involved in operating ferries in Miyajima Iceland (Japan), real estate, shopping centres and hotels management, and other services. JR-West reported revenues of JPY 1.35tr (USD 11.15bn) and a net income of JPY 67bn (USD 554mn) for fiscal year ended March 2015. Mitsui & Co Ltd, established in 1947, is a global diversified trading company with interests in the energy, machinery and infrastructure, metals, chemicals, food, textile, logistics, and finance sectors. The company operates a network of 150 offices in 67 countries worldwide, and engages more than 44,800 employees. Mitsui has gas distribution business in Brazil that consists of regional monopolies based on the concessions granted by state governments. _________________________________________________________________________________________ A provedora japonesa de serviços de transporte ferroviário West Japan Railway Co (JR-West) anunciou que entrou em um acordo para adquirir 33.9% do negócio ferroviário brasileiro Guaraná Urban Mobility Inc (GUMI) da trading japonesa Mitsui & Co Ltd, por um valor não revelado. Sob o acordo, a JR-West vai adquirir 812,736 de ações do capital social da GUMI. A aquisição está em linha com o "Plano de Gestão de Médio Prazo 2017" (do inglês "Medium-Term Management Plan 2017") da JR-West que procura acelerar o seu crescimento global e desenvolver os seus recursos humanos. O investimento também deverá contribuir para um transporte seguro e estável nas ferrovias urbanas de passageiros no Brasil. A GUMI opera como uma subsidiária da Mitsui, que é responsável para o investimento em empresas de transporte ferroviário urbano de passageiros no Brasil. A empresa está no controle da operadora suburbana SuperVia no Rio de Janeiro, a linha de metrô No. 6 em São Paulo, o Rio Light Rail Transit (LRT) no Rio de Janeiro, e a LRT em Goiânia (GO). O quatro projetos têm uma capacidade combinada de cerca de 3,225,000 passageiros por dia. A JR-West, sediada na cidade de Osaka, é especializada na prestação de serviços de transporte ferroviário. A empresa também está envolvida na passagem de barcos para a ilha da Miyajima (Japão), na gestão de imobiliário, centros comerciais e hotéis, entre outros serviços. A companhia apurou uma receita de JPY 1.35tr (USD 11.15bn) e um lucro líquido de JPY 67bn (USD 554mn) para o ano fiscal findo em março de 2015. A Mitsui & Co Ltd, fundada em 1947, é uma empresa de comércio global diversificada, com interesses nos sectores da energia, máquinas e setores de infra-estrutura, metais, produtos químicos, alimentos, têxtil, logística e finanças. A empresa opera uma rede de 150 escritórios em 67 países em todo o mundo, e envolve mais de 44,800 funcionários. Mitsui tem negócio de distribuição de gás no Brasil, representado por monopólios regionais com base nas concessões outorgadas pelo governo do estado.

The buyer acted through the fund EfTEN Kinnisvarafond. The deal is due to close in early 2016. The sale is in compliance with RSA's earlier voiced plans to offload its assets in Russia and the Middle East. Paul Whittaker, CEO of RSA Insurance Group Plc, said, as quoted in the press release, that the Russian business does not have the same scale as its franchises in the U.K., Canada and Scandinavia. RSA Insurance Group Plc was created in 1996 through the merger of the two leading insurers in Great Britain - Royal Insurance and Sun Alliance. The insurance group has operations in over 140 countries across the world. In 2014, INTOUCH Insurance collected RUB 1.69bn (USD 44.8mn) in net insurance premiums and paid out RUB 952.8mn (USD 25.2mn) in insurance claims, according to the company's report under international financial reporting standards. Blagosostoyanie is one of the largest non-state pension funds in Russia. The fund provides non-state pension coverage and compulsory pension insurance services.
114059 09/12/2015 新加坡 Compass Point shopping mall in Sengkang 少数股权购买 Prudential Plc 英国 Frasers Centrepoint Ltd 房地产 (531) 57.01 (官方数据) 18.99 Singapore-listed real estate company Frasers Centrepoint Limited (FCL) announced it will divest its 18.99% stake in a JV that owns the Compass Point sopping mall in Sengkang, Singapore to its joint partner Asia Prudential Fund 1 S.a.r.l. (APF 1), for SGD 80.3mn (USD 57.0mn). The deal is expected to complete by February 2016. Gemshine Investments (S) Pte. Ltd. is the JV company formed between FCL and APF 1 - owned by U.K. based insurance and financial services company Prudential Plc. Prudential already holds 81.01% of the target and upon deal completion, it will become sole owner of Compass Point. Following the deal, FCL will cease to manage the property. The sale is in line with FCL's strategy of streamlining and divesting its non-core assets. Compass Point is a 6-floor shopping mall which started its operations in August 2002, and it will be closed for renovation for one year beginning with October 2015. The mall has total floor area of 25,000 m2, and is located in the center town of Sengkang, in Singapore. Singapore Exchange-listed has four core businesses focused on residential, commercial, hospitality and industrial properties spanning 77 cities across Asia, Australasia, Europe, and the Middle-East. It had total assets of over SGD 23bn (USD 17bn) as at 30 June 2015.
114025 09/12/2015 加拿大 FHRI Holding Ltd 收购 Accor Sa 法国 Qatar Investment Authority; Kingdom Holding Co; Ontario Municipal Employees Retirement System (OMERS) 住宿服务 (721) 2,868.99 (DW 估计) 100 French hotel group Accor announced that it has signed an agreement with Qatar's sovereign fund Qatar Investment Authority (QIA), Saudi Arabian investment holding company Kingdom Holding Co (KHC) and Oxford Properties, an Ontario Municipal Employees Retirement System (OMERS) company for the acquisition of FRHI Holdings for approximately USD 2.87bn (EUR 2.64bn). The buyer will pay USD 840mn (EUR 768mn) in cash and will issue 46.7 million new Accor shares. Following the deal, QIA and KHC will hold respectively 10.5% and 5.8% stakes in Accor's share capital. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals. FHRI Holdings owns three global luxury hotel brands: Raffles, Fairmont and Swissôtel. It has 155 hotels and resorts (of which 40 are under development), and more than 56,000 rooms (of which approximately 13,000 are under development). FRHI's hotels and resorts span 34 countries across five continents, with 42 properties in North America, two in South America, 26 in Europe, 17 in Africa/Middle East and 28 in Asia-Pacific. The company employs 45,000 people. Accor is present in 92 countries. As at 30 June 2015, the company has 3,792 hotels and 495,072 rooms. It employs 160,000 people, and generated revenues of EUR 5.45bn and a net income of EUR 223mn in 2014. QIA was established in 2005 and currently holds assets worth over USD 100bn. The main purpose of QIA is to develop, invest and manage the state reserve funds of Qatar. Kingdom Holding Co is one of the most diversified private investment companies in the world, mainly focused on finance services and real estate investments. The company invests in petrochemical, media and publishing, entertainment, finance, social media and technology, education, health care, aviation, and agriculture sectors. It has investments in a number of US companies including Apple, Hewlett-Packard, Kodak, News Corporation, Pepsi, Procter & Gamble, SAKS Inc., Time Warner, and the Walt Disney Company. KHC listed on the Tadawul - Saudi Stock Exchange. Oxford Properties invests in and manages real estate assets on behalf of OMERS. It has a portfolio of properties locates in Canada, the US and Europe. The company employs 2,000 people and has USD 34bn of real assets under management. Note: The deal value estimate was made based on the Accor's closing stock price of EUR 40.11 on 8 December 2015.
114043 09/12/2015 委内瑞拉 Seguros Caracas de Liberty Mutual CA 收购 Humberto Gil - private investor 委内瑞拉 Liberty Mutual Holding Company Inc 保险活动 (5241) 　 　 　 U.S. insurance group Liberty Mutual disclosed in its financial report for the third quarter of 2015 that it has agreed to sell its Venezuelan operations for an undisclosed amount. Venezuelan newspaper El Universal reported that the group will sell its local arm Seguros Caracas to Venezuelan private investor Humberto Gil. Gil said that he has extensive experience and participation in the reinsurance sector in Latin America, with special emphasis on the Venezuelan market, as well as in the health and insurance business. He is the owner of International reinsurance group Fidens. Seguros Caracas was founded in 1943 and is currently the largest insurer in Venezuela. In terms of premiums, the company had a market shares of 16.3% as of September 2015. Seguros Caracas focuses on the health, auto, accidents and home segments.
114031 09/12/2015 巴西 AZ FuturaInvest Holding SA 收购 Azimut Holding SpA 意大利 　 投资银行及其他金融投资活动 (523) 　 　 50 Italian asset manager Azimut Holding SpA announced it has agreed to reach up to a 100% ownership in its 50% owned Brazilian subsidiary AZ Futurainvest Holding SA for an undisclosed sum. Azimut acted through its Brazilian subsidiary AZ Brasil Holding Ltda. The deal value will be disclosed upon the completion of the transaction. On February 2014, Azimut completed the acquisition of 50% stake in Brazilian peer Futurainvest Group for BRL 12.5mn (USD 5.4mn, EUR 3.9mn). The transaction is subject to regulatory approvals and the fulfilment of certain conditions. FuturaInvest Group, founded in 2003, operates as an asset management firm, comprised of three entities: FuturaInvest Gestao de Recursos (asset and wealth management), FuturaInvest Consultoria de Valores Mobiliarios (financial advisory services) and FuturaInvest Distribuidora de Titulos e Valores Mobiliarios (brokerage of financial products). Azimut, established in 1988, is an independent investment management firm with assets under management, allocated in mutual funds, hedge funds and individual investment portfolios. The company also provides financial and insurance products and advisory services in offices in Italy, Luxembourg, Ireland, China, Hong Kong, Monaco and Turkey, and in other countries. Azimut is listed on the Milan Stock Exchange and posted EUR 401mn (USD 533.3mn) in revenues and a net income of EUR 92mn (USD 122.4mn) in 2014. _________________________________________________________________________________________ A gestor de recursos italiana Azimut Holding SpA anunciou que entrou em um acordo para atingir até 100% de participação na sua subsidiária brasileira detida a 50%, AZ Futurainvest Holding SA, por um valor não revelado. A Azimut agiu por meio da sua subsidiária brasileira AZ Brasil Holding Ltda. O valor do negócio vai ser divulgados após a conclusão da transação. Em fevereiro de 2014, a Azimut concluiu a aquisição de 50% na empresa brasileira do mesmo ramo Grupo Futurainvest, por BRL 12.5mn (USD 5.4mn, EUR 3.9mn). A transação está sujeita a aprovações regulatórias e ao cumprimento de determinadas condições. A FuturaInvest Group, fundada em 2003, opera como uma empresa de gestão de activos, composta por três entidades: FuturaInvest Gestão de Recursos (gestão de ativos e riqueza), FuturaInvest Consultoria de Valores Mobiliários (assessoria financeira) e FuturaInvest Distribuidora de Títulos e Valores Mobiliários (corretagem de produtos financeiros). A Azimut, criada em 1988, é uma empresa independente de gestão de investimentos com ativos sob gestão, distribuídos em fundos multimercados, fundos de hedge e carteiras de investimento individuais. A empresa também oferece seguros, produtos financeiros e serviços de assessoria financeira em escritórios na Itália, Luxemburgo, Irlanda, China, Hong Kong, Mônaco e Turquia, e em outros países. A Azimut está listada na Bolsa de Milão e gerou um faturamento de EUR 401mn (USD 533.3mn) e um lucro líquido de EUR 92mn (USD 122.4mn) em 2014.
114021 09/12/2015 斯洛文尼亚 Raiffeisen Banka dd 收购 Apollo Global Management LLC 美国 Raiffeisen Bank International AG 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 100 Austrian lender Raiffeisen Bank International (RBI) announced that it has agreed to sell its Slovenian unit, Raiffeisen Banka d.d., to Biser Bidco, managed by U.S. investment fund Apollo Global Management LLC. Financial terms were kept confidential. The deal is subject to regulatory and other approvals, and is expected to close in Q1 2016. The Slovenian Raiffeisen Leasing d.o.o. is not included in the transaction. The sale is part of RBI's costs restructuring plan and following the deal, it will book in Q4 2015 a negative effect of EUR 49m. This sum is already included in its outlook. With the deal, RBI expects to reduce its risk-weighted assets by approx. EUR 270mn. This acquisition comes after the U.S. fund Apollo, along with the EBRD, have agreed to acquire Slovenian state-owned NKBM bank for EUR 250mn (USD 277.3mn) earlier in June 2015. Raiffeisen, which has been present in Slovenia since 2002, announced its plan to pull out of the Slovenian market at the beginning of 2015. Raiffaisen Banka d.d. operates through 14 business outlets in Slovenia, with around 220 employees. Its total assets amounted to EUR 843mn as of 30 September 2015. Apollo Global Management, founded in 1900, has around USD 60bn of assets under management as at end-2014. The company specialises in private equity, credit and real estate investments in the chemicals, commodities, consumer and retail, distribution and transportation, financial and business services, manufacturing and industrial, and telecommunication sectors. Raiffeisen Bank International is a leading corporate and investment bank in Austria, as well as in Central and Eastern Europe where it covers 15 regional markets, including Albania, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Croatia, Kosovo, Romania and Serbia. The bank's total assets amounted to EUR 117.24bn as of 30 September 2015.

The acquisition will accelerate the target's growth domestically and support its integration with the BIC stationery business in India. The buyer held a 75% stake in the target on July 2014. Cello Pens is an Indian pen manufacturer which offers ball point and gel pens, pencils and other stationery materials. The firm has 10,000 employees which operate over 180 injection moulding machines. It was founded in 1995 and is currently a wholly owned subsidiary of the BIC Group. BIC is a France-based stationery, lighters and razorblades manufacturing firm. It has a presence in over 160 countries through numerous brands such as BiC Kids, Tipp-Ex and BiC Soleil among others. Frasers is acting in the transaction through its U.K. subsidiary Malmaison Hotel du Vin Property Holdings Ltd. Post deal completion, the four hotel properties will operate under the brands Malmaison and Hotel du Vin. Earlier in June 2015, Frasers has acquired Malmaison Hotel du Vin Holdings, which comprises 29 upscale lifestyle boutique hotels, for GBP 363.4mn (USD 567.3mn). Following the deal, FHT will expand the total number of boutique hotels under the Malmaison and Hotel du Vin brands to 33; while FHT's portfolio of hotel rooms and serviced residence units will reach 2,347 keys. The acquired hotel properties are the 75-bedrom Avon Gorge Hotel in Bristol; the 59-room Magdalen Chapter in Exeter, formerly an eye hospital; the 60-room Montpellier Chapter in Cheltenham; and the 71-room Hotel Seattle in Brighton. FHT is the first global hotel and serviced residence trust listed in Singapore, comprising Frasers Hospitality Real Estate Investment Trust (FH-REIT) and Frasers Hospitality Business Trust (FH-BT). As at 30 September 2015, FHT's current portfolio is valued at approx. SGD 1.96bn (USD 1.44bn) with 13 quality properties strategically located across seven key gateway cities in Asia, Australia and the U.K.
113971 09/12/2015 厄瓜多尔 A joint venture between Enami EP and Codelco 合资企业 Empresa Nacional Minera (Enami EP); Corporacion Nacional del Cobre (Codelco) 厄瓜多尔; 智利 　 金属矿的开采 (2122) 　 　 　 Chilean state-owned copper producer Corporacion Nacional del Cobre (Codelco) announced it has agreed to form a joint venture company with Ecuadorian state-owned miner Empresa Nacional Minera (Enami EP) to develop the Llurimagua copper-molybdenum project in Ecuador. The Llurimagua project is located in the Imbabura province, 80km northeast from Ecuador's capital Quito, and is at a stage of initial exploration conducted by Codelco under cooperation agreement with Enami EP. Following completion of the current exploration works, in case the project becomes of interest to Codelco, the parties will proceed with the creation of a new entity, which is to be owned 49% by Codelco and 51% by Enami EP, with the latter being in charge of developing and operating the project. Codelco is one of the world's largest nonferrous metals enterprises producing approximately 18 million tons of copper per year, accounting for 11% of total global output, and managing 10% of global copper reserves. It belongs to the Chilean state and is primarily involved in the development and operation of copper mines, as well as in the processing, refining, and sale of copper and by-products. Enami EP's aim is to ensure the sustainable exploitation of Ecuador's minerals and non-renewable natural resources while safeguarding the environment and community rights. Currently it explores eight mining prospects - two in partnership with Codelco, one of which is the Llurimagua project.
113954 09/12/2015 南非 Trussard Property Consultants (Pty) Ltd 收购 Jones Lang LaSalle Inc (JLL) 美国 　 房地产 (531) 　 　 100 U.S. financial and professional services firm Jones Lang LaSalle Inc (JLL) announced the acquisition of South African real estate leasing and investment agency Trussard Property Consultants. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Trussard Property Consultants is expected to be fully rebranded as JLL by mid-2016, with the combined business operating from both the existing JLL and Trussard offices in the city of Johannesburg. JLL said that the acquisition will further accelerate the strong growth momentum in its South Africa business which is based in the city of Johannesburg. Vincent Lottefier, JLL's EMEA Management Board sponsor for Africa, said that the purchase represents an important further step in JLL's broader Africa growth strategy, which has also seen the company open new offices in Lagos and Nairobi within the past 15 months. Trussard Property Consultants was founded in 2006 and has so far services more than 640 commercial and industrial property clients ranging from SMEs, national and multinational companies. The company is based in Johannesburg and offers real estate leasing and investment services for commercial and industrial properties as well as vacant land. JLL, established in 1783, is a financial and professional services firm specialising in commercial real estate services and investment management. With a team of 58,000 employees across 230 corporate offices in more than 80 countries, the company provides management and real estate outsourcing services for a property portfolio of over three billion square feet. JLL is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and it had a market capitalisation of USD 7.36bn in 9 December 2015.

Chillr is a mobile-based fund transfer platform which enables users to transfer money and reload prepaid accounts. Sequoia Capital is a U.S.-based venture capital and private equity firm focused on start-up and growth stage companies. Its portfolio includes companies from the energy, financial, healthcare, mobile and technology industries. Blume Ventures is an Indian Venture capital firm that invests in early stage companies in the consumer, internet and technology sector. It has funded over 50 companies domestically. Blume manages a total fund size of INR 1bn (USD 21.3mn). It typically invests USD 50,000 - USD 300,000 in a round and up to USD 1.5mn in follow-up investments.

113928 09/12/2015 莫桑比克 Galana Mozambique Ltd 少数股权购买 Oiltanking GmbH 德国 　 交通运输辅助活动 (488) 　 　 　 German storage services provider Oiltanking announced that it has agreed to acquire an undisclosed stake in Galana Mozambique, thus getting an indirect shareholding in two terminal projects for the storage and handling of bulk petroleum and chemical products in the ports of Matola and Beira. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Oiltanking said that the purchase will further strengthen its presence in Africa and enhance its ability to serve new market segments on the east coast of the continent. The company added that the transaction is expected to be completed by mid December 2015. Galana Mozambique's terminal in Matola (north Mozambique) is currently under construction and is expected to become operational in the second quarter of 2016. The terminal will have an initial capacity of 51,000 cbm and will be equipped with rail- and truck-loading facilities to serve southern Mozambique and neighboring countries. The Beira terminal (central Mozambique), in turn, is currently at the development stage and is expected to facilitate imports into the central part of Mozambique, Zimbabwe, Malawi, Zambia and the Democratic Republic of Congo. Galana Mozambique is registered in Mauritius and it forms part of the Galana Group, a UAE-based group of companies specialising in trading, shipping, terminal storage and distribution of refined petroleum products. Oiltanking, owned by Germany-based family-owned petroleum products wholesaler Marquard & Bahls AG, is an independent storage services provider for oils, chemicals, gases and dry bulk. Currently, the company operates 73 terminals in 22 countries with total storage capacity of 19 million cubic metres.

(1.16%) and Maxi-Harvest Group Pte. Ltd. (1.16%). mm2 Asia Ltd. will sell an aggregate of 6,351,625 new shares to the investors at a price of SGD 0.7872 each share. 114253 08/12/2015 俄罗斯 СТТ Expo 收购 Messe Munchen GmbH 德国 Media Globе 其他支援服务 (5619) 　 　 100 German construction machinery trade fair organizer Messe Munchen announced the acquisition of Moscow-based building equipment exhibition CTT Expo from Russia's largest independent trade fair organizer, Media Globe. The financial terms of the purchase were not disclosed. Alexey Striganov, a co-owner of Media Globe will become Messe Munchen’s partner in Russia and shareholder in the newly-established operator company. The acquisition will boost the global market share of the buyer to more than 50%. In addition, Messe Munchen will become the fourth largest foreign trade fair organizer in Russia. According to the press statement, the current acquisition is the biggest and most important one in the history of Messe Munchen. CTT is the fifth largest construction machinery fair in the world. The event has been held in Moscow since 2000. The fair covers area of 53,900 m2. Messe Munchen organizes the world’s biggest trade fair - Bauma in Munich at 605,000 m2, as well as Bauma China in Shanghai, Bauma Conexpo in India and Bauma conexpo in Africa.
114186 08/12/2015 巴西 Kiviks Marknad Industrias Alimenticias Ltda 收购 Hero Group AG 瑞士 　 其他食品制造 (3119); 食品制造 (311) 　 　 50 Swiss food group Hero Group AG has entered into an agreement to acquire a 50% stake in Brazilian jam manufacturer Kiviks Marknad Industrias Alimenticias Ltda for an undisclosed sum, the buyer's legal advisor disclosed to DealWatch. Under the "Quota Purchase Agreement", Hero Group acquired 50% plus one quota of Kiviks. Furthermore, Kiviks will change its legal nature from a limited liability commercial company into a corporation. The transaction is expected to lead to good synergies between the two companies and marks the first step that Hero Group takes into the Brazilian food and beverage market. The buyer is planning to increase the penetration of jams in the local market, by introducing fruit-based products in new segments. Kiviks, founded in 1986 in the municipality of Itatiba (Sao Paulo state, Brazil), operates as a fruit jam producer, through its Queensberry brand. The company also offers other fruit-based products in its portfolio such as smoothies. The Kiviks' jams are available in the market in eight product line with 50 different flavours. The Hero Group, established in 1886 in Lenzburg (Switzerland), is a food company that manufactures and markets products such as baby food, toddler food, jams, milks, healthy snacks and fruit drinks. In addition, the company is active in the decoration and gluten-free product markets. The Hero Group generated revenues of more than USD 1.3bn in 2014. _______________________________________________________________________________ O grupo alimentar suíço Hero Group AG entrou em um acordo para adquirir uma participação de 50% na fabricante brasileira de geléias de fruta Kiviks Marknad Indústrias Alimentícias Ltda, por um valor não revelado, o assessor jurídico da compradora revelou para o DealWatch. Sob o "Contrato de Compra de Cotas", o Hero Group adquiriu 50% e uma quota de Kiviks. Para além disso, a Kiviks vai mudar a sua natureza jurídica de sociedade empresária limitada para sociedade anônima. A transação deverá contribuir para o desenvolvimento de boas sinergias entre as duas empresas e marca a entrada do Hero Group no mercado brasileiro de alimentos e bebidas. O comprador está a planejar aumentar a penetração no segmento local de geléias, através da introdução de produtos a base de frutas em novos segmentos. A Kiviks, estabelecida em 1986 no município de Itatiba (SP, Brasil), atua como produtora de geléia a base de frutas, através da sua marca Queensberry. A empresa também oferece outros produtos a base de frutas em seu portfólio, tais como smoothies. As geléias da Kiviks estão disponíveis no mercado em oito linha e 50 sabores diferentes. O Hero Group, fundado em 1886 em Lenzburg (Suíça), é uma empresa de alimentos que fabrica e comercializa produtos como comida para bebés, comida para crianças, geléias, leites, lanches saudáveis ​​e sucos de fruta. A empresa também atua nos mercados de decoração e de produtos sem glúten. O Hero Group gerou um faturamento de mais de USD 1.3bn em 2014.
114106 08/12/2015 土耳其 Marriott The Istanbul Edition Hotel; Palmarina 收购 Vagit Alekperov - private investor; State Oil Company of Azerbaijan Republic 俄罗斯; 阿塞拜疆 Palmali Group 住宿服务 (721); 游乐场、博彩和其他休闲娱乐活动 (713) 　 100 Vagit Alekperov, the president of Russian oil major LukOil, and The State Oil Company of Azerbaijan Republic (Socar) have acquired Marriott The Istanbul Edition Hotel and Palmarina in Bodrum from Turkey-based Azeri businessman Mubariz Mansimov, the owner of Palmali Holding, Turkish magazine Para reported. No financial details were disclosed. The five-star Edition Hotel, one of most luxurious hotels in Istanbul, is located in the city's Levent district. It has 78 lavishly appointed guest rooms and features Cipriani Restaurant, Billionaire Night Club and Drawing Room. The hotel has a three-floor ESPA spa with a sauna, steam room, snow cabin, couples suite and traditional Hammam in addition to a fitness centre and indoor swimming pool. Yacht club Palmarina is located in Bodrum's Yalikavak district. It has a capacity for 69 yachts of 40 metres and above and also provides technical services to boats and yachts. Vagit Alekperov is rated by Forbes magazine as the eighth richest person in Russia. LukOil claims to be the second largest non-state publicly traded oil company worldwide by proven reserves of hydrocarbons. The group holds 0.8% of global oil reserves and 2.1% of global oil production. Palmali is mainly engaged in oil shipping and its clients include Socar and LukOil.
114152 08/12/2015 德国 Younicos AG 少数股权购买 Undisclosed investor(s); First Solar Inc; Grupo ECOS 美国; 巴拿马 　 其他电力设备和元件制造 (3359) 50 (官方数据) 　 German intelligent energy storage and grid solutions company Younicos AG said it has raised USD 50mn in a funding round with participation from Panama-based sustainable investment-focused private equity firm Grupo ECOS and U.S. photovoltaic solar energy solutions provider First Solar Inc. The round was led by an undisclosed strategic investor. Younicos said it will use the funds obtained to further develop and deploy its intelligent energy storage solutions. Younicos offers battery technology-based intelligent storage and grid solutions. It combines battery technologies and power electronics with highly sophisticated software which regulates the energy requirements of power networks. Grupo ECOS is a PE firm specialized in emerging growth, growth capital, turnaround and buyout investments in Latin America with main focus on the sustainable development segments. First Solar is a global photovoltaic solar energy solutions provider with operations in two business lines: design, manufacturing and sale of solar modules and components; and development, engineering, construction, and operation of photovoltaic solar power systems. The company generated total revenues of USD 3.39bn and a net income of USD 397mn for 2014.

ORIGINAL: Singaporean property major Frasers Centrepoint Ltd. (FCL) announced it has acquired a 29.5% in Thailand-listed property investor and manager Golden Land Property Development Pcl, following an investment of THB 3.26bn (SGD 127.2mn / USD 90.7mn). FCL has subscribed for 685,700,997 new ordinary shares of Golden Land at an issue price of THB 4.75 (SGD 0.18 / USD 0.13) apiece. Following the transaction, Univentures Pcl will remain Golden Land's majority shareholder. However, the deal will dilute Univentures Pcl stake in the target to 39.3%, from 55.7%. The deal will enable FCL to re-enter into Thailand's commercial and residential property markets, and complement its exiting business profile. Golden Property will use the proceeds to fund new investment and development of residential projects, reduce gearing and for general corporate funding. Golden Land Property Development Plc develops residential and commercial projects such as houses, town homes, office buildings and hotels. The company is listed on the Stock Exchange of Thailand and its revenues amounted to THB 4.39bn (USD 122.4mn) for 2014. Note : All multiples are calculated on a pre-money basis.

The proceeds will be used for improving the target's customer services. In November 2015, Nestpick secured USD 11mn in a Series A round. Launched in 2014 in Rotterdam, Nestpick initially started as a small portal connecting tenants with landlords through mid to long-term contracts. Later on, the company moved its head office to Berlin. Currently, the company operates in 35 cities across eight European countries and Australia. Target Global is an international VC firm with over USD 300mn in assets under management and offices in San Francisco, Berlin and Moscow. Target Global focuses primarily on fast-growing digital-enabled B2C and B2 SMB companies in e-Commerce, finTech, travel, software and mobile.
114105 08/12/2015 俄罗斯 Sollers-Isuzu 少数股权购买 Sojitz Corp 日本 Sollers 汽车整车制造 (3361) 　 　 21 UPDATE: On 25 December 2015, Sollers announced it completed the sale of its 21% interest in Sollers-Isuzu to Sojitz Corp, as well as 29% to Isuzu Motors Ltd. As a result of the deal, Isuzu Motors Ltd consolidated 74% in the target, Sojitz Corp - 26% respectively. ORIGINAL: Japanese trade and industrial corporation Sojitz Corp has obtained antitrust approval to acquire Russian company Sollers-Isuzu, a commercial vehicles joint venture between Russian automotive company Sollers and Japanese automaker Isuzu Motors, Kommersant daily reported, citing information of the Federal Antimonopoly Service. The seller is reportedly Sollers. As a result of the acquisition, Sojitz Corp will consolidate a 26% in the target. A source briefed with the matter told Kommersant that Sollers could completely exit the JV in the future and stop developing the Isuzu brand in Russia. Sollers-Isuzu was established in February 2007 and has the capacity to manufacture up to 2,500 Isuzu trucks per year. The company uses the production facilities of Sollers in Ulyanovsk. In 2014, Sollers-Isuzu generated RUB 3.67bn (USD 97.3mn) in sales and RUB 225mn (USD 5.96mn) in net earnings. Sojitz is an international trading and industrial group with operations within four divisions: machinery, energy and metals, chemicals, and consumer lifestyle. The company reported sales revenues of JPY 4.1tn (USD 32.96bn) and net income of JPY 33.1bn (USD 265mn) for FY ended 31 March 2015.

In September 2014, Investcorp bought another portfolio of office and industrial properties in Durham, NC, Seattle, WA and Jacksonville, FL for USD 250mn. The buyer acted through its U.S.-based real estate division. The deal aligns with Investcorp’s strategy to invest in well-occupied properties with healthy cash flows located in major U.S. markets displaying strong economic fundamentals and employment growth. The properties are located in Atlanta, San Francisco and Boston. They have combined area of 5.5 million sq f (510,950 m2) and an average occupancy rate of 85%. Investcorp was established in 1982. The company is mainly active in corporate, real estate and technology investment, as well as hedge funds management. It has offices in New York, London, Bahrain, Abu Dhabi and Riyadh. Investcorp is listed on the Bahrain stock exchange. As of 30 June 2015, it has USD 10.6bn in total assets under management. Its real estate group had approximately USD 1.4bn in assets under management.
113884 08/12/2015 俄罗斯 Geoprogress 收购 RussNeft 俄罗斯 Kalish Services Ltd 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 100 (官方数据) 100 Russian oil and gas company RussNeft is finalising the acquisition of Orenburg region-based counterpart Geoprogress for up to USD 100mn, the largest shareholder of RussNeft, Mikhail Gutseriev, told TV Channel Russia 24. The sole shareholder of Geoprogress is Cyprus-registered Kalish Services Ltd. The acquired asset is located close to RussNeft’s existing deposits. The acquisition will boost the buyer’s extractable hydrocarbon reserves in the Orenburg region to more than 45 million tonnes while the combined output of oil will rise to 500,000 tonnes. The extracted oil will be processed in the Orsk Oil Refinery which is affiliated to RussNeft and is projected to be modernised until 2025 with an estimated investment cost of USD 3bn. Geoprogress reportedly has 20 million tonnes of recoverable oil reserves. In 2014, the company registered a net loss of RUB 954mn (USD 25.3mn) on revenue of RUB 714mn (USD 18.9mn). The short- and long-term liabilities of Geoprogress have reached RUB 3.13bn (USD 55.1mn). RussNeft claims to be one of Russia`s top ten oil and gas companies. The group has 45 production subsidiaries and operates in 16 regions of Russia and the CIS. In 2014, its annual oil output was 8.6 million tonnes. The company's recoverable reserves of oil and gas are measured at 765 million tonnes and 177bn m3 respectively. In 2014, RussNeft generated RUB 102.4bn (USD 2.71bn) in sales.
113952 08/12/2015 巴西 Renova SA Corretora de Cambio 收购 Travelex Holdings Ltd 英国 　 证券和商品期货交易 (5232) 　 　 100 British foreign exchange company Travelex Holdings Ltd has acquired Brazilian counterpart Renova SA Corretora de Cambio for an undisclosed sum, the latter's legal advisor disclosed to DealWatch. The buyer acted through its Brazilian subsidiary Confidence Cambio. Mr. Andreas Wiemer, CEO of Confidence Cambio, said that the incorporation of Renova's assets and customer portfolio will expand the company's exchange services in Brazil. According to Brazilian media sources, Confidence Cambio will start operating more than 150 locations, executing more than 7,000 transactions per day. In addition, the buyer will start exchanging new currencies such as Dominican Peso (Dominican Republic) and Dirham (United Arab Emirates). Renova, founded in 1993 in Sao Paulo city (Sao Paulo state), is engaged in the intermediation of foreign exchange transactions. The company is focused on import and export of payments, remittances, money orders received from abroad, and others. Confidence, founded in 1997 in Sao Paulo, is Brazil's largest independent foreign exchange company with a network of stores in shopping malls and airports. Travelex, established in 1976, is an international provider of foreign exchange and international payments services. The company provides cash and prepaid cards to over 37,000 corporate clients each year through a network of 1,500 stores in 28 countries. ______________________________________________________________________________________ A provedora britânica de soluções em câmbio Travelex Holdings Ltd adquiriu a empresa brasileira do mesmo ramo Renova SA Corretora de Câmbio por um valor não revelado, o assessor jurídico da empresa-alvo revelou para o DealWatch. O Sr. Andreas Wiemer, CEO da Confidence Cambio, disse que a incorporação dos ativos e do portfólio de clientes da Renova ia expandir os serviços de câmbio da empresa no Brasil. De acordo com fontes da mídia brasileira, Confidence Cambio vai passar a operar mais de 150 localizações e a realizar mais de 7,000 operações por dia. A compradora já pode contar com novas moedas como, por exemplo, Peso Dominicano (República Dominicana) e Dirham (Emirados Árabes Unidos). A Renova, fundada em 1993 na cidade de São Paulo (SP), está envolvida na intermediação de operações de câmbio. A empresa é focada em importação e exportação de pagamentos, remessas, ordens de pagamento recebidas do estrangeiro, entre outros. O Grupo Confidence, fundado em 1997, em São Paulo, é a maior empresa independente de câmbio no Brasil com uma rede de lojas em shoppings e aeroportos. A Travelex, fundada em 1976, é uma fornecedora global de soluções em câmbio e pagamentos internacionais. A empresa fornece moeda estrangeira e cartões pré-pagos para mais de 37,000 clientes corporativos a cada ano, por meio de uma rede de 1,500 lojas em 28 países.

Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Golden Peanut and Tree Nuts had been operating the facility under lease since May 2015. 116119 07/12/2015 阿尔巴尼亚 Velca Block concession 收购 Pennine Petroleum Corp 加拿大 Government of Albania 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 　 　 100 Canadian oil & gas company Pennine Petroleum Corp. announced it has won the tender for acquiring Albanian onshore Velca Block, in an international auction held by the Albanian government. Financial details were not disclosed. The oil field concession was granted by the Ministry of Energy and Industry. The award is conditional and subject to certain terms and conditions. The buyer has also been offered the right to negotiate a production sharing contract (PSC) for the oil exploration block with Albania's national oil company Albpetrol Sh.A. Velca Block is located 10 km southeast of the coastal city of Vlore, southern Albania, and covers an area of 620 km2. The block contains hydrocarbon reservoirs of Ionian sub thrust carbonates, which are similar in structure to reservoirs of the foothills of western Alberta in Canada. Pennine Petroleum Corp. is an emerging oil & gas exploration and development company with operations in Alberta and Saskatchewan, Western Canada. The company is in the process of expanding internationally.
114970 07/12/2015 拉脱维亚 Naco Technologies 收购 Schaeffler AG 德国 Proks Capital; ZGI Capital; Imprimatur Capital; Undisclosed sellers 金属表面处理及热处理加工 (3328) 　 　 100 German automotive and industrial supplier Schaeffler has acquired Latvian coating systems developer Naco Technologies, the target company announced. The sellers are venture capital firms Imprimatur Capital, ZGI Capital, Proks Capital, and other shareholders and founders. The value of the transaction was not revealed. Naco Technologies was founded in 2010. The company's patented technology is based on high-speed ion-plasma magnetron sputtering (HsIPMS) in a vacuum chamber (European patent Nr 2050837). It can produce a wide range of high performance multi-layer, multi-component coatings for equipment used in tooling, automotive, aerospace and micro-chip industries. Schaeffler Group is a leading global integrated automotive and industrial supplier. The company has 170 locations in 50 countries and employs 84,000 people. It had revenues of EUR 12.4bn in 2014. Currently, Schaeffler carries out coating at over 20 locations around the world.

Other investors included U.S. venture capital firm American Express Ventures (Amex Ventures), U.S. private equity and venture capital firm Endeavor Catalyst, U.S. VC company Sierra Ventures, as well as Mexican investors Fondo de Fondos, Angel Ventures Mexico, and certain angel investors. The stake acquired by the investors was not disclosed. Clip will use the funds obtained to further develop its business and to grasp the growth opportunities posed by the enhanced penetration of financial technologies. PayClip develops the credit card portable reader device Clip which enables users to accept credit card payments via their smartphones and tablets. Alta Ventures Mexico is a private equity and venture capital firm focused on innovative companies, which are mainly engaged in the IT sector. The PE & VC vehicle mainly invests in Mexican and US-based, Latin America-focused companies. It injects capital of between USD 0.05mn and USD 7mn in enterprises with maximum sales of USD 10mn. American Express Ventures invests in start-ups operating primarily in the mobile, consumer and business payments segments. Sierra Ventures focuses on incubation, seed, start-ups, early venture, mid venture, growth capital, and emerging growth investments. Fondo de Fondos invests in early venture, mid venture, late venture, middle market, later stage, and buyout primarily in Mexico. Angel Ventures Mexico provides financial resources to small and medium enterprises operating in the technology, energy, and real estate development sectors.
114146 07/12/2015 巴西 Relsa Brasil Locacao de Veiculos Ltda 收购 BNP Paribas SA 法国 Empresas Relsa SA 汽车设备租赁 (5321) 　 　 100 French bank BNP Paribas SA, acting via its fully-owned vehicle leasing subsidiary Arval, announced it has agreed to acquire Relsa Brasil Locacao de Veiculos Ltda, the Brazilian subsidiary of Chilean vehicle leasing firm Empresas Relsa SA. Financial terms were not disclosed. Arval also agreed to form joint venture companies in Chile and Peru with Empresas Relsa. Philippe Bismut, CEO of Arval, said that by joining forces with Empresas Relsa, the company strengthens its presence in South America and becomes a leading full service leasing player in the region. The stakes to be held by BNP and Relsa in each of the JV firms were not revealed. The transactions are subject to regulatory and other approvals and are expected to close during the first quarter of 2016. Arval is a full service leasing player with a fleet of 930,000 vehicles globally, as of November 2015. BNP Paribas offers retail, corporate and institutional banking services worldwide. It generated net income of EUR 157mn (USD 171mn) for 2014. Empresas Relsa operates as a full service leasing company with operations in Chile, Peru and Brazil. Currently the company has a fleet of 12,000 vehicles under management. It is controlled by Chilean investing holding company Empresas Juan Yarur SAC, engaged in the banking, insurance, food processing and other sectors, and which registered revenues exceeding USD 3.4bn in 2014.
114130 07/12/2015 开曼群岛 Dolphin Cove Cayman dolphinarium 收购 Controladora Dolphin SA de CV (Dolphin Discovery Group) 墨西哥 Stafford Burrowes - private investor; Undisclosed sellers 游乐场、博彩和其他休闲娱乐活动 (713) 　 　 100 Mexican amusement parks operator Controladora Dolphin SA de CV, better known as Dolphin Discovery Group, announced the acquisition of a dolphinarium on the island of Grand Cayman which is known as Dolphin Cove Cayman. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. "We are really proud to add up to our parks and dolphinariums Dolphin Cove Cayman, which will allow us consolidate our service in one of the most beautiful and visited places in the Caribbean: Cayman Islands," said Dolphin Discovery Group CEO Eduardo Albor. "Last month, we sold a majority stake of Dolphin Cove Jamaica to Dolphin Discovery and we then took the decision to sell, Dolphin Cove Cayman, to Dolphin Discovery Cayman. This acquisition will allow consolidation of this dolphinarium as part of the leading company in swimming with dolphins programs worldwide," said Dolphin Cove Cayman founder Stafford Burrowes. Dolphin Cove Cayman began operations in 2008 and some of the attractions it offers include Nature Trail, which is a tour where guests can see and learn about birds such macaws, cockatoos and parakeets, as well as a visit to Stingray City, which includes a series of shallow sandbars. Dolphin Discovery Group owns and operates 23 amusement parks and dolphinariums in Mexico, the Caribbean, the United States, and Europe. The company offers dolphin swimming programs, tours, animal training programs, shark programs, water action and other recreation activities.
114098 07/12/2015 智利; 秘鲁 A joint venture between BNP Paribas and Empresas Relsa in Chile; A joint venture between BNP Paribas and Empresas Relsa in Peru 合资企业 BNP Paribas SA; Empresas Relsa SA 法国; 智利 　 汽车设备租赁 (5321) 　 　 　 UPDATE: On 2 February 2016, Arval and Empresas Relsa completed the formation of the joint venture firm, media sources reported. ORIGINAL: French bank BNP Paribas SA, acting via its fully-owned vehicle leasing subsidiary Arval, announced it has agreed to form joint venture companies in Chile and Peru with Chilean vehicle leasing firm Empresas Relsa SA. Financial terms were not disclosed. Philippe Bismut, CEO of Arval, said that by joining forces with Empresas Relsa, the company strengthens its presence in South America and becomes a leading full service leasing player in the region. Arval has also agreed to acquire Empresas Relsa's Brazilian operations. The stakes to be held by BNP and Relsa in each of the JV firms were not revealed. The transactions are subject to regulatory and other approvals and are expected to close during the first quarter of 2016. Empresas Relsa operates as a full service leasing company with operations in Chile, Peru and Brazil. Currently the company has a fleet of 12,000 vehicles under management. It is controlled by Chilean investing holding company Empresas Juan Yarur SAC, engaged in the banking, insurance, food processing and other sectors, and which registered revenues exceeding USD 3.4bn in 2014. Arval is a full service leasing player with a fleet of 930,000 vehicles globally, as of November 2015. BNP Paribas offers retail, corporate and institutional banking services worldwide. It generated net income of EUR 157mn (USD 171mn) for 2014.
113889 07/12/2015 俄罗斯 Azur Air 收购 Anex Tourism Group 土耳其 UTair 航空运输 (481) 　 　 100 Russian air carrier UTair Group has divested a 100% stake in its charter flights unit Katekavia (brand Azur Air) in September 2015, according to the seller’s 2014 consolidated financial statements. According to ch-aviation.com, the buyer is Turkish travel services holding Anex Tourism Group (ATG). The amount of the transaction was not disclosed. It also became clear, that the target has stopped using the legal name Katekavia after the sale, ato.ru reported. In November 2014, UTair announced that it would launch a new charter operation under the air operator certificate of Katekavia - Azur Air. It was then decided that Azur Air would receive all nine long-haul aircrafts Boeing 757-200 that were previously exploited by the parent group. To date, the fleet of Azur Air includes also five wide-bodied Boeing 767-300 whose transfer to the company completed in August 2015. According to data of Rosaviation, Azur Air carried 2.1 million passengers in the first ten months of 2015, which is 11.7 times more than a year before. Currently, the air company occupies 11th place among Russian carriers. ATG was founded in 1996 in Antalya as an incoming travel agency focused on Russia. Today, the group is active in 7 countries, adding to its portfolio tour operations, hotel and aviation services.

The group also owns medicine products manufacturer Cosmetica Internacional SA (Coinsa) and drugs distributors Medilab and Euromed.

Completion of the transaction is subject to regulatory approvals and is expected to be completed in H1 2016. The buyer will settle the transaction by first acquiring 62,758,389 shares at the price of USD 17.9 apiece, or USD 35.8 per ADS, in exchange for a 65.13% stake. Then the buyer will issue 33,621,685 shares valued at CNY 15.7 (USD 2.5) each to the target company's shareholders in exchange for the remaining 34.87% stake. BTG Hotels (Group) will establish two overseas special purpose subsidiaries BTG Hotels Group (HK) Holdings Co Ltd and BTG Hotels Group (Cayman) Holdings Co Ltd for the acquisition. BTG also announced that its cash purchase in the deal will come by way of a loan worth USD 1.2bn from the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Ltd. Sellers in the deal include Poly Victory Investments Ltd, Neil Nanpeng Shen, James Jianzhang Liang, David Jian Sun and Ctrip Travel Information Technology (Shanghai) Co Ltd. Homeinns Hotel Group, founded in 2002, operates various hotels and also provides accommodation, hotel management and hotel catering services. BTG Hotels (Group) Co Ltd provides tourism services, operates about 170 hotels and resorts as well as providing transportation and travel arrangement services. The company is listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of CNY 2.8bn (USD 437.5mn) in 2014.
113887 07/12/2015 爱沙尼亚 Eurex CS 收购 G4S Plc 英国 Eurex Capital 调查和保安活动 (5616) 　 　 100 U.K.-based security solutions provider G4S has acquired Estonian sector firm Eurex CS, Baltic News Service reported. The transaction value was not disclosed. Following the deal, the target company will operate under the G4S brand. Eurex CS provides armored cash transportation services. G4S is a global provider of secure and cash solutions. The secure solutions include integrated security solutions such as risk consulting, manned security and security system and others. The cash solutions include the outsourcing of cash cycle management of central banks, financial institutions and retailers, ATM cash & network management, cash logistics services and others. G4S is listed on the LSE. The company employs some 623,000 people in 110 countries. It posted revenues of GBP 6.75bn and net profit of GBP 152mn in 2014.
113865 07/12/2015 塞尔维亚 C Market 少数股权购买 Louis Delhaize Group 比利时 Privatisation Agency of Serbia 超市和食品杂货店 (4451) 12.85 (官方数据) 16.26 Belgian international food retailer Delhaize Group has agreed to acquire additional 16.26% stake in Serbian grocery store chain C Market for EUR 11.8mn (USD 12.8mn), eKapija reported. The buyer has won the public tender for the sale of minority stake in C Market, after Serbia's Privatisation Agency suspended twice the sale procedures of C Market due to a probe into the company earlier privatisation in 2011. In late 2014, Delhaize group withdrew its offer. However, Delhaize group has resubmitted its offer, within the public tender's time-frame and conditions, and the Serbian Privatisation Agency said it has accepted its offer. The deal is subject to regulatory approval. The sale price is higher than the starting bid price of EUR 9.3mn (USD 10.3mn). Delhaize group has been the only interested buyer, and it is acting in the transaction through Luxembourg-based subsidiary Lion Retail Holding. In July 2011, Delhaize bought C Market from the businessman Miroslav Miskovic for EUR 932.5mn, including its net debt of EUR 318mn. The Belgian group now owns a 75.4% stake in C Market, and it is one of the leading food retailer in Serbia, with a network of 387 stores throughout the country and more than 10,000 employees. Delhaize Group, founded in 1867, operates currently on three continents. Recently, in June 2015, Delhaize announced it will be taken over by Dutch global grocer Royal Ahold for nearly EUR 9.32bn in stocks, in what will be the largest transaction in the retail industry in almost 10 years.
113866 07/12/2015 瓜德罗普岛（法属） Geothermie Bouillante SA 私有化 Ormat Technologies Inc 美国 Government of France 地热发电 (221116) 　 　 85 U.S. renewable energy company Ormat Technologies (ORA) announced that it has agreed to acquire an 85% stake in Guadeloupe-based geothermal power producer Geothermie Bouillante at a total company enterprise value of up to EUR 52mn (USD 56.6mn). The seller is Sageos holding, a fully owned subsidiary of the French geological survey Bureau de Recherches Geologiques et Minieres (BRGM). Under the deal, Ormat will initially get an 80% stake in Geothermie Bouillante, which will be increased to 85% within two years by capital investment. The purchase consideration will be paid in installments in accordance with the specific milestones, including production milestones, expected to be achieved in the next few years. "This acquisition represents another milestone in the execution of our strategic plan to expand our global footprint and enhance our portfolio through targeted M&A activity," said Ormat CEO Isaac Angel. Geothermie Bouillante owns and operates a 14.75 MW geothermal power plant and owns two exploration licenses with a total additional potential capacity of up to 30 MW on the island of Guadeloupe. The company has two power purchase agreements (PPAs) with French power utility Electricite de France SA (EDF). A a new 15-year PPA with EDF with improved energy rates which will replace these PPAs is expected to enter into force in January 2016. Ormat said that it's confident it can optimise the use of the resource and existing facilities at the thermal plant of Geothermie Bouillante and recover its current approximate production of 10 MW to its designed production of 14.75 MW by mid-2017. Ormat added that it plans to make modifications to the existing equipment as well as to further develop the asset, with a potential of reaching a total of 45 MW in phased development by 2021. Ormat Technologies owns, operates, designs, manufactures and sells geothermal and recovered energy generation (REG) power plants and it has 69 U.S. patents. The company's currently has a 666 MW generating portfolio in the USA, Guatemala and Kenya. Ormat Technologies is listed on the New York and Tel Aviv stock exchanges and had a market capitalisation of USD 1.75bn on 7 December 2015.

The deal is subject to regulatory and government approvals. Tata AIA Life Insurance Co is an insurance JV of Tata Sons and AIA Group which offers life insurance through protection, wealth, savings and child solutions. The firm was formed in 2001 and is based in Mumbai. AIA Group is a Hong Kong-based International life insurance firm which has presence in 18 countries in the Asia-Pacific Region. It has issued over 26 million individual and 16 million group insurance policies. The firm is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange (HKG) and has total assets of USD 172bn as of 31 May 2015.
113833 07/12/2015 新加坡 Neptune Orient Lines Ltd 收购 CMA CGM SA 法国 Temasek Holdings (Pte) Ltd 水上运输业 (483) 1,606.18 (官方数据) 66.84 French global container shipping company CMA CGM SA has agreed to buy a 66.84% stake in Singaporean counterpart Neptune Orient Lines Ltd. (NOL) from Singapore's state-owned investment firm Temasek Holding for SGD 2.26bn (USD 1.60bn) in cash. CMA CGM will acquire around 1.74 billion NOL shares at an offer price of SGD 1.30 (USD 0.93) apiece. The deal is subject to certain conditions precedent, including approvals by U.S., European Union and Chinese regulators. It is expected to complete by mid-2016. The transaction was unanimously approved and recommended by NOL's board members. Temasek, one of the target's major shareholders, supported the offer of CMA CGM and will tender all of its shares. As part of the deal, CMA CGM will also offer to buy the other 33.16% of the target's publicly traded shares at the same offer price for a total of SGD 1.21bn (USD 801.6mn). The whole transaction for 100% of NOL's share capital would be worth SGD 3.38bn (USD 2.42bn). The offer price of SGD 1.30 per share represents a premium of 48.6% over the target's share closing price of SGD 0.875 on 16 July 2015, the last unaffected trading day immediately preceding the deal announcement. The acquisition will enable CMA CGM to strengthen its geographical presence, consolidate its position on strategic trade routes, and increase its fleet size to 563 vessels. Following the deal, CMA CGM will have a global market share of approximately 11.5%, and a combined turnover of approximately USD 22.0bn. Neptune Orient Lines Ltd (est. 1968) offers transcontinental cargo shipping across Asia, North and South America, Europe, the Middle East, the Indian subcontinent and Australia through more than 80 weekly services at 160 ports worldwide. The company is Southeast Asia's largest container vessels and terminal services provider, with around 180 offices in the world and 7,400 employees. Neptune Orient Lines is present in over 50 countries and operates 94 vessels. Its shares are listed on the Singapore Exchange and it posted revenues of USD 8.61bn for 2014. CMA CGM (est. in 1978) is among the leading shipping groups gobally. It operates 469 vessels working 170 shipping lanes, and calling more than 400 ports in the world, on all 5 continents. The company is present in 160 countries, through its 655 agencies network, and employs 22,000 people worldwide, including 2,400 in its headquarter in Marseille. In 2014, CMA CGM booked revenues of USD 16.7bn. Temasek Holdings is an investment company wholly-owned by Singapore's Ministry of Finance. It focuses on investing in the financial services, telecommunications, technology, transportation and energy sectors, among others. Temasek reported total assets under management of SGD 405.8mn (USD 290.0mn) for FY ended 31 March 2015. Note: Operating leases were capitalised and included towards long-term debt for the purpose of net debt calculation.

Through the acquisition, Healthe Care Australia will be able to provide a platform to build world class and highly successful healthcare services in various countries in Asia. The deal also serves as the entry of Luye Pharma Group in the Australian market. Healthe Care Australia Pty Ltd provides health services to its clients and patients. It operates 17 private hospitals across five states in Australia. Founded in 1994, Luye Pharma Group Co provides medical services such as rehabilitation, women's hospital, dentistry, health screening, geriatrics, oncology and other related services. The round was also participated by existing investors Singapore's healthcare fund BioVeda Capital, Chinese investment firms Morningside and Cenova, and U.S. venture firm Sagamore Bioventures. Other new investors included Hong Kong-based Tianda Pharmaceuticals Ltd and U.S. venture firm MVP Capital. ASLAN will use the proceeds to further accelerate the clinical development of four novel therapeutic agents, which have the potential to treat tumour types highly prevalent in Asia. The current financing round follows a USD 12.0mn Series A funding that ASLAN had secured in 2011, and a USD 22.0mn Series B round in 2013. ASLAN Pharmaceuticals, founded in 2010, focused on the development of immunotherapies and targeted agents for Asia prevalent tumour types, such as gastric cancer, cholangiocarcinoma and hepatocellular carcinoma. The company develops novel medicines for the global healthcare market. Accuron Technologies is a precision engineering and management consultancy services provider, which serves the aerospace, electronics and medical industries.
