114060 06/12/2015 巴西; 印度尼西亚; 菲律宾; 新加坡; 比利时; 爱尔兰; 荷兰; 美国 Bridon Bekaert Ropes Group 合资企业 Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan (OTPP); NV Bekaert SA 加拿大; 比利时 　 钢材制造 (3312) 　 　 100 Belgian steel wire manufacturer NV Bekaert SA and Canadian pension fund Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan Board (OTPP) announced the creation of global joint venture for ropes and cords production called Bridon Bekaert Ropes Group. Under the agreement, Bekaert will have a 67% stake in the joint venture, while OTPP will hold the remaining 33%. The new group will have operations in 11 countries across Latin America (including Brazil), Canada, Australia, Europe and the U.S., and will combine the ropes and advanced cords facilities in 19 manufacturing entities, with a team of more than 3,000 employees. The business is expected to generate around EUR 600mn (USD 652.6mn) in sales in 2016. The newly-created entity is expected to leverage the scale of Bekaert and Bridon and increase value creation for the customers of the new group. In addition, the transaction is estimated to add around EUR 350mn (USD 381mn) to Bekaert's revenues on an annual basis. The agreement is subject to regulatory approvals and the fulfilment of certain conditions, and it's expected to close during the first half of 2016. OTPP is Canada's largest single-profession pension fund with USD 154.5bn in net assets as of 31 December 2014, specialised in equity, fixed income, and alternative investment portfolios. With a team of more than a 1,000 employees in offices in Toronto and London, the company serves more than 311,000 working and retired teachers. Bekaert, established in 1880, is an international provider of steel wire transformation and coatings solutions to customers from the agriculture, automotive, construction, energy and consumer goods sectors in more than 120 countries. Bekaert is listed on the NYSE Euronext Brussels Stock Exchange and posted EUR 3.22bn (USD 4.3bn) in revenues and a net income of EUR 87mn (USD 116mn) in 2014. ____________________________________________________________________________ A fabricante belga de arame de aço NV Bekaert SA e o fundo de pensão canadense Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan Board (OTPP) anunciaram a criação de uma parceria estratégica de produção de cordas e cabos de aço, denominada Bridon Bekaert Ropes Group. Pelo acordo, a Bekaert vai controlar 67% na joint venture, enquanto a OTPP vai ficar com a parcela remanescente de 33%. O novo grupo vai ter operações em 11 países na América Latina (incluindo o Brasil), Canadá, Austrália, Europa e os EUA, e vai combinar as instalações de fabricação de cordas e cabos de 19 entidades produtivas, com uma equipe de mais de 3,000 colaboradores. O negócio deverá gerar cerca de EUR 600mn (USD 652.6mn) em 2016. Existem expetativas que a entidade recém-criada alavanque a escala de Bekaert e da Bridon e crie valor adicionado para os clientes do novo grupo. Além disso, estima-se que a transação incremente as vendas da Bekaert em aproximadamente EUR 350mn (USD 381mn), numa base anual. O acordo está sujeito a aprovações regulatórias e ao cumprimento de determinadas condições, e deverá fechar durante o primeiro semestre de 2016. O OTPP é o maior fundo de pensão profissional do Canadá com USD 154.5bn em ativos líquidos em 31 de dezembro de 2014, especializado em investimentos em renda fixa, renda variável e investimentos alternativos. Com uma equipe de 900 colaboradores em escritórios em Toronto e Londres, a empresa atende a mais de 311,000 professores ativos e aposentados. A Bekaert, fundada em 1880, é uma fornecedora internacional de soluções de transformação e revestimento de arame de aço para clientes dos setores da agricultura, automotivo, construção, energia e bens de consumo em mais de 120 países. Listada na Bolsa de Valores de Bruxelas, a Bekaert gerou um faturamento de EUR 3.22bn (USD 4.3bn) e um lucro líquido de EUR 87mn (USD 116mn) em 2014.

(est. 1983) offers civil engineering works, including excavation, piling, substructures and superstructures works, architectural works, aluminium cladding and curtain walling, mechanical and electrical works, interior fitting-out works, external works and landscaping. Financial terms were not disclosed. Following this operation, Andreas Ignacio Keller Sarmiento no longer holds any interest in Genneia. Further transaction details were not disclosed. On the same day, 4 December 2015, Genneia also announced that U.S. investment firm PointState Argentum LLC (Argentum) and Argentinean investment holding firm Prado Largo SA have acquired a combined 47.32% interest in the company for an undisclosed sum. Ivanissevich (3.68%), while Prado Largo purchased 4.39% from Fides Group (4.19%) and Alejandro P. Ivanissevich (0.2%). Genneia, formerly known as Empresa de Gas del Sudeste SA (Emgasud), generates and distributes electricity from wind and thermal energy sources, and distributes natural gas. The company also develops energy projects using renewable sources, including solar thermal technologies. Currently it owns and operates nine thermal power plants with total capacity of 276MW, the wind park Rawson (77.4MW), and plans to develop the 220MW wind power project Puerto Madryn. Genneia reported total revenues of ARS 1.3bn (USD 134mn) and a net income of ARS 7.3mn (USD 0.75mn) for 2014. Fintech Advisory is an investment and private equity company of Mexican entrepreneur David Martinez. Through Fintech, Martinez owns a 40% stake in Argentinean media company Cablevision of the Clarin Group.
114023 04/12/2015 阿根廷 Genneia SA 少数股权购买 Prado Largo SA; PointState Argentum LLC 阿根廷; 美国 Alejandro P. Ivanissevich - private investor; Fides Group SA; Juan Manuel Arias - private investor; Fintech Advisory Inc; Jorge Horacio Brito - private investor; Delfin Jorge Ezequiel Carballo - private investor; Jorge Pablo Brito - private investor 风力发电 (221115); 地热发电 (221116); 电力传送，控制和分配 (22112) (DW 估计) 47.32 Argentinean energy company Genneia announced that U.S. investment firm PointState Argentum LLC (Argentum) and Argentinean investment holding firm Prado Largo SA have acquired a combined 47.32% interest in the company, accepting the sellers' irrevocable offer. Under the offer Argentum, acting via Argentum Investments I LLC, purchased a total participation of 42.71%, with the remaining 4.61% being bought by Prado Largo. Financial terms were not disclosed. PointState Argentum acquired 38.72% from Argentinean holding company Fides Group SA (35.04%) and local private investor Alejandro P. Ivanissevich (3.68%), while Prado Largo purchased 4.39% from Fides Group (4.19%) and Alejandro P. Ivanissevich (0.2%). The other selling shareholders and their respective offloaded stakes included Juan Manuel Arias (1.89% to Argentum and 0.1% to Prado Largo), U.S. investment firm Fintech Advisory Inc, acting via Fintech Energy LLC, (0.95% to Argentum and 0.05% to Prado Largo), private investor Jorge Horacio Brito (0.32% to Argentum and 0.02% Prado Largo), private investor Jorge Pablo Brito (0.51% to Argentum and 0.03% to Prado Largo), and local entrepreneur Delfin Jorge Ezequiel Carballo (0.32% to Argentum and 0.02% to Prado Largo). In a separate operation, Argentinean private investor Andreas Ignacio Keller Sarmiento has agreed to sell his 11.64% stake in Genneia to Fintech Advisory (5.82%), Jorge Horacio Brito (1.94%), Jorge Pablo Brito (1.94%) and Delfin Jorge Ezequiel Carballo (1.94%). Following completion of both operations Fides Group SA, Alejandro P. Ivanissevich, Juan Manuel Arias and Andreas Ignacio Keller Sarmiento will no longer hold any interest in Genneia. The largest shareholders becomes Argentum with a 42.71% interest. Genneia, formerly known as Empresa de Gas del Sudeste SA (Emgasud), generates and distributes electricity from wind and thermal energy sources, and distributes natural gas. The company also develops energy projects using renewable sources, including solar thermal technologies. Currently it owns and operates nine thermal power plants with total capacity of 276MW, the wind park Rawson (77.4MW), and plans to develop the 220MW wind power project Puerto Madryn. Genneia reported total revenues of ARS 1.3bn (USD 134mn) and a net income of ARS 7.3mn (USD 0.75mn) for 2014. PointState Argentum is an investment firm focused on investments in Argentina.
113848 04/12/2015 巴西 Company resulting from merger between BDO RCS and auditing and outsourcing operations of Baker Tilly in Brazil 合并 BDO RCS Independent Auditors; Baker Tilly International 巴西; 英国 　 会计、审计、簿记及税务服务 (5412); 办公支持服务 (5614) 　 100 Brazilian accounting and auditing services provider BDO RCS Independent Auditors and part of the Brazilian subsidiary of international audit network Baker Tilly have agreed to merge operations, local economics and business magazine Exame reported. Financial terms were not disclosed. The agreement includes the auditing and outsourcing portfolio of Baker Tilly Brasil in Sao Paulo city (Sao Paulo state) and in Ribeirao Preto (Sao Paulo state), and its outsourcing business in Rio de Janeiro city (Rio de Janeiro state). The combined company will have around 1,300 employees and is expected to have a turnover of more than BRL 160mn (USD 42mn) in 2015. Mr. Raul Correa da Silva, president of BDO, commented that the merger will strengthen the company's auditing, tax, outsourcing and advisory portfolio. He added that the operation will reinforce BDO's leading position in the capital market, as well as in the middle market in Brazil. BDO, established in 1985, provides accounting, bookkeeping, and related auditing services. It has almost 1,500 corporate customers from the food, construction, textile, retail, metallurgy, medicine and health sectors, among others. Baker Tilly Brasil provides auditing, management consulting, tax consulting and outsourcing services to micro, small, medium and large enterprises. The firm operates offices in 10 Brazilian states. ___________________________________________________________________________________ A provedora brasileira de serviços de contabilidade e auditoria BDO RCS Independent Auditors e uma parte da subsidiária brasileira da rede internacional de auditoria Baker Tilly entraram em um acordo para fundir as suas operações, a local revista de economia e negócios Exame apurou. Os termos financeiros não foram divulgados. O acordo inclui a carteira de auditoria e outsourcing da Baker Tilly Brasil na cidade de São Paulo (SP) e em Ribeirão Preto (SP), e o seu negócio de terceirização na cidade do Rio de Janeiro (RJ). A empresa combinada vai ter cerca de 1,300 colaboradores e espera faturar mais de BRL 160mn (USD 42mn) em 2015. O Sr. Raul Correa da Silva, presidente da BDO, comentou que a fusão reforçava o portfólio de auditoria, impostos, consultoria de outsourcing da empresa. Ele acrescentou que a operação ia fortificar a posição de liderança da BDO no mercado de capitais, bem como no mercado médio brasileiro. A BDO, criada em 1985, opera como provedora de serviços de contabilidade, auditoria e outros serviços relacionados. A empresa tem uns 1.500 clientes corporativos dos setores de alimentos, construção civil, têxtil, comércio varejista, metalurgia, medicina e saúde, entre outros. A Baker Tilly Brasil oferece serviços de auditoria, consultoria de gestão, consultoria tributária e terceirização de serviços para micro, pequenas, médias e grandes empresas. A empresa opera escritórios em 10 estados brasileiros.
113882 04/12/2015 美国 Blue Apron Inc 少数股权购买 Target Global 俄罗斯 　 速递服务 (492); 互联网出版与传播 (516) 13 (官方数据) 0.65 Russian venture fund Target Global has invested USD 13mn for a 0.65% stake in U.S. grocery delivery service Blue Apron, Vedomosti daily reported, citing the fund’s managing director Mikhail Lobanov. Target Global expects a public offering of its shares in the target within two years and profitability of at least 50%. It is not clear whether the acquired stake represented new shares or it was purchased from an existing shareholder. So far, Blue Apron has attracted USD 193mn in four rounds from 16 investors. New York-based Blue Apron was set up in 2012. The company goes shopping for its clients at wholesale prices and delivers the ingredients needed to prepare a meal at home. Target Global is an international VC firm with over USD 300mn in assets under management and offices in San Francisco, Berlin and Moscow. Target Global focuses primarily on fast-growing digital-enabled B2C and B2 SMB companies in e-Commerce, finTech, travel, software and mobile.
113846 04/12/2015 马拉维; 莫桑比克; 赞比亚 Greenbelt Fertilizers Ltd 收购 Yara International ASA 挪威 　 肥料制造业业 (32531); 其他非耐用品的批发 (4229) 51 (官方数据) 100 Norway-based fertilizer producer Yara International ASA announced the acquisition of Zambian fertilizer distributor Greenbelt Fertilizers for USD 51mn. Yara said that the purchase re-confirms its long-term commitment to Africa and that Greenbelt will further improve its downstream position within a fast-growing agricultural region. The transaction is subject to competition authority approval and other customary closing conditions and is expected to close in the first quarter of 2016. Greenbelt started operations in Zambia in 2004 and currently sells of 80 kilotons of fertilizers annually mainly in Zambia, Malawi and Mozambique. The company owns three blending plants and three warehouses and it generated EBITDA of USD 5mn in the year ended 31 March 2015. Yara, established in 1905 in Oslo, is a multinational producer and distributor of nutrients fertilizers, compounds and micronutrients. The company sells its products in more than 150 countries and employs more than 12,000 people. Yara is listed on the Oslo Stock Exchange, and posted NOK 95.3bn (USD 15.16bn) in revenues and a net profit of NOK 7.6bn (USD 1.21mn) in 2014.
113829 04/12/2015 波兰 Wojcik Fashion Sp z oo Sp J 收购 21 Partners 意大利 　 服装制造 (315); 服装、服饰店 (448) 　 　 80 UPDATE: On 17 February 2016, 21 Concordia has completed the deal. ORIGINAL: Italian private equity group 21 Partners has asked approval for the acquisition of local children clothes manufacturer Wojcik Fashion, Polish competition regulator UOKiK said. The buyer is acting through the Luxembourg-based company Polinvest 4. The transaction will be carried out in two stages. In the first stage, the buyer will acquire a 68.93% stake In Wojcik Fashion. In the second stage, 21 Concordia will acquire new shares in the company and will obtain an 80% stake. Wojcik Fashion was established in 1987. The company produces children clothes under brand names Wojcik, Lady Diamond, and Ceremony. 21 Partners, founded in 1992, is a private equity group focused on Italy, France, Switzerland, and Poland. To date, the company has completed over 80 investments. It raised capital of EUR 1.6bn from global institutions. In Poland, the group operates through the fund 21 Concordia, which is supported by European Investment Fund (EIF), European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD), and Polish Growth Fund of Funds (PGFF).
113824 04/12/2015 智利 Transmisora Electrica del Norte SA (TEN) 收购 Red Electrica de Espana SAU 西班牙 E.CL SA 电力传送，控制和分配 (22112) 278 (官方数据) 50 UPDATE: On 25 January 2016, E.CL said that the European Commission has given green light to the proposed transaction. The Chilean firm concluded that on 27 January it will sign other contracts and documents necessary for closing the deal. ORIGINAL: Spanish electricity transmitter Red Electrica de Espana SAU (REE) announced it has agreed to acquire a 50% stake in Chilean electricity transmission company Transmisora Electrica del Norte SA (TEN) from Chilean electricity firm E.CL SA for USD 278mn (CLP 195.3bn). The deal value comprises a USD 217.6mn (CLP 152.8bn) payment for the entire share capital of TEN, plus a USD 61mn (CLP 42.85bn) payment for 50% of the shareholder loan which E.CL has against TEN, and whose total value is currently estimated at about USD 122mn (CLP 85.7bn). REE acted via its subsidiary Red Electrica Internacional SAU (REI), which in turn acted via Red Electrica Chile SpA (RE Chile). REE said that this acquisition is an important step forward in its 2014-2019 strategic plan. Transmisora Electrica del Norte carries out the Mejillones-Cardones transmission project, consisting of the construction of a 500 kV electricity transmission line stretching 600km in the north of the country, and will connect Chile's Central Interconnected System to the Norte Grande Interconnected System. Currently, the project is in construction stage and requires an investment of USD 780mn. It is expected to be commissioned during the second half of 2017 and will generate annual revenues of USD 90mn. Red Electrica de Espana transmits electricity, operates electricity systems and manages the electricity transmission grid in Spain.
113821 04/12/2015 智利; 秘鲁 Bupa Chile SA 少数股权购买 Grupo Bupa Sanitas SL 西班牙 Grupo Said 健康服务和社会福利业 (62) 89.36 (官方数据) 17.35 Chilean investment firm Inmobiliaria Atlantis SA, linked to the Chilean group Grupo Said, announced it has agreed to sell its 17.35% stake in local health care services provider Bupa Chile SA, formerly Cruz Blanca Salud SA, to Spanish clinics and hospitals owner and operator Grupo Bupa Sanitas SL (GBS) for approximately CLP 62.84bn (USD 89.4mn). The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals. Following completion of this deal, GBS will increase its interest in Bupa Chile from 56.38% to 73.73%. The Spanish firm will also launch a tender offer for the remaining Bupa Chile shares. The tender offer starts on 10 December and involves a unitary share price of CLP 568 (USD 0.808). For its part, Grupo Said will no longer be a shareholder of Bupa Chile. Grupo Bupa Sanitas acquired a 56% participation in Bupa Chile in early 2014 for approximately CLP 188.8bn (then USD 339mn). Bupa Chile is one of the major health care services providers in the country offering insurance and high-quality healthcare services. The company occupies the second position in Chile in terms of sales revenues in the private health care market and also has operations in Peru. It reported total revenues of CLP 591.3bn (USD 841mn) and a net income of CLP 13.5bn (USD 19.2mn) for 2014. Grupo Bupa Sanitas owns and operates clinics and hospitals, providing various healthcare and plastic surgery services globally. Note: The target's book value is negative due to substantial net intangible assets.
113818 04/12/2015 墨西哥 The equipment lending and leasing business in Mexico of General Electric 收购 Linzor Capital Partners LP 智利 General Electric Co 商业和工业机械和设备租赁 (5324) 　 　 100 UPDATE: On 31 March 2016, Linzor Capital said it completed the acquisition of the equipment lending and leasing business in Mexico. ORIGINAl: Chile-based, Latin America-focused asset manager Linzor Capital Partners LP announced it has agreed to acquire the equipment lending and leasing business in Mexico of U.S. infrastructure and financial services group General Electric Co (GE). Financial terms were not disclosed. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals and is expected to close during the first quarter of 2016. The equipment lending and leasing business currently has assets worth more than USD 1.1bn. Linzor Capital Partners is one of the major middle market private equity firms in Latin America. The company's investment focus falls on Mexico, Colombia, Chile, and Argentina and covers various industries. Currently, it manages over USD 700mn in assets under management, and since its inception in 2006 it has raised more than USD 1.2bn of capital commitments. GE is a multinational industrial and financial conglomerate with interests in the energy, oil and gas, mining, power and water, healthcare, transportation, technology infrastructure, aviation, capital finance, intelligent platforms and customized industrial solutions. The company reported sales revenues of USD 148.5bn and net income of USD 15.23bn for 2014.
113807 04/12/2015 中国 Zhongke Hengyuan Technology Co Ltd 少数股权购买 Kong Sun Holdings Ltd 香港 Existing shareholders 太阳能发电 (221114) 54.28 (官方数据) 44.587 Hong Kong-listed diversified group Kong Sun Holdings disclosed it will purchase a 44.6% stake in Chinese photovoltaic power station building company Zhongke Hengyuan Technology for RMB 347.8mn (USD 54.3mn). The sellers in the deal are 37 individuals and 10 investment holding companies. Completion of the deal is subject certain conditions precedent. The acquisition is in line with buyer's long term development strategy to enter the photovoltaic power sector in China. Zhongke Hengyuan Technology focuses on the construction and development of photovoltaic power station projects and wind-solar hybrid street lights in China. Kong Sun Holdings engages in properties investment, production of life-like plants, securities investment and investment in photovoltaic power plants in China.
113795 04/12/2015 南非; 撒哈拉沙漠以南非洲地区 Food Lover's Market 少数股权购买 Actis LLP 英国 　 食杂店、便利店、果蔬市场、肉类市场等 (445) 52.98 (官方数据) 　 U.K.-based private equity firm Actis announced that it acquired a substantial minority stake in South African food products retailer Food Lover's Market for ZAR 760mn (USD 53mn). Actis said that the investment represents a backing for Food Lover's Market founders Brian and Mike Coppin, together with the existing management team. "Brian and his team have carved a niche in the South African food retail landscape, offering a distinguished value proposition to aspirational consumers looking for high quality products at real value. We look forward to working together to continue the Group’s growth story and expanding further within Africa," said Actis director David Cooke. Food Lover's Market has over 120 stores in 11 African countries which sell fresh produce, bakery, grocery, butchery and deli food products. The company also operates over 200 FreshStop convenience stores in Caltex service stations, Market Liquors, a convenience liquor offering, an import export business and has recently acquired artisanal coffee brand named Seattle Coffee. Actis was established in 2004 and is a private equity firm with USD 7.6bn of assets management. The company focuses exclusively on investments in emerging markets across Africa, Asia and Latin America.
113771 04/12/2015 澳大利亚 117 Clarence Street commercial property in Sydney 收购 Roxy-Pacific Holdings Ltd 新加坡 　 房地产 (531) 59.26 (官方数据) 100 Singapore Exchange-listed real estate investor and developer Roxy-Pacific Holdings Ltd said it will acquire a commercial property located at 117 Clarence Street in Sydney for AUD 81.0mn (USD 59.2mn). The deal is subject to certain closing conditions, including the regulatory approval. The purchase consideration will be financed by internal funds and bank borrowings. The acquired property is a 14-storey commercial building, with a total net lettable area of approximately 12,571 m2. The building has three street frontages, with views through the Sydney's central business district and out to Darling Harbour. Roxy-Pacific Holdings develops and sells residential and commercial properties. It also owns the Grand Mercure Roxy Hotel in Singapore, as well as Hotel Harvest Kyoto in Japan. The company booked revenues of SGD 317.81mn (USD 250.8mn) in 2014.
115980 03/12/2015 中国; 美国; 英属维尔京群岛 Epic China Ltd; Shanghai Landsea Planning and Architectural Design Co Ltd 收购 Landsea Green Properties Co Ltd 香港 Landsea Group Co Ltd 非居住性建筑物的建造 (2332); 专业服务、科学研究和技术服务 (541) 115.44 (官方数据) 100 Hong Kong-listed property development group Landsea Green Properties said it will acquire Chinese design company Shanghai Landsea Planning and Architectural Design Co Ltd (Landsea Design) and the U.S. business division of Landsea Group for a combined consideration of HKD 894.8mn (USD 115.4mn). The completion of transactions are subject to satisfaction of closing conditions, including shareholder approval. Landsea Green Properties will acquire 100% of British Virgin Islands-based Epic China Ltd, which holds the U.S. business of Landsea Group for HKD 871.1mn. The consideration will be settled through the issue of shares, which will be equal to 15.59% of Landsea Green Properties' enlarged share capital. Epic China holds five property development projects in the greater New York region, the Boston region, the San Francisco region and the Los Angeles region. The projects mainly comprise luxury apartments and suburban villas. Landsea Green Properties will acquire 100% of Landsea Design from Landsea Group for CNY 19.5mn (HKD 23.6mn). Landsea Design is one of the first green construction design institutes in Shanghai. The acquisitions will internationalise Landsea Green Properties' green property development business and will make the company the only listed platform for green property development business of Landsea Group. Landsea Green Properties is active in the property development and investment business. It posted a turnover of CNY 703.8mn (USD 114.6mn) for 2014.
115163 03/12/2015 美国 Welltok Inc 少数股权购买 Georgian Partners; Economic Development Board Investments (EDBI); Flare Capital Partners 加拿大; 新加坡; 美国 　 电脑系统设计和相关服务 (54151) 45 (官方数据) 　 U.S. health optimization platform developer Welltock Inc. said it has secured USD 45.0mn in a Series D funding round led by Canada-based venture capital firm Georgian Partners. The round was also participated by Singapore's PE and VC firm Economic Development Board Investments (EDBI) and U.S. venture firm Flare Capital Partners. Welltock will use the funding proceeds to finance part of the acquisition of Massachusetts-based Silverlink, a leading healthcare consumer communications company. The funding will also be used for Welltock's ongoing product development and market expansion. The acquisition enables Welltock to complement and extend the capabilities of its health optimization software, called CaféWell. Welltock has developed CaféWell Health Optimization Platform which aims to keep users healthy. The company's platform is transforming the way population health managers guide and incentivize consumers to optimize their health. Georgian Partners is a growth equity firm investing in expansion-stage Enterprise Software, Internet and Information companies that are harnessing big data analytics to streamline business processes. EDBI, founded in 1991, invests in the knowledge and innovation-intensive sectors of biomedical sciences (BMS), information & communication technology (ICT), smart & sustainable technology (SST) and select industry clusters under its strategic growth program (SGP).
114652 03/12/2015 罗马尼亚 The medical laboratories network of Romgermed 收购 Synlab Holding GmbH 德国 Clinica Romgermed SRL 流动救护服务 (621) 　 　 100 German medical laboratory services provider Synlab has acquired the medical test laboratories network of Romgermed in Romania, local business portal profit.ro reported. Financial details were not disclosed. The acquired network includes 21 medical laboratories in the country, owned via six companies which Synlab has bought. Earlier in July 2015, Romanian business daily Ziarul Financiar reported that Swedish private healthcare group Medicover will also acquire four medical clinics of Romgermed in Bucharest and Constanta. The six companies which operate the 21 RomGerMed laboratories have reported an aggregate turnover of RON 4.7mn (EUR 1.1mn) in 2014. Romgermed was founded in 1999 by Dorian Sam Schwartz (95%) and his brother Filip Florin Schwartz. The company is comprised of four medical clinics and a network of 21 medical test laboratories. The labs network provides medical tests for both human and veterinary medicine. Romgermed employs around 500 specialists serving over 150,000 patients per year. Dorian Sam Schwartz is currently facing legal troubles with Romanian authorities. Synlab group is present in 26 countries with 300 laboratories, and employs around 7,000 people. The company reported revenues of EUR 740mn in 2014. Synlab has been active in Romania since 2005 and operates 3 own laboratories and 9 collection centers in Bucharest, Iasi, Cluj, and Brasov. In 2014, Synlab generated revenues of RON 13.2mn (EUR 3.0mn) in Romania.
114074 03/12/2015 那米比亚; 南非; 荷兰; 葡萄牙; 西班牙 Aberdare Cables (Pty) Ltd; Aberdare Holdings Europe BV Ltd 收购 Hengtong Optic-electric Co Ltd 中国 Allied Electronics Corp Ltd (Altron) 通信与能源电线电缆制造业 (33592) 69.49 (官方数据) 　 South African telecommunication and information technology group Allied Electronics (Altron) disclosed to the JSE that it has agreed to sell its majority stake in local cable manufacturer Aberdare Cables to Chinese power and fibre optic cable producer Hengtong Optic-electric Co. Under the deal, Altron's subsidiary Powertech will sell a 75% stake in Aberdare Cables and a 100% stake in Aberdare International to Hengtong. The purchase consideration will be based on an equity value of ZAR 1bn (USD 69.5mn) in respect of the Aberdare Group. Also, Hengtong will assume Aberdare Group's debt which amounted to ZAR 232mn (USD 17.4mn) as at 31 August 2015. Altron said that Hengtong considers the Aberdare Group an attractive platform to expand its international business in those key markets where the Aberdare Cables operates, namely South Africa, Africa and Europe. Aberdare Cables is the largest cable manufacturer in Southern Africa and it specialises in the production of low and medium voltage electrical cables for application in power generation, power transmission, power distribution, rural electrification, rail, petrochemical, mining, ports, airports, wholesale, construction and domestic building environments. The company has three manufacturing sites and six customer service centres in South Africa as well as manufacturing and sales sites in Portugal, Spain, Namibia and Mozambique. Hengtong Opto-Electric is a Shanghai-listed manufacturer of optical cables and related products such as stranded optical cables, centralised tube optical cables and optical fibre belt optical cables. It is the fourth largest cable manufacturer in China and among the top 100 largest cable manufacturers in the world.
113888 03/12/2015 以色列 Kidoz 少数股权购买 Roman Abramovich - private investor; Chernovetskyi Investment Group 俄罗斯; 乌克兰 　 软件出版 (5112) 3.5 (官方数据) 　 Israeli mobile environment for kids Kidoz raised USD 3.5mn in a funding round led by investment company Millhouse Capital of Russian tycoon Roman Abramovich and Chernovetskyi Investment Group (CIG) of Kiev’s ex-mayor Leonid Chernovetskyi, kidscreen.com reported. The proceeds will be used for expansion of the target in the U.S. and China. CIG has already invested USD 1mn in Kidoz in August 2015. Kidoz is a content discovery platform for kids which protects children from inappropriate information or in-app purchases. Founded in 2014, CIG is an investment company active in the CIS region. London-registered Millhouse Capital controls non-profile assets of former Sibneft's shareholders.
113839 03/12/2015 印度尼西亚 RumahDijual.com 收购 PropertyGuru Pte Ltd 新加坡 　 互联网出版与传播 (516) 　 　 100 Asian online property portal provider PropertyGuru Group announced that it has acquired Indonesian peer RumahDijual.com for an undisclosed amount. The acquisition is in line with the buyer's strategy to strengthen its operations in Indonesia, one of the fastest growing property and digital markets in Southeast Asia. In July 2015, PropertyGuru also acquired project sales and marketing company ePropertyTrack. The buyer also received a SGD 175mn (USD 129.3mn) in Series D founding round from media group PT Elang Mahkota Teknologi (EMTK), Australia's tech venture capital firm Square Peg Capital, and U.S. international private investment firm TPG Capital in 2015. RumahDijual, founded in 2010, operates a website for property agents and home owners in Indonesia. The site has over 100,000 live listing and 13.9 million views per month. PropertyGuru Group operates property portal and mobile apps for real estate developers and agent advertiser across Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia and Thailand.
113781 03/12/2015 土耳其 Milas packaging business 收购 DS Smith Plc 英国 Dasa Milas Ambalaj 造纸业 (322) 　 　 100 U.K.-based packaging manufacturer DS Smith said it will acquire the Milas packaging business of Turkish firm Dasa Milas Ambalaj for an undisclosed price. Completion is subject to customary conditions including competition clearance. It is expected to take place by the end of DS Smith's financial year ending April 2016. The acquisition gives DS Smith direct exposure to the Turkish market through a business focused on FMCG customers and expands its presence in Southeastern Europe. Milas is a leading producer of specialist corrugated packaging and displays in Turkey. The business is focused on international FMCG customers and generates USD 25mn in annual sales. Its production facility is located near Istanbul and has 240 employees. Earlier in 2015, DS Smith announced the sale of minority stakes in Turkish corrugated paper and packaging companies Kaplamin Ambalaj, Ova Oluklu Mukavva Ambalaj, Selkasan Kagit, Yalova Ambalaj and waste treatment firm Atkasan Atik Degerlendirme to Turkish industrial group Cukurova Holding. In a related deal, DS Smith will acquire Greek corrugated packaging companies Cartonpack Hellas and Cretan Packaging from Cukurova group. DS Smith has operations in 25 countries, employing over 21,500 people. For the financial year ended April 2015, the company reported GBP 3.82bn (USD 5.87bn) in revenues and GBP 231mn (USD 355.3mn) in earnings.

Bhd. for MYR 15.06mn (USD 3.55mn). The purchase price is subject to adjustments at the completion of the deal, and shall be settled within two months from the date of the notice. Following the deal, Silverlake will own 100% stake in Merimen Ventures Sdn. Bhd. The acquisition will enable Silverlake Axis to strengthen its presence and software services solutions offering in the Asia-Pacific region. Merimen Ventures Sdn. Bhd., founded in 2005, develops and provides streamlined software solutions for the insurance and motor industry, in the Asia-Pacific region, Middle-East and North Africa. Its solutions facilitate and enable transactions, papers processing, and provides custom reports for data analysis. Silverlake Axis, former Axis Systems Holdings Limited, is a leading provider of digital economy solutions and services for major organisations in banking, insurance, payments, retail and logistics sectors. The company serves over 100 organisations across Asia, including 40% of the largest banks in South East Asia. For 2014, it reported revenues of USD 154.3mn.
113783 03/12/2015 秘鲁 Hidroval Peru SAC 收购 MAT Holding SL 西班牙 　 金属加工及制品 (332) 　 　 100 Spanish crop protection and irrigation products company MAT Holding SL acquired Peruvian valves manufacturer Hidroval Peru SAC, MAT Holding announced cited by media sources. Financial terms were not disclosed. With this acquisition MAT Holding, acting via its subsidiary Hidroglobal, enters into the South American market, and via its Peruvian platform it will seek to expand into other neighbouring countries. Hidroval Peru produces and sells mechanical, hydraulic and electrical valves, as well as filtration systems to the mining, sanitation, and industrial sectors. The company is expected to generated sales revenues of EUR 5mn (USD 5.3mn) in three years. MAT Holding, via its subsidiaries, operates in the crop protection, drip irrigation and water treatment sectors. It produces valves, water treatment, copper compounds, metalaxyl, and other related products.
113774 03/12/2015 津巴布维 China Africa Sunlight Energy Pvt Ltd 合资企业 Yunnan Linkun Investment Group Ltd 中国 Shandong Taishan Sunlight Group Co Ltd 煤炭开采 (2121); 化石燃料发电 (221112) 　 　 50 Chinese company Yunnan Linkun Investment Group has acquired a 50% stake in Zimbabwe-based firm China Africa Sunlight Energy (CASE), the daily The Herald (Zimbabwe) reported. The other 50% in CASE are held by Zimbabwean company Old Stone Investments. Yunnan Linkun aims to invest around USD 700mn towards the development of the Gwayi coal-electricity project. The stake was acquired from another Chinese company Shandong Taishan Sunlight, which failed to secure funds for the project. China Africa Sunlight Energy is involved in the construction of Gwayi coal mine and power plant located in Matabeleland North Province. The project will consist of 2X300 Megawatts thermal power station and coal mine with production capacity of three million tonnes per year.
113775 03/12/2015 中国; 英属维尔京群岛 Zhao De Land Ltd 收购 Sino-Ocean Land Holdings Ltd 香港 Nan Fung Group; Good Estate Group Ltd 房地产 (531) 113.97 (官方数据) 100 Hong Kong-listed property developer Sino-Ocean Land Holdings Ltd. said it will acquire Chinese counterpart Zhao De Land Ltd. for an aggregate consideration of HKD 883.4 mn (USD 113.97mn). The sellers in the deal are British Virgin Islands-based companies - Newrich Holdings Ltd., part of the real estate company Nan Fung Group which will sell a 86.33% of the target; and Good Estate Group Ltd. (13.67%). The deal is subject to certain conditions precedent, and is expected to complete by 31 March 2016. As part of the deal agreement, Sino-Ocean Land will also assume two loans of HKD 427.35mn and respectively HKD 12.93mn granted by the sellers to Zhao De Land Ltd. The acquisition will strengthen Sino-Ocean Land's presence in the southern region property market of China. Zhao De Land Ltd. is an investment holding company incorporated in the British Virgin Islands which owns China's Sanya Deshang Real Estate Development Co. Ltd., which in turn is the developer of the serviced-residence and villa development project located at Taiyangwan Road in Jiyang district, in Sanya city of China. The development project consists of a total gross lettable area of 177,000 m2. Sino-Ocean Land Holdings specializes in developing mid-to-high end residential properties, high-end office premises, serviced apartments, hotels and retail properties in China. In 2014, it had total assets under management of HKD 132.2bn (USD 21.60bn).
113761 03/12/2015 意大利 Liabilities portfolio of Unione di Banche Italiane Scpa 收购 Kruk SA 波兰 Unione di Banche Italiane Scpa 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 100 Polish debt collector Kruk has won a tender to acquire portfolio of liabilities from Italian lender Unione di Banche Italiane (UBI Banca), the buyer disclosed in market filings to the stock exchange. The purchase price was not disclosed. The acquired portfolio has nominal value of around EUR 83mn (PLN 357.2mn). Kruk, founded in 1999, provides debt management and collection services for corporate clients, including banks, utilities, pay TV operators, and telecoms. The company posted net income of PLN 151.8mn (EUR 36.3mn) in 2014. UBI Banca, formed in 2007 through the merger of Banche Popolari Italiane (BPU) and Banca Lombarda (BL), is the third largest Italian commercial banking Group in terms of market cap with a market share above 5%. It employs 17,500 people and has 1,560 branches. Its shares are listed on the Milan Stock Exchange.
113740 03/12/2015 澳大利亚 The serviced apartments component of Aurora Melbourne Central 收购 Ascendas Hospitality Trust 新加坡 UEM Sunrise Bhd 住宿服务 (721) 87.8 (官方数据) 100 Singapore-based Ascendas Hospitality Trust said it will acquire the serviced apartments component of Australia-based mixed-use development named Aurora Melbourne Central from Malaysia's property developer UEM Sunrise Bhd for AUD 120mn (USD 87.8mn). The deal is subject to certain closing conditions. The acquisition is in line with Ascendas Hospitality Trust's growth plan to acquire quality assets in prime location in key cities of Australia. The buyer intends to finance the acquisition via a combination of equity and debt. Aurora Melbourne Central is a 92-storey mixed-use development located in the heart of Melbourne. The development is the maiden project of UEM Sunrise Bhd in Australia, with a gross development value of AUD 770mn, scheduled for completion in 2019. The development has a build-up area of more than 120,000 m2 and includes in total 941 residential apartments, retail spaces, strata offices as well as the 252-room serviced apartments. The serviced apartments component is part of Aurora Melbourne Central, and will comprise 252 serviced apartments located on levels 10 to 32 of the development, along with common facilities for guests located on level nine, a restaurant on the ground floor, swimming pool, car park spaces, and direct access to Melbourne Central railway station. The development faces a shopping center across the road, and it is located in close vicinity to renowned attractions such as Queen Victoria Market, the Royal Exhibition Building etc. Ascendas Hospitality Trust invests in a diversified portfolio of income-producing real estate used for hospitality purposes. It is comprised of Ascendas Hospitality Real Estate Investment Trust (A-HREIT) and Ascendas Hospitality Business Trust (A-HBT). Its portfolio includes 12 hotels with over 4,500 rooms located across Asia, Australia and New Zealand. The total assets under its management were SGD 1.36bn (USD 1.07bn) for 2014.
113715 03/12/2015 波兰 Galeria Sfera shopping centre 收购 CBRE Global Investors 美国 　 房地产 (531) 　 　 100 US real estate investment company CBRE Global Investors has acquired Galeria Sfera shopping centre in Poland, property portal Eurobuildcee.com reported. The purchase price was not disclosed. Galeria Sfera is located in the city of Bielsko-Biala. It has 230 retail units and GLA of 61,800 m2. It is 97.2% leased. CBRE Global Investors, founded in 1972, is a multinational real estate investment company with USD 88.6bn (EUR 69.8bn) in assets under management as of 30 September 2014. Its client portfolio comprises public and private pension funds, insurance companies, sovereign wealth funds, foundations and private individuals. The firm is part of full-service commercial real estate services company CBRE Group, which has offices in 22 countries and 34,000 employees.
119378 02/12/2015 新加坡 Cellwize Wireless Technologies Pte Ltd 少数股权购买 Carmel Ventures; Vintage Venture Partners 以色列 　 软件出版 (5112); 数据处理、主机管理及相关服务 (518); 电脑系统设计和相关服务 (54151) 14.5 (官方数据) 　 Singapore-based Cellwize Wireless Technologies Pte. Ltd., a provider of cutting-edge SON (Self-Organizing Network) solutions to mobile operators, announced it has secured USD 14.5mn in a Series A funding round led by Israel's VC fund Carmel Ventures and Vintage Investment Partners. The raised funds will be used to boost Cellwize's innovative SON customer-centric cellular network optimization and market presence, including a planned significant increase in its workforce. In addition, Viola Credit (formerly Plenus) granted a USD 10.0mn credit facility to Cellwize. Cellwize develops and delivers innovative SON solutions across vendors and wireless technologies. The company's elastic-SON™ platform utilizes big data processing to transform volatile networks into user-centric and over-performing mobile networks across multiple vendors and wireless technologies (Multi-RAT). Founded by industry experts, Cellwize launched its commercial SON platform in 2012, and currently elastic-SON realizes its promise with multiple MNOs (mobile network operators) across Europe, APAC and LATAM. Carmel Ventures, founded in 2000, is a venture capital firm which manages over USD 800mn, investing across a number of key market segments including software, new enterprise infrastructure, big data, digital media, consumer applications and semiconductors. Carmel Ventures is a member of the Viola Group, Israel's premier technology focused PE group with USD 2.0bn under management.
116393 02/12/2015 新加坡 Ematic Solutions 少数股权购买 Wavemaker Partners; Convergence Ventures; 500 Startups 美国; 印度尼西亚 　 软件出版 (5112) 1.06 (官方数据) 　 Singapore-based SaaS e-mail marketing start-up Ematic Solutions has secured SGD 1.5mn (USD 1.06mn) in a seed funding from U.S. venture capital firms 500 Startups and Wavemaker Partners, and from Indonesia-based Convergence Ventures, online news portal insideretail.asia reported. Ematic Solutions will use the funding to accelerate its Southeast Asian expansion, with a priority on Indonesia and Thailand. In addition, the funds will help Ematic Solutions to introduce new solutions to online businesses in the Asian region, the CEO and founder of the target, Paul Tenney, said. Ematic Solutions, founded in 2011, has developed a software that helps marketers improve their performance across digital marketing channels. The company's app Bye-IQ is an exit intent module, a technology that predicts the moment a potential customer is leaving the website. Its second app Hi-IQ, an automated software that analyses data behind a campaign to either re-engage a customer or pull back to prevent spamming. Ematic Solutions has a client portfolio of around 12 firms, including Singaporean e-commerce company Luxola, which was one of the first customers to implement Ematic's apps. Paul Tenney has been working in the email marketing field since 2002 and helped notable startup like eBay and Expedia build their campaigns. Convergence Ventures was founded in 2014 and is a venture capita firm focused on investing in early stage technology firms based in Indonesia. The company is led by Adrian Li and Donald Wihardja.

(APG) said it will acquire a 20% stake in Slovenian electric car hub motor or in-wheel motor technology provider Elaphe Propulsion Technologies Ltd., following an investment of EUR 10mn. The deal is pending regulatory approval. Post deal completion, both sides agreed to establish a joint venture (JV) company in China to manufacture hub motor. APG group will hold a 51% stake in the JV, while Elaphe Propulsion Technology the remainder 49%. Elaphe Propulsion Technology will use the funds for the in-wheel technology research and development services. Elaphe Propulsion Technologies Ltd. is a hub motor technology company, which produces an electric motor that is incorporated into the hub of a wheel (also called hub motor or in-wheel motor). The company has produced several generations of in-wheel motor prototypes that are under tests on several vehicles. Zhejiang Asia-Pacific Mechanical & Electronic Co Ltd (APG) develops and produces automotive braking systems, brake calipers, brake discs, drum brakes and electronic products. The company is listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and it recorded revenues of CNY 3.28bn (USD 511.6mn) in 2014.

As a result of the acquisition, the buyer will consolidate 100% in INK-Sever. INK and its subsidiaries (INK Group) focus mainly on the geological study, exploration and production of crude oil, condensate and natural gas in Irkutsk region and the Republic of Sakha (Yakutia). Currently, INK operates 22 oil and gas fields and blocks.

Financial terms were not disclosed. The Apple resellers network being acquired comprises nine shops and will be renamed to the Grupo Motta's MyShop brand, currently used in Panama and Colombia. ORIGINAL: U.S. wholesale technology distributor Ingram Micro Inc has agreed to acquire Odin Service Automation, a software unit of local cross-platform solutions provider Parallels, founded by Russian entrepreneur Serguei Beloussov, according to a press release of Parallels. The deal completion is due by the end of 2015. The transaction includes the Odin Service Automation platform along with the related cloud management technologies, intellectual property and the Odin brand. The deal size was not specified. Market experts value the asset at around USD 200mn, Kommersant daily noted. Birger Steen, CEO of Parallels Holdings Ltd, is quoted as saying that the transaction follows a long-term collaboration with Ingram Micro and will enable Parallels to focus on its other products. Odin provides the software that powers the cloud ecosystem, from small and local hosters to some of the world's largest telecommunication companies. More than 10,000 service providers rely on Odin to deliver applications and cloud services to more than 10 million SMBs in 130 countries. Parallels was established in 1999 by Russian entrepreneurs Serguei Beloussov, who is currently executive chairman of the company's board, and Ilya Zubarev. The company provides hosting and cloud computing services, as well as desktop vitualisation software. Founded in 1979, Ingram Micro takes leading positions in technology and supply chain services ranking 69th in the FORTUNE 500®. The company focuses on cloud, mobility, supply chain and technology solutions. In 2014, Ingram Micro posted revenues of USD 46.5bn.

Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Previously, Itec founder Jacques Duyver had a 90% stake in the company. "We have plans to become increasingly more involved in system development whilst introducing innovations that will greatly improve operating efficiencies, service delivery and customer flexibility," Itec CEO Philip Perkins said. Itec was established in 1996 under the name Konica and is a document management and printing, production printing, enterprise communications and financial solutions provider. Investec is an international specialist banking and asset management group focused on the UK, South Africa and Australia. The group is split into Investec plc (listed on the London Stock Exchange) and Investec Ltd (listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange). Khulasande Capital is a black-owned and controlled private equity and investment vehicle. Its investment portfolio includes Southern Africa-focused chlorine, caustic soda, soda ash, alkali derivatives and bulk and refined salt manufacturer Chlor-Alkali Holdings and mobile crane group Concord Cranes.

The transaction valued the whole arean at some USD 825mn, including debt. ORIGINAL: Russian tycoon Mikhail Prokhorov, through his investment vehicle Onexim Sports & Entertainment, has agreed to acquire the remaining 55% stake he did not own in Brooklyn-based sports complex Barclays Center, the home arena for NBA franchise Brooklyn Nets, Bloomberg reported, citing two people briefed with the matter. The seller is U.S. property developer and manager Forest City Enterprises Inc. On a related note, Prokhorov also reportedly agreed to buy the remaining 20% in the Brooklyn Nets sports club. The financial terms of the transactions were not disclosed. Bloomberg cited market expert Peter Schwartz who earlier valued the two assets at about USD 2bn. The National Basketball Association is currently reviewing the transaction. The consolidation of the two assets will supposedly enable Prokhorov to easier sell them wholly or partially on a later stage. Barclays Center also hosts the games of hockey team New York Islanders. The arena opened in 2012 and was specially built for the Brooklyn Nets for USD 1bn. In start-September 2015, The New York Post wrote that Barclays Center is projected to generate USD 55mn in operating income annually but has a debt of USD 640mn.
113801 02/12/2015 巴西 Laticinios Verde Campo Ltda 收购 The Coca-Cola Co 美国 　 液体乳及乳制品制造 (3115) 86.59 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 11 February 2016, the buyer's legal advisor disclosed to DealWatch that the deal value was BRL 335.05mn (USD 86.59mn). ORIGINAL: U.S. beverage company The Coca-Cola Company signed an agreement to acquire the total capital of Brazilian dairy product manufacturer Laticinios Verde Campo Ltda for an undisclosed sum, Brazilian media sources reported. Coca-Cola acted through its Brazilian bottling subsidiary Leao Alimentos e Bebidas Ltda. Upon the completion of the transaction, Coca-Cola will expand its healthy drinks business and start operating in the Brazilian dairy production segment. The transaction has already received the approval of the Brazilian Antitrust Authority CADE and it is expected to close in the first quarter of 2016. Verde Campo, headquartered in the municipality of Lavras (Minas Gerais state, Brazil), is a small dairy products manufacturer that produces yogurts, fresh and ripened cheeses, cottage cheese and sour cream. The company distributes its products to the states of Rio de Janeiro, Sao Paulo and Belo Horizonte. The firm is a pioneer in Brazil in the lactose-free products manufacturing with its LacFree line. Coca-Cola, established in 1886, is the world's largest beverage company with a portfolio of over 500 sparkling and still brands available in more than 24 million retail consumer outlets in 200 countries. The Coca-Cola systems comprises over 250 bottling partners worldwide, with nearly 900 plants and more than 700,000 employees. Coca-Cola is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and posted USD 46bn in revenues and a net profit of USD 7bn in 2014. Coca-Cola has been present in Brazil since 1942, and currently operates a network of 13 bottling partners, which produce soft drinks, energy drinks, nectars, teas and mineral water in 46 plants throughout Brazil, employing some 60,000 people. _________________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE: Em 11 de fevereiro de 2016, o assessor jurídico da compradora revelou para o DealWatch que o valor do negócio era de BRL 335.05mn (USD 86.59mn). ORIGINAL: A empresa norte-americana de bebidas Coca-Cola Company assinou um contrato para adquirir a totalidade do capital social da fabricante de laticínios brasileira Laticinios Verde Campo Ltda, por um valor não revelado, fontes da mídia brasileira apuraram. A Coca-Cola agiu através da sua subsidiária brasileira de engarrafamento Leão Alimentos e Bebidas Ltda. Após a conclusão da transação, a Coca-Cola vai expandir o seu negócio de bebidas saudáveis e começar a operar no segmento de produção de lacticínios no Brasil. A transação já recebeu a aprovação do Conselho Administrativo de Defesa Econômica (CADE) e deverá ser concluída no primeiro trimestre de 2016. A Campo Verde, sediada no município de Lavras (MG, Brasil), é um fabricante pequena de produtos lácteos, que produz iogurtes, queijos frescos e curados, queijo cottage e creme de leite. A empresa distribui os seus produtos para os estados do Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo e Belo Horizonte. A companhia é pioneira no Brasil na fabricação de produtos sem lactose com a sua linha de produtos LacFree. A Coca-Cola, fundada em 1886, é a maior empresa de bebidas do mundo, com um portfólio de mais de 500 marcas, com gás e sem gás, disponíveis em mais de 24 milhões de pontos de venda em 200 países. O sistemas da Coca-Cola é composto por mais de 250 parceiros de engarrafamento em todo o mundo, com cerca de 900 plantas e mais de 700,000 funcionários. A Coca-Cola está listada na Bolsa de Valores de Nova Iorque e apresentou um faturamento de USD 46bn e um lucro líquido de USD 7bn em 2014. A Coca-Cola está presente no Brasil desde 1942, e atualmente opera uma rede de 13 parceiros de engarrafamento, que produzem refrigerantes, bebidas energéticas, néctares e refrescos, chás e água mineral em 46 plantas em todo o Brasil, empregando cerca de 60,000 funcionários.
113737 02/12/2015 美国 Brooklyn Nets 少数股权购买 Mikhail Prokhorov - private investor 俄罗斯 Forest City Enterprises Inc 艺术表演、竞技运动和相关服务业 (711) 175 (官方数据) 20 UPDATE: On 22 December 2015, Prokhorov completed the acquisition of a 20% stake in Brooklyn Nets, the seller announced. The transaction valued the team at some USD 875mn, including debt. ORIGINAL: Russian tycoon Mikhail Prokhorov, through his investment vehicle Onexim Sports & Entertainment, has agreed to acquire the remaining 80% stake in NBA team Brooklyn Nets from U.S. property developer and manager Forest City Enterprises Inc, Bloomberg reported, citing two people briefed with the matter. On a related note, Prokhorov also reportedly agreed to buy the remaining 55% it did not own in sports complex Barclays Center, the home arena for Brooklyn Nets. The financial terms of the transactions were not disclosed. Bloomberg cited market expert Peter Schwartz who earlier valued the two assets at about USD 2bn. In early September 2015, The New York Post wrote that market analysts value the team at an enterprise value of USD 700mn, excluding the debt of USD 210mn. Thus taking the debt into consideration, the Brooklyn Nets could be worth some USD 490mn. The National Basketball Association is currently reviewing the transaction. The consolidation of the two assets will supposedly enable Prokhorov to easier sell them wholly or partially on a later stage. Prokhorov acquired the Brooklyn Nets back in 2010 for some USD 200mn. In the last season, the team incurred losses of USD 144mn. Brooklyn Nets franchise is based in the New York City and is a member club of the Atlantic Division of the Eastern Conference.
113688 02/12/2015 俄罗斯 Bauer SNG and Company 收购 Five managers of Bauer Media Group 俄罗斯 Bauer Media Group 报纸、期刊、图书和字典的出版 (5111) 　 　 80 German publisher Bauer Media Group has sold an 80% of its Russian business Bauer SNG and Company to five of the latter’s top managers, Kommersant daily reported, citing SPARK-Interfax corporate database. The transaction was carried out through a restructuring of the German concern’s Russian operations in end-November 2015 whereby a new media company, Bauer Media Group (Russia), was registered. Bauer SNG and Company, the daughter of Bauer Media Group, obtained a 20% stake in the new company. The remainder was distributed in equal 16%-stakes among five people: the general director of the holding’s distribution company OOO TDS - Sergey Alekseenko, the publishing director of Bauer Media - Aleksey Ivanov, the chief editor of magazine Zvyozdy i Sovety - Elena Pryadko, the editor of Bauer Media’s entertainment editions - Alisher Khalilov and the executive director of Bauer Media - Muza Monams. The financial parametres of the deal were not disclosed. The shareholder changes were triggered by the latest legislative rulings which stipulate that foreign capital ownership in Russian media companies should be restricted to 20% as of start-2016. Bauer SNG and Company publishes women, esoteric and children’s magazines, as well as scan words and Sudoku editions. In 2014, the company generated sales of RUB 1.28bn (USD 33.9mn) and a net profit of RUB 178.9mn (USD 4.74mn), being the fourth largest player locally in terms of audience. Bauer Media Group is a large European publisher with a global presence spanning 20 countries on four continents. The group’s portfolio comprises over 600 magazines, more than 400 digital media and 100 radio- and tv-stations.
113803 02/12/2015 肯尼亚 M-KOPA Kenya Ltd (M-KOPA Solar) 少数股权购买 Richard Branson - private investor; Stephen Case - private investor; Jean Case - private investor; Existing shareholders; Generation Investment Management LLP 英国; 美国 　 商业和工业机械和设备租赁 (5324) 19 (官方数据) 　 Kenyan pay-as-you-go rooftop solar provider M-KOPA Solar announced that it has raised USD 19mn through an equity round led by British investment manager Generation Investment Management. The round included new investments by Sir Richard Branson (founder of Virgin Group) and Jean and Stephen Case (founder of AOL) as well as reinvestment by existing shareholders. M-KOPA plans to use the funds to further expand its management team, product range and international operations. "We're very pleased to have the world's leading sustainability investors and entrepreneurs backing us at M-KOPA. We’re proving that solar power for the off-grid world will be transformative for customers, good for the planet and profitable for investors. In just three years we’ve reached over a quarter-million homes across three countries and we are just getting started," M-KOPA CEO Jesse Moore said. M-KOPA Solar leases solar power systems through a pay-as-you-go instalment plan. Customers pay a deposit of USD 30, followed by 365 daily mobile money payments of 50 cents. In just three years since commercial launch, the company has connected more than 280,000 homes in Kenya, Tanzania, and Uganda to solar power. M-KOPA currently has over 2,000 full-time staff and sales agents and is on track to reach its initial target of one million homes in East Africa by the end of 2017. Generation Investment Management was founded in 2004 by former U.S. vice president Al Gore and David Blood as an independent, private, investment management partnership. The company is dedicated to long term investing, integrated sustainability research and client alignment and has offices in London and New York.

The property is a two-part building with seven floors. It has leasable area of 18,000 m2. EfTEN Capital, founded in 2008, specialises in real estate investments. The company also offers private portfolio management. It manages 41 commercial properties with the market value of EUR 320mn in Estonia and Latvia.
113777 02/12/2015 英国 FXCM Securities Ltd 收购 Expobank AS 拉脱维亚 FXCM Inc 投资银行及其他金融投资活动 (523) 　 　 100 U.S.-based online provider of foreign exchange (FX) trading and related services FXCM announced that it has sold its U.K.-based brokerage arm FXCM Securities to Latvian lender Expobank. The deal value was not disclosed. Originally, FXCM acquired FXCM Securities through the purchase of ODL Group. FXCM Securities specialises in exchange traded equities, futures, and options. Expobank (formerly LTB Bank) is wholly-owned by Russian entrepreneur Igor Kim. The bank was founded in 1991. It has 77 employees and posted net profit of EUR 3.54mn in 2014. FXCM provides online foreign exchange (forex) trading, CFD trading, spread betting and related services. Its shares are listed on the NYSE. The company posted net profit of USD 17.2mn in 2014.

The deal values the target at USD 250mn. The buyer will also infuse capital in the target for its planned growth through acquisitions. GVT Biosciences is a pharmaceuticals research, development and manufacturing firm which offers informatics, chemistry, biology, analytical clinical pharmacology and process R&D services among others. It has more than 2,400 employees that cater to more than 300 international companies in the chemicals, Academics, Biotechnology, Pharmaceuticals and Electronics Sector. Chryscapital is an Indian private equity firm that focuses in investing in various local industries including business services, financial services, health care and manufacturing. The firm manages six funds worth USD 2.5bn and has disbursed USD 2bn in more than 70 investments in which it has had over 50 exits. Chyrscapital typically invests between USD 30mn to USD 300bn in funding round.
113750 02/12/2015 印度 Birla Sun Life Insurance Co Ltd 少数股权购买 Sun Life Financial Inc 加拿大 Aditya Birla Nuvo Ltd 保险活动 (5241) 250.14 (官方数据) 23 Canadian international insurance major Sun Life Financial Inc (SLFI) announced that it has entered into an agreement to acquire a 23% stake in its Birla Sun Life Insurance Co Ltd joint venture (JV) from its JV partner Aditya Birla Nuvo Ltd for a total consideration of INR 16.6bn (USD 250.1mn). The deal is expected to close by the end of FY 2016 and is subject to statutory and regulatory approvals in India and Canada. The acquisition is in line with Sun Life's Strategy of expanding its presence in strong growth markets. It is expected to be earnings accretive. Post-transaction, SLFI will hold 49% stake in the target. Birla Sun Life Insurance is a joint venture between Sun Life Financial Inc and the Aditya Birla Group. It offers life insurance through children protection, health and wellness, wealth protection and retirement solution plans among others. The firm has 55,000 advisors in 489 branches catering to 1.6 million policy holders in 418 cities across India. Birla Sun Life reported total assets of INR 316.8bn (USD 4.8bn) as of 30 September 2015. Sun Life Financial is an international Canadian financial services and insurance firm which cater to individuals and enterprises. It has presence in Asia, the Americas and Europe. The firm is listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX), New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) and the Philippine Stock Exchange (PSE). Sun Life Financial reported total assets under management of CAD 846bn (USD 630.8bn) as of 30 September 2015.

The investment is in line with the buyer's view of the positive cash flow and high quality asset base of Hibiscus Petroleum. Hibiscus Petroleum Bhd is an independent oil and gas production company in Malaysia. The company invests in small and medium-sized oil and gas fields in the Middle East, South Asia, East Asia and Oceania regions. It is listed on the Main Market of Bursa as a Special Purpose Acquisition Company (SPAC). The company posted revenues of MYR 15.6mn (USD 4.1mn) for FY ended 30 June 2015. Polo Resources Ltd had net loss of USD 16.3mn in 2014. Note: All multiples are calculated on a pre-money basis.
113710 02/12/2015 巴西 A joint venture between Sk Automotive and Mister Auto 合资企业 Mister Auto SAS; SK Automotive SA Distribuidora de Autopecas 法国; 巴西 　 汽车及零配件经销商 (441) 　 　 100 Brazilian automotive parts seller and distributor Sk Automotive and French peer Mister Auto have agreed to launch a joint venture for online sale and distribution of automobile spare parts in Brazil. The information was provided to DealWatch by Demarest Advogados who acted as a legal advisor to Mister Auto and Sk Automotive. The joint venture will increase the supply and distribution of spare parts and accessories for automobiles and motorcycles in Brazil. In addition, the joint venture will be engaged in the sale of car parts, motorcycle parts, car accessories and bikes via internet. Mister Auto's goal is to expand its business outside Europe. On the other hand, SK Automotive intends to develop new operations in the online vehicle parts market. On 20 November 2015, the Brazilian Antitrust Authority (CADE) approved the transaction without restrictions. Mister Auto, established in 2007 in Genas, France, operates in the areas of online retail and distribution of new automobile tires, batteries, and other automobile parts and accessories. The company is acting in France, as well as in other European countries. Mister Auto is part of French automobile manufacturer Peugeot-Citroen (Grupo PSA). SK Automotive, located in Sao Paulo city (Sao Paulo state, Brazil), specialises in automotive parts sale and logistics services. It markets engine, brakes, clutches, suspension, steering, cooling, filters, injection, bearing and electrical, accessories, tools, and other spare parts. _______________________________________________________________________________________ A provedora brasileira de peças automotivas Sk Automotores e a homóloga francesa Mister Auto entraram em um acordo para lançar uma aliança estratégica (joint venture) para venda online e distribuição de autopeças no Brasil. A informação foi fornecida para o DealWatch por Demarest Advogados que atuou como assessor jurídico da Mister Auto e Sk Automotive. A joint venture vai aumentar a oferta e a distribuição de peças e acessórios para automóveis e motocicletas no Brasil. A joint venture também vai vender via internet peças automotivas, peças para motocicletas, acessórios para automóveis e motas. O objetivo da Mister Auto é expandir os seus negócios além da Europa. Por outro lado, a SK Automotive pretende desenvolver novas operações no mercado online de peças de veículos. Em 20 de Novembro de 2015, o Conselho Administrativo de Defesa Econômica (CADE) aprovou a operação sem restrições. A Mister Auto, criada em 2007 em Genas, França, atua nas áreas de varejo online e distribuição de pneus novos automotivos, baterias, acessórios e outras peças de automóveis. A empresa atua na França e em outros países europeus. A Mister Auto faz parte da fabricante francesa de automóveis Peugeot-Citroën (Grupo PSA). A SK Automotive, localizado na cidade de São Paulo (SP, Brasil), é especializada em serviços de logística e em venda de peças automotivas. A empresa comercializa partes para motores, freios, embreagens, suspensão, direção, refrigeração, filtros, injeção, rolamento e eléctricas, acessórios, ferramentas e outras peças de reposição.
113733 02/12/2015 塞尔维亚 Shopping centres portfolio of MPC Properties 少数股权购买 Atterbury Europe; Attacq Ltd 南非 MPC Properties 房地产 (531) 90.55 (DW 估计) 33.33 South Africa's real estate investor and manager Atterbury Group jointly with its real estate capital growth fund Attacq Ltd. will acquire a 33.33% stake in Serbian shopping centers portfolio from local real estate developer MPC Properties for an estimated EUR 85.47 (USD 90.55mn), the former announced. The assets portfolio consists of seven shopping centers valued at EUR 259mn (USD 274.4mn). The retail property portfolio includes Serbia's largest mall - Ušće Shopping Centre in its capital Belgrade, and four smaller centres in Belgrade and two assets in Subotica city, northern Serbia. Atterbury Group acted in the transaction through its Netherlands-based retail investor and developer Atterbury Europe. The strategic partnership with MPC Properties will strengthen Atterbury Europe's goal to develop and invest in shopping centres in Central and Eastern Europe, Louis van der Watt, CEO of Atterbury Group said. In addition, the parties seeded a 50:50 development fund to develop a pipeline of retail real estate assets in Serbia and neighboring countries in the Balkans. Atterbury Europe, a joint venture formed by Atterbury Group and foreign investors, focuses on shopping centre investments and retail development opportunities in the Balkan region. In July 2015, it made its first landmark investment in a EUR 200mn retail portfolio in Cyprus. JSE-listed Attacq Ltd (former Atterbury Investment Holdings) is a leading South African capital growth fund in the real estate sector. Attacq has grown gross assets to ZAR 23.3bn (USD 1.61bn) as at 30 June 2015. Founded in 2002, MPC Properties is one of largest real estate development companies in Serbia, which has invested in more than 25 projects with a total gross lettable area of around 1.25 million m2. Note: Based on the EUR 259mn gross asset value portfolio of seven Serbian shopping centers, the deal value for the 1/3 acquired stake is EUR 85.47mn.

The proceeds will be used for increasing the employee team and international expansion to Russia and Germany. In November 2014, Maxfield Capital injected USD 1.7mn in the target. PKB works through a mobile application. The service connects to the electronic systems of hospitals and allows patients to share information with them via an encrypted channel. Thus the centralization of the access to the medical records is facilitated. Maxfield Capital is a venture capital firm that invests in global seed and early stage technology companies. The fund is focused on Israel, West and East Europe as well as the U.S.A.

The deal is subject to regulatory approvals and is expected to be completed by 31 March 2016. The seller in the deal is German-based universal Bank Landesbank Baden-Wuerttemberg (LBBW). The acquisition is a strategic move by Wipro to invest in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. The deal will enable the buyer to have significant scale and prime customer relationships primarily in the manufacturing and automotive domains. Cellent AG provides application life cycle consulting and management, identity management, business discovery and future workplace. The company also offers SAP consulting, service catalogue management and service transition. Wipro Ltd offers IT services and solutions such as analytics, applications, business outcome services, cloud services, information management, infrastructure services, and product engineering. The deal marks the entry of BRF into the Thailand market. The acquisition will be carried out by BRF subsidiary BRF GmbH and will include shares and assets of Golden Foods Siam in Thailand and Europe. The buyer has also announced that it will acquire Argentina's Eclipse Holding Cooperatief UA for USD 85mn and U.K.-based meat supplier Universal (U.K.) Ltd for approximately USD 51mn. The acquisitions are in line with the plan of BRF to expand its operations in Asia, Europe and South America. Golden Foods Siams, established in 1991, acts as a fully integrated chicken processor. It also manufactures fully cooked chicken products for the global market. It supplies restaurants chains, supermarkets and food services providers in both retail and industrial bulk packaging. The company had revenues of THB 11.1bn (USD 337.3mn) in 2014. BRF SA produces and supplies a portfolio of good products such as meats, pizzas, pastas and frozen vegetables among others. The buyer's stake in Berjaya Land will increase from 63.05% to 75.05% upon completion of the deal. The acquisition is aligned with the strategy of Berjaya Corp to increase its equity interest in Berjaya land as the former assumes that the properties under the latter will appreciate in value. Berjaya Land Bhd, founded in 1990, invests and operates properties, hotels, resorts and casinos. The company also provides education and training services in Asia. 113676 02/12/2015 巴西 Rede D'Or Sao Luiz SA 少数股权购买 GIC Pte Ltd 新加坡 Banco BTG Pactual SA 医院服务 (622) 615.06 (官方数据) 12 UPDATE 2: On 30 December 2015, BTG Pactual announced the completion of the transaction. UPDATE 1: On 2 December 2015, BTG Pactual confirmed the transaction for a total consideration of BRL 2.38bn (USD 615mn). ORIGINAL: Brazilian investment bank Banco BTG Pactual SA has agreed to sell a 12% stake in Brazilian hospital operator Rede D'Or Sao Luiz SA to Singapore's sovereign wealth fund GIC Private Ltd for around BRL 2.47bn (USD 633mn), O Estado de S. Paulo journal reported. Upon the completion of the transaction, GIC will increase its stake in Rede D'Or to 28.3%. On 27 May 2015, GIC acquired a 16.3% in Rede D'Or for BRL 3.2bn (USD 1bn), and an additional 1% on 6 August 2015 for BRL 310mn (USD 89.3mn). BTG Pactual has accelerated the sale that has been negotiated since August 2015, due to an urgent need of financial resources. The investment bank is trying to get rid of some of its direct investment, including shareholdings, bonds and real estate properties, Brazilian economics and business magazine Exame reported, citing a source close to BTG Pactual. Rede D'Or Sao Luiz SA, established in 1977 by the Moll family in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, operates a network of 30 hospitals with over 4,700 beds and 46 laboratories under the Labs D'Or brand, located in the states of Rio de Janeiro, Sao Paulo, Pernambuco and the Federal District. With a team of more than 34,000 employees and 87,000 affiliated doctors, annually, the company has over 2.9 million emergency room visits, 170,000 surgeries and 270,000 inpatient treatments, serving an addressable market of 53 million people. Rede D'Or had revenues of BRL 5bn (USD 2.13bn) and a net income of BRL 322.9mn (USD 137.6mn) in 2014. BTG Pactual is a leading provider of investment banking, asset and wealth management services in Brazil. The group has an international investment and distribution platform covering Latin America, the United States, the United Kingdom, Singapore and Hong Kong. It posted total revenues of BRL 4.87bn (USD 2.08bn) and net income of BRL 3.41bn (USD 1.45mn) for 2014. GIC Private Ltd, incorporated in 1981, is the sovereign wealth fund of the Government of Singapore, with over USD 100bn of assets under management as of 31 March 2015, focused on investments in public and private equities, fixed income assets, real estate, natural resources and infrastructure in more than 40 countries worldwide. The company operates offices in Singapore, Brazil, India, Japan, China, Korea, the United Kingdom, and the United States, and has 1,200 employees. ______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE 2: Em 30 de dezembro de 2015, o BTG Pactual anunciou o fechamento do acordo. UPDATE 1: Em 2 de dezembro de 2015, o BTG Pactual confirmou a informação relativamente ' transação. O valor do negócio era de BRL 2.38bn (USD 615mn). ORIGINAL: O banco de investimento Banco BTG Pactual SA entrou em um acordo para a venda de uma participação de 12% na operadora brasileira de hospitais Rede D'Or São Luiz SA, para o fundo soberano de Cingapura GIC Private Ltd, por cerca de BRL 2.47bn (USD 633mn), o jornal O Estado de S. Paulo apurou. Após a conclusão da transação, a GIC vai aumentar a sua participação na Rede D'Or para 28.3%. Em 27 de Maio de 2015, a GIC adquiriu uma participação de 16.3% na Rede D'Or para BRL 3.2 (USD 1bn), e uma parcela adicional de 1%, em 6 de agosto de 2015, por BRL 310mn (USD 89.3mn). A BTG Pactual tem acelerado o processo da venda que foi negociada desde agosto de 2015, devido ' necessidade urgente de recursos financeiros que o banco estava a passar. O banco de investimento procura livrar-se de alguns dos seus investimentos diretos, incluindo participações em empresas, títulos e ativos imobiliários, a revista brasileira de economia e negócios Exame apurou, citando uma fonte próxima ao BTG Pactual. A Rede D'Or, fundada em 1977 pela família Moll, no Rio de Janeiro, Brasil,, opera uma rede de 30 hospitais com mais de 4,700 leitos e 46 laboratórios sob a marca Labs D'Or, localizados nos estados do Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo, Pernambuco e no Distrito Federal. Com uma equipe de mais de 34,000 funcionários e 87,000 médicos afiliados, anualmente o grupo tem mais de 2.9 milhões de atendimentos de emergência, 170,000 cirurgias e 270,000 tratamentos de internação, servindo um mercado potencial de 53 milhões de pessoas. A Rede D'Or postou receitas de vendas de BRL 5bn (USD 2.13bn) e um lucro líquido de BRL 322.9mn (USD 137.6mn) em 2014. O BTG Pactual é um provedor líder de serviços de banca de investimento, e gestão de ativos e riqueza no Brasil. O grupo tem uma plataforma internacional de investimento e distribuição que abrange a América Latina, os Estados Unidos, o Reino Unido, Singapura e Hong Kong. A empresa apurou um faturamento de BRL 4.87bn (USD 2.08bn) e um lucro líquido de BRL 3.41bn (USD 1.45mn) em 2014. O GIC Private Ltd, criado em 1981, é o fundo de riqueza soberana do Governo de Cingapura com mais de USD 100bn de ativos sob gestão ' data de 31 de março de 2015, focado em investimentos em títulos públicos e privados, ativos de renda fixa, imóveis, recursos naturais e infraestrutura em 40 países. A empresa tem escritórios em Cingapura, Brasil, Índia, Japão, China, Coreia do Sul, Reino Unido e Estados Unidos e envolve 1,200 colaboradores.

The buyer will settle the deal through its wholly owned subsidiary Xizang Linzhi Parkson Pharmaceutical Co Ltd. Huapont’s acquisition is in line with its plan to focus its main business to the healthcare sector. The company will also bring Swiss Biological’s Paracelsus Suisse to China, a medical center for anti-aging, tumor and chronic disease treatments. In addition, the deal marks the second international transaction the buyer has made related to the healthcare sector. On 17 September 2015, the buyer had acquired German rehabilitation provider Rheintalklinik GmbH & Co Porten KG for CNY 42.5mn (EUR 5.8mn, USD 6.7mn). Swiss Biological Medicine Group Ltd produces pharmaceutical products and provides medical treatment services through its medical centre Paracelsus Suisse. The company had revenues of CNY 115.3mn (USD 18mn) in 2014. Huapont Life Science Co Ltd manufactures active pharmaceutical ingredients, retinoids, dermatological drug products, adjuvant drug products and anti-infection products. The company is listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of CNY 4.9bn (USD 795.1mn) in 2014.
