The completion of the deals is subject to closing conditions precedent. The acquisition will supplement United Photovoltaics' existing solar power plant portfolio and further expand its scale of business in the solar energy sector. The company will fund the payment of the consideration payable by internal resources. Wujiaqu Lishang owns a solar power plant project with an installed capacity of 20MW located in Wujiaqu, Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region of China. The plants is expected to be connected to the grid and enter into operation by the end of December 2015. Tangshan Zhaoxin owns a solar power plant project with an installed capacity of approximately 20MW located in Tangshan, Hebei Province. The plant is expected to be connected to the grid and go operational operation in the first quarter of 2016. United Photovoltaics invests in, develops and operates solar power plants in China. It posted a turnover of CNY 379.4mn (USD 61.8mn) for 2014. Zhaoxin Energy Investment is engaged in the business of investment, planning, construction and operation of solar power plants in China. 113641 01/12/2015 韩国 Social Network 少数股权购买 Korea Investment Partners Co Ltd; Mirae Asset Financial Group; Posco Co Ltd; Intellectual Ventures 韩国; 美国 　 软件出版 (5112); 互联网出版与传播 (516) 4.3 (官方数据) 　 South Korean trends servicing platform Social Network has raised an investment of USD 4.3m from Korea Investment Partners, Mirae Asset Investment, Posco Ltd and Intellectual Ventures, digital technology media besuccess.com reported. The investment fund will be used for the development the company's original content and for expansion into China. The round increased the total investment in Social Network to close to KRW 10bn (USD 9mn). In 2012, the start-up received an early stage investment from Travel Doctor, Shinhan Bank and Hong Kong's Evo Revo. So far Social Network has launched two products - Sketchup and Campus 10. Sketchup is top Korean children's coloring application that utilizes popular Korean children's characters including Pororo, Larva, Pucca, Robo Car Poli and Tobot. Campus 10 is the top Korean mobile magazine for people in their twenties.
114750 01/12/2015 塞尔维亚 Iron Trust doo 收购 Iron Mountain Inc 美国 Toma Bilic - private investor; Panagiotis Xydas - private investor 流程，实物分配及物流咨询服务 (541614) 　 　 100 U.S.-based storage and information management group Iron Mountain Inc. agreed to acquire Serbian peer Iron Trust d.o.o. from private individuals Toma Bilic and Panagiotis Xydas, CEE Legal Matters announced. Financial terms were not disclosed. Iron Trust d.o.o., based in Belgrade, is one of the leading companies in Serbia in the archive management, imaging services, and physical data storage solutions. The company serves customers from many business activities, including accounting & auditing, aviation, banking, finance, food & beverage, healthcare, IT, legal, manufacturing, media, pharma, shipping, trading, travel & tourism. Iron Mountain, established in 1951, is one of the global leaders for storage and information management solutions, offering records management, data backup and recovery, document management, and secure shredding. The company operates in 36 countries with a network of 1,100 facilities comprising a total area of 67.8 million square feet. It employs more than 20,000 people. The company is listed on the NYSE and its revenues were USD 1.86bn in 2014.

Capital Invent focuses on investments in internet companies. Rise Capital focuses on early venture and later stage investments. Variv Capital is an investment firm, operating under a hybrid model between a traditional venture capital firm and company builder. Since its inception, the company has helped entrepreneurs build over 30 technology companies across Latin America.

ORIGINAL: Brazilian food processor BRF SA announced it has signed a binding offer for the acquisition of a majority stake in Argentinean counterpart Campo Austral SA for an enterprise value of USD 85mn. Under the offer, BRF will acquire the entire share capital of Dutch holding company Eclipse Holding Cooperatief UA, which in turn controls Campo Austral. The sellers were U.K.-based private equity funds Pampa Agribusiness Fund LP and Pampa Agribusiness Follow-on Fund LP. BRF said that the acquisition is aligned with its strategy of globalizing the company by accessing local markets and strengthening its operations. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals. Campo Austral operates a fully integrated business in the Argentinean hog segment. BRF is an animal protein and food processing company with operations in the segments of meats (poultry, hogs and beef cattle), processed meats, dairy products, margarines, pastas and frozen vegetables under the brands of Sadia, Perdigao, Batavo, Elege and Qualy. The round was also participated by local private equity firm Tembusu Partners, and China-based investment firm Triumph Capital. Burpple said it will use the funds to enhance its existing features, introduce complimentary dining services, and hire product development engineers, as it prepares for a regional roll out. The app has over four million users currently. Tembusu Partners is a PE firm that invests in fast-growing companies, while SPH Media Fund is the venture-capital arm of Singapore Press Holdings Ltd. 113816 01/12/2015 巴西 Shopping Eldorado 少数股权购买 Gazit-Globe Ltd 以色列 　 房地产 (531) 19.12 (官方数据) 4.3 Israeli shopping centre operator Gazit-Globe Ltd announced it has acquired a 4.3% stake in Brazilian shopping center Shopping Eldorado in Sao Paulo city (Sao Paulo state, Brazil) for BRL 74mn (USD 19.12mn). Gazit acted through its wholly owned Brazilian subsidiary Gazit Brasil. The transaction is part of the company's strategic plan for expansion through acquisitions in the country. This is the fourth acquisition that Gazit makes in Brazil in 2015, due to the low prices of real estate properties. It has acquired a 60% stake in Mais Shopping (Sao Paulo city) in February this year, the total capital of Light Shopping (Sao Paulo city) in June, and a 5.16% stake in Brazilian shopping centres management company BR Malls Participacoes SA in October. Shopping Eldorado was built in 1981 and is located in Sao Paulo. The shopping centre has 328 stores with a gross leasable area of 164,734 m2 and contains 3,500 parking spaces. Gazit-Globe, founded in 1991, specialises in the acquisition, development and management of real estate properties, primarily supermarket-anchored shopping centres. As of June 30 2015 its portfolio includes 453 properties in more than 20 countries with a gross leasable area of 6.3 million m2 and a total value of USD 20bn. Gazit-Globe is listed on the New York Stock Exchange, the Toronto Stock Exchange and the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange. _________________________________________________________________________________________ O operador israelita de centros comerciais Gazit-Globe Ltd anunciou a aquisição de uma participação de 4.3% no centro comercial brasileiro Shopping Eldorado na cidade de São Paulo (SP, Brasil), por BRL 74mn (USD 19.12mn). A Gazit agiu através da sua subsidiária integral brasileira Gazit Brasil. Esta é a quarta aquisição que a Gazit faz no Brasil em 2015, devido aos baixos preços das propriedades imobiliárias. Ele adquiriu uma participação de 60% no Mais Shopping (cidade de São Paulo) em fevereiro deste ano, a totalidade do capital social do Light Shopping (cidade de São Paulo), em junho, e uma participação de 5.16% na administradora de shopping centers BR Malls Participações SA, em outubro. O Shopping Eldorado foi construído em 1981 e está localizado em São Paulo. O centro comercial tem 328 lojas com uma área arrendável de 164,734 m2 e contém 3,500 lugares de estacionamento. A Gazit-Globe, fundada em 1991, especializa-se na aquisição desenvolvimento e gestão de imóveis, principalmente centros comerciais e supermercados. Em 30 de junho de 2015 o portfólio da empresa incluia 453 propriedades em mais de 20 países, com uma área arrendável de 6.3 milhões m2 e um valor total de USD 20bn. A Gazit-Globe está listada na Bolsa de Valores de Nova Iorque, na Bolsa de Valores de Toronto e na Bolsa de Valores de Tel Aviv.
113820 01/12/2015 巴西 Standard Tyres Group 收购 Trelleborg AB 瑞典 　 橡胶制品的制造 (3262); 汽车及零配件经销商 (441) 　 　 Swedish polymer technology group Trelleborg AB announced it has acquired Brazilian industrial tyre manufacturer Standard Tyres Group for an undisclosed sum. Trelleborg acted through its business area Trelleborg Wheel Systems. The acquisition strengthens Trelleborg's presence in the industrial tyre segment in South America and reinforces its leading position on the global market. Mr. Maurizio Vischi, President of the Trelleborg Wheel Systems business area, said that, since Brazil is the largest market for materials handling vehicles in South America, the acquisition provides Trelleborg with access to the local Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) market. In addition, it consolidates Trelleborg's presence as a global supplier of solid tyres to global OEM markets. Mr. Maurizio also said that the operation will facilitate the company's expansion to other South American countries. Standard, based in Sao Paulo city (Sao Paulo state, Brazil), operates as a tyre manufacturer and supplier. In addition, the company provides technical assistance and tyre fitting services. The firm had a turnover of approximately USD 14.61mn in 2014. Trelleborg is a leading global provider of engineered polymer solutions that seal, damp and protect critical applications in demanding environments. The company has operations in over 40 countries and workforce of 16,500 people. It posted revenues of SEK 22.5bn (USD 3.29bn) and a net profit of SEK 2.24bn (USD 327mn) in 2014. Trelleborg has been listed on the Stockholm Stock Exchange since 1964. ________________________________________________________________________________________ A provedora sueca de tecnologia em polímeros Trelleborg AB anunciou que adquiriu a fabricante brasileira de pneus industriais Standard Tyres Group, por um valor não revelado. A Trelleborg agiu através da sua área de negócios Trelleborg Wheel Systems. A aquisição fortalece a presença da Trelleborg no segmento de pneus industriais na América do Sul e reforça a sua posição de liderança no mercado global. O Sr. Maurizio Vischi, presidente da área de negócios Trelleborg Wheel Systems, disse que, visto que o Brasil tem o maior mercado de equipamentos de manuseio de materiais na América do Sul, a aquisição proporciona para a Trelleborg acesso ao mercado local de Fabricação Original do Equipamentos (do inglês, OEM). A operação também consolida a presença da Trelleborg como fornecedora global de pneus maciços para o mercado global de OEM. O Sr. Maurizio acrescentou que a operação ia facilitar a expansão da empresa para outros países sul-americanos. A Standard, sediada em São Paulo (SP, Brasil), opera como fabricante e fornecedora de pneus. A companhia também oferece assistência técnica e serviços de montagem de pneus. A empresa teve um faturamento de cerca de USD 14.61mn em 2014. A Trelleborg é uma provedora líder no mercado global de soluções de polímeros de engenharia que vedam, despejam e protegem aplicativos críticos em ambientes exigentes. A empresa tem operações em mais de 40 países e uma equipe de 16,500 pessoas. A Trelleborg teve uma receitas de vendas de SEK 22.5bn (USD 3.29bn) e um lucro líquido de SEK 2.24bn (USD 327mn) em 2014. A Trelleborg está listada na Bolsa de Valores de Estocolmo desde 1964.
113825 01/12/2015 巴西 Selectchemie Importacao Exportacao e Representacoes Ltda 收购 IMCD Group NV 荷兰 Selectchemie AG; Company manager(s) 化工产品的批发 (4226) 　 　 100 UPDATE: On 15 December 2015, the buyer's legal advisor disclosed to DealWatch that the deal was completed. ORIGINAL: Dutch specialty chemicals and food ingredients distributor IMCD Group NV announced it has agreed to acquire the total capital of Brazilian pharmaceutical chemicals distributor Selectchemie Importacao Exportacao e Representacoes Ltda (Selectchemie) for an undisclosed sum. The sellers are Swizz industrial chemicals manufacturer Selectchemie AG and two current managers of Selectchemie. According to Dr. John Robinson, director of IMCD Business Group Pharmaceuticals, the acquisition aligns with the company's goal to consolidate its position as a world class supplier of pharmaceutical ingredients, by complementing its existing product portfolio. He added that he considers Brazil to be a dynamic market for the generic pharmaceutical industry. Mr. Walter Thuring, managing director of Selectchemie, said that the company will combine its knowledge about the Brazilian market with IMCD's technical expertise, in order to reach further growth. The transaction is expected to be concluded before the end of 2015. Selectchemie, established in 1970, operates as a wholesaler of chemicals and allied products, such as excipients and active pharmaceutical ingredients. The company distributes pharmaceutical ingredients in Brazil, under the brands of world leading producers from the U.S., Europe and Asia. Selectchemie had 43 employees and generated revenues of BRL 68mn (USD 29mn) in 2014. IMCD, established in 1995, focuses on sale, marketing and distribution of specialty chemicals and food ingredients for the detergents, pharmaceuticals, personal care, coatings, food and nutrition, lubricants, synthesis, and plastics industries. The company operates distribution facilities in 30 countries in Europe, Africa and Asia-Pacific, and engages 1,500 employees. IMCD reached a turnover of EUR 1.36bn (USD 1.8bn) and a net income of EUR 20mn (USD 26.6mn) in 2014. __________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE: Em 15 de Dezembro de 2015, o assessor jurídico da compradora revelou para o DealWatch que o negócio foi fechado. ORIGINAL: A distribuidora holandesa de especialidades químicas e ingredientes alimentícios IMCD Group BV anunciou que entrou em um acordo para a aquisição da totalidade do capital social da fornecedora brasileira de químicos farmacéuticos Selectchemie Importação Exportação e Representações Ltda (Selectchemie), por um valor não revelado. Os vendedores são a fabricante suiça de produtos químicos industriais Selectchemie AG e dois dos gestores atuais da Selectchemie. Segundo o Dr. John Robinson, diretor da IMCD Business Group Pharmaceuticals, a aquisição está em linha com o objetivo da empresa de consolidar a sua posição de liderança global no fornecimento de ingredientes farmacêuticos, complementando o seu portfólio existente de produtos. Ele acrescentou que considerava o Brasil um mercado de grande potencial para a indústria farmacêutica de medicamentos genéricos. O Sr. Walter Thuring, diretor da Selectchemie, disse que a empresa ia combinar o seu conhecimento sobre o mercado brasileiro com a experiência técnica da IMCD, a fim de alcançar um maior crescimento. A transação deverá ser concluída antes do final de 2015. A Selectchemie, criada em 1970, opera como uma atacadista de produtos químicos e produtos aliados, tais como excipientes e ingredientes farmacêuticos ativos. A empresa distribui ingredientes farmacêuticos no Brasil, sob as marcas de algumas das principais produtoras dos EUA, Europa e Ásia. A Selectchemie teve 43 colaboradores e gerou uma receita de vendas de BRL 68mn (USD 29mn) em 2014. A IMCD, criada em 1995, concentra-se na marketing, comercialização e distribuição de especialidades químicas e ingredientes alimentícios para os segmentos de detergentes, farmacêuticos, higiene pessoal, tintas, alimentação e nutrição, lubrificantes e plásticos. A empresa opera unidades de distribuição em 30 países na Europa, África e Ásia-Pacífico e envolve 1,500 colaboradores. A IMCD atingiu um volume de negócios de EUR 1.36bn (USD 1.8bn) e um lucro líquido de EUR 20mn (USD 26.6mn) em 2014.

Explore Worldwide is a British tour operator which provides walking, cycling, rail and other adventure tours across 120 countries worldwide. The company currently has over 120 employees offering around 570 tours. The firm was founded in1981. Explore Worldwide reported total revenues of GBP 11.2mn (USD 16.6mn) for FY ended 31 March 2015. Hotelplan Group is an international Swiss travel and tourism firm which provides walking, skiing, cycling, and hiking tours among others. The group has around 2,600 employees that catered to 1'304 clients in FY ended 31 December 2014. The group has reported consolidated revenues of CHF 1.3bn (USD 1.3bn) for FY ended 31 December 2014. Cox & Kings is an Indian travel firm that offers leisure and corporate travel services, visa processing and foreign exchange. It has a total presence in 149 cities in India and has operations in 22 countries. Cox & Kings reported total consolidated revenues of INR 26.2bn (USD 414.2mn) for FY ended 31 March 2015.

No financial details were disclosed. Orucoglu Yag was established in the late 1960s. It produces sunflower, maize, canola, hazelnut and olive oil. The factory has daily capacity to process 750 tonnes of seed and to produce 300 tonnes of oil and 450 tonnes of oil cake. Orucoglu Yag is currently part of Hedef Group, which has interests also in the distribution of non-durable goods, chemicals and tourism. The sale is in line with the group's plans to focus on its distribution business, hurriyet.com.tr reported. The deal is expected to complete by end-December 2015. The buildings acquisition is part of HBL's growing portolio of British investments. The current deal is HBL's third major acquisition in 2015, and its sixth office building in the U.K. Earlier in late July and early August 2015, HBL announced the acquisitions of two office buildings in London, of which one office is located at 39 Victoria Street, and the second is known as 110 Park Street - situated at he northern end of Park Street in Mayfair district. The acquired property comprises two office buildings of 20 storeys and 22 storeys, with an aggregate lettable area of 41,044 m2 (441,797 square feet). The buildings are situated at the Wellesley Road in Croydon district, an important business and commercial centre in London, and both are currently fully let to the British Government in two separate leases until 23 June 2023. The buildings were constructed in the late 1960s and underwent a refurbishment process in 1995 and 2000. Ho Bee Land Ltd, established in 1987, is a real estate development and investment company, with a diverse portfolio of quality residential, commercial and high-tech industrial projects in Australia, China and the U.K. The company also develops luxury homes in the exclusive residential complex of Sentosa Cove in Singapore. In London, its properties portfolio includes 1 St Martin's Le Grand, Rose Court and 60 St Martin's Lane. It is listed on the Singapore Exchange and its total assets were SGD 3.74bn (USD 2.7bn) as of 30 June 2015.

Financial details of the deal were not disclosed. AES Oasis Ltd, holds 60% stake in AES Jordan HoldCo Ltd, which owns Al Mnakhir independent power plant in Jordan. In March 2015, Nebras agreed to acquire a 24% stake in the 241 MW IPP4 power plant in Jordan from U.S. energy group AES for an undisclosed amount. In 2014, Nebras acquired a 35% stake in the Shams Maan Solar PV project in Jordan. Al Mnakhir independent power plant is located in east of Amman and has installed capacity of 374 MW. It sells electricity generated to National Electricity and Power Company of Jordan through a long term power purchase agreement which expires in 2033. Nebras Power was established in 2014 as a USD 1bn joint venture among QEWC (60%), Qatar Petroleum (20%) and Qatar Holding (20%). The company is pursuing continuing investments in power generation and water desalination projects, both within the MENA region and outside. The state-owned QEWC, founded in 1990, is one of the biggest companies in Qatar in terms of assets. It operates in the field of power and water production in the region.
113713 01/12/2015 中国 Dumex Baby Food Co Ltd 收购 Yashili International Holdings Ltd 香港 Groupe Danone SA 液体乳及乳制品制造 (3115) 158.67 (官方数据) 100 French food group Danone disclosed it will sell Chinese dairy products company Dumex Baby Food to local peer Yashili International for EUR 150mn (USD 158.7mn, RMB 1bn, HKD 1.2bn). Completion of the transaction is subject to customary closing conditions. Danone holds a 25% stake in Yashili International. The acquisition is in line with buyer's strategy to penetrate into the markets of first and second tier cities in China, and broaden its product portfolio. Yashili operates in four segments, including pediatric milk formula products, scient pediatric milk formula products, nutrition products, and the production and sale of packing materials and sale of surplus raw materials. It is a leading player in Chinese paediatric milk formula industry, and also has a leading position in the soymilk powder market. The company is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. 113685 01/12/2015 阿尔巴尼亚; 希腊; 意大利; 瑞士 Trans Adriatic Pipeline (TAP) AG 少数股权购买 Snam SpA 意大利 Statoil ASA 管道运输 (486) 137.51 (官方数据) 20 UPDATE: On 17 December 2015, Trans Adriatic Pipeline (TAP) announced the completion of the transaction. ORIGINAL: Norway's global energy group Statoil will sell its 20% in the Trans Adriatic Pipeline (TAP) project to Italy's gas infrastructure company Snam SpA for EUR 130mn (USD 137.5mn), both parties announced. As part of the deal agreement, Snam SpA will also assume a EUR 78.0mn credit facility granted by Statoil to TAP. The deal is subject to certain conditions precedent, and is expected to complete by end-2015. As a result of the deal, Statoil will exit the ownership of TAP, and Snam SpA will take over its rights and duties related to the development of the pipeline project, which will carry gas from Azerbaijan to Europe, going through Greece and Albania, and ending in Italy. The acquisition will enable Snam SpA to expand its geographical footprint and strengthen its ambition to create a gas hub in Europe. Following the deal, TAP's ownership will be controlled by BP (20%), SOCAR (20%), Snam SpA (20%), Fluxys (19%), Enagas (16%) and Axpo (5%). This divestment follows Statoil's sale of its remaining 15.5% stake in Azerbaijan's Shah Deniz field and the South Caucasus Pipeline to Malaysia-based Petronas for USD 2.25bn, announced in October 2014. Swiss-based Trans Adriatic Pipeline AG has four offices in Albania, another four in Greece and two offices in Italy, and is the company established for the purpose of developing the TAP project. TAP route will be 878 km long, and will transport natural gas from the giant Shah Deniz II field in Azerbaijan to Europe, passing through Turkey, Greece, Albania, the Adriatic Sea, and Italy. TAP will connect with the Trans Anatolian Pipeline (TANAP) at the Turkish-Greek border at Kipoi. TAP will facilitate gas supply to several South Eastern European countries, including Albania, Bulgaria, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Montenegro, Romania and others. The first TAP gas deliveries to Europe are planned for early 2020, with an initial capacity of 10 bcm (10 billion cubic meters) per year. TAP will open the so-called Southern Gas Corridor, enhancing Europe's energy security by contributing to the diversification of the gas supplies.
113681 01/12/2015 斯洛伐克 160,000 commercial real estate portfolio 收购 CTP Invest spol sro 捷克共和国 　 房地产 (531) 　 　 100 Czech industrial real estate company CTP Invest announced that it has acquired portfolio of commercial properties in Slovakia. Financial terms of the deal were not disclosed. The portfolio comprises three assets: 62,000 m2 logistics and production halls in Trnava, with a land bank of 35,000 m2 for further development - renamed CTPark Trnava. 15,000 m2 automotive components production facility in Nitra, with a land bank of 40,000 m2 for further development - renamed CTPark Nitra. 8,500 m2 Westend Tower office building in Bratislava. CTP, founded in 1998, is a real estate developer and property manager operating in the Czech Republic and Central Europe. The company's portfolio consists of premium industrial, office, retail and mixed-use properties with over 2.8 million m2 of leasable space. CTP employs 160 people.
113679 01/12/2015 撒哈拉沙漠以南非洲地区; 葡萄牙 Salvador Caetano Auto Africa 少数股权购买 AfricInvest 突尼斯 　 汽车、摩托车及零配件批发 (4211) 　 　 　 Africa-focused private equity firm AfricInvest announced that it has made an investment in sub-Saharan Africa-focused auto distributor Salvador Caetano Auto Africa. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. AfricInvest said that investment intends to finance the growth of Salvador Caetano Auto Africa.on the continent. The transaction was carried out through AfricInvest Fund III. Salvador Caetano Auto Africa is the exclusive auto distributor of Ford, Audi, Seat, Volkswagen and Skoda for Cape Verde and Angola and also Toyota, Renault and KIA in Cape Verde. The company recently expanded into East and French speaking West Africa with the signing of distribution agreement with Renault in 10 countries. Salvador Caetano Auto Africa forms part of Portuguese motor vehicle group Salvador Caetano. AfricInvest was founded in 1994 and has made over 120 investments in 25 African countries. It has asset under management of some USD 1bn across 14 funds and is part of Tunisian investment and financial services group Integra.
113672 01/12/2015 尼日利亚 OPL 310 block offshore Nigeria 少数股权购买 Lekoil Ltd 英国 Afren Plc 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 13 (官方数据) 22.86 British oil and gas company Lekoil disclosed to the LSE that it has agreed to acquire a 22.86% stake in the OPL 310 block offshore Nigeria from British peer Afren for USD 13mn. Lekoil currently has a 17.14% participating interest and a 30% economic interest in OPL 310 which it got through a farm-in agreement signed in 2013 with Afren. After the completion of the transaction, Lekoil will hold a 40% participating interest and a 70% economic interest in the license. "We have long stated our ambition to become a leading indigenous, risk diversified E&P business focused on Africa in general and Nigeria in particular. We believe that today's acquisition is a great result for our shareholders. It further demonstrates our ability to build a strong portfolio, and marks the culmination of a busy period in the development of the Company. Lekoil now has a suite of assets at different stages of development, with different teams working on them," said Lekoil CEO Lekan Akinyanmi. OPL 310 is located within the Upper Cretaceous fairway that runs along the West African Transform Margincontains and it the Ogo oil and gas discovery. According to Afren's review, the Ogo-1 well drilled into a four-way dip-closed structure in the Turonian to Albian sandstone reservoirs was one of the world's largest discoveries of 2013. The company estimated recoverable resources in the 774-1,180 MMboe range, with upside potential for light oil or condensate-rich gas in the syn-rift play. Lekoil is an Africa-focused oil and gas exploration and production company with a focus on Nigeria and West Africa. The firm is listed on the London Stock Exchange and had a market capitalisation of GBP 118.4mn |(USD 178mn) on 1 December 2015.
113669 01/12/2015 南非 Kimberley Mines tailings retreatment operations 收购 Petra Diamonds Ltd; Ekapa Mining (Pty) Ltd 英国; 南非 De Beers Group of Companies 非金属矿的采选 (2123) 7.08 (官方数据) 100 Africa-focused diamond mining group Petra Diamonds disclosed to the LSE that it has agreed to acquire the Kimberley Mines tailings retreatment operations in northwestern South Africa of De Beers in partnership with South African empowerment tailings treatment company Ekapa Mining. The sum of the deal stands at ZAR 102mn (USD 7.08mn) and the transaction will be carried out through an acquisition vehicle named Ekapa Minerals. Ekapa Mining and Petra will own 50.1% and 49.9% of Ekapa Minerals, respectively. Ekapa Minerals will be managed by Ekapa Mining CEO Jahn Hohne and it will inject ZAR 200mn (USD 13.9mn) of working capital into the operations. The transaction includes a number of tailings dumps in Kimberley and an associated plant. The Kimberley tailings operations have a resource of 2.8 million carats at a grade of 11 carats per 100-tonnes for the first three years and then dropping to six carats. Ekapa Minerals is expected to produce some 700,000 ctpa in the first three years of operation of the Kimberley Mines, with annual revenue of close to ZAR 920mn (USD 65mn), based on an assumed diamond price of USD 95 per carat. Petra operates the nearby Kimberley underground mine and the two buyers are considering combining their assets in Kimberley to pool resources and include the Kimberley Mines tailings. Petra Diamonds is a Jersey-based diamond mining group with interests in five producing mines in South Africa and Tanzania. The company is listed on the London Stock Exchange and it booked sales of USD 425mn in its FY ended 30 June 2015. Ekapa Mining is a medium-sized Tailings Mineral Resources (TMR) processing business which currently owns a 60.6% interest in 40 Mt of TMRs in Kimberley. The company also operates a processing plant with an effective throughput of 3 Mtpa.
113665 01/12/2015 那米比亚; 赞比亚 BHL Zambia; BHL Namibia 收购 Beefco Ltd 赞比亚 Cargo Carriers Ltd 道路运输 (484) 1.94 (官方数据) 　 South African logistics services provider Cargo Carriers disclosed to the JSE that it has agreed to sell its 55% stake in BHL Zambia and its 51% interest in BHL Namibia to Zambian food company Beefco for USD 1.94mn. Beefco has a 45% stake in BHL Zambia and a 49% stake in BHL Namibia. Cargo Carriers said that the exposure to the fluctuations in the mining economy in Zambia and changes in the currency environment, among other matters, has led it to accept an offer for the business. BHL Zambia specialises in the transport of various commodities including copper concentrates, lime and sulphuric acid. The company's clients include firms operating in the mining, manufacturing and agricultural sectors in Zambia, the DRC and Namibia. Cargo Carriers was founded in 1956 and is a specialised transportation, supply chain and logistics service provider. The company is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and had a market capitalisation of ZAR 224.4mn (USD 15.6mn) on 1 December 2015.
113642 01/12/2015 巴西 Samar Solucoes Ambientais de Aracatuba SA 收购 GS Inima Environment SA 西班牙 OAS Solucoes Ambientais SA 水的供应、污水处理和其他水的处理、利用与分配 (2213) 　 100 UPDATE 2: On 03 May 2016, GS Inima announced that the operation was completed. UPDATE 1: On 28 December 2015, the Brazilian Antitrust Authority CADE approved the transaction. ORIGINAL: Brazilian engineering and infrastructure group OAS Solucoes Ambientais SA has agreed to sell its wholly-owned environmental services arm Samar Solucoes Ambientais de Aracatuba SA to Spanish environmental engineering services provider GS Inima Environment SA, Brazilian media sources reported. Financial terms were not disclosed. GS Inima Environment SA acted through its Brazilian subsidiary GS Inima Brasil. Samar is one of nine OAS' companies under judicial recovery that have to be sold. The raised funds will be used to pay debt. The transaction will not affect Samar's current operations in Aracatuba city (Sao Paulo state, Brazil). The operation is subject to regulatory approvals and the fulfillment of certain conditions, including the approval of the Brazilian Antitrust Authority CADE. Samar specialises in operation, management, and maintenance of equipment and infrastructure for supply, collection, and distribution of water and sewage systems. Apart from the concession in Aracatuba, the company holds a water and sewage concession in Lima, Peru, serving more than eight million people. Gs Inima Environment, established in 1991 in Madrid, provides engineering environmental solutions on a national and international level. It offers all kind of construction services, such as exploration, maintenance and execution, etc., in accordance with the specific country's legislation. OAS, established in 1976, is a multinational conglomerate with operations in two business lines: engineering and heavy-duty construction works in the private and public sectors (such as highways, airports, hydroelectric power plants, ports), and investments in infrastructure, sanitation, multipurpose arenas, concessions of urban roads, highways, subways and airports. The company is present in 20 countries in Central and South America, and Africa. _________________________________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE 2: Em 03 de maio de 2016, a GS Inima anunciou que o negócio foi concluído. UPDATE 1: Em 28 de dezembro de 2015, o Conselho Administrativo de Defesa Econômica (CADE) aprovou a transação. ORIGINAL: O grupo brasileiro de engenharia e infraestrutura OAS Soluções Ambientais SA entrou em um acordo com a provedora espanhola de soluções ambientais de engenharia GS Inima Environment SA para a venda do seu braço de serviços ambientais OAS Soluções Ambientais SA, fontes da mídia brasileira relataram. Os termos financeiros não foram divulgados. A GS Inima Meio Ambiente SA agiu através de sua subsidiária brasileira GS Inima Brasil. A Samar é uma dos nove empresas da OAS que estão num processo de recuperação judicial e devem ser vendidas. Os recursos captados vão ser usado para pagar dívida da OAS. A transação não vai afetar as operações atuais da Samar na cidade de Araçatuba (SP, Brasil). A operação está sujeita a aprovações regulatórias e ao cumprimento de determinadas condições, incluindo a aprovação do Conselho Administrativo de Defesa Econ'2mica (CADE). A Samar é especializada em operação, gestão e manutenção de equipamentos e infraestrutura para abastecimento de água, coleta e tratamento de esgoto. Além da concessão em Araçatuba, a empresa detém a concessão dos serviços de água e esgotamento sanitário em Lima, Peru, atendendo a mais de oito milhões de pessoas. A Gs Inima Ambiente, criada em 1991 em Madrid, oferece soluções ambientais de engenharia a nível nacional e internacional. A companhia realiza todo o tipo de serviços de construção, tais como exploração, manutenção, execução, etc., de acordo com a legislação específica de cada país. A OAS, criada em 1976, é um conglomerado multinacional com operações em duas linhas de negócios: execução de obras de engenharia e construção civil pesada nos setores público e privado (como estradas, aeroportos, hidrelétricas e portos) e investimentos de infraestrutura, saneamento, arenas multiuso, concessões de vias urbanas, rodovias, metrôs e aeroportos. A empresa está presente em 20 países da América Central, América do Sul e África.
113638 01/12/2015 英国 City Football Group 少数股权购买 China Media Capital; CITIC Capital Holdings Ltd 中国 Abu Dhabi United Group 艺术表演、竞技运动和相关服务业 (711) 400 (官方数据) 13 Consortium of high profile Chinese institutional investors led by Chinese financial firm CITIC Capital Holdings and investment fund CMC Holdings (China Media Capital) has agreed to invest USD 400mn in U.K.-based City Football Group (CFG) in exchange for a 13% stake, the parties jointly announced. CFG is wholly-owned by private equity firm Abu Dhabi United Group (ADUG). The transaction will be carried out through the issuance of new shares and is subject to regulatory approval in some territories. CFG will use the capital to fund its China growth, to further CFG international business expansion opportunities, and to develop CFG infrastructure assets. City Football Group owns football clubs, academies, technical support and marketing companies. CFG's clubs include Premier League major Manchester City FC, Melbourne City FC of the A-League and MLS Franchise New York City Football Club. The Group is also a minority shareholder in Yokohama F. Marinos of the J-League. CITIC Capital Holdings, founded in 2002, provides investment banking, asset management, securities trading and brokerage services. The company currently has USD 5bn under management. China Media Capital, founded in 2010 by Ruigang Li, focuses on media, entertainment, sports and Internet. The company owns a slate of exclusive major sports media rights including Chinese Super League, China Football Association “Team of China” (National Teams), and China University Football League. Abu Dhabi United Group (ADUG) is an investment and development company privately owned by Sheikh Mansour bin Zayed Al Nahyan.

Earlier this month, on 2 November 2015, Dentons announced it will merge with both Singapore's counterpart Rodyk & Davidson LLP and Australian peer Gadens, claiming that this will make it the largest law firm in the world. Cardenas & Cardenas is a full-service law firm specialized in various areas of the business law, such as corporate and M&A, banking and finance, antitrust and competition, project finance and infrastructure, litigation, intellectual property, tax and labour. The company reported total revenues of COP 13.5bn (USD 4.32mn) and a net income of COP 53.3mn (USD 0.02mn) for 2014. Lopez Velarde Heftye y Soria offers M&A, project finance, antitrust, corporate, foreign trade, litigation, dispute resolution and other legal services. Dentons specializes on areas such as antitrust, intellectual property, bankruptcy, litigation and arbitration, regulatory compliances, restructuring, corporate governance and others.

Post-transaction, LyondellBasell will have an domestic annual capacity of 44,000 metric tonnes and double it's India customer base. The transaction comes after LyondellBasell acquired SJS Plastiblends for an undisclosed amount in April 2015. It is expected to close on early 2016. The buyer will acquire Zylog Plastalloys' polypropelene compounding and warehousing assets as well as its brands such as Entek, Hipolyene and Hiflex. LyondellBasell is an International Dutch chemical manufacturing that offers plastics and chemicals manufacturing and fuel refining. The firm has 55 manufacturing and refining plants across 18 countries. LyondellBasell is listed in the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) and has reported consolidated total net revenue USD 45.6bn for FY ended 31 December, 2014.

Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner & Smith already placed part of the shares on the international market, acting as an underwriter in the offer, while the remainder were handed over to the owners of the purchase options. 113809 30/11/2015 中美洲; 特立尼达和多巴哥 Guardian Holdings Ltd 少数股权购买 National Commercial Bank Jamaica Ltd (NCB) 牙买加 International Finance Corporation (IFC); Lok Jack family; Ahamad family 保险活动 (5241); 企业管理服务 (55) 143.67 (DW 估计) 29.99 National Commercial Bank Jamaica (NCB) announced that it has agreed to acquire a 29.99% stake in Trinidad and Tobago-based insurance group Guardian Holdings from the Lok Jack and Ahamad families and the International Finance Corporation. Based on the closing price of TTD 12.91 (USD 2.07) per share on the latest trading day before the announcement, i.e. 27 November 2015, the deal value is estimated at TTD 897.9mn (USD 143.7mn). The completion of the transaction is subject to regulatory approvals in Jamaica, Trinidad and Tobago and other relevant jurisdictions. "The acquisition is consistent with our stated intentions to expand our regional interests through strategic investments, joint ventures, mergers and acquisitions, in order to drive continued growth and shareholder value. This momentous partnership also lays the foundation for a future state where an indigenous Caribbean financial institution will also be a leader on the global stage," NCB Group Managing Director Patrick Hylton said. Guardian Holdings is the largest indigenous financial services and insurance group in the English and Dutch Caribbean. It has operations in 21 countries and it focuses on the provision of general and life insurance and asset management services among other. The group is listed on the Trinidad Stock Exchange and had a market capitalisation of TTD 2.99bn (USD 479mn) on 27 November 2015. National Commercial Bank Jamaica is the largest financial group in Jamaica and it offers deposit accounts, unsecured and secured loans, credit cards, overdraft lines, foreign exchange, personal and private banking services. It also provides wealth and asset management and insurance services. The group is listed on the Jamaica Stock Exchange and it had a market capitalisation of JMD 88.8bn (USD 754mn) on 27 November 2015.

The sellers include China-based private investors Chen Wei Ping, Chen Chen, Tang Tianrui, Yang Tianying, Yang Xiaoguang, Tan Poh Kuan Linda and He Qingzhi. The deal is subject to certain closing conditions. The purchase price consists of a cash payment of SGD 166.32mn to the sellers, except of Chen Wei Ping which will be satisfied by the issuance of 461.99 million Midas new shares at SGD 0.36 apiece. Furthermore, the deal also envisages an earn-out payment in the amount of SGD 97.68mn to Chen Wei Ping, which will be settled by the issuance of additional 271.33 million Midas new shares. The acquisition enables Midas to increase its aluminum products offering, and to benefit from a wider customer base which includes firms involved in the aviation, aerospace, rail transportation, marine, automotive and petrochemical industries. Huicheng Capital Ltd. operates in China through its subsidiary Dalian Huicheng Aluminium Co., Ltd. which manufactures aluminum alloy stretched plates and hot-rolled aluminium alloy plates, and coils. It employs more than 250 people and its revenues were CNY 112.99mn (USD 17.7mn) for 2014. Midas Holdings Ltd. manufactures aluminum alloy extrusion products for the passenger rail transportation sector in China. The company also manufactures and installs polyethylene pipes for use in gas piping networks and water distribution networks. In 2014, it reported revenues of CNY 1.32bn (USD 206.3mn).

113670 30/11/2015 巴西 TMAF Servicos de Solucoes Digitais Ltda 收购 Eletromidia SA 巴西 Telefonica SA 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418) 　 　 100 Brazilian out-of-home digital media company Eletromidia SA has agreed to purchase the total capital of local peer TMAF Servicos de Solucoes Digitais Ltda for an undisclosed price, the buyer's legal advisor disclosed to DealWatch. The seller is Spanish telecom Telefonica SA that acted through its Brazilian arm Telefonica On The Spot Solucoes Digitais do Brasil Ltda. Further transaction details were not disclosed. TMAF Servicos de Solucoes Digitais, established in 2015 in Sao Paulo city (Sao Paulo state, Brazil), operates as a digital out-of-home advertising company. Eletromidia, founded in 1993 in Sao Paulo, by local entrepreneurs Paulo and Fernanda Badra, specialises in digital media out-of-home solutions, such as urban furniture, digital outdoor displays, indoor networks, display and lighting solutions. The company manages over 500 static and digital panels in 26 Brazilian cities, and reaches a population of 6.7 million people. Telefonica SA, founded in 1924, is an integrated telecommunication company, offering mobile, fixed-line, pay-TV, internet and data access services to over 341 million clients in 21 countries in Europe and Latin America. Telefonica has been present in Brazil under the Vivo brand since 1998, and currently serves over 106.6 million clients in the mobile and fixed telephony, pay-TV, internet and data access segments as of 30 June 2015. The company is listed on the Spanish Stock Exchange and had a turnover of EUR 52.1bn (USD 69.2bn) and a net income of EUR 3bn (USD 4bn) in 2014. ________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A empresa brasileira de mídia digital out-of-home Eletromídia SA entrou em um acordo para a aquisição da homóloga local TMAF Serviços de Soluções Digitais Ltda, por um valor não revelado, o assessor jurídico da Eletromídia revelou para o DealWatch. A vendedora é a empresa de telecomunicações espanhola Telefónica SA, que agiu através de seu braço brasileiro Telefónica On The Spot Soluções Digitais do Brasil Ltda. Não foram divulgados mais detalhes acerca da transação. A TMAF Serviços de Soluções Digitais, estabelecida em 2015 na cidade de São Paulo (SP, Brasil), opera como uma empresa de publicidade digital out-of-home. A Eletromídia, fundada em 1993 em São Paulo, pelos empresários Paulo e Fernanda Badra, é especializada em soluções de mídia digital out-of-home, tais como instalações de mobiliário urbano, exposições digitais ao ar livre, redes indoor e outdoor, soluções de iluminação e exibição. A empresa opera mais de 500 painéis estáticos e digitais em 26 cidades brasileiras e atinge uma população de 6.7 milhões de pessoas. A Telefónica SA, fundada em 1924, é uma empresa integrada de telecomunicações, oferecendo serviços de telefonia fixa e móvel, TV por assinatura, internet e acesso a dados para mais de 341 milhões de clientes em 21 países na Europa e América Latina. A Telefónica está presente no Brasil sob a marca Vivo desde 1998, e atualmente atende a mais de 106.6 milhões de clientes nos segmentos de telefonia móvel e fixa, TV por assinatura, internet e acesso a dados, � data de 30 de junho de 2015. A empresa está listada na Bolsa de Valores da Espanha e apurou um faturamento de EUR 52.1bn (USD 69.2bn) e um lucro líquido de EUR 3bn (USD 4bn) em 2014.
113663 30/11/2015 英国 Office Retail Group Ltd 收购 Truworths International Ltd 南非 Silverfleet Capital; Company manager(s) 服装、服饰店 (448) 　 　 88.9 South African fashion apparel and accessories retailer Truworths International disclosed to the JSE that it has agreed to acquire an 88.9% stake in British footwear retailer Office Retail Group at an enterprise value of GBP 256mn (USD 385.1mn). The sellers include British private equity firm Silverfleet Capital and Office management. Under the deal, key management of Office will remain with the business and reinvest a portion of their sale proceeds to retain a minority stake in the company. Truworths said that the purchase enables it to expand its operations, extend its product offering, benefit from currency diversification and balance its revenue between cash and credit sales. Office Retail Group was founded in 1981 and is a young fashion footwear retailer focused on the U.K. and Ireland. The company has 104 stores and 47 concessions in the U.K., as well as five in Ireland, which operate under the the Office, Offspring, Poste and Poste Mistress brands. Office Retail Group generated sales of GBP 270.2mn (USD 442.9mn) for the year ended 25 January 2015. Truworths is a retailer of fashion apparel and related merchandise and has over 650 stores, mainly in South Africa. The company's brands include Truworths Man, Truworths Ladies, Daniel Hechter, Inwear, and LTD. Truworths is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and it booked ZAR 12.6bn (USD 1.1bn) revenues in its FY ended 28 June 2015.
113654 30/11/2015 印度 Micro Polypet Pvt Ltd 收购 Indorama Ventures Public Co Ltd 泰国 　 基础化学原料制造 (3251) 　 　 100 Thailand-based yarn manufacturer Indorama Ventures PCL announced that it has acquired Indian peer Micro Polypet Pvt Ltd (MicroPet) for an undisclosed amount. The acquisition marks the entry of Indorama Ventures in India. The buyer announced that the deal is in line with its strategy to establish operations in one of the world's fastest growing developing economies. Micro Polypet Pvt Ltd manufactures polyethylene terephthalate (PET) and polyester. The company has a plant in the Panipat district with a capacity of 216,000 tonnes. Indorama Ventures produces polyester chain and wool yarn to the food, beverages, personal and home care, health care, automotive, textile, and industrial sectors. The company's share are publicly traded in the Stock Exchange of Thailand and its revenues were THB 243.9bn (USD 7.4bn) for FY ended 31 December 2014.
113648 30/11/2015 南非; 德国; 葡萄牙; 西班牙 Tableros de Fibras SA (Tafisa) 收购 Empresas Copec SA 智利 Sonae Industria SGPS SA 木材加工及木制品业 (321) 145.59 (官方数据) 50 UPDATE 2: On 31 May 2016, Empresas Copec said it completed the purchase of the 50% interest in Tafisa. UPDATE 1: On 29 February 2016, the European Commission approved the transaction. ORIGINAL: Chilean industrial conglomerate Empresas Copec SA announced it has agreed to acquire a 50% stake in Spanish wood products manufacturer Tableros de Fibras SA (Tafisa), a subsidiary of Portugal-based Sonae Industria SGPS SA, for EUR 137.5mn (USD 145.6mn). For the purpose of the deal Empresas Copec, acting via its pulp producing subsidiary Celulosa Arauco y Constitucion SA, will subscribe for the entire capital increase to be launched by Tafisa. Matias Domeyko, executive vice-president of Arauco, said that this acquisition is aligned with the company's geographic diversification strategy and with its plans to position itself as a global enterprise with good prospects. With this purchase, Arauco becomes the second largest producer of wood panels in the world with annual production capacity of nine million cubic metres. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals and is expected to close during the first half of 2016. Following completion of the operation, Tafisa will change its name to Sonae Arauco SA, and will be co-managed by Empresas Copec and Sonae Industria. Sonae Arauco will own Sonae Industria's production facilities of wood-based panels (OSB, MDF and PB), chemicals and paper impregnation. This includes two wood panels facilities in Spain, two wood panels facilities and one resin plant in Portugal, four wood panels sites in Germany and two in South Africa. The deal excludes Sonae Industria's North American operations and its laminates and components business. Empresas Copec SA is an industrial conglomerate engaged in the forestry, non-mining exportation, distribution of liquid fuels, liquefied petroleum gas and natural gas, fishing, as well as in the electric power generation business. It reported total revenues of USD 23.84bn and a net income of USD 856mn for 2014.
113646 30/11/2015 阿尔巴尼亚; 波黑共和国; 克罗地亚; 科索沃; 马其顿; 黑山; 塞尔维亚; 斯洛文尼亚 Bonitetna Hisa I doo; Bonline doo; Rating doo 收购 Bisnode 瑞典 The Dun & Bradstreet Corp 办公支持服务 (5614) 　 　 100 Sweden-based decision support system (DSS) provider Bisnode announced it has agreed to acquire three ratings agencies - Slovenia's Bonitetna Hisa I. d.o.o., Croatia's Bonline d.o.o. and Serbia's Rating d.o.o. Financial details were not disclosed. The deal is expected to complete in January 2016, and the integration of the three companies into Bisnode group will be done throughout 2016. The acquisition will enable Bisnode to increase its customer base and market share in South Eastern European countries. The companies' operations cover Slovenia, Croatia, Serbia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Macedonia, Montenegro, Kosovo, Albania and offer credit solutions services to local and international B2B clients. For 2014, the target companies booked aggregate revenues of EUR 1,232mn. Previously, the three rating agencies operated under the world's largest business information company The Dun & Bradstreet Corp. (D&B). The D&B worldwide network can provide customers with data on 240 countries and more than 210 million companies. Since 2002, Bisnode has been a partner of D&B in its commercial information database, and through the current deal Bisnode will strengthen existing D&B business knowledge and customer relationship. Founded in 1989, Bisnode is one of Europe's leading providers of digital business and decision support information, with a complete offering of online services for market, credit and business information. The company has about 2,600 employees in 17 European countries. Bisnode is 70%-owned by Swedish PE firm Ratos AB, while the remaining 30% is owned by local media group Bonnier AB.
113640 30/11/2015 巴西 Fasa America Latina Participacoes Societarias SA 少数股权购买 Corpesca SA 智利 Private investor(s) 淀粉和植物脂肪和油制造业 (31122) 42.9 (官方数据) 30 UPDATE: On 10 March 2016, Corpesca announced it completed the acquisition of the 30% stake in FASA for BRL 171.6mn (USD 42.9mn). ORIGINAL: Chilean fishmeal and fish oil producer Corpesca SA, linked to Chilean group Grupo Angelini, announced that Brazilian private investor Valdir Jose Federhen and Brazilian holding company VJF&F Participacoes Ltda have accepted its binding offer as a result of which Corpesca will acquire a 30% stake in Brazilian high quality protein concentrates manufacturer Fasa America Latina Participacoes Societarias SA (FASA) for BRL 168mn (approximately USD 44mn). Corpesca, acting via its Brazilian subsidiary Corpesca do Brasil Empreendimentos e Participacoes Ltda, may pay an additional sum depending on FASA's working capital as of 31 December 2015, and depending on FASA's EBITDA results from 2016 to 2018. Further deal details were not revealed. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals. FASA produces high quality protein concentrates used as ingredients for animal feed. As a by-product of its industrial processes, the company obtains fats and oils used both as an energetic ingredient for animal feed as well as for biodiesel. The company generates consolidated annual revenues of approximately BRL 350mn (USD 90.9mn). Corpesca is dedicated to the fishing and production of fishmeal, fish oil and frozen jack and chub mackerel. The company's fish oil is used in the pharmaceutical and nutraceutical industries. Corpesca reported sales revenues of USD 804.6mn and net income of USD 16.6mn for 2014. Grupo Angelini is an industrial conglomerate operating mainly in the mining, energy, financial, food and forest products industries.
113583 30/11/2015 俄罗斯 Royal Bank of Scotland (Russia) 收购 Expobank 俄罗斯 The Royal Bank of Scotland PLC 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 44.31 (市场估计) 100 UPDATE: On 4 April 2016, Expobank announced the closing of the transaction. ORIGINAL: Russian commercial lender Expobank agreed to acquire 100% in the Russian subsidiary of Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS) for an undisclosed amount, the buyer announced. The acquisition is expected to complete in early Q2 2016 subject to approvals from the Central Bank. IFCMarkets analyst, Dmitry Lukashov, as cited by RBC news agency, values the asset at half of its own capital given the devaluation of Russian banks due to the mass revocation of operation licences. As of 1 November 2015, Royal Bank of Scotland (Russia) reported RUB 5.9bn (USD 92.3mn) of equity capital. Thus the transaction could have made around RUB 2.95bn (USD 44.3mn). Expobank's CEO Kirill Nifontov is quoted as saying in the press release that the purchase aligns with the bank's strategy on organic growth and business development through mergers and acquisitions. In February 2015, Royal Bank of Scotland announced its exit from 25 countries in Central and Eastern Europe, Middle Asia and Africa, including Russia. The bank plans to focus on regions where it has stable leading positions and observes maximum growth potential. RBS entered the Russian market in 2008 with the acquisition of Dutch bank ABN Amro. The bank specialises in servicing large legal entities and mainly foreign companies with interests in Russia. RBS Russia also arranges syndicated loans and trade financing to Russian companies-borrowers. As of 1 November 2015, the total assets of RBS Russia fell more than two times since the start of 2015 - down to RUB 28.5bn (USD 445.8mn). In 2014, the bank posted net profit of RUB 212mn (USD 5.62mn). Expobank was founded in 1994 and its main shareholder is businessman Igor Kim (66.6%). The bank has 19 branch-offices in 11 Russian cities, servicing more than 100,000 private clients and around 7,500 legal entities. As of 1 November 2015, the bank's net assets amounted to RUB 62.7bn (USD 980.3mn), ranking 93rd in Russia.

The sellers were: Ian Kershaw (89%), Samantha Gibbs (10%), and Simon Emmons (1%). The buyer will finance the transaction through its own funds and bank debt. In August 2015, Amica purchased a 39.29% stake in French distributor Sideme for EUR 1.6mn (USD 1.76mn). CDA Group has 25 years of experience in wholesale and distribution of kitchen appliances. The company is based in Nottinghamshire and employs 200 people. It expects to reach revenues of GBP 43mn and EBITDA of GBP 2.82mn in 2015. Amica Wronki manufactures cookers, ovens, washing machines, refrigerators, as well as small kitchen and home appliances. The company exports 70% of its production. It employs around 2,000 people, and posted revenues of PLN 2.03bn (EUR 484.7mn) and net profit of PLN 78.1mn (EUR 18.7mn) in 2014. Note: All multiples are calculated based on the CDA's estimated financials for 2015.
113599 30/11/2015 印度 LeapMile Logistics Pvt Ltd 少数股权购买 SSN Logistics Pvt Ltd; Flipkart Online Services Pvt Ltd; Accel Partners; Hon Hai Precision Industry Co Ltd 印度; 美国; 台湾 　 数据处理、主机管理及相关服务 (518); 定制电脑编程服务 (541511) 9 (官方数据) 　 India-based logistics and analytics firm LeapMile Logistics Pvt Ltd which operates as QikPod, has raised USD 9mn, in a funding round led by Flipkart and Accel Partners, VCCircle reported. The round also saw the participation of SSN Logistics Pvt Ltd and Foxconn. The proceeds of the round will be used to build a network of automated lockers, hire talent and further develop its technology. LeapMile Logistics operates QikPod, a soon to be launched logistics data platform and automated locker provider. The firm plans to install over 50,000 lockers across India. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bangalore. Accel Partners is a venture capital and private equity investor focused on technology-based firms. It has a portfolio of over 300 companies and has presence in the U.K., U.S.A. and India. Flipkart is an Indian e-commerce portal that offers more than 20 million products from over 70 categories including electronics, apparel, furniture, books and car accessories. The firm has 20,000 employees, 13 warehouses, 26 million registered users, and claims to have 8 million page visits daily.
113598 30/11/2015 西班牙 Brandy and sherry business of Beam Suntory 收购 Emperador Inc 菲律宾 Beam Suntory Inc 葡萄酒制造 (31213) 291.18 (官方数据) 100 U.S.-based premium spirits company Beam Suntory Inc announced that it will sell its brandy and sherry business in Spain for a total consideration of EUR 275mn (USD 291.2mn). The buyer on the deal is Philippine beverage company Emperador Inc. The acquisition includes a portfolio of brandies and sherry wine namely Emperador, Terry Centenario, Trese Cepas and Harveys. The seller's production operations in Jerez and Tomelloso, Spain will also be acquired under the deal terms. The investment brings Emperador as the top brandy company globally. In 2014, Emperador bought U.K.-based whiskey manufacturer Whyte & Mackay Group Ltd for a total enterprise value of GBP 430mn (USD 729mn). Emperador Inc, formerly known as Touch Solutions Inc, is involved in the production of wines and brandy. Its brands include Generoso Brandy and The BaR flavoured vodka, as well as Emperador Deluxe Spanish Edition brandy. The company's Chairman is billionaire Andrew Tan, one of the Philippines' richest men. Emperador had revenues of PHP 32bn (USD 713.9mn) for FY ended 31 December 2014. Beam Suntory Inc manufactures and markets bourbon whiskey, tequila, vodka, tequila, rums, cognacs, cordials and gin. It is a unit of Japanese beverage company Suntory Holdings Ltd.
113578 30/11/2015 波兰 Dubois 41 office building 收购 Warburg-HIH Invest Real Estate GmbH 德国 Nacarat 房地产 (531) 22.25 (市场估计) 100 German investment company Warburg-HIH Invest Real Estate has acquired Dubois 41 office building in Poland from French property developer Nacarat for around EUR 21mn (USD 22.3mn), eurobuildcee.com reported. The buyer acted through the fund Europa Select Immobilien Invest. Dubois 41 is located in the city of Wroclaw. Completed in May 2015, it offers 8,000 m2 of office and retail space. The building is fully leased. Warburg-HIH Invest Real Estate is a real estate investment manager serving institutional investors. It has EUR 5.6bn in assets under management as of 30 September 2015. Nacarat is a property developer focused on France, Belgium and Poland. The company has 203 employees and posted revenues of EUR 260mn in 2013. Nacarat is a 70%-owned by French building and civil engineering group Rabot Dutilleul.
113575 30/11/2015 波兰 Galeria Katowicka 收购 Meyer Bergman 英国 Polskie Koleje Panstwowe SA; NEINVER 房地产 (531) 　 　 20 U.K.-based investment company Meyer Bergman acquired the remaining 50% stake in Galeria Katowicka shopping centre in Poland from Spanish property developer and fund manager Neinver, and Polish state-owned railway group Polskie Koleje Panstwowe (PKP), money.pl reported. Financial terms of the transaction were not disclosed. In 2010, Meyer Bergman, Neinver and PKP formed a joint venture to build Galeria Katowicka. In 2012, Meyer Bergman increased its stake in the shopping centre to 80% by acquiring an additional 30%. Galeria Katowica is located in the city of Katowice. Opened in 2013, it has 250 retail units and GLA of 47,500 m2. Meyer Bergman, founded in 2004, targets attractive investment opportunities in Western, Central and Eastern Europe with typical transaction values ranging from EUR 30mn to EUR 300mn. The company has 37 years of investment and development experience, and over EUR 7.5bn in total transaction value to date. Neinver, based in Madrid and established in 1969, is one of the leading European developers, investors and property managers. It manages 15 commercial centres under The Style Outlets and FACTORY brands, and it has also developed more than 1.5 million m2 of industrial projects. Its portfolio comprises a total retail area of 565,100 m2. The group has presence in France, Germany, Italy, Poland, Portugal, Spain and The Netherlands. PKP was established in 2001 as a result of the commercialisation of the former Polish national railways state enterprise, which was founded in 1926. PKP is a state-run company and is the dominant railway operator in Poland. It employs around 85,000 people.
113574 30/11/2015 毛利塔尼亚 Block C-10 offshore Mauritania 少数股权购买 Sterling Energy Plc 英国 Tullow Oil PLC 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 　 　 13.5 U.K.-based oil and gas company Sterling Energy disclosed to the LSE that it has agreed to acquire a 13.5% stake in Block C-10 offshore Mauritania from British peer Tullow Oil. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Block C-10 covers an area of 10,725 km2 and it lies in water depths of between 50 metres and 2,400 metres. The production sharing contract for the block is in the second phase of the exploration period and Tullow has matured a drill ready Neocomian carbonate prospect in water depth of approximately 100 metres. An exploration well to test this prospect is expected to be drilled in 2017. "The company looks forward to de-risking the remaining potential on block, including the deeper shelf carbonate play, leading to an exploration well with Tullow in early 2017," said Tullow CEO Eskil Jersing. Sterling Energy is an oil and gas company focused mainly on high potential exploration opportunities in Africa. The company has operations in Somaliland, Cameroon, Madagascar and Mauritania. Sterling Energy is listed on the AIM market of the London Stock Exchange and it booked USD 16mn revenues in 2014.
101724 30/11/2015 巴西 Congonhas Minerios SA 合资企业 Companhia Siderurgica Nacional (CSN); Itochu Corp; JFE Steel Corp; Kobe Steel Ltd; Nisshin Steel Co Ltd; Posco Co Ltd; China Steel Corp; Nacional Minerios SA (Namisa) 巴西; 日本; 韩国; 台湾 　 铁矿石的开采 (21221); 铁路运输业 (482); 交通运输辅助活动 (488) 　 　 UPDATE 3: On 30 November 2015 the transaction was completed, the buyers' legal advisor disclosed to DealWatch. UPDATE 2: On 30 November 2015, the buyers have officialise the joint venture on the BM&FBOVESPA Stock Exchange. The deal is still subject to regulatory approvals and the fulfilment of certain conditions. UPDATE 1: On 12 December 2014, the Board of Directors of CSN approved the transaction. ORIGINAL: Brazilian steel producer Companhia Siderurgica Nacional (CSN) and Brazil Japan Iron Ore Corp, a consortium of six Japanese, South Korean and Taiwanese companies, announced an agreement to combine their assets related to iron ore mining business in Brazil into a new company, called Congonhas Minerios SA. Under the agreement, the consortium, formed by Japanese trading group Itochu Corp, Japanese steel manufacturers JFE Steel Corp, Kobe Steel Ltd and Nisshin Steel Co Ltd, Korean steel-maker POSCO, and Taiwanese peer China Steel Corp, will contribute its combined 40% stake in Brazilian iron ore miner Nacional Minerios SA (Namisa) to the new entity. In turn, CSN will contribute to Congonhas Minerios its 60% stake in Namisa, a 100% working interest in the Casa de Pedra iron ore mine, an 8.63% equity interest in Brazilian rail transportation company MRS Logistica SA and the concession for the Terminal de Graneis Solidos (Tecar) port terminal in Itaguai, Rio de Janeiro state. CSN will control an 88.25% stake in Congonhas Minerios, with the remaining 11.75% equity interest being held by the Asian consortium. The agreement also includes an earn-out clause, which based on the fulfilment of certain conditions, can dilute the equity interest of the Asian consortium in Congonhas Minerios to 8.21%. The transaction is subject to regulatory and shareholders' approvals and the fulfilment of certain conditions, and is expected to close in a period of 12 months. The deal marks the settlement of a dispute between the parties, which involved USD 3bn in potential penalties to be paid by CSN to the Asian consortium for missing previously agreed expansion goals for Namisa. In 2008, the Asian consortium acquired a 40% stake in Namisa for USD 3.1bn. Namisa, founded in 2007, specialises in the extraction, production and sale of iron ore. The company operates iron ore mines and processing facilities in the state of Minas Gerais, with production capacity of 39 million tonnes per year, as well as a logistic network of railway systems and port terminals to ship its products to the international market. Namisa posted BRL 2.4bn (USD 1.1bn) in revenues and a net profit of BRL 892.9mn (USD 414.7mn) in 2013. Casa de Pedra operates an iron ore mine and a processing facility, with a production capacity of 21 million tonnes per year, located in the municipality of Congonhas, Minas Gerais state. Its proved and probable reserves are estimated at 1.4 billion tonnes of iron ore. MRS, founded in 1996, is cargo railway transportation company that controls, operates and monitors the Southeastern Federal Railroad Network, with a total length of 1,643 km, which interconnects the states of Rio de Janeiro, Minas Gerais and Sao Paulo. The company is also responsible for the management of the railway system, which interconnects the Casa de Pedra mine with CSN's steel mill Presidente Vargas in the municipality of Volta Redonda, Rio de Janeiro state, and the Tecar port terminal in the state of Rio de Janeiro. MRS reached a turnover of BRL 3bn (USD 1.4bn) and a net profit of BRL 469.4mn (USD 218mn) in 2013. CSN, founded in 1941, is an integrated steel producer with operations from the mining of iron ore to the production and sale of a diversified range of steel products, including coated galvanized flat steel and tinplate, for the automotive, construction, packaging, home appliance and OEM (capital goods) industries. The company operates five steel plants in Brazil, Germany, Portugal and the United States, with installed capacity of 7.1 million tons per year, and has some 22,000 employees. CSN posted BRL 17.3bn (USD 8bn) in revenues and a net profit of BRL 509mn (USD 236.4mn) in 2013. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UPDATE 3: Em 30 de novembro de 2015 a transação foi concluída, o assessor jurídico das compradoras revelou para o DealWatch. UPDATE 2: Em 20 de novembro de 2015, as empresas vendedoras oficializaram o acordo num comunicado na Bolsa de Valores BM&FBOVESPA. A transação continua sujeita a aprovações regulatórias e ao cumprimento de determinadas condições. UPDATE 1: Em 12 de dezembro de 2014, o Conselho de Administração da CSN aprovou a operação. ORIGINAL: A siderúrgica brasileira Companhia Siderúrgica Nacional (CSN) e Brazil Japan Iron Ore Corp, um consórcio de seis empresas japonesas, sul-coreanas e taiwaneses, anunciaram um acordo para combinar seus ativos relacionados ao negócio de mineração de minério de ferro no Brasil, em uma nova empresa, batizada de Congonhas Minérios SA. Pelo acordo, o consórcio, formado pela trading japonesa Itochu Corp, as fabricantes de aço japonesas JFE Steel Corp, Kobe Steel Ltd e Nisshin Steel Co Ltd, a sul-coreana POSCO e a taiwanesa China Steel Corp, irá contribuir sua participação combinada de 40% na mineradora brasileira Nacional Minérios SA (Namisa) para a nova entidade. Por sua vez, a CSN irá contribuir para a Congonhas Minérios sua participação de 60% na Namisa, uma participação de 100% na mina de minério de ferro Casa de Pedra, uma participação de 8.63% na empresa brasileira de transporte ferroviário MRS Logística SA e a concessão do Terminal de Granéis Solidos (Tecar) em Itaguaí, no Estado do Rio de Janeiro. A CSN irá deter uma participação de 88.25% na Congonhas Minérios, sendo a participação restante de 11.75% detida pelo consórcio asiático. O acordo também inclui uma cláusula de earn-out, que com base no cumprimento de determinadas condições, pode diluir a participação acionária do consórcio asiático na Congonhas Minérios para 8.21%. A transação está sujeita a aprovações regulatórias e societárias e ao cumprimento de determinadas condições, e deverá ser concluída em um período de 12 meses. O negócio marca a resolução de um litígio entre as partes, que envolveu uma penalidade potencial de USD 3bn a ser paga pela CSN ao consórcio asiático por não cumprir metas de expansão anteriormente acordadas para a Namisa. Em 2008, o consórcio asiático adquiriu uma participação de 40% na Namisa por USD 3.1bn. A Namisa, fundada em 2007, é especializada na extração, produção e venda de minério de ferro. A empresa opera minas de minério de ferro e instalações de processamento no Estado de Minas Gerais, com capacidade de produção de 39 milhões de toneladas por ano, bem como uma rede logística composta de ferrovia e porto para escoamento de sua produção para o mercado internacional. A Namisa apresentou um faturamento de BRL 2.4bn (USD 1.1bn) e um lucro líquido de BRL 892.9mn (USD 414.7mn) em 2013. A Casa de Pedra opera uma mina de minério de ferro e uma instalação de processamento, com uma capacidade de produção de 21 milhões de toneladas por ano, localizada no município de Congonhas, Minas Gerais. As suas reservas provadas e prováveis são estimadas em 1.4 bilhões de toneladas de minério de ferro. A MRS, fundada em 1996, é uma empresa ferroviária que controla, opera e monitora a Malha Sudeste da Rede Ferroviária Federal, com uma extensão total de 1,643 km, que interliga os Estados do Rio de Janeiro, Minas Gerais e São Paulo. A empresa também é responsável pela gestão da ferrovia que interliga a mina Casa de Pedra com a usina da CSN Presidente Vargas, no município de Volta Redonda, Estado do Rio de Janeiro, e com o terminal portuário Tecar, no Estado do Rio de Janeiro. A MRS atingiu um volume de negócios de BRL 3bn (USD 1.4bn) e um lucro líquido de BRL 469.4mn (USD 218mn) em 2013. A CSN, fundada em 1941, é uma companhia siderúrgica integrada, com operações desde a extração do minério de ferro até a produção e comercialização de uma diversificada linha de produtos siderúrgicos, incluindo aços planos revestidos galvanizados e folhas metálicas, para os setores automotivo, construção civil, embalagens, linha branca e OEM (bens de capital). A empresa opera cinco usinas no Brasil, Alemanha, Portugal e Estados Unidos, com capacidade instalada de 7.1 milhões de toneladas por ano, e tem cerca de 22,000 funcionários. A CSN gerou um faturamento de BRL 17.3bn (USD 8bn) e um lucro líquido de BRL 509mn (USD 236.4mn) em 2013.
113566 29/11/2015 巴西 Hotel Urbano Viagens e Turismo SA 少数股权购买 Insight Venture Partners LP 美国 Jose Eduardo Mendes - private investor; Joao Ricardo Mendes - private investor 互联网出版与传播 (516); 旅行社、旅游经营者的活动 (5615) 57.14 (DW 估计) 11 U.S. venture capital firm Insight Venture Partners has agreed to purchase an 11% stake in Brazilian online travel agency Hotel Urbano Viagens e Turismo SA, Brazilian economics and business magazine Exame reported. According to Exame magazine, the transaction values Hotel Urbano at BRL 2bn (USD 519.5mn) and the company is expected to have a turnover of around BRL 600mn (USD 155.8mn) in 2015. The sellers are brothers Joao Ricardo Mendes and Jose Eduardo Mendes who established Hotel Urbano in 2011. Upon the completion of the transaction, Insight will have a 41% share in the company, becoming a controlling shareholder, while the founders will have a 35% participation. Hotel Urbano, founded in 2010, is the leading group buying site in Brazil for accommodations and destinations, specialised in discount offers for hotel rooms, vacation packages, cruises and tourist attractions in Brazil and Latin America. Its portfolio comprises more than 2,000 offers from 4,000 travel agencies, hotels, hostels and resorts. Insight is a venture capital and private equity firm, focused on investments in software, e-commerce, internet and data-services companies. Since its creation in 1995, the firm has raised more than USD 13bn through eight private equity funds and has invested in more than 250 companies from 65 countries. Insight's investment portfolio in Brazil includes healthcare management system provider MV Informatica Nordeste, healthcare web platform Bionexo, consumer electronics on-line store KaBuM!, social games publisher Mentez, and on-line language school Open English, among others. ______________________________________________________________________________________________ A empresa norte-americana de capital de risco Insight Venture Partners entrou em um acordo para adquirir 11% do capital social da agência brasileira de viagens online Hotel Urbano Viagens e Turismo SA, a revista brasileira de economia e negócios Exame apurou. De acordo com a revista Exame, a Hotel Urbano está avaliada em BRL 2bn (USD 519.5mn) e a empresa espera gerar um faturamento de cerca de BRL 600mn (USD 155.8mn) em 2015. Os vendedores são os irmãos João Ricardo Mendes e José Eduardo Mendes, que estabeleceram a Hotel Urbano em 2011. Após a conclusão da transação, a Insight vai deter uma participação de 41% na empresa, tornando-se acionista controladora, enquanto que os fundadores vão ter uma participação de 35% na empresa. A Hotel Urbano, fundada em 2010, opera o site de compras coletivas líder no Brasil para acomodações e destinos, especializado em ofertas de desconto para quartos de hotel, pacotes de viagens, cruzeiros e atrações turísticas no Brasil e na América Latina. O portfólio da empresa é composto por mais de 2,000 ofertas de 4,000 agências de viagens, hotéis, pousadas e resorts. A Insight é uma empresa de capital de risco e investimento em participações, focada em investimentos em empresas de software, comércio eletrônico, internet e serviço de dados. Desde a sua criação em 1995, a empresa captou mais de USD 13bn por meio de oito fundos de investimento em participações e investiu em mais de 250 empresas em 65 países. A sua carteira de investimentos no Brasil inclui a provedora de sistemas de gestão para o setor de saúde MV Informática Nordeste, a web plataforma de saúde Bionexo, a loja virtual de eletrônica de consumo KaBuM!, a desenvolvedora de jogos sociais Mentez e a escola virtual de inglês Open English, entre outros empreendimentos.
114093 28/11/2015 巴西 Majority stakes in 13 warehouses in Pernambuco state, Brazil 收购 The Blackstone Group LP 美国 Cone SA 建筑用及结构性金属制品制造 (3323) 　 　 　 U.S. private equity group Blackstone has agreed to acquire a majority stake in the Cone Suape warehouse project (municipality of Cabo de Santo Agostinho, Pernambuco state), operated by port and industrial complex manager Cone SA, Brazilian media sources reported. Financial terms were not disclosed. According to Brazilian media Valor Economico, Cone SA will hold a minority stake in the project. Nevertheless, part of the Cone's portfolio of assets under management, located in Bahia state, are not subject of the current agreement. This is the second acquisition of warehouses that Blackstone is making in the country. On 25 November 2015 the company completed the purchase of 10 real estate properties from Brazilian real estate investment firm BR Properties for BRL 1.07bn (USD 310.4mn). Cone Suape's project portfolio comprises 13 warehouses with a total area of 331,000 m2 and hosts around 70 customers. Blackstone, established in 1985, is a global alternative investment firm with USD 310.5bn in assets under management as of 31 March 2015, allocated in real estate private equity funds, hedge funds, and mutual funds. With a team of over 1,600 employees and 23 offices in North America, Europe and the Asia-Pacific region, the company provides financial and strategic advisory services, restructuring and reorganisation advisory and fund placement services. Blackstone is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and booked a net profit of USD 1.58bn in 2014. ________________________________________________________________________________________ O grupo norte-americano de capital privado em participações Blackstone entrou em um acordo para adquirir uma participação majoritária no projeto Cone Suape de galpões (município de Cabo de Santo Agostinho, PE), operado pela gestora portuária e industrial Cone SA, fontes da mídia brasileira apuraram. Os termos financeiros não foram divulgados. Segundo a mídia brasileira Valor Econômico, a Cone SA vai deter uma participação minoritária no projeto. No entanto, parte da carteira de ativos sob gestão da Cone, localizados no Estado da Bahia, ficou de fora do negócio. Esta é a segunda aquisição de galpões que a Blackstone faz no Brasil. Em 25 de novembro de 2015, a empresa completou a compra de 10 imóveis da empresa brasileira de investimento imobiliário BR Properties, por BRL 1.07bn (USD 310.4mn). A carteira do projeto da Cone Suape está composta por 13 galpões com uma área total de 331,000 m2 que aluga para cerca de 70 clientes. A Blackstone, criada em 1985, é uma empresa global de investimentos alternativos com USD 310.5bn em ativos sob gestão, até à data de 31 de março de 2015, alocados em fundos de investimento imobiliário de capital privado, fundos hedge e fundos mútuos. Com uma equipe de mais de 1,600 colaboradores e 23 escritórios na América do Norte, Europa e no região da Ásia-Pacífico, a empresa oferece serviços de assessoria financeira e estratégica, reestruturação e reorganização de consultoria e serviços de colocação de fundos. A Blackstone está listada na Bolsa de Valores da Nova Iorque e apurou um lucro líquido de USD 1.58bn em 2014.
　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 总计: 92,099.16
